@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ ya thA lab+d+ha kha sa ma tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ ji bzhin brnyes pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig
sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /sa gsum kun gyi snying po dang ldan pa/ /dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas ngo bo mdzad/ /de ni mkha' dang mnyam par spyod pa'o/ /gal te de 'dra'i ngo bor sems dag
pa/ /byis pa 'di ni don dam sgom pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rang bzhin mthong min te/ /sangs rgyas dang ni rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / /rin chen tog dang pad ldan 'jug pa ste/ /lha de rnams kyi rang
bzhin yod ma yin/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i rang bzhin no/ /dang po'i chos las de rnams 'byung ba ste/ /mkha' dang lhan cig sems can khams rnams kyang / /gzhug rnams su
ni bstan bcos tshad mar byas/ /gdod nas dag pa'i go 'phang mkha' mnyam mtshungs/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan dang yang ldan/ /gang zhig chos de nyid kyi rang bzhin can/ /sa gsum po
yi chos ni 'byung 'gyur ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la ni phyag 'tshal ba'i/ /bsod nams kyang ni mtha' yas 'byung 'gyur zhing / /rdo rje sems dpa'
de la phyag 'tshal bas/ /chos kyi bdag nyid chen po 'thob par 'gyur/ /sems can thams cad yongs su bsgom par yang / /bya ba 'di ni thar pa'i rang bzhin no/ /dngos kun rdo rje sems
dpar dag byas pa'i/ /thar pa chos kyi rang bzhin bya ba ste/ /chos 'di 'jig pa med pa'i rang bzhin can/ /'jig rten pas ni rang bzhin gzhan du byas/ /'di ni sku dang gsung dang thugs dag
ni/ /chos 'di yi ni dang po 'byung ba ste/ /rnal 'byor gnas ni lha mo skul byed ma/ /der ni dang por chos rnams 'byung 'gyur ba'o/ /der ni sngags rnams rdo rje gcig dngos bsgom/ /chos kyi rang bzhin
rdo rje dngos dmigs sam/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis kyang rab brgyan cing / /sku mdog kyang ni sngon po'i rang bzhin can/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dge ba ste/ /gcig pa'i rang bzhin
nyid ni bsgom par bya/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus gnas par/ /yi ge bskyed pa nyid du bsam par bya/ /yi ge'i gzugs ni yongs su gyur pa las/ /rdo rje rang bzhin nyid du bsam
par bya/ /mchu yi mtha' ni sngags pas bsgom bya ba/ /rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin te/ /gnyis su med pa'i sku yi rang bzhin can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dmigs par bya ba'o/ /'di ni sems
nyid yongs su grub pa ste/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa yis ni gsungs pa yin/ /gang zhig bsgom pa 'di yis bsgom byed pa/ /sems kyi rang bzhin nyid ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di ni lha mo bzhi rnams ro
gcig pa'o/ /ngo bo blos ni mkha' dang mnyam las bsgom/ /de lta'i chos byas sems kyi rang bzhin te/ /lha mo thar pa'i rang bzhin nyid du bsgom/ /rdo rje sems dpa' des mthong ba/ /
chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin can/ /rnal 'byor gnas dang rol pa ste/ /thams cad mnyam pa'i btsun mor bcas/ /bkod pa dag dang ldan par gnas/ /mkhas bcas dngos
las byung de la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gang mthong bar/ /gzung ba sangs rgyas spro bsdu'o/ /bzhi yi ngo bo lha mo bzhi/ /dbus su nges par gnas pa ste/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin gyis/ /sa gsum
la ni khyab pa'o/ /lha yi der ni kha bzhi pa'i/ /lha tshogs rdo rje nyid yin no/ /de la sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/ /rnam 'phrul thams cad 'di yi'o/ /ci lta ci ltar sems can rnams/ /skye bar 'gyur ba

lan nyid de/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam 'phrul ni/ /sna tshogs rdo rje yin par 'gyur/ /de las gang byung lha kun kyang / /rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul yin/ /sems can rnams ni chos kyi ngo bor blta/ /sa
gsum thams cad gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /rol pa mdzad pa sangs rgyas kyis gzigs shing / /de yis rnal 'byor dbang phyug ma kun mthong / /lha yi dam tshig gi le'u ste dang po'o// //
rtag tu mchog ldan khyod kyi ni/ /dam tshig lha mo thams cad kyi/ /mchog tu gyur pa'i lha mo ni/ /du mchis bdag cag zhu bar 'tshal/ /de la glu bzhi gsungs pa ste/ /steng dang dbyer med byas pa'i
chos mnyam rang snang ma/ /zhi la thar pa ma dang mchog tu mnyam byed ma/ /gang phyir sgyu ma'i mdzad pas sangs rgyas rnams dang mnyam/ /mkha' mnyam thams cad rol pa zhi ba med pa'o/ /
ru lu ru lu b+h+yo ru d+ha/ mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams kun du rol pa ste/ /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang ni sgra brnyan chos mnyam snang / /lhan cig gnas min cha ste rang nyid pi wang mtshungs/ /
byas pa'i snang ba dang ni mnyam par gyur pa'o/ /gang zhig chos rnams snang ba nam mkha' dang mnyam pa/ /der ni rdo rje mdzad pa gzugs can lta bu ste/ /rdo rje'i theg pa der ni gzugs
sogs 'dod yon gyi/ /bde ba mi zad sna tshogs dang mnyam stsol mdzad pa'o/ /rnal 'byor gnas ni du ma'i rdo rje'i tshul 'di ni/ /du ma'i gzugs 'dzin der ni rdo rje dang mnyam zhing / /nyid
dang 'dra ba'i sems dpa' rnams ni spro mdzad pa'i/ rdo rje dbyings dang lhan cig mchog stsol mdzad/ rang bdag mkha' mnyam bzhugs la bskul ba ni/ gang zhig rtse gcig sems
kyis 'di nyan cing / brjod bcas sems kyi glu 'di 'dzin pa'o/ /glu 'di nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa ste/ der ni gzugs bcas rdo rje len pa'i phyir/ rdo rje'i bdag nyid thugs ni sad
byed cing / /rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir ni rgyud kyang len par 'gyur/ 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig ste rdo rje gzhan rang bzhin/ sngags pas thugs chud dkyil 'khor kun bsgoms shing / chos kyi
dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pad mchog der bsgom pa/ dkyil 'khor dbus gnas chos ni hU~M gi dbye ba can/ /gzugs rnams thams cad sgyu ma'i ngo bor nges par brtag /thugs kyi ngo bor
gcig bsam rdo rje theg pa'o/ /sems ni mkha' mnyam sems kyi theg pa rang bzhin med/ gnyis ka'i rang bzhin yang ni lus can ma yin te/ der ni rdo rje la ni med pa yis/ rdo rje sems
dpa' khyod ni gcig pa'i rang bzhin te/ 'jig rten pa la sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid du mdzad/ sems can 'dul ba'i rang bzhin du ni sad mdzad pa/ kye lags rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni gcig
pa'i dngos/ lha mo bzhis smras rdo rje kun tu spangs pa ste/ nang du gnas pa rdo rje rol par ldan pa dang / thugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis der ni rab tu gnas/ thugs kyi gsang ba'i chos ni
rnam par 'byung ba'o/ /nam mkha'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje spro bya zhing / spros pa'i rdo rje slar yang bsdu byas te/ sems kyi rang bzhin du ni gcig phyir ro/ /sems ni 'gog par gyur pa na/ /
kun kyang mnyam zhing mtshungs par mthong / /yang dang yang du sngags bsdus pas/ /gcig pa'i rnam par bya ba'o/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // bram ze dang
ni gdol pa gcig pa'i rang bzhin du/ /chos rnams kyi ni rang bzhin sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o/ /gcig gi rang bzhin la gnas pa yi dngos po ste/ /de la rdo rje can gyis mnyam pa'i ngo bor

gsungs/ /bram ze dang ni khyi dag gcig pa'i dngos yin zhing / /rus pa'i rgyan rnams kyang ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te/ /rdo rje'i go 'phang de la len pa'i rang bzhin no/ /rnal 'byor de la mnyam pa'i ngo bor des mthong ste/ /de dang
mnyam pa'i rang bzhin sems can rnams la sbas/ /de yi rnal 'byor rang bzhin lha mos gsungs pa ni/ /lha mo thams cad der ni gcig pa'i rang bzhin te/ /gtso bo dang bcas mdzes pa gcig pu 'byung
gyur khyod/ /mnyam pa rang bzhin de ni sngags pa gcig pu ste/ /rdo rje rnam par sad par byed pa gcig pu nyid/ /der ni zhe sdang rang bzhin dag ni zhig pa ste/ /yan lag phyed pa'i chos ni 'byung
bar 'gyur ba yin/ /der ni rdo rje'i btsun mo gcig rang bzhin/ /gang tshe rdo rje la ni dbyangs kyis bstod pa'i tshe/ /lha yi g.yon gyi phyed dang gcig tu gyur par blta/ /lung nyid tshad mar byas nas
rdo rje sems dpa' de bsgom bya/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // glang po dang ni rta dang mi dang khyi dang ni/ /ba lang sha ste thams cad ma lus gyur pa rnams/ /dam tshig de
nyid gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin te/ /mkha' mnyam rang bzhin can gyis rnal 'byor pas bza' ba'i/ /dam tshig 'di ni lha mo bzhi pos gsungs pa'o/ /rnal 'byor pa la bsgom pa'i sems

dang ldan gyur cing / /sems gcig pa ni rdo rje 'chang nyid 'grub 'gyur te/ /dngos po nyid dang bcas pa'i thugs ni skye bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i dngos mdzad zhi ba ma gsungs snying po ste/ /'di ltar chos rnams mnyam

pa nyid du rtogs bya zhing / /de ltar mkha' dang mnyam par rnam par dpyad par bya/ /lha 'di rnam snang lha mo lnga rnams de'i bdag nyid/ /rdo rje theg pa la ni mnyam pa'i rang bzhin te/ /skul byed mas ni srid pa'i
rang bzhin yin phyir ro/ /gcig pa'i dang po rdo rje sems te skur mthong ba/ /rdo rje'i theg par 'dod rnams lha mos 'di skad gsungs/ /bden pa bskyed pa 'di ni rnam snang lha mos gsungs/ /
'di ni zla ba'i dbus gnas bsgom pa rdo rje'i gsang sngags te/ /de ni sems gcig pa yis rdo rje rnam bsgom pa/ /rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa nyid do/ /rnal 'byor gnas kyi dbus
gnas rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsgom/ /ngas ni rdo rje'i theg par 'di skad du/ /chos rnams gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid du bstan/ /sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // dngos med mi

rtag pa las dngos bcas lus bsgom min/ /lha mos skul ba byed pa'i dngos po ste/ /de ltar chos las nges par brtag bya bas/ /sems ni nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang / /dngos po theg pa med pa'i dngos por bya/ /

dngos po'i rang bzhin la ni theg pa med pa ste/ /sems ni nam mkha' nyid dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin can/ /snga ma ci bzhin sems ni rnam par sbyar bar bya/ /ci ltar de ni dngos por bya ba ste/ /dngos po 'di ni theg
par 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ /sems can nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang / /dbus su tshig ni chos la nges rtog par/ /sems las dngos po nyid du bya ba ste/ /rnam pa du ma'i tshul gyi rang bzhin

gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed par bya ba'o/ /ci ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med pa'i chu/ /'di 'dra'i sems ni myur ba'i ngo bor bsgrub/ /de ltar bstan du med pa 'di ni nga yis bstan/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sku

yi rang bzhin gyis/ /bzhi pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bor bya ba ste/ /de la rdo rje'i chu ni yi dam lha yi rang bzhin can/ /thugs kyi ngo bo'i rnal 'byor pas bza' bya/ /chos dang dge 'dun dang ni rdo rje'i chu ste de rnams mnyam pa'i rang bzhin
te/ /zhag dang khrag sogs mchog tu mdzes par rab bzhugs dngos po'i lus ni bsgyur bar bya/ /bza' dang bca' dang mal stan la sogs de rnams thams cad 'di'i rang bzhin/ /gang zhig ting nge

'dzin du nges par bstan pa'ang de dang gcig pa'i rang bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni gsum char rdo rje'i ngo bor mdzad/ /chos rnams thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/ /rdo rje can gyis sgyu ma'i rang
bzhin nyid du gsungs/ /de yi rang bzhin mkha' mnyam so sor snang bar 'gyur/ /sgyu ma'i ngo bor nges par bstan pa yis/ /rdo rje yi ni nges par 'jug par bya ba ste/ /sems can rang bzhin la ni theg
par med/ /sems ni de la gnas pa'i snying po'o/ /de lta'i ngo bos thugs kyi bdag nyid kyi/ /sngags pa khyod ni 'grub par 'gyur ba ste/ /thugs dang spro dang slar yang bsdus bya ba/ /gsum car yang ni
gcig pa'i rang bzhin no/ /sems ni ri rab hUM dang mnyam byas te/ /dag pa'i sangs rgyas su ni sems slar bskyed/ /sems dub gyur na slar yang bsdu ba dag /der ni sngags pas des brtag
bsgom par bya/ /bsdus pa'i ngo bos slar yang sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' der ni sku g.yos mdzad/ /slar yang nam mkha'i ngo bos khro bas te/ /de ltar spros dang bsdus pa'i rang bzhin

no/ /de la rdo rje sems dpa' gcig dngos grub pa'i phyir/ /de'i phyir spro ba'ang rdo rje 'chang du rigs/ /sngags pas brtan par gyur na spro/ /brtan par ma gyur 'dir spros pa/ /lus nyon mongs kyi 'bras mi
'byin/ /nges par 'grub 'gyur theg pa'i dngos/ /thams cad bden pa 'di rnams bstan/ /de lta'i chos ni bsgom pa yi/ /dngos po rdo rje'i rang bzhin no/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems ni smad mi bya/ /

gang yang dri ma cis kyang gos pa min/ /kye rnal 'byor pa/ bcom ldan 'das yum skul byed ma ni dang po'i rang bzhin te/ /rdo rje bskyed par bsgoms pas sangs rgyas bskyed mdzad pa'o/ /lha mo rnams ni lha dang
gcig pa'i rang bzhin te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas 'byor pa bskyed mdzad pa'o/ /rjes su 'dzin pas bsgom pa'i sems dang ni/ /yi ge hUM gis kyang ni de 'grub 'gyur/ /brla dang rkang pa dag tu rnam
rtog pa'i/ /rmongs pa yid la bya ba ma yin no/ /'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo 'di nyid ni/ /rdo rje'i 'od zer gyis ni yang dag bcings/ /sngags pas nam mkha'i khams su khro bo'i lha/ /bye ba stong phrag
dag ni spro bya ste/ /gcig pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i rdo rjer ni/ /slar yang nges par bsdu bar bya ba yin/ /byang chub theg pa sems kyi rang bzhin te/ /byang chub kyang ni sems kyi rang bzhin no/ /gnyis
ka rang bzhin sems kyi theg pa ste/ /sems kyang mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin no/ /rgyud gzhan dang thun mong ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //ji bzhin brnyes pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i

rgyud rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po tAk+Sha ka ga Na dang / /lo tsA ba mang 'or dge slong byang chub shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //thang chen ring mos zhus/ /stag lung rgyud la btugs te zhus dag /
@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ka tsita ta ra ha s+yo gu h+ya sa mA dza nA ma ma hA kal pa rA dza/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang
chen gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so/ /brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab snyed kyi byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam tshig rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sku rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po gsung rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me rdo rje dang /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rlung rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs rdo rje dang / byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ro rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po reg

bya rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings rdo rje dang / de dag la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab snyed rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa la yang 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par
snang mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen tog dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje don yod pa dang de dag la sogs pa nam mkha'i khams
thams cad dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / thabs gcig tu 'di lta ste dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad shin du yongs su gang

bar snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bkod pa de dag nyid kyi sku la zhugs par mdzad do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po yongs su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir nyid kyi sku bud med kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku las mngon par byung bar gyur to/ /
de la la la ni sangs rgyas spyan gyi rnam par ro/ /la la mA ma kI'i rnam par ro/ /la la gos dkar mo'i rnam par ro/ /la la dam tshig sgrol ma'i rnam par yang dag par gnas par gyur to/ /la la gzugs
kyi ngo bo'i rnam pas/ la la ni sgra'i ngo bo'i rnam pas/ la la dri'i ngo bo'i rnam pas/ la la ro'i ngo bo'i rnam pas/ la la reg bya'i ngo bo'i rnam pas yang dag par
gnas par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i b+ha ga la gru bzhi rdul med pa dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs
pa ni/ gsal ba de yi ngo bo nyid/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyis kun du rgyas/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni kun tu bkram/ /me stag 'phro ba mang po 'khrug /gsal ba la sogs
dkyil 'khor ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po de de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bdag nyid bzhag par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad rnams de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i thugs
la bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po snyoms par zhugs pa de ma thag tu/ de nas nam mkha'i dbyings 'di thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas par gyur to/ /de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo
rje'i dam tshig byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rig pa chen po skyes bu'i gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin
gyis brlabs so/ /byin gyis brlabs pa tsam gyis de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid zhal gsum pa'i rnam par de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i thugs kha nas mngon par byung ste ched du brjod pa/
e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /byang chub sems ni rab 'jug pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /rab tu mi rtog gnas med pa'o/ /
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa spros pa'i dam
tshig de kho na nyid kyi rin po che'i sprin gyis yang dag par mchod de phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'dus pa gsang ba las byung ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
kun gyi gsang / /rdo rje snying po btus pa yi/ /de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs so
legs so/ /'on kyang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang the tshom skye bar byed pa yin na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i yon tan khyad par can la yang / de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ston par mi spro bar de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad la byin gyis brlab pa mdzad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang /
yid bde ba myong bar bgyi ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar gyi phyir yang dag par bstan du gsol/
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa de mkhyen nas/ ye

shes sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhe sdang gi rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying po 'di snying po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /badzra d+h+r-ika /
de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba mchog gi gnas
kyis nag po dkar po dmar po'i rnam pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje la bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gti mug gi rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku/ gsung
thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dzi na dzika / de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid
rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po sbyor ba mchog gi gnas kyis dkar po nag po dmar po'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
gsung thugs rdo rje'i spyan sngar bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che 'byung ba'i rdo rje dpal zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ yid bzhin nor bu'i rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /rat+na d+h+rika / de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid rin chen tog gi phyag rgya chen po sbyor ba nam mkha' mchog gi gnas kyis ser po nag po dkar po'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung

thugs rdo rje'i g.yas phyogs su bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje 'dod chags kyi

rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /A ro lika / de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de

nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rig pa'i bdag po chen po'i phyag rgya chen po sbyor ba mchog gi gnas kyis dmar po nag po dkar po'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i rgyab tu bzhugs so/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod mchog gi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig dgug pa'i rigs mchog gi snying po'i snying po

'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika / de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid rdo rje don yod pa'i phyag rgya chen

po sbyor ba mchog gi gnas kyis ljang khu nag po dkar po'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i byang phyogs su bzhugs so/ /zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags/ /yid bzhin nor bu

dam tshig ste/ /rigs ni lnga po 'di rnams nyid/ /'dod dang thar par bsgrub pa'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa rjes su chags pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dwe Sha ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung

thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te lho phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /mo ha ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te shar phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'dzin pa/

rjes su chags pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'dzin pa'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /rA ga ra

ta/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te nub phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs slu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab 'chang ba rjes su chags pa'i rdo rje 'di nyid

kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /badzra ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/

byang gi grwar bzhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /ya mAn ta kr-ita/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsnyengs par byed pa'i rnam pas shar phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs

par byang chub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /pradz+nyAn ta

kr-ita/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid rdo rje dam tshig bsnyengs par byed pa'i rnam pas lho phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rin po che 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'chang ba'i dkyil

'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /pad mAn ta kr-ita/ de nas de phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung

thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung bsnyengs par byed pa'i rnam pas nub phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung

thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlab pa khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /

big+han ta krita/ de nas de phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs bsnyengs par byed pa'i rnam
pas byang phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mnyes par byed pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig sems dpa' rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /snying po sku gsung
thugs mchog ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung
thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen cing / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas byang chub sems
dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyed kyis sems lus kyi rnam pa dang lus sems kyi rnam pa dang / sems tshig tu brjod pas skyed cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams ni nam mkha' lta bur yang dag par sbyar nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma ho kun du bzang po yi/ /

sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje can/ /skye ba med pa sbyor ba yis/ /skye ba 'di ni rab tu bsgrags/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po med la sgom pa med/ /bsgom pa bsgom pa ma yin nyid/ /
de ltar dngos po dngos med de/ /sgom pa dmigs su med pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

dngos po thams cad rnam bral phung po khams/ /skye mched gzung ba 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa/ /chos bdag med mnyam nyid kyis rang gi sems/ /gdod nas ma skyes stong nyid rang bzhin no/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi zad pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes pa/ /chos dang chos nyid med pa ste/ /nam mkha' lta bur bdag med par/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pas gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen tog gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams thams cad dngos med cing / /chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs/ chos bdag med las kun tu byung / /byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o/ /

zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pas ye shes 'od zer sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la/ /ngo bo med de sgom pa'ang med/ /nam mkha'i gnas kyi sbyor ba yis/ /'dis ni dngos po rab tu bsgrags/ /zhes bcom ldan
'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pas gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje don yod grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /gdod nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin/ /byang chub sems cing mngon rtogs med/ /
byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje don yod grub pas gsungs so/ /de nas byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid kyi yi ge thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod

do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas e ma'o chos/ /chos bshad pa ni ngo mtshar che/ /yang dag don ni dag pa'i don/ /byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi bdag med yang dag byung / /sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs mdzad pa/ /rnam

par mi rtog dmigs su med/ /byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun tu bzang po thams cad don/ /byang chub sems ni rab skor ba/ /byang chub spyod pa rdo rje che/ /byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs ni de

bzhin gshegs pa'i dag /sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab ston pa/ /byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen
gsang ba 'dus pa las byang chub kyi sems kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad 'phro ba sprin bkod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u 'di gsungs so/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA bA Ata ma ko\u0f85 haM/

nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sgom bya ste/ /'od zer sprin gyi bkod pa che/ /sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od dang mnyam/ /'od zer lnga ni kun tu khyab/ /kun nas yongs su zlum po

ste/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis spras/ /mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa/ /bsgom par byas nas bsdus pa yis/ /gzugs ni dbus su bsgom par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya che/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan

pa'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ phyag rgya yang ni bsgom par bya/ /bsdus pa gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ /mi bskyod phyag rgya mchog rab dang / /rin chen tog gi phyag rgya che/ /tshe dpag med pa'i 'od byed dang / /don grub phyag rgya chen po rnams/ /

sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /in dra nI la'i kha dog 'dra/ /rab 'bar phyag na rdo rje bsnams/ /rnam par gtsigs gsal 'jigs su rung / /shel dang zla ba'i 'od dang 'dra/ /thor tshugs cod

pan gyis brgyan pa/ /rab 'bar phyag na 'khor lo bsnams/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes par brgyan/ /'dzam bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni kun du 'khrigs/ /rtse mo dgu pa'i rdo rje che/ /de yi phyag tu rnam par

bsgom/ /ma ra ka ta'i 'od 'dra ba/ /rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan/ /kun tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyis khyab/ /phyag na rin chen bsnams par bsgom/ /pad ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba/ /gtso bo 'dod chags 'od 'bar 'chang / /

rab 'bar phyag na pad ma bsnams/ /'dod chags rdo rje can bsgom bya/ /'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra ba'i/ /sna tshogs don yod rdo rje can/ /zhi ba phyag na ral gri bsnams/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor du ni bsgom/ /de

nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku gsung thugs

byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko\u0f85 haM/ rin chen chen po kha dog lnga/ /yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsam/ /sna yi rtse mor nan tan du/ /rnal 'byor gyis ni rtag tu bsgom/ /

rin chen brtan par gyur na spro/ /brtan par ma gyur yong mi spro/ /sangs rgyas 'bar ba mnyan pa'i 'od/ /rab mchog sprin rnams spro bar bya/ /'khor lo rdo rje rin chen ches/ /pad ma ral gri mtshon cha 'dzin/ /byang
chub sems dpa'i sprin chen rnams/ /spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /'khor lo'i

dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /pad ma'i dkyil 'khor yang dag gsal/ /pad ma sgom pas bsgom par bya/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor yang dag gsal/ /rin chen brtson pas bsgom par bya/ /sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor las byung

ba/ /nam mkha' 'dra bar bri bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rab mchog 'di rnams nyid/ /sku gsung thugs ni sgrub pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje las byung ba/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul thob pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las rdo rje bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun bdag med pa'i mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan nyid min pa thams cad spangs/ /kun du bzang po sku yi mchog /
dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i chos mchog las byung ba/ /ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong mdzad/ /kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /sems can
kun gyi sems chen po/ /rang bzhin dag cing dri ma med/ /kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni bshad du gsol/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /'jig rten gsum pa khams
gsum pa/ /'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtso/ /'jig rten gsum mchog ston pa po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor
dkyil 'khor tshul/ /dkyil 'khor nyams dga' rab tu bshad/ /de nas de phyir thugs dkyil 'khor/ /mchog thugs rdo rje rab 'dra ba/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag
rab bshad bya/ /lus dang ngag sems bsgoms pa yis/ /shes rab can gyis thig gdab pa/ /thig skud sar pa legs bkal ba/ /tshad ma bzang po mdzes pa yis/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor

dam pa ni/ /khru ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya/ /ngos bzhi dang ni grwa bzhi dang / /sgo bzhi bar ni rab tu brtag /de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni/ /rab tu zlum po bri bar bya/ /cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/ /de nas phyag rgya
dgod par bya/ /de dbus rdo rje bri ba ni/ /in dra nI la'i kha dog 'dra/ /'bar ba chen po rtse lnga pa/ /'jigs pa dag kyang rab 'jigs byed/ /shar du 'khor lo chen po ni/ /rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par
brgyan/ /lho ru rin chen chen po ni/ /'od zer mang po rab tu 'khrigs/ /nub tu pad ma chen po ni/ /pad ma rA ga'i kha dog 'dra/ /byang du ral gri chen po ni/ /'od zer 'bar ba rab 'khrigs bri/ /dbus

su sprin ni zhi ba'i 'od/ /spyan ni shar gyi grwa ru bri/ /mA ma ki'i rigs byung ba'i/ /rdo rje de bzhin lho ru'o/ /pad ma kha bye sdong bur bcas/ /nub tu kun du bri bar bya/ /byang du uta pal mdzes pa ni/ /mthing

ka sprin dang 'dra ba bri/ /tho ba kun nas 'od mdzes 'bar/ /shar gyi sgor ni bri bar bya/ /rdo rje 'bar sogs 'od bzang ba/ /dbyug pa lho ru kun tu bri/ /pad ma ral gri 'bar 'od byed/ /nub tu kun tu bri bar bya/ /
rdo rje 'khyil ba rdo rje can/ /byang du rdo rje bri bar bya/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de/ /yongs su gsal bar shes byas nas/ /lus dang ngag sems mchod pa yis/ /nan tan du ni mchod par bya/ /

btsun mo mdzes shing mdangs bzang ba/ /lo grangs bcu drug la rnyed nas/ /dri dang me tog brgyan byas te/ /de dbus su ni 'dod pa bya/ /yon tan ske rags mA ma kI/ /shes rab can gyis de byin brlabs/ /zhi ba spro bya
sangs rgyas gnas/ /nam mkha'i dbyings ni rab tu brgyan/ /bshang gci khu ba khrag la sogs/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de ltar byas na sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen mnyes/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ /kun gyi sku dang gsung thugs kyi/ /rdo rje 'chang ba'i rgyal po ni/ /gnas kyi dbang phyug kun mchog gis/ /spyod pa kun mchog chos kyi don/ /spyod pa'i mtshan nyid bka' stsal to/ /
rnam par mi rtog don las byung / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug 'khrugs/ /theg pa'i mchog ni bla na med/ /rab mchog dngos grub sgrub par byed/ /gdol pa smyin ma mkhan la sogs/ /gsod don don gnyer
sems pa rnams/ /theg chen bla na med pa yi/ /theg mchog 'di la 'grub par 'gyur/ /sems can mtshams med las sogs pa/ /sdig pa chen po byed pa yang / /de rnams kun kyang theg pa che/ /mchog gi

sgrub pa 'dir 'grub 'gyur/ /slob dpon smod pa po gzhan dag /bsgrubs kyang 'grub par yong mi 'gyur/ /srog gcod pa yi sems can gang / /brdzun du smra la dga' ba dang / /gzhan gyi nor la chags pa dang / /

rtag tu 'dod pa spyod dga' gang / /bshang gci zas su za ba ste/ /de rnams sgrub pa'i skal ldan 'gyur/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo la/ /sgrub po gang gis 'dod byas na/ /theg chen mchog gi chos su ni/ /dngos grub rgya chen des
'thob po/ /sangs rgyas gtso bo'i yum dag la/ /mnyes par byas kyang mi gos te/ /de ni blo can rnam mi tog /sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ci'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi
nang du 'di lta bu'i tshig ngan pa gsung zhes gsol to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi

tshig gsan nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu rnams mthong de skad ma smra cig /chos nyid dag 'di sangs rgyas ni/ /snying po ye shes can rnams kyis/ /snying po'i

chos kyi don byung ba/ /'di dag byang chub spyod pa'i gnas/ /de nas yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri rab la sogs pa'i rdul phra mo snyed kyi byang chub sems
dpa' rnams 'jigs shing skrag la brgyal bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag brgyal bar gyur pa gzigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag slang du gsol/ de nas

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /

snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po'i 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rang rang gi stan la gnas par gyur to/ /de
nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur/ dgyes pas khyab par gyur nas chos kyi dbyings 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /e ma'o chos e ma'o chos/ /e ma'o chos kyi don 'byung ba/ /chos

don dag pa bdag med pa/ /rdo rje rgyal po phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sku dang gsung thugs rab tu dag /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam nyid gnas/ /rnam par mi 'gyur snang ba med/ /rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /
thugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtso/ /dus gsum dag gi lam du 'byung / /nam mkha' chen por khams gyur pa/ /nam mkha'i lam la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /nam mkha'i sku las yang dag byung / /nam mkha'i
lam la gnas pa po/ /nam mkha' thugs te chos kyi mchog /spyod pa'i gnas khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las

kun du spyod pa'i mchog gi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta/ badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyis rdul dang

bral ba'i rdo rje'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sku byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pas mnyam pa nyid mi gnyis pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gsung byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badzra swa

b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/ /rdo rje gsum pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang / /gnas dang gnas ni rnam par bsgom pa ste/ /de dag nyid mchog rab kyi sngags kyi ni/ /mtshan nyid mtshan ma bsgrub pa nyid du bya/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen tog gis ye shes sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma

ko\u0f85 ha~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje don yod grub pas rdo rje don yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA

badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/ rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas/ /sangs rgyas tshul bzhin mchod par bya/ /mchod pa rnam pa lnga rnams kyis/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen
pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi gsang chen 'di gsungs so/ /sngags dmigs pa yi lus kyis ni/ /ngag dang yid la bskul byas pas/ /bsgrub bya rab mchog dngos grub dang / /
yid ni yang dag dga' mdzes pa/ /sems kyi dmigs pa bdag med pa/ /ngag dang lus kyang rnam par bsgom/ /rnam gsum sbyor ba nam mkha' dang / /mnyam nyid gnas ni grub par bya/ /lus dang ngag

dang sems dmigs pa'i/ /ngo bo nyid ni dmigs su med/ /sngags kyi sku yi sbyor ba yis/ /byang chub med cing sgom pa'ang med/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid 'di/ /rnam par dpyad nas bsdu ba yis/ /byang chub sbyor ba
ting nge 'dzin/ /sngags kyi brtags pa bsgom par bya/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog kun mkhyen gyis/ /sgom pa'i mchog ni
bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms nas/ /phra mo'i sbyor ba kun tu brtsam/ /sna yi rtse mor yungs kar
bsam/ /yungs dkar rgyu dang mi rgyu ba/ /ye shes gnas ni nyams dga' ba/ /gsang ba'i ye shes brtags pa bsgom/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /

sangs rgyas sku yi gnas bsgom te/ /de yi steng du gnas dgod do/ /hU~M nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /spyan gyi tshul gyi sbyor ba la/ /de nas pad ma rdo rje sgom/ /

nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /dang po'i sbyor ba nan tan gyis/ /de yi steng du yongs su bsgom/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor

bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas tshul ni zhi ba spro/ /'khor dag khyad par dag tu spro/ /ut+pal mthing ka'i mdog 'dra ba/ /rtse mo lnga pa khyad par du/ /nas kyi 'bru tshad nan tan gyis/ /sna yi rtse mor rnam par

bsam/ /tsa na ka yi 'bru tshad kyi/ /'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas/ /sna yi rtse mor 'di shes te/ /byang chub gzhol bas bsgom par bya/ /'khor lo la sogs khyad par du/ /bsgom pa der ni brtag par bya/ /dngos grub

thams cad yon tan gnas/ /nyams dga' byang chub gnas 'grub 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub gnas rnams ni/ /bsdu bas der ni spro bar bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma yi/ /chos kyi gnas ni rab tu dbyung / /

de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /de nyid don kun ston pa pos/ /spyod pa kun mchog legs dag pa/ /gsang ba'i dam pa bka' stsal to/ /gzugs dang sgra dang ro ldan pa/ /shes rab can gyis zla drug bsgom/ /gsang ba

'i de nyid mchod chen ni/ /legs mchod nas kyang bsgom par bya/ /zas su bshang gci bya ba'i phyir/ /dngos grub 'bras bu 'dod pas bya/ /bla med de nyid 'grub pa ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub skyon med pa'o/ /sha

yang bza' bar bya ba'i phyir/ /sha chen po ni rab tu brtag /gsang ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /glang po'i sha dang rta yi sha / de bzhin dam pa khyi yi sha / zas kyi phyir
ni bza' bar bya/ /gzhan zas bza' bar yang mi bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo can yang / /'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur/ /'dod

khams dbang phyug 'jig rten du/ /go 'phang las ni byed par 'gyur/ /stobs ldan gtso bo gzi brjid can/ /mdangs bzang mthong na yid du 'ong / /mthong ba tsam gyis bskul med par/ /'jig rten 'di dag dbang byed 'gyur/ /'di ni

thams cad sangs rgyas kyi/ /gsang ba byang chub dam pa ste/ /yang dag sngags kyi gsang ba 'di/ /lus ngag sems las 'da' ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las sku dang
gsung dang thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag pos dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid sngags kyi spyod

pa mchog rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u 'di gsungs so/ /'dod pa thams cad longs spyod pa/ /bsten pas ji ltar 'dod pa las/ /'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /nges par sangs rgyas myur thob 'gyur/ /'dod pa thams cad longs

spyod pa/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bsten bya zhing / /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya/ /dka' thub nges pa mi bzad pas/ /bsten pas 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi/ /'dod pa thams cad longs spyod pas/ /bsten

na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /slongs mo za zhing mi bzlas te/ /bslangs la dga' bar yang mi bya/ /'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing / /sngags kyi yan lag dbyer med bzlas/ /lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni/ /bder gnas thob

na byang chub 'thob/ /gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang / /dmyal bar nges par sreg par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /sngags kyi spyod pa mchog spyod pas/ /chos dang mi 'gyur mchog brnyes rnams/ /'dod

pa thams cad bstan pas so/ /chags can ye shes 'dod pa yis/ /'dod yon lnga rnams rtag tu brten/ /byang chub sems dpa' mnyes par bya/ /byang chub nyi ma chags par bya/ /gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /

mchod pa'i bdag nyid can mchod bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gzhi/ /sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /sangs

rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gtso/ /dri la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /sangs rgyas sogs la dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso/ /ro la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /

lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nyid sangs rgyas sna tshogs pa/ /sangs rgyas don yod rdo rje 'dzin/ /reg bya rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /rang gi rigs la dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /mi bskyod pa yi

tshul brnyes rnams/ /gzugs sgra dri la sogs pa la/ /rtag tu sems ni sbyar bar bya/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba snying po btus pa'o/ /gzugs sgra dri sogs sngags pa yis/ /lha rnams nyid du

rtag tu bsgom/ /yang na de la rigs kyi ni/ /dbye ba rnam par bsgom pas bsgom/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sbyor/ /chos ni rjes su dran sgom pa/ /lus dang ngag dang sems ni bsgom/ /rdo rje rjes su dran sgom
pa/ /rigs ni rjes dran sbyor ba las/ /khro bo rjes su dran sgom pa/ /dam tshig rjes dran sbyor ba las/ /bsgoms na byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bud med gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba/ /
lo grangs bcu drug lon rnyed nas/ /byin gyis rlob pa'i gnas gsum gyis/ /dben par mchod pa rab tu btsam/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo che/ /spyan la sogs pa bsgom par bya/ /dbang po

gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /yi ge hU~M dang oM dag dang / /phaT kyang rnam par brtag par bya/ /'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yi/ /rdo rje pad mo bsgom par bya/ /de ni 'bar bcas

zla 'od bzhin/ /yid du 'ong ba bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor la sogs/ /byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par bya/ /de la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ /b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas/ /

sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom par bya/ /ba spu'i bu ga rtse bar nas/ /mkhas pas sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro/ /de la chos rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas/ /rdo rje chos ni rab

bsgom bya/ /ba spu'i bu ga rtse bar nas/ /mkhas pas chos kyi sprin rnams spro/ /de la rdo rje rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /

ba spu'i bu ga rtse bar nas/ /rdo rje sprin rnams spro bar bya/ /de la rigs rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab tu bsgom/ /ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse bar

nas/ /mkhas pas rigs kyi sprin rnams spro/ /de la khro bo rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas/ /khro bo'i dbang po rab tu bsgom/ /ba spu'i bu ga rtse bar nas/ /mkhas pas

khro bo'i sprin rnams spro/ /de la dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ rang gi rdo rje pad mar ldan/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te/ /rang gi khu ba'i thigs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'
mchod/ /de la dkyil 'khor rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ dbang po gnyis ni mnyam gzhag ste/ /mkhas pas rang gi khu ba dag /rnal 'byor pa ni chen pos dbyung / /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor

tshul du bya/ /de la sku rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang zhig /phung po lnga yis rab tu rgyas/ /sangs rgyas sku yi ngo bo yis/ /bdag kyang de dang 'drar gyur cig /de la
gsung rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang zhig /nges pa'i tshig ni phun sum tshogs/ /bdag gi tshig kyang de 'dra bar/ /chos 'dzin pa dang 'drar gyur cig /de la thugs
rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ kun tu bzang po'i thugs gang zhig /gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa/ /bdag gi sems kyang de 'dra bar/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang 'drar gyur cig /de la sems can
rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ sems can kun gyi sems gang yin/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mtshan/ /bdag gi sems kyang de 'dra zhing / /mkha' dang mtshungs par dpa' bo rnams/ /de la sngags

kyi gzugs dang sku dang gsung dang thugs thams cad rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ sngags kyi rdo rje'i sku gang yin/ /gsung gi sku ni rnam bsgom pa/ /bdag kyang de dang 'dra ba'i sku/ /rtag tu sngags 'dzin
pa dang mnyam/ /de la dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ dam tshig khu chu cho ga bzhin/ /'bras bu 'dod pas btung bya zhing / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs gsad bya/ /dngos grub rab
mchog thob par 'gyur/ /de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /skye ba med cing zag pa med/ /byang chub med cing
mngon rtogs med/ /khams kyang med cing 'byung ba med/ /de la ma skyes pa rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ rang bzhin 'od gsal de nas ni/ /nam mkha' mtshan med mi 'gyur des/ /gnyis med
gnyis su med min zhi/ /shin tu dri med nam mkha' bzhin/ /de la zhe sdang gi rigs kyi mchod pa rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ bud med sems ni rab brtan pa/ /lo grangs bcu gnyis lon rnyed
nas/ /rigs kyi sbyor ba'i rab dbye bas/ /rang gi khu bas mchod par bya/ /'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dag dang / /chos 'dzin mchog gi gsung dag ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la
thob par 'gyur/ /sku dang gsung thugs yang dag grub/ /dman skyes gang gzhan bshad pa rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /bzlas pas de la 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las sngags kyi spyod pa mchog gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen

rtog gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dam pa'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'chang chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab po/ /rdo rje rgyal po theg pa che/ /nam mkha'i spyod pas rnam
sbyong ba/ /kun du bzang po'i spyod pa mchog /rgyal mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che/ /rdo rje theg pa rab ston pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i mchog /rgyal
gzhi mchod pa bshad du gsol/ /bar pa'i lam ni rab ston pa/ /theg pa gsum gyi lam 'jug mdzad/ /sangs rgyas skal mchog dag pa'i bdag /mi mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol/ /byang chub sems ni rgyas

pa'i spyan/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor ba/ /sku dang gsung thugs shin du dag /rdo rje theg pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che/ /thams cad dbang bskur kun gyi don/ /kun

dbang rdo rje rin chen 'dzin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i mchog /rdo rje gsum ni mi phyed gnas/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs skal mchog /rgyal ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba bshad/ /na chung yangs pa'i mig can ni/ /

gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan rnyed nas/ /lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon gzung / /byol song las kyang rab tu brtag /sa phyogs gtsang zhing rnam par dben pa 'am/ /rgyal ba nyid skyes zhi ba zhi ba'i gnas/ /bshang

gci chu la sogs pas byug pa yang / /rgyal ba mchod phyir rtag par rab tu bya/ /nu ma'i dbus gang spyi gtsug mtha' dbus su/ /cho ga shes pas rkang pa'i bar du yang / /lte ba ro smad gsang ba rgyal ba'i sras/ /
rigs lnga rnams ni dgod par rab tu bya/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya/ /bdag nyid zla ba'i dbus gnas bsgom/ /mkhas pas zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin/ /

snying gar gang zhig 'dod pa ni/ /bsdu ba dag kyang rab tu bya/ /mchod rten rin chen bzhi'i rang bzhin/ /'od zer phreng bas rnam brgyan pa/ /ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum gyi/ /gnas su gyur par rnam par
bsam/ /rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas/ /mkhas pas mchod pa'i sprin rnams spro/ /mkhas pas uta pa la dag dang / /pad ma rnam pa lnga shes bya/ /dza ti rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /lha rnams la ni 'bul

bar bya/ /me tog kar ni ka ra dang / /mal+li ka dang ya thi ka / me tog ka ra bI ra yang / /bsams nas mchod pa rab tu brtag /dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom bya zhing / /rnam par

mkhas pas rtag par ni/ /rigs rnams rab tu dgod par bya/ /de bzhin pad ma rdo rje dang / /ral gri uta pal mkhas pas bsgom/ /dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon tsam la/ /gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa yi/ /mchod rten

rin chen bzhi'i rang bzhin/ /gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med/ /rigs rnams gnas ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /shes rab can gyis bsgom par bya/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis/ /de la mchod pa rgya mtsho brtsam/ /

rin chen na bza' la sogs pas/ /byang chub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod/ /mchod pa rnam lnga mchog rnams kyis/ /rtag tu lha rnams mnyes par bya/ /rin chen 'byung gnas na chung mchog /rin chen sna tshogs la sogs
brgyan/ /bsgrub cing rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/ /rin chen bdun gyis yongs bkang ba'i/ /zhing 'di rnam par mkhas pas ni/ /ye
shes 'dod pas dngos grub 'dod/ /nyin re shes rab can gyis dbul/ /bdag po'i phyag rgyar mnyam gzhag la/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu/ /'dod chags blo can sangs rgyas la/ /reg
bya'i sbyor ba dbul bar bya/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /dkyil 'khor bkod pa bsgom par bya/ /rang lus de bzhin gshegs rang bzhin/ /bshang ba gci bas bla ma mchod/ /bzhin bzang
yid du 'ong ba yi/ /na chung skal ba'i mchog ldan pa/ /byin gyi brlabs kyi gnas bsam te/ /de nyid mchod pa rab tu brtag /mig yangs khu ba blangs nas ni/ /brtan pa'i blo dang ldan pas bza'/ /'di de
sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste/ /ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang / /sngags rnams dngos grub byed par gsungs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang
thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las bshang gci'i dam tshig gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che/ /thams cad dbang bskur
spyod pa'i mchog /kun don dbang phyug dam pa yis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod pa/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil 'khor/ /sangs rgyas theg pa can la gsang / /nyams dga' mchog ni rab tu
bshad/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /mi bskyod rdo rje rab bsgoms nas/ /lag tu rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /'od 'phro mang po 'bar ba dang / /
'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang / /dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /bsgoms nas rdo rjes phye mar brlag /sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod ni/ /rdo rjes phyer brlags med gyur pa/ /bsam gtan
mchog de bsgoms na ni/ /thugs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje gsang ba 'di yis ni/ /sems can thams cad bsad na ni/ /mi bskyod sangs rgyas zhing du ni/ /rgyal
ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur/ /'di ni rigs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho las zhes sdang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho nar shes par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /mi shes thar pa
rab sgrub pa/ /ngo bo nyid dag gos pa med/ /byang chub spyod pa rab ston pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub pa yi/ /yang dag dam tshig bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus
gnas par/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad rab bsgoms te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par bsgom/ /rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis/ /
rdo rje'i gzugs ni rab tu brtag /nor rnams thams cad phrogs nas su/ /rdo rje gsum gyis rnam par bsgom/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba yis/ /nor gyi rgya mtshos
rab gang 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sras rnams dang / /thub pa'i skyes bu rnams su 'gyur/ /'di ni rigs kyi rgya mtsho thams cad las gti mug gi rigs kyi
yang dag pa'i dam tshig tu shes par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags thar pa rab bsgrub pa/ /gsang ba dag pa dmigs med pas/ /dkyil 'khor
rab tu bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /pad ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /'od dpag med ni rab bsgoms te/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad ni/ /dgang
zhing de ru thams cad ni/ /btsun mo'i rnam pa'i sbyor bar bsgom/ /dam tshig bzhi yi sbyor ba yis/ /'di ni rdo rje'i tshul mchog go/ /dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas/ /de dag thams cad
nye bar spyad/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /mi phyed sku gsum sgrub pa'o/ /'di ni 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi yang dag pa'i dam tshig ste/ sngags pas bsgom par bya ba nyid do/ /de nas rgyal
po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje sngags kyi don sgrub pa/ /ye shes las byung bdag med pas/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom
par bya/ /rdo rje don yod rab bsgoms te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya/ /brdzun gyi ngag ni rdo rje'i gnas/ /thams cad gzugs su rnam bsgom bya/ /rgyal ba'i gnas ni thams cad
dang / /rgyal ba thams cad bslu bar bya/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /nam mkha'i gsung ste dri med pa/ /ye shes blo can kun gyi gsang / /sngags kyi dngos grub byed par bshad/ /'di ni dam

tshig 'gugs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid de/ don ji lta ba bzhin du spro bar bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje gsum mi phyed rgyal gnas/ /dngos grub rdo rje rab ston pas/ /gsung
ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /rin chen tog tu rab bsgoms te/ /gzugs rnams kun gyis 'di dag dgang / /rtsub
pa'i ngag la sogs pa yis/ /bsten na ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bkod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje tog la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ngo mtshar zhing rmad du byung bar gyur nas rdo rje'i tshig 'di smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

bdag po khams gsum las 'das shing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad las 'das pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'di lta bu rmad du

byung ba'i tshig gi lam rdo rje'i tshig 'di ci'i slad du gsung / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis brjod kyi mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyi mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ri rab kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje tog la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dman pa'i 'du shes dang / smad pa'i 'du shes 'di lta bu ma skyed cig /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gang 'di byang chub sems pa'i spyod pa ni mchog gi spyod pa'o/ /gang 'di sngags kyi spyod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'
ni thams cad la rjes su song ba ste/ chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i khongs su gtogs pa'o/ /de dag kyang 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i kham
sa na mi gnas/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi la mi gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni de ltar rjes su rig par bya'o/ /'di lta bu'i don gyi dbang mkhyen nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems
can rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas chos 'chad par mdzad do/ /rigs kyi bu de lta bu nyid kyi nam mkha'i tshig nges par brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig de dag rjes su rig par bya'o/ /

rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na gtsub shing dang gtsub stan dang mi'i lag pa bskyod pa'i rkyen gyis du ba rab tu 'byung zhing me/ 'byung bar 'gyur mod kyi/ me de yang gtsub shing la yang mi gnas/ gtsub stan la
mi gnas/ mi'i lag pa bskyod pa la yang mi gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig rjes su rig par bya ste/ 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pas zhes pa'o/ /de

nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur pas ngam zhing mig gdangs te tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /rmad byung chen po'i chos rnams ni/ /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa
dang / /rnam par mi rtog dag pa la/ /kun rdzob yang ni bshad pa mtshar/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/ don dam pa'i dag pa de kho na
nyid kyi don gyi dam tshig gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje de kho na nyid
mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de nyid sngags snying kun bsdus pa/ /sku dang gsung thugs gsang bar
sgrags/ /dngos grub chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mtsho gtso/ /'bar ba gtum po spyan yangs pas/ /gsung
ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /lus dang ngag dang sems rnams bsgom/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams/ /rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pa/ /mnyam nyid gar yang mi gnas pa/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas pha rol tu phyin pa sngags kyi tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rig pa du ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang thabs gcig tu sems can
thams cad kyi don bya ba'i gar gyi rol ba ston par mdzad de/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' klas par 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis rol pa dgyes par yongs su spyod pa yod kyang de dag

sngags spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la spyan ras kyis mi 'tsho ste/ de rgyu gang gi phyir zhe na/ kye ma 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyis chos thos pas so/ /de'i

phyir skyes bu dam pa chen po de rnams kyi spyan ras kyis btsa' ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba sngags thams cad kyi thugs kun du skul bar byed pa zhes
bya ba'i rab tu gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dmigs pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dmigs pa/ chos 'dzin pa thams
cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dmigs pa/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las tshig gi lam nges par brjod pas sngags bsdus pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM hU~M AHswA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam
gyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad sras dang bcas/ /rab tu 'dar zhing rgyal bar gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos dam tshig 'di
gsungs so/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus gnas yi ge hU~M/ /rang gi gzugs su rab tu brtag /rdo rje'i 'od zer cher 'bar ba/ /
rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs/ /drangs par de yis rnam par bsgom/ /de ma thag nyid der 'gyur ba/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
rgyal po che/ /kun gyi gtso bo dbang phyug mchog /rang gi dkyil 'khor rang rdo rjes/ /skyed par byed pa'i cho gar 'gyur/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /snying po rdo rje bsdus pa'o/ /rang sngags
skyes bu bsgoms nas ni/ /gnas bzhi rnams su gzugs kyi tshul/ /zhal gsum rnam pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /kha dog gsum gyis rab tu bsgom/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis de skad
ces bka' stsal to/ /de la 'di ni mchog rdo rje'i gsang ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi thugs ka yi/ /dbus chud phra mo rnam bsgom bya/ /de yi dbus su chud par ni/ /yi ge mchog gi tshig bsam mo/ /sbyor

ba rdo rje chen po ni/ /rtse mo lnga pa rtag tu bsgom/ /rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje gsum rnams bsgom par bya/ /de yis thugs ni gzir bya ste/ /lha yang rab tu bskul bar bya/ /'di de rdo rje thams
cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rnam bsgom pa/ /rdo rje pad mo'i rigs la sogs/ /thugs ni bskul ba rab bshad pa/ /'di de rol mo 'byung ba ste/ /rdo rje yi ni tshul
mchog 'di/ /zhag bdun bar du byas na ni/ /gsang chen sku dang gsung dang thugs/ /ye shes rdo rje can grub 'gyur/ /'jigs shing yid ni skrag gyur nas/ /mchog stsol ba ni rnam

par gzigs/ /yid ni mgu bas dga' ba yi/ /dngos grub rgya chen ster bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog 'dzin rnams/ /gal te rmongs bdag nyid 'das na/ /de yi srog ni der

zad 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje gsum mchog ston pa po/ /'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtsos/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /sngags kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa/ /rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes rdzogs/ /

dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /dngos po thams cad brtag par bya/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sngags kyi dam tshig sgrub pa'o/ /rig ma'i dbang phyug zhugs pa la/ /rdo rje'i sbyor ba rab bsgom zhing / /
chags shing chags pa'i lta bas blta/ /'di ni dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /de bzhin gshegs kun bdag nyid skyes/ /thams cad dbang bskur sangs rgyas gtsos/ /gsung

ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad na/ /ji snyed bud med brjod pa kun/ /phyag rgya chen po'i sngon sbyor bas/ /de dag thams cad nye bar spyad/ /bye ba grangs med rdo rje can/ /sangs
rgyas gnas ni der spro bya/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi dam tshig gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byang chub 'di yis 'thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje gsum po mkha' 'dra ba'i/ /byang chub sems dpa'
rgyal rgya mtsho/ /rdo rje sems dpa' tshe des 'thob/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs bskul
ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje skyes bu mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags rdo rje rigs pa skyes bu mchog gi le'u 'di gsungs so/ /rdo rje gsum yig sngags kyi mchog /phyag rgya chen po rnam bsgom pa/ /byang chub thams

cad 'thob pa ni/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /oM yig ye shes snying po ste/ /rdo rje sku ni 'thob byed pa'o/ /AHyig byang chub sprul pa'i bdag /rdo rje gsung ni 'thob byed pa'o/ /hU~M yig sku gsung thugs yin te/ /rdo rje

gsum ni mi phyed 'thob/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi sngags kyi skyes bus de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje kun skyes dkyil 'khor

bsam/ /de ru yi ge da b+h+ru~M bsam ste/ /rdo rje sprin ni 'phro skyed pa'o/ /de la 'di ni ye shes rdo rje'i snying po'o/ /b+h+ru~M/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /yi ge hU~M ni rab tu bsgom/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas
par/ /yi ge oM ni rnam par bsam/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /yi ge AHni rab tu bsgom/ /yi ge b+h+ru~M gi gnas bsgoms te/ /rdo rje gsum byung bsgom par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das dam tshig gsum
gyi gsang bas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /snying po dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi/ /sku gsung thugs ni mnyes byed pa/ /oM yig sangs rgyas sku yi mchog /oM/ AHyig sangs rgyas gsung gi lam/ /AHhU~M

yig ye shes 'jings ni thugs/ /hUM 'di ni byang chub tshul mchog yin/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa/ /ye shes rdo rjes sprul pa ste/ /sangs rgyas rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung / /

'di dag sangs rgyas skyes bu nyid/ /sngags dang rig pa zhes bsgrags pa/ /bskyed pa la sogs dam tshig dag /rdo rje gsum mi phyed bsgoms pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs dam tshig de

kho na nyid ye shes rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa'i rgyu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rnam par dben zhing nyams dga' bar/ /sbyor ba 'di ni kun tu brtsam/ /rdo rje'i sku dang gsung thugs 'grub/ /phyogs gcig gis ni the tshom
med/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig bskyed/ /yi ge oM ni thugs kar dgod/ /'od zer lnga pa sprin chen po/ /rnam par snang mdzad
mchog sgom pa/ /'di yis sangs rgyas kyi ni sku/ /rdo rje rnam snang rgya mtshor 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje gsum gyi kalpa ni/ /ye shes lnga ldan bsten cing gnas/ /phyogs
tsam gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das sku rdo rje gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i 'od zer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /
nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas pa'i/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /rang gi sngags kyi skyes bu bskyed/ /AHyig ngag gi lam la dgod/ /kha dog lnga pa rdo rje che/ /'jig rten dbang phyug
mchog bsgoms pas/ /dam tshig ye shes rdzogs byas te/ /tshig gi dam tshig lnga yi mchog /chos gyi tshig gi lam gnas pa/ /rdo rje chos dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /rdo rje gsum gyi kalpa ni/ /
ye shes lnga ldan bsten cing gnas/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gsung gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin to/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa'i/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /rang sngags skyes bu bskyed nas ni/ /thugs la gnas pa'i yi ge hU~M/ /dam tshig chen po de nyid ni/ /kha dog lnga
pa rnam bsgom bya/ /rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /ston pa rdo rje thugs las byung / /ye shes yon tan rgya mtshor 'gyur/ /rdo rje gsum gyi kalpa ni/ /
ye shes lnga ldan bsten gnas shing / /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje thugs gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin to/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje chen po bsgom par bya/ /lus rnams kun la yi ge kha~M/ /rdo rje ye shes mkha' mnyam 'gyur/ /kha~M/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /
yang dang yang du mchod pa dang / /kal pa gsum ni dam tshig gnas/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs mi 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sku

gsung thugs rdo rje mi snang ba 'byung ba bkod pa phreng ba can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus las ni/ /rang sngags skyes bu rab bsgoms la/ /snying gar rdo rje ha~M zhes pa/ /bzhag
ste 'od zer rnam par bsgom/ /ha~M/ 'jam dpal dam tshig rdzogs longs spyod/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid du/ /sa bcu dag la gnas de 'gyur/ /byang chub
sems dpa' ye shes dam tshig zla ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /'od zer rab 'bar yi ge th+lI~M / /mtshan mchog rdo rje'i lus su ni/ /bsgoms

na rdo rje'i sku mnyam 'gyur/ th+lI~M/ nam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bkod pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /mngon shes lnga dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mngon shes dam tshig mchog /
'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas mngon shes mchog sgrub pa'o/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgoms la/ /
ye shes oM yig bsgom par bya/ /oM/ rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas/ /mi bskyod rdo rje gsum 'drar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi bskyod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mi bskyod pa yi
sku 'dra dang / /gsung dang thugs mchog rtag tu 'dzin/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du/ /mi bskyod rdo rjes mchod par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i dam tshig mngon par 'byung ba'i rdo rje
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bsam/ /nam mkha' rdo rje rab bsgoms la/ /rin chen oM yig bsgom par bya/ /oM/
rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas/ /rdo rje gsum gyi tog 'drar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen tog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yis/ /rin chen tog

gi 'od dang 'dra/ /de ni bdag med byang chub dang / /ye shes gsang ba mnyam gnas 'gyur/ /rin po che dam tshig longs spyod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /
sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms la/ /chos kyi oM yig bsgom par bya/ /oM/ rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas/ /rdo rje gsum dpag med 'drar 'gyur/ /lus dang ngag
sems rdo rje yis/ /'od dpag med dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /theg chen lam ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'od dpag tu med pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yon
tan dpag tu med pa'i 'od kyi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /rdo rje uta pal rab bsgoms nas/ /dam tshig oM yig

rab tu bsgom/ /oM/ rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas/ /rdo rje don yod gsum 'drar 'gyur/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis/ /rdo rje don yod 'dra ba'i 'od/ /de ni dpal ldan ye shes mtsho/ /sems can kun don

'byung bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje don yod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /don yod pa'i dam tshig 'byung ba 'od zer ye shes kyi mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings
kyi dbus gnas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bsam/ /rdo rje snang mdzad rab bsgoms la/ /sku gsum oM yig rab tu bsgom/ /oM/ rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas/ /rnam par snang

mdzad mnyam par 'gyur/ /lus dang ngag yid rdo rje yis/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'dra ba'i 'od/ /de ni ye shes rdzogs byang chub/ /sku gsum mi phyed sgrub byed 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang

mdzad kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lus dang ngag dang yid dmigs pa rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ri bo rnam par dben pa dang / /chu klung 'bab pa rnams dang ni/ /dur
khrod la sogs rnams su yang / /bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di dag bya/ /mi bskyod ye shes rdo rje sogs/ /rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil gnas bsam/ /mngon shes lnga po'i sbyor ba yis/ /gnas su sangs

rgyas mchog rnams bsgom/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po dam tshig rdo rje mngon par mkhyen pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa/ /'bar ba lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /gnas lngar

rab tu sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur/ /me stag mang po 'khrug pa yi/ /rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje lnga ni sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha'
rdo rje'i dkyil gnas par/ /'khor lo sangs rgyas 'bar 'od 'dra/ /bsgoms nas sangs rgyas 'jug pa yis/ /sangs rgyas gnas dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /
rang gi lus la snang mdzad bzhag /snying gar yi ge oM bsam la/ /sngags la rnam par shes pa bsgom/ /de'i sems 'gog pa'i rdo rjer tshud/ /gang tshe skye bar 'gyur ba de/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog
sgrub pa/ /yid bzhin nor bu dpal ldan 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /rdo rje mi bskyod rab tu bsgom/ /snying gar yi ge hU~M bsgoms nas/ /sems ni thig ler gyur par bzhag /
sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /tshe dpag med par rab tu bsgom/ /snying gar yi ge AHbsams te/ /rdo rje thig ler gtogs pa bzhag /'di de dam tshig mchog gi mchog /rdo rje
gsum ni mi phyed bsgom/ /'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes te/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub 'thob 'gyur ba'i/ /nam mkha' rdo rje dbyings gnas par/ /bsgom bya gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /lus ngag
sems la yi ge oM/ /bsams na de ni bskal par gnas/ /nam mkha' rdo rje dbyings gnas par/ /bsgom bya chos kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /lus ngag sems la yi ge AH/ /bsams na de ni bskal
par gnas/ /nam mkha' rdo rje dbyings gnas par/ /bsgom bya rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni/ /lus ngag sems la yi ge hU~M/ /bsams na de ni bskal par gnas/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum gyi rtog
pa'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi/ /rnal 'byor 'di gang nas bzung ste/ /klog gam yang na sems kyang rung / /de yang rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid rig pa'i skyes bu mchog gi
le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /bskyed pa ye shes mchog sgrub pas/ /dam tshig rdo rje gsum de nyid/ /rdo rje gsung gis bka' stsal pa/ /mkha' dang mtshungs
par mnyam gyur pa/ /rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid/ /chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa la/ /rol mo 'di dag rab tu bsgom/ /dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs mchog /me tog 'bras bu sogs pas brgyan/ /
ri bo skye bos dben pa ru/ /dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa bsgrub/ /ma~M/ lus dang ngag sems rdo rje la/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje rab tu bsgom/ /lus dang ngag sems la spro ba/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje 'dra bar
'gyur/ /dpag tshad brgyar ni rgya che ba/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od des ni/ /snang 'gyur dag pa'i bdag nyid de/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ni/ /tshangs pa drag po la sogs lhas/ /nam yang mthong
