bar mi nus so/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje mchog gi dam tshig mi snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum las byung / /bshang gci dam tshig lnga rnams ni/ /lcags gsum

dang ni ldan byas nas/ /khar bcug nas ni bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mi phyed pa'i/ /thugs ni de ru rab tu bsgom/ /de ni de ma thag nyid du/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje 'od 'drar 'gyur/ /rang gi sngags
las 'khor lo ni/ /'od 'phro mdangs mchog can bsgoms nas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas/ /bsgoms na sangs rgyas mnyam par 'gyur/ /ri rab sum bcu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji

snyed yod pa yi/ /de yi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ /thams cad rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra/ /'di ni 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyis/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su rab

bsgoms la/ /rdo rje kun gyi gnas yin par/ bsams na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /ri rab sum bcu rtsa drug gi/ phra rab rdul rnams ji snyed pa'i/ /de snyed kyi ni bud med rnams/ /yon tan can gyi gnas su 'gyur/ /

drag po dag gis phyag byas pa/ /khams gsum rdo rje chen por 'gyur/ /rdo rje mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /pad ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa/ /rang sngags rdo rjes bsams nas su/ /chos rnams
kun gyi gnas yin pa/ /rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /ri rab sum bcu rtsa drug gi/ phra rab rdul rnams ji snyed pa'i/ /sangs rgyas mchod mchog dkyil 'khor du/ /dag pa'i bdag nyid 'jog par byed/ /
pad mo mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /gsum gyi kal pa'i dam tshig ni/ /ye shes lnga ldan bsten cing gnas/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba rnam gsum bsnyen bkur
byed/ /'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra'i 'od/ /rang gi sngags la ral gri bsgom/ /mig yangs lag na thogs nas ni/ /rdo rje gsum rig 'dzin par 'gyur/ /khams gsum chen pos mchod bya dang / /tshangs dbang
lha min phyag byas pa/ /stong gsum na ni gcig pu dpa'/ /gsang ba 'dzin pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams/ /sems kyis gang zhig 'dod pa ni/ /rdo rje thugs las rab tu byung / /
de lta bu yi dngos grub ster/ /ral gri thams cad dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /oM yig ri lu tsa na ka'i/ /'bru tshad du ni bsams nas ni/ /dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs/ /bsams te

kha ru bsgom par bya/ /de ni de ma thag nyid du/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur/ /nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing / /'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog /AHyig ri lu tsa na ka'i/ /'bru tshad tsam du bsams
nas ni/ /dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs/ /bsams te kha ru bsgom par bya/ /de ni de ma thag nyid du/ /byang chub ye shes 'od 'drar 'gyur/ /nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing / /'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi

mdog /hU~M yig ri lu tsa na ka'i/ /'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni/ /dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs/ /bsams te kha ru bsgom par bya/ /de ni de ma thag nyid du/ /rdo rje'i sku dang 'od 'drar 'gyur/ /nyi ma
shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing / /'dzam bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra/ /mkha' dbyings gsal ba'i dkyil gnas pa'i/ /rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bsgom/ /lag tu 'khor lo rab bsgoms na/ /'khor lo'i rig pa
'dzin par 'gyur/ /'khor lo chen po'i rigs bsgoms te/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rab sbyor bas/ /ye shes mchog gi sgrub pa 'di/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /

ye shes mi bskyod rab bsgoms te/ /lag tu rdo rje rnam bsgoms na/ /rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rdo rje chen po'i rigs bsgoms te/ /rdo rje'i skur ni rab sbyor bas/ /rdo rje mchog gi sgrub pa 'di/ /ye
shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /mkha' dbyings rin chen dbus gnas par/ /rin chen rdo rje rab tu bsgom/ /lag tu rin chen rab bsgoms na/ /rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rin chen chen po'i rigs bsgoms

nas/ /rin chen skur ni rab sbyor bas/ /rin chen mchog gi sgrub pa 'di/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /mkha' dbyings chos kyi dbus gnas par/ /tshe dpag med pa rab tu bsgom/ /lag tu pad mo rab bsgoms na/ /pad

mo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /pad mo chen po'i rigs bsgoms nas/ /chos kyi skur ni rab sbyor bas/ /pad mo'i mchog gi sgrub pa 'di/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /mkha' dbyings dam tshig dbus gnas par/ /
don yod ye shes rab tu bsgom/ /lag tu ral gri rab bsgoms na/ /ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /dam tshig chen po'i rigs bsgoms te/ /dam tshig skur ni rab sbyor bas/ /dam tshig mchog gi sgrub
pa 'di/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /rtse gsum ye shes lcags kyu sogs/ /rdo rje'i khyad par gyis bsgrubs na/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa yis/ /bsam gtan des ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /bcom

ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am shing gcig drung / /mtshan ma gcig dang zhi gnas su/ /rdo rje dgug pa'i khyad par gyis/ /sgrub pa pos ni rtag

tu bsgrub/ /sbyor gsum sngags kyi skyes bu ni/ /rdo rje can gsum sbyor bsams nas/ /sku dang gsung thugs lcags gyu ni/ /sangs rgyas ye shes blo ldan gyi/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas

dgug pa dam pa yin/ /dam tshig las byung phyogs bcu pa/ /rdo rjes bkug nas nye bar spyad/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dam tshig rdo rje dgug pa'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo che/ /rgyal gnas lcags kyu bsams
nas ni/ /rdo rje pad ma la sogs pas/ /dam tshig dgug pa'i mchog ni bya/ /khams gsum gyi dam tshig dgug pa'o/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la/ /lag tu sku dang
gsung thugs ni/ /kyo ba la sogs rab tu bsgom/ /'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /de ni gnas las byed par 'gyur/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje sku ni rnam bsgoms shing / /lce yi rdo rje'i

sbyor bas bsgom/ /rdo rje'i gsung dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas skur ni rnam bsgoms la/ /lag tu bsgrub bya bsams na ni/ /rdo rje dang ni 'dra bar 'gyur/ /gsang gsum
dam tshig mchod pa'i mchog /mchod pas mchod nas rab bsgrub 'di/ /de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba'i snying po bsdus pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig gis de skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /sha chen dam tshig mchog gis ni/ /rdo rje gsum mchog bsgrub par bya/ /bshang gci dam tshig mchog gis ni/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/ /glang po'i dam tshig sha yis ni/ /

mngon shes lnga nyid thob par bya/ /rta sha dag gi dam tshig gis/ /mi snang ba yi bdag por 'gyur/ /khyi sha dag gi dam tshig gis/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /ba glang sha yi dam tshig gis/ /rdo rje
dgug pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /sha rnams thams cad ma rnyed na/ /thams cad bsams pas rnam par brtag /rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di byas na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob/ /rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa

yi/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can/ /snying gar ye shes dam tshig dang / /dbu rgyan rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes 'gyur la/ /'di ni dam tshig tshul gyi mchog /dam tshig mchog gi bya ba ni/ /

dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog /dam tshig thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje'i zas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /lce ni dam tshig rdo rje mchog /hU~M yig rdo rje can bsgoms te/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba

yis/ /zos na rdo rje gsum thob 'gyur/ /'di ni rdo rje'i tshul mchog ste/ /AHdang oM gyi dam tshig kyang / /'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje dam tshig bdud rtsi'i phreng ba

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rdo rje dam tshig gsum grub mchog /sku gsum rdo rje can du 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i rgya mtshor 'gyur/ /'jig rten khams ni thams
cad du/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid snang bar byed/ /'khor lo'i dam tshig grub pa mchog /sangs rgyas sku dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /gang gA'i bye snyed thams cad du/ /kun nas grub pa rnam par spyod/ /thams
cad dam tshig mchog gis ni/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/ /thams cad dam tshig gzugs mchog ni/ /rdo rje sku ni rab bsgoms pas/ /mi snang gyur pa thams cad la/ /stong gsum gcig
pus snang byed pas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'phrog pa dang / /lha mchog bu mo dag la spyod/ /gang gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje gsum gyi gnas bzhugs pa/ /rang lag skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/ /

rdo rje'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur/ /gang gA'i bye snyed zhing rnams na/ /sgra grag pa ni ji snyed pa/ /rna ba'i drung na 'khod pa bzhin/ /mngon shes khyu mchog gis thos 'gyur/ /gang gA'i bye snyed zhing dag
gi/ sems can kun gyi sems rnams ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid can/ /rol mo ltar byung sems rig 'gyur/ /bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed du/ /'khor bar gnas par 'byung ba yi/ /sngon gyi
gnas kyi gtan tshigs rnams/ /zhag gsum lon pa bzhin du dran/ /gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sku/ /sangs rgyas sprin la sogs brgyan pas/ /bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed du/ /rdzu 'phrul mchog gi rdo rjes
'gengs/ /bcom ldan 'das dam tshig mngon par mkhyen pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de la mngon par shes pa lnga ni rdo rje'i spyan dang / rdo rje'i snyan dang rdo rje'i thugs dang / rdo rje'i

gnas dang rdo rje'i rdzu 'phrul lo/ /sangs rgyas mngon shes don grub cing / /sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /gang gA'i bye snyed grangs med pa'i/ /'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas su/ /rdo rje'i sku

dang gsung dang thugs/ /'jig rten khams kun rnam par bsgrod/ /bsnyen pa dam tshig sbyor ba dang / /nye bar sgrub pa 'byung ba dang / /sgrub pa'i don du dam tshig dang / /sgrub pa chen po dag dang bzhi/ /

shes byas rdo rje'i bye brag gis/ /de nas las rnams bsgrub par bya/ /bsnyen pa ting 'dzin rab sbyor ba/ /byang chub mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /nye bar sgrub pa grub mchog la/ /rdo rje'i skye mched rnam dpyad pa/ /sgrub

pa bskul ba rab brjod pa/ /sngags dang bdag po rnam bsgom pa/ /sgrub pa chen po byed pa'i tshe/ /rang sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs/ /dbu rgyan la ni bdag po bsam/ /ye shes rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur/ /bsnyen

pa ye shes bdud rtsis bya/ /thams cad du ni rtag tu nyid/ /'di gang sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /sngags dang de nyid don sgrub pa'o/ /dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs dang / /rab tu skye bos dben pa dang / /ri
bo nags 'dab chu ngogs su/ /rtag tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sgrub pa chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yang na rdo rje bzhi dag gis/ /brtul zhugs brtan pas bsnyen par

bya/ /rdo rje sku gsum mnyam de yis/ /bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /thun bzhi rnams dang rab sbyor bas/ /gnas lngar blo dang ldan pa yis/ /oM gyi yi ge bsgoms nas ni/ /ye shes rdo rjes sdom pa bstan/ /

zhag bdun dang ni zla phyed dang / /zla gcig zla ba phyed dang gnyis/ /rdo rje dam tshig bsgrubs na ni/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /zhag grangs bye brag rab dbye bas/ /nga yis rgyas par rab tu bstan/ /phyogs kyi nang

las dngos grub gsungs/ /gsang ba mchog las byung rnams kyis/ /de la 'di ni nye bar bsgrub pa'i sdom pa'i yul lo/ /sangs rgyas sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje gsum dang mi phyed dngos/ /bdag la byin gyis

brlab gnas deng / /sku yi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje gsum dang mi phyed dngos/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab gnas deng / /sku yi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol/ /de la 'di
ni sgrub pa'i sdom pa'i yul lo/ /chos nyid gsung lam dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje gsum dang mi phyed dngos/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab gnas deng / /gsung gi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i
sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje gsum dang mi phyed dngos/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab gnas deng / /gsung gi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol/ /de la 'di ni sgrub pa chen po'i sdom pa'i yul lo/ /rdo rje thugs 'dzin
dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje gsum dang mi phyed dngos/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab gnas deng / /thugs kyi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje gsum dang mi phyed
dngos/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab gnas deng / /thugs kyi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ /yang na chos kyi sems dpa'ang rung / /gal te rmongs bdag nyid 'da' na/ /tshal bar

'gas 'dir gdon mi za/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sbyor ba dam tshig sgrub pa mchog nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan bde

gshegs kun/ /ye shes rdo rje mchog 'dzin dang / /sems can kun don yang dag 'byung / /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis/ /thub pa don kun rdo rje can/ /ston pa che la phyag 'tshal nas/ /dam tshig de nyid mkhyen pa la/ /mchod de rdo
rje'i dbyangs 'di gsungs/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas tshul re bzang / /e ma'o byang chub tshul gyi mchog /e ma'o chos kyi tshul re zhi/ /e ma'o sngags kyi tshul re brtan/ /ma skyes pa'i yi chos rnams ni/ /

ngo bo nyid kyis khyad par can/ /rnam par mi rtog yang dag la/ /ye shes 'byung bar rab tu gsungs/ /yid 'ong sngags rnams kun bsdus pa/ /rdo rje bzlas pa ye shes che/ /sku gsung mi phyed dkyil 'khor ni/ /sangs
rgyas ye shes thob 'gyur ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /bzlas pa rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlob/ /rigs ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /sku dang gsung
dang thugs mtshan nyid/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa de ring gsungs/ /ye shes rgya mtsho gsan pa dang / /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas dus gsum byung ba rnams/ /rdo rje sngags ni rab bsgoms
pas/ /ye shes mnyam med thob 'gyur ba/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bshad du gsol/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /nam mkha' rdo rje ye shes byung / /byed skyed dam pa mchog gi gtsos/ /rdo rje bzlas
pa 'di gsungs so/ /sngags kun don gyi bzlas pa ni/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum mtshan nyid/ /dbye ba gsum gyi rdo rje'i mthar/ /bkod pa rdo rje gsum brjod bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gnas rnams
su/ /spro ba rnam pa gsum dag bya/ /rdo rje bzlas pa 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs/ /bsgoms nas mchod pa'i mchog brtag pa/ /ye shes

rdo rjes byas na ni/ /rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs/ /bsams nas mchod pa'i mchog brtag pa/ /ye shes rdo rjes rab tu bya/ /'di ni byang chub mchog 'thob pa'o/ /

yang na dbye ba rnam gsum gyis/ /so so so sor spro bar bya/ /sku dang gsung thugs bdag med pa/ /ye shes sems kyi yang dag spro/ /brjod nas rdo rje spro bya zhing / /rdzogs nas rab tu bsdu bar bya/ /'di ni

ye shes spyan phye ba'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni kun gyi yin/ /sku yi rdo rje rdzogs byang chub/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam dpyad pa/ /sangs rgyas sku zhes bya bar gsungs/ /de ni sku yi bzlas par bshad/ /gsung
gi dam tshig rdzogs byang chub/ /sgra dang sgra min rnam dpyad pa/ /gsung gi rdo rje zhes gsungs te/ /de ni gsung gi bzlas par bshad/ /thugs kyi dam tshig rdzogs byang chub/ /gnas pa'i rdo rje
rnam dpyad pa/ /thugs kyi rdo rje zhes gsungs te/ /de ni thugs kyi bzlas par bshad/ /don gyi rjes rtogs bzlas pa ni/ /ngo bo nyid byung bzang po yis/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams dpyad pa/ /de ni

rin chen bzlas par bshad/ /sangs rgyas zhing las thams cad du/ /sku yi sprin rnams spro ba ni/ /bzhud cing byon pa rdo rje'i don/ /de ni don yod bzlas par bshad/ /khro bo'i dam tshig shes pa yis/ /rang gi
rdo rjes bsgrags dkyil 'khor/ /sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig thos pa/ /de ni khro bo'i bzlas par bshad/ /'dod pa'i don gyis myos gyur ma/ /sems can kun la phan dga' med/ /sems can gti mug gnas
la 'jog /de ni gti mug bzlas par bshad/ /'dod chags rdo rje las byung tshig /lus dang ngag sems la gnas pa/ /sems can 'dod chags mtshor gnas bzhag /de ni 'dod chags bzlas
par bshad/ /zhe sdang rdo rje las byung sems/ /lus dang ngag sems la gnas pa/ /sems can zhe sdang gnas la bzhag /de ni zhe sdang bzlas par bshad/ /dam tshig rdo rje gsum de nyid/ /dam
tshig rdo rje can dbu ma/ /de nyid dam tshig rdo rje yi/ /ma ning bzlas pa zhes bshad do/ /'dod chags de nyid don bsgom pa/ /rdo rje bdag po thams cad ni/ /sems can kun la phan 'dod pa'i/ /'dod
chags las skyes byang chub mdzad/ /rig pa chen po spyan la sogs/ /rtag tu 'dod pa'i don brtson pa/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gis ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bsten na 'grub/ /gti mug dam tshig
las byung ba/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje can/ /ma ning dag gi gnas grub pa/ /dngos grub dam pa rab tu ster/ /khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes/ /rtag tu gsod la brtson pa rnams/ /gsod pa'i don gyis
sgrub pa po/ /mchog gi chos can gyis 'grub 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ye shes 'khor lo can gyi ni/ /snying ka'i dbus su 'khor lo bsgom/ /
gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /dbus su 'khor lo'i don bsgom mo/ /ye shes rdo rje can gyis ni/ /snying ka'i dbus su rdo rje bsgom/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /rdo rje'i sngags don
bsgom par bya/ /rin chen ye shes can gyis ni/ /snying ga'i dbus su rin chen bsgom/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /rin chen sngags don bsgom par bya/ /pad ma ye shes can gyis ni/ /snying ga'i
dbus su pad ma bsgom/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /pad ma'i sngags don bsgom par bya/ /ral gri ye shes can gyis ni/ /snying ga'i dbus su ral gri bsgom/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor dbus gnas

pa/ /ral gri'i sngags don bsgom par bya/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi ngos rnams su/ /sangs rgyas lnga rnams dgod par bya/ /'od zer lnga yi bye brag gis/ /spros na byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /sngags rnams thams cad

spro ba ni/ /bye brag rnam pa gnyis su bsgrags/ /sku gsum rdo rje'i bye brag gis/ /spro ba dang ni bsdu bar bya/ /lus ni sku yi ngo bo nyid/ /sems ni thugs kyi ngo bo nyid/ /ngag ni gsung gi rang bzhin gyis/ /mchod na
mchod pa'i gnas thob 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo yis/ /rdo rje lnga ni bsgom par bya/ /sku gsung rdo rje'i dbus su ni/ /rang gi bdag po'i gzugs bsams nas/ /rang gi sngags kyi rdo rje'i
gzugs/ /dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi dag ni/ /kha dog rnam bzhir kun brtags la/ /snying gar sngags kyi don bsgom pa/ /rdo rje rnam pa bzhi yi las/ /bsam gtan rdo rje can dag byed/ /'di ni
sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /mchog tu rtag pa gsang chen no/ /zhi ba la ni spyan gyi tshul/ /rgyas pa pad mo rdo rje can/ /dbang la rnam par snang mdzad gnas/ /rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod

la/ /'di de rdo rje thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba sku gsum las byung bas/ /sprul pa sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /bya ba'i rol mos mtshan pa'o/ /ma dad smra ba'i sems can dang / /slob dpon rdo rje can smod pa/ /gdug
pa'i sems can gzhan rnams la'ang / /rab tu bskul ba 'di bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen po 'khor lo rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams/ /sangs rgyas skur
ni rnam bsgoms la/ /dgra bo bsad par bsams nas su/ /de nas las rnams brtsam par bya/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa/ /rdo rje rtse lnga zhal bzhi pa/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan/ /rdo rje
sems dpar rnam par bsgom/ /dus gsum dam tshig las byung ba'i/ /sangs rgyas 'khor lo rnam bsgoms la/ /sangs rgyas 'khor lo stobs po che/ /lag pa g.yas pas 'di bya'o/ /phyogs bcu

nas byung sems can rnams/ /sangs rgyas sku yi bye brag gis/ /bsdus te gong bu'i tshul gyis su/ /de dag rang gi lus la gzhug /sangs rgyas ye shes 'khor lo can/ /slar yang spro bar rab tu bya/ /khros pas
'khrugs pa'i khro bo bsam/ /mi sdug rab gsal 'jigs su rung / /mtshon cha sna tshogs mchog 'dzin pa/ /gsod pa'i don gyi mchog sems pa/ /gdug pa chen po gsod par byed/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid
kyang / /sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog stsol bas/ /rdo rje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gnas/ /dngos grub ster 'gyur rmongs bdag nyid/ /'di la the tshom mi bya'o/ /'di ni nyin zhag bdun bya ste/ /sangs rgyas

kyis kyang mi 'grub bo/ /rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi bka'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa/ /'khor lo rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan/ /rnam
par snang mdzad rab tu bsgom/ /dus gsum dam tshig las byung ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' grags chen po/ /rdo rje me stag 'phro ba can/ /de yi phyag na bsnams par bsgom/ /phyogs bcu nas byung sems

can rnams/ /rdo rje'i sku yi khyad par gyis/ /'od zer tshul gyis bsdus nas ni/ /de dag bdag gi lus la gzud/ /rdo rje thams cad spro ba ni/ /ye shes mchog gi gnyen gyis bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba can/ /
sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid gson/ /bdag ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor bas/ /gal te dam tshig las 'das na/ /rdo rje kun nas 'bar gzugs kyis/ /sku gsum
las byung dgas par bgyis/ /zhig par 'gyur 'dir gdon mi 'tshal/ /'khor lo'i dam tshig ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rdo rje can/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus
gnas bsam/ /gshin rje gshed ni 'khor lo che/ /rang gi rdo rje rab tu brtag /dus gsum sangs rgyas sems dpa' rnams/ /sku gsum dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa/ /slar yang sangs rgyas gshin rje gshed/ /rnam
pa 'dra bar spro bar bya/ /sems can dus gsum la bzhugs pa/ /gdug sems can dang dgra bo rnams/ /khros pas thams cad gsod par bsgom/ /'di ni rdo rje bka' dkyil 'khor/ /dam tshig thams
cad las byung ba sku gsum gyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'am/ /rang sngags don gyi yon tan nam/ /yang na gtsug tor dam tshig gis/ /bka' yi 'khor lo

sbyar bar bya/ /sngags kun bsrung phyir ye shes mchog /rdo rje can gyis bya ba ste/ /'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi/ /byang chub bsrung ba'i don zhes bya/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjes de skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /rnam par snang mdzad sku mchog las/ /'byung ba'i sku gsum dam tshig chos/ /bsams nas gdan de rab tu brtag /mkha' dbyings sangs rgyas
thams cad kyis/ /yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgom/ /rang sngags yi ge gnas ye shes/ /thugs kyi rnam par bsgom par bya/ /slar yang sangs rgyas sems tsam du/ /bsgoms pa rnams ni rab tu bsdu/ /

thugs kyi rdo rjer byas nas su/ /sku gsum la ni de dag gzud/ /bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje'i sngags rin po che rab tu snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
to/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgom/ /sangs rgyas rim par bkod nas ni/ /chu yi steng du bcag par bya/ /rkang pa mnyam bzhag sbyor ba yis/ /spyi bo'i steng du rkang

pa bsgom/ /bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje chu gter rkang pas gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dbus su dbang chen dkyil 'khor ni/ /bsams te khro bo'i rigs

bzhag la/ /las kyi rdo rje gnas gnon pa/ /de yi spyi bor bsgom par bya/ /mu stegs thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khrul 'khor gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /khro bo'i gzugs gsum rdo rje
mchog /ge sar ser po'i mdog 'dra ba/ /thams cad ri yi rgyal po ltar/ /spyi bor bsams nas rab tu bsgom/ /sangs rgyas dpung yang gnon byed na/ /mi dbang la 'dir the tshom med/ /bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs las byung bas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dpung thams cad gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dgra bo skrag pa'i dam tshig la/ /bsam gtan
'di ni rab tu brtag /sangs rgyas kyis kyang gal te bgrod/ /gsal bar 'gyur 'di gdon mi za/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis 'di skad ces gsungs te/ yi ge hU~M las phur

bu yi/ /tshad ni rtse mo lnga pa ste/ /rdo rje phur bur byas bsgom la/ /snying kar de yis 'di rab bsgom/ /sangs rgyas dpung ni khros pa yang / /'jig par 'gyur 'dir gdon mi za/ /dgra rmongs pa gnon par

byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /grong khyer ram ni yang na grong / /ljongs su yang ni rab sbyar bya/ /nad kun spong ba'i zhi ba yang / /'dis ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya/ /bar snang la gnas rdo rje ni/ /rtse mo
lnga pa rnam par bsgom/ /bskal pa sreg pa ltar bsams la/ /slar yang rab tu bsdu bar bya/ /spro ba dag kyang slar bya'o/ /rin chen yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od/ /chos kyi sprin ni bsgoms nas kyang / /dbang

bskur ba ni yang dag bya/ /rdo rje'i bsam gtan 'di yis ni/ /dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs/ /sbyin pa'i rdo rje rab snang byed/ /yid bzhin nor bu dpal ldan 'gyur/ /der ni sangs rgyas chos chen dang / /
rdo rje sems dpa'i sprin spro bya/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum yang gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /skyon med sku yi gsang ba'o/ /nad thams cad med par
byed pa rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /bsam gtan las byung dam bcas pa/ /gnas gang du ni brtsam par bya/ /'di yis bsam gtan sbyor ba yis/ /gnas na sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob/ /

rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che/ /rdo rje phur bur rab bsgoms la/ /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor mchog rnams la/ /me stag 'bar ba 'dra bas gdab/ /ces kyang gsungs so/ /'gro ba 'dul ba zhi ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa'i/ /zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /rnam par snang mdzad gzugs bsams nas/ /rang gi thugs kar don gnyer bzhag /mkha' dbyings

spyan gyi mchog rnams kyis/ /yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgom/ /bsdus nas 'od kyi gong bu yis/ /nad pa la ni phab nas su/ /spu khung rtse bar nas sangs rgyas/ /sprin rnams brtul zhugs can gyis spro/ /

sangs rgyas sprin rnams de yi tshe/ /de la dbang bskur rab tu stsal/ /dam tshig rdo rje nad pa yis/ /skad cig gis ni dpal ldan 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyi dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin to/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /chos 'dzin pa yi gzugs bsam mo/ /thugs kar don gnyer gzhag par bya/ /mkha' dbyings
gnas ni nyams dga' bar/ /dkar mo zhes byas rab tu dgang / /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'od/ /'od kyi gong bu bsdu bar bya/ /'di dag 'dod pa'i lus dang ngag /sems kyi gnas la dbab par bya/ /

spu khung rtse bar nas rin chen/ /sprin rnams brtul zhugs can gyis spro/ /chos kyi sprin ni bsgom bya zhing / /dbang bskur ba ni yang dag bya/ /rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni/ /dgang dka' ba yang rab tu

'gengs/ /de ni yid bzhin nor dpal ldan/ /sbyin pa'i rdo rje rab snang ba'o/ /chos kyi sprin gyi dam tshig bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa'i/ /rdo rje zla gam dkyil 'khor
bsam/ /rdo rje nam mkha' chos mdun gzugs/ /thugs kar 'dod pa gzhag par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor yongs su gang / /'od zer lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /gzi

brjid de la dbab par bya/ /de ni de ma thag nyid du/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs su byon/ /'jam dpal dang ni mnyam zhing gsal/ /gnas las byed par der 'gyur ro/ /dgyes pa'i bdag nyid can dbang bskur/ /dga'

ston chen po stsol bar mdzad/ /mthong ba nyid kyis byung ba yi/ /'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /rin po che'i dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha' rdo rjer srin po ni/ /drag cing
khro la rab gtum dang / /wa dang sna tshogs bya rog dang / /bya rgod khyi yis gang bar bsgom/ /me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /dgra bo rnams ni rtag par bsgom/ /sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed pa/ /

bsams nas rnal 'byor sbyar bar bya/ /rgyu ma rus bcud khrag la sogs/ /kun gyis grangs par rnam par bsgom/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pas mnan/ /bsgoms na dgra rnams 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje

'dzin pas kyang / /gal te 'di ltar rab bsgoms na/ /zla phyed nang du rdzogs pa la/ /'chi bar 'gyur 'dir gdon mi za/ /rdo rje sprin dam tshig bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rnam par snang mdzad zhal gsum pa/ /
ston ka'i chu sgong mdog 'dra bsam/ /dkar po nag po rab tu dmar/ /thor tshugs dbu rgyan dag gis brgyan/ /rdo rje can ni zhal gsum bsam/ /nag po dkar po dmar po'i zhal/ /'bar ba'i thor tshugs dbu
rgyan can/ /'jig rten khams rnams 'khrug byed pa'o/ /'dod chags can ni zhal gsum bsam/ /dmar po nag po dkar po'i zhal/ /thor tshugs dbu rgyan longs spyod can/ /bsgoms na nges par 'grub
par 'gyur/ /'khor lo rdo rje pad mo che/ /g.yas pa'i phyag tu rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje phyag drug bzang po ni/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams par bsgom/ /sems can kun la phan bzhed ma/ /spyan ma zhal
gsum dag tu bsam/ /dkar po nag po dmar po che/ /mdzes pa'i gzugs su rab tu bsgom/ /mkha' skyes spyan ni rgyal mo che/ /dri ma med cing zhal gsum pa/ /gnag dang dmar dang dkar ba'i tshul/ /
mdzes pa'i gzugs su rtag tu bsgom/ /gsung rdo rje spyan rgyal mo che/ /dmar gnag dkar po'i rnam pa yi/ /zhal gsum pa ni myur du 'grub/ /kha dog mdzes par rab tu bsgom/ /rig ma rdo rje
uta pal bsnams/ /zhal gsum rab tu gsal ba'i mdangs/ /ser gnag dkar ba'i rnam pa ni/ /bsgoms na ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed/ /zhal gsum drag po'i
'od bzang ba/ /rnon po 'jigs pa'ang 'jigs par byed/ /kha dog nag po rab tu bsgom/ /gzhan gyi mi thub khro bo che/ /drag tu bzhad pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ /zhal gsum 'od zer mang po dag /rab tu
'phro bar rnam par bsam/ /khro bo chen po rta mgrin ni/ /bskal pa'i me bzhin rab tu 'bar/ /zhal gsum gdug pa zhabs kyi mnan/ /sbyor ba can gyi rtag tu bsgom/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi khro bo che/ /'od zer
'phro ba rab tu 'khrug /drag po rdo rje 'bar ba 'dra/ /'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed/ /'dod pa'i ye shes khro bo che/ /zhal gsum pa ni 'jigs par byed/ /phyag bzhi 'jigs par byed
pa'i mchog /Tak+ki'i rgyal po rab tu bsgom/ /stobs po che ni rdo rje che/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mun sel ba/ /gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed/ /zhal gsum pa ni rtag tu bsgom/ /khro bo
chen po dbyug sngon can/ /khams gsum dag ni 'jigs par byed/ /zhal gsum rdo rje las byung ba/ /'bar ba rnon po can du bsgom/ /rdo rje mi g.yo khro bo che/ /rdo rje las byung zur gyis blta/ /
zhi ba ral gri zhags pa bsnams/ /brtul zhugs can gyis zhal gsum bsgom/ /gtsug tor chen po yi ge gcig /'od zer dag ni kun tu 'phro/ /zhal gsum 'bar ba'i 'khor lo can/ /
bsam gtan 'od bzang bsgom par bya/ /gnod mdzes ye shes mchog 'dzin pa/ /'jigs pa'i rgya mtsho yang dag byed/ /zhal gsum 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro sku/ /bsam gtan dkyil 'khor
bsgom par bya/ /gzi brjid phung po gtsug tor rgyal/ /gang gzhan sngags kyi 'khor lo can/ /dam tshig longs spyod 'di rnams kyis/ /so so so sor bsgom par bya/ /sngags rnams kyi ni ting nge 'dzin/ /
dpag tu med pa bshad pa yin/ /khro bo dag ni re re yang / /nam mkha'i steng bas shin tu 'phags/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas
gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ /rnam par snang mdzad rnam par bsam/ /gsal zhing zla ba bzhin zhi ba/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'dra ba'i 'od/ /me long lta bur yang dag byung / /khams gsum dag ni rgyan
gyur pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dag /bsams na byang chub de yis mthong / /bsam gtan rdo rje rab bsgom pa/ /de yis sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag /'jig rten thams cad

dbang byed pa/ /tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /rnam par snang mdzad dam tshig 'byung ba mdzes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor
dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsam/ /khros pa gsal ba'i lus dang 'dra/ /'bar ba sna tshogs mnyam pa'i 'od/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan/ /
rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /zhi ba'i ye shes gnas bsgoms na/ /rdo rje nyid ni myur du 'thob/ /bsam gtan rdo rje rab bskul ba/ /'dis ni rdo rje'i bdag nyid che/ /sems can thams cad
dbang byed pa/ /tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /dam tshig thams cad 'byung ba mdzes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa
bsam/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ /chos kyi sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /gsal ba'i lus 'dzin zhi ba ni/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /'od zer sprin ni 'khor
lo che/ /rnam par 'phro ba rab tu bsgom/ /'di yis chos kyi bdag nyid che/ /sku gsum mi phyed las byung ba/ /ye shes rgya mtshos rnam brgyan pas/ /tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /chos kyi sems

dpa' 'byung ba'i dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ /spyan ma mchog ni
rnam par bsgom/ /zhal mdzes spyan ni rab tu yangs/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /mtshan rnams thams cad rab tu rdzogs/ /bud med sgyu ma'i mchog ldan pa/ /khams gsum dag ni dbang byed
pa/ /ye shes dngos grub thams cad byed/ /'khor lo'i yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od/ /phyag tu 'khor lo bsgom par bya/ /spyan gyi dam tshig phyag gi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam
mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'od mchog bsam/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms nas/ /nam mkha' rdo rje mchog rab bsgom/ /zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs/ /ud ut+pa
pal mthing ga'i mdog 'dra ba/ /mtshan rnams thams cad rab tu rdzogs/ /nam mkha' dam tshig mchog rab bsgom/ /phyag na ud pal sngo dmar bsnams/ /khams gsum dag gis phyag byas pa/ /sangs rgyas byang

chub byed pa'i mchog /dngos grub rdo rje can gyi gsang / /nam mkha' yum rin po che'i 'od kyi sprin rdo rje tshim par byed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /chos
kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ /rdo rje chos ma rab tu bsgom/ /zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs/ /pad ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba/ /sgyu mas mdzin pa'i mchog
las byung / /'dod chags chags pa 'dzin sdug pa/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs shing / /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /phyag na ud pal dmar mdzes bsnams/ /sangs rgyas thams

cad rab bsgoms pa/ /chos kyi ye shes 'byung gnas mchog /dam tshig rdo rje can gyi gsang / /chos kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa kun tu ston pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin to/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /dngos grub dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ /sgrol ma mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs/ /

sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /kha dog ljang ser 'dra ba'i 'od/ /bud med sgyu mas rab tu myos/ /rdo rje ting nge 'dzin las byung / /sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /ud pal ljang ser dmar ba'i
mdangs/ /phyag na bsnams pa rab tu bsgom/ /dam tshig sgrol ma mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs
rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ /gshin rje gshed mchog rnam par bsgom/ /'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro/ /'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu khros/ /spyan dmar mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /
phyag na ral gri bsnams par bsgom/ /dbu rgyan snang mdzad bzhugs bsgoms na/ /rdo rje can ni dgyes par 'gyur/ /'di ni ye shes rdo rje can/ /thams cad khro bo'i dam tshig yin/ /gshin rje gshed
spro ba'i snang ba bkod pa bsgom pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ /gzhan
gyis mi thub rab tu bsgom/ /'bar ba 'od zer mang po can/ /sbrul gyis brgyan cing ske rags can/ /zhal ni rnam par gtsigs shing bgrad/ /kha dog dkar po rab tu bsgom/ /mi bskyod dam

tshig dbu rgyan la/ /bsams na rdo rje can dag dgyes/ /'di ni ye shes rdo rje can/ /thams cad khro bo'i dam tshig go/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha'
rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ /rdo rje rta mgrin rab tu bsgom/ /khro bo'i 'od zer mang po dag /thams cad du ni rnam
par 'phro/ /gdug pa thams cad zhabs kyis mnan/ /kha dog dmar po rnam par bsam/ /rdzogs sangs dpag med dbu rgyan la/ /bsgoms na rdo rje can dag mnyes/ /'di ni rdo rje ye shes can/ /
thams cad khro bo'i dam tshig yin/ /rta mgrin skyed pa 'byung ba rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas
gzugs ni rab bsgom la/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi rab bsgom pa/ /'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro/ /rdo rje'i sprin ni kun du 'khrug /khros shing khro bcas gnag pa dang / /mche ba rnon po rab tu bsgom/ /mi
bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la/ /bsgoms na rdo rje can mnyes 'gyur/ /'di ni thams cad khro bo yi/ /'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ /bdud rtsi'i dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin to/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ /Tak+ki'i rgyal po rab bsgom bya/ /khro bo 'jigs pa'i cha lugs
gtum/ /'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /rdo rje 'od bzang bsgom par bya/ /mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la/ /bsgoms na mnyes pa rab tu 'phel/ /'di
ni thams cad khro bo yi/ /'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ /bsam gtan rdo rje rdzogs par byang chub pa dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma'i dkyil
'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ /stobs po che ni rab tu bsgom/ /'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro/ /rdo rje gsum gyi gnas dkyil 'khor/ /khro zhing drag po zhags
pa 'dzin/ /rdo rje stobs can bsgom par bya/ /mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la/ /bsgoms na mnyes pa rab tu 'phel/ /'di ni thams cad khro bo yi/ /'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ /rdo rje gsum gyi
stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ /rdo rje sngon po rnam par bsgom/ /khro bo
'jigs pa'i cha lugs can/ /'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed/ /gzugs ni rab tu gnag la rno/ /nag po'i rgya mtsho skyed par byed/ /'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro/ /rdo rje dbyug thogs
bsgom par bya/ /mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la/ /bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur/ /'di ni thams cad khro bo yi/ /'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ /rdo rje dbyug pa'i dam tshig mchog
dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ /mi g.yo mchog ni rnam par

bsgom/ /khros shing 'jigs pa'i zur gyis lta/ /ral gri zhags pa bsnams pa 'khrug /'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro/ /mi g.yo rdo rje can bsgom bya/ /mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la/ /bsgoms na mnyes pa rab tu 'phel/ /

'di ni thams cad khro bo yi/ /'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig yin/ /rdo rje nam mkha' dbyings kyi gnas/ gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa
bsam/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ /rig pa'i 'khor lor rab tu 'byung / /mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /'khor lo 'bar bas yongs su bskor/ /gtsug tor 'khor lo dam tshig ni/ /

rnam par 'phro ba rab tu bsgom/ /mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la/ /bsgoms na mnyes pa rab tu 'phel/ /'di ni thams cad khro bo yi/ /'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ /gtsug tor gyi dam tshig rig pa'i stobs
'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ /rdo rje sum b+ha rab tu bsgom/ /me lce rnon po

'bar ba'i sku/ /rdo rje'i sprin ni rab tu 'phro/ /phyag na rdo rje rab 'bar ba/ /bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la/ /bsgoms na mnyes pa rab tu 'phel/ /'di ni thams
cad khro bo yi/ /'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ /rdo rje dam tshig sum b+ha rab tu 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /'gog pa khro bo'i 'khor lo ni/ /sangs rgyas 'khor lo bstan pa yis/ /
ting 'dzin rdo rje ye shes rnams/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/

rdo rje'i dam tshig bkod pa de kho na nyid kyi don bsgom pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi

bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos zhi ba'i dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM ru ru

s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+ha lo tsa ni sarbA ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /phun sum tshogs kun yid bzhes pa/ /mnyes shing rab tu dgyes gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje rjes su dran/ /sangs rgyas
rnams kyi zhi skyed ma/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub cing / /rdo rje'i dam tshig skul mdzad ma/ /shi ba sos par byed par gsungs/ /rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das sku gsum gyi dam tshig khro bo rdo rjes dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku

gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM shang ka ri ShAn ta ka re g+huT Ta g+huT Ta ni g+huT Ta ni/ g+hu ta ya g+hu ta ya g+hu Ta te ni swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /rdo rje gsum ni mi phyed pa/ /
rdo rje can mnyes spyan gdangs nas/ /rdo rje thugs ni rjes su dran/ /srung ba'i rdo rje sbyor ba la/ /rtag tu las ni rab bsgrub pa/ /rdo rje chen po 'jigs nyen la/ /
rtag tu stobs ni byed par bshad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags chen po'i dam tshig gzigs

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos kyi dam tshig gi sku'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te ka Te da ka Te swA hA/
de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /rdo rje chos mchog 'dzin pa rnams/ /rdo rje chos ni rjes su dran/ /mnyes nas bsam gtan thob gyur pas/ /rtag tu chos rgyas stobs dang ldan/ /rtag tu mdzad
po che mdzad pa/ /rdo rje gsung gi bka' bzhin du/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis byed par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig kun nas 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs nas/ dam tshig sems dpa'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM tA re tud tA re tu re swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas
kun bdag che skyes mnyes/ /rdo rje'i sku ni rjes su dran/ /bsam gtan ye shes thob gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sde chen dang / /sems can khams ni kun nas su/ /skad cig gis ni
bran bzhin du/ /thams cad g.yo med dbang du byed ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de
bzhin gshegs pas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje gshin rje gshed po chen po rdo rje khro bo 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs

rdo rje las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzrA NA/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba duSh+Ta satwa da ma ka / a si mu sa la par shu pA sha hasta/ tsa tur mu kha/ tsa tur b+hu dza/ sha Ta tsa ra Na/

A gta tsha/ A gta tsha/ /sarba duSh+Ta pra NA a pa hA ri Ne/ ma hA bi g+hA ta ka / bi kr-i tA nan/ /sarba b+hU ta b+ha ya~M ka ra/ aT+TAT+Ta ha sa nA de ne/ byA g+hA tsar ma ni ba sa na/ ku ru ku ru/ sarba karmA ni/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha

sarba mAn trA na/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha pa ra mu drAn/ A kar Sha ya/ A kar Sha ya/ sarba b+hU tAn/ ma tha ma tha/ nir ma tha nir ma tha/ sarba duSh+TAn/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ maN Da la ma d+h+ye bai ba swa ta/

dzI bi tAn ta ka ra/ ku ru ku ru ma ma sarba kAr+yam/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA bi lam ba mA bi lam ba/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarbAn nA sha ya ka ra ka ra/ big+ha

nA~M sarbA a shA pa ri pU ra ka / he he b+ha ga ban/ kin tsi ra ya si/ ma ma sarba ar+thA~M sA d+ha ya swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun ni grangs chen po/ /'jigs shing kun du'i
skrag gyur nas/ /rdo rje sems ni rjes su dran/ /thod pa ma chag ma gas pa/ /gzugs mdzes yid 'ong rnyed pa la/ /rkang pas mnan pa'i tshul byas nas/ /sngags 'di rjes su dran par bya/ /
mA ma kI 'am spyan yang rung / /rdo rje chen po rigs mthon po/ /lan gsum dag tu brjod na ni/ /de ma thag tu nges par 'gugs/ /bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis dam tshig 'od zer mthug po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ bdud rtsi'i dam tshig gi rdo rje khro bo

'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man ta kA ya bAka tsita ta badzrA NA~M/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA da~MSh+To ta ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si/ mu sha la/ par shu pA sha hastA ya/ oM a mr-i ta kuN

Da li/ /kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+na bi nA ya kAn/ ma hA ga na pa ti/ dzI bi tAn ta ka rA ya swA hA/ /de nas 'di

ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun ni grags chen po/ /brgyal zhing rab tu 'jigs gyur nas/ /rdo rje sku ni rjes su dran/ /sngags rnams kun gyi sbyor ba la/ /rdo rje bskrad pa'i las rnams ni/ /cho gas
sangs rgyas dpung dag kyang / /rang nyid kyis ni sprod par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs nas/ rdo rje khro bo chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man ta kA ya bA ka tsita ta badzrA NA~M/ oM hUM dzi na ri TiT+Ta hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni
gsungs tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas bdag nyid cha skyes kun/ /'jigs shing kun du skrag gyur pas/ /byang chub sems ni rjes su dran/ /srin po ma rungs gtum po dang / /'jigs pa chen po 'khrugs pa
la/ /rdo rje sems kyis rab sbyar bas/ /las rnams cho ga bzhin du byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pas dpag tu med pa 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ pad mo 'byung ba'i rdo rje khro bo 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man ta kA ya bA ka tsita ta badzrA NAM/ oM hU~M hU~M hU~M ta ru la/ bi ru la/ sarba bi Sha

g+hA ta ka / dz+wa li ta bi s+phu ling ga / aT+TAT+Ta hA sa/ ke sa ris Ta a to pa/ badzra khu ra nir g+ha ta na/ tsa li ta ba su d+hA ta la ni shwA sa mA ru tota k+Shi pa ta d+ha ra Ni d+ha ra/ b+hISha Na aT+TAT+Ta hA sa/ a pa ri mi tA ba la pa rA

krA ma/ A bya ga NA b+hI ta b+hU ta ga NA d+h+yu Shi ta/ bud+h+ya bud+h+ya/ ha ya grI ba/ khA da khA da/ ba ra man trAn/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ sid+d+hi ma me d+he sha /A be sha ya A be sha ya/ sarba dz+wa ra pi shA tsA na/ sarba gra he Sh+wa a pra ti ha to b+ha ba/ badzra

da~MSh+Ta kiny+tsi rA ya si/ i daM duSh+Ta gra ha na/ duSh+Ta sarbam bA/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ mar da mar da/ pA Ta ya/ pA Ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ bud+d+ha d+harma sang g+ha a nu dz+nyA ta~M karma ku ru ha ya gri bA ya phaT/ badzra

ya phaT/ badzra gA trA ya phaT/ badzra ne trA ya phaT/ badzra da~MSh+TA ya phaT/ badzra khu rA ya phaT/ badzra kur nir g+hA ta nA ya phaT/ sarba trai lo kya b+ha yang ka rA ya phaT/ sarba karme Sh+ye a pra ti ha ya phaT/ badzra ku la

san trA sa na ya phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /chos kyi rdo rje mchog skyes rnams/ /'jigs shing rab tu brgyal bar 'gyur/ /ye shes rgyal po rjes su dran/ /mkha'
dbyings dug gis yongs gang ba/ /rdo rje ha la ha la'i 'od/ /khro bo'i rgyal po bskul ba yis/ /dug rnams thams cad med par byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar

grub pas gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i tog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje be con sngon po khro bo'i rgyal po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /

na maHsa man ta kA ya bA ka tsita ta badzrA NA/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga ban/ nI la badzra daN Da/ tu ru tu ru/ hu lu hu lu/ hA hA/ gu lu gu lu/ gu lA pa ya/ gu lA pa ya/ kra ma kra ma/ b+ha ga ban bA yu be ga na/ b+hU

tAn shI g+han/ da ha da ha/ da ra da ra/ ba ha ba ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha/ pA ta ya/ pA ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ mo TA pa ya mo TA pa ya/ sarba karmA Ni/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya/ as+thi me dam as+ya/

ru d+hi ra madz+dza med/ pa shA madz+dza/ ru d+hi ra pri ya e h+ya hi/ b+ha ga ban/ sarba big+h+na ni/ sarba bid+yA ni/ sarba man trA Ni/ sarba mU la karmA Ni/ kri tra ma Ni ShA dI ni/ sarba gra hA na/ ha na ha na/ b+han dza b+han dza/ mar da mar da pa e

dam me kAr+yam sA d+ha ya/ hU~M nI lA ya/ nI lA ya/ nI la badzra daN DA ya/ tu ru tu ru/ big+h+nan bi nA ya kA~M/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ hu ru hu ru/ dIb ta tsaN DA ya/ sarba sha tru~M NA~M hrI da yA ni pI Da ya/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ pa ra bid+yA nam

ts+tshe da ka hU~M bid+yA nA ma/ shiSh+Ta ka / sa ma ya ma nu smar/ /badzra d+ha ra ba tsa na~M tsa/ mar mA ni ni krin ta/ hU~M ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru/ hu ru hu ru/ phaT phaT hU~M hU~M kri tan tA ya/ de ba ri Shi bi drA pa kA ya/
ha na ha na/ badzra daN De na swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /gdug pa'i mchog las byung ba kun/ /yid ni 'jigs shing rab skrag nas/ /sems dpa'i rdo rje rjes su dran/ /grags chen khro bo'i
rgyal po 'di/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas na ni/ /cho ga'i tshul bzhin bskul ba yis/ /gdug pa thams cad gsod par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas kun nas sprin gyi

dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje stobs po che 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man ta kA ya bA kA tsita ta badzra NA~M/ oM hU~M hUM~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ u gra

shU la pA Ni hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ oM dz+yo ti nir nA da hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ oM ma hA ba lA ya swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /stobs po che yi klu rnams kun/ /yid ni 'jigs shing rab skrag
nas/ /sku gsum rdo rje rjes su dran/ /bzlas pa tsam dang sbyor ba yis/ /las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /than pa byung ba'i dus su yang / /chu yi dkyil 'khor 'bebs par byed/ /de nas bcom

'das kun tu sgrogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi Tak+ki'i rgyal po chen po khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /na

maHsa man ta kA ya bA ka tsita ta badzrA NA~M/ Tak+ki hU~M dzaH/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag che skyes rnams/ /'jigs shing rdo rje sku gsum ni/ /rjes dran dam tshig ldan gyur nas/ /
rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rkang pa g.yas pas ling ga mnan/ /rdo rje gsum gyi sngags bzlas pas/ /sngags rnams thams cad 'gugs par byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ye

shes kyi phreng ba chu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ mi g.yo ba rdo rje gtum po'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man ta kA ya bAka

tsita ta badzrA NA~M/ a tsa la kA Na tsaN Da/ na Ta na Ta/ maT+Ta maT+Ta/ moT+Ta moT+Ta/ saT+Ta saT+Ta/ taT+Ta taT+Ta/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ mo ha mo ha/ mo ha ka ra/ ha sa ha sa/ badzra ha sa ku ru/ ha sa ha sa/

mam+Ta raT mar da raT/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ ha na ha na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ A bi sha A bi sha / ma hA man tra/ bA la ka / d+hu na d+hu na/ ti Ni ti Ni/ khA da khA da/ big+ha nAn/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ duSh+TAn/ b+hak+Sha

b+hak+Sha/ sarbA na ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ ma hA bi Sha Na badzra/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M tri ba lI ta rang ga na rta ka / a~M a~M a~M/ hA~M hA~M hA~M/ a tsa la tse Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hU~M hU~M a sa man ti ka trAT/

ma hA ba la ma shA ta ya/ ba ra man trAn/ A~M A~M/ hU~M hA~M/ mA~M shud d+h+ya~M tu lo ka / tu ShaM tu badzrI/ na maHstu a pra ti ha ta ba le b+h+yaHdz+wa la ya/ trAT a sa ha na maHswA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /
lha kun 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /brgyal zhing yid ni rab skrag nas/ /rdo rje'i sku ni rjes su dran/ /khro bo chen po'i sngags 'di yis/ /lha chen po la sogs pa'i lha/ /mthu chen dag kyang
skrag gyur nas/ /kha sbyar lus kyis 'gugs par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad

kyi dam tshig khro bo chen po gnod mdzes 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sum+b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M/ grIh+Na hU~M/ grIh+NA pa ya grIh+NA pa ya hU~M/ A na ya hoHb+ha ga bAn/ bid+yA rA dza hU~M phaT/ de
nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /bu mo mthu chen thams cad ni/ /skra bshig gos dang bral bdag nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i zhabs kyis mnan/ /de bzhin
gshegs kun bdag po ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa yis/ /bcings na bu mo dgug pa'i mchog /de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig chen po rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba gsung gi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi gnas 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i sku gsum
la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom pa/ /zhags pa rdo rje kyo ba 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa'o/ /sangs rgyas gsung sku'i sbyor ba yis/ /'khor lo chen po sbyor ba las/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
rgyal chen po/ /rtag tu nges par 'khugs par 'gyur/ /'khor lo pad mo rdo rje ches/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms pas/ /rdo rje kyo ba'i dbye ba yis/ /sngags rnams thams cad dgug pa'i mchog /
rang sngags skyes bu bsgoms nas ni/ /thams cad rdo rje'i dngos zhi ba/ /mi yi bu mo mchog rnams kyi/ /snying gar rdo rje kyo ba sbyar/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /nges par rtag tu mgugs
par 'gyur/ /rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen po/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /sha tsi der ni gnas par bsam/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba yis/ /lan grangs lnga bcu brjod na ni/ /nges par
rtag tu mgugs par 'gyur/ /rdo rje lcags kyu gzugs po che/ /'bar ba rnon po 'dra ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor rab bsgoms la/ /nam mkha'i pad mo dgug pa'i mchog /khro bo rdo
rje'i dam tshig rang / /rdo rje sa 'og gnas pa la/ /shU la rdo rje kyo zhags pas/ /lha min bu mo 'gugs pa'i mchog /btsug gam rdo rgyus dag kyang rung / /rdo rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /zla ba gza'
yis zin pa'i tshe/ /khar bcug nas ni bsgrub par bya/ /tshangs dbang drag po la sogs lha/ /rang gi ming rnams bris na ni/ /rdo rje gsung gi bka' bzhin du/ /'jigs shing skrag nas 'ong
bar 'gyur/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje rab tu bsgom/ /khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rnam par bsam/ /bskal pa sreg pa'i 'khor lo
che/ /bsgoms nas gnod sbyin mo dang spyad/ /phyag rgya'i dbye bas thams cad kyi/ /sngags kyi dbye bas thams cad du/ /dgug pa'i rab tu sbyor ba gsungs/ /gzhan du byas na 'jig par
'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /yang dang yang du bskul bar bya/ /de nyid sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /rgyal po mchog tu rtag pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' kun
du rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje ral pa gcig ma dam tshig chen po'i gsung rdo rje'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung

thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM shU li ni swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /klu yi bu mo mthu chen rnams/ /tshig par gyur cing gos dang bral/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rjes su dran/ /sngags kyi
rig pa 'di yis ni/ /klu rnams thams cad mgugs par 'gyur/ /klu yi bu mo mig bzangs dag /bkug nas nye bar spyad par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dam tshig 'byung ba

rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje khro gnyer can 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba b+ha ya nA sha ni/ trA sa ni trA se/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ bai ra Ta tri
ku TI ti Ti/ bai ra ti bai ra Ti/ shwe te shwe ta/ dza Ti ni swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /rig 'dzin bdag nyid skyes ma kun/ /'dar zhing 'jigs par gyur pas ni/ /ye shes rdo rje rjes su
dran/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo mchog /gser gyi rna cha g.yo ba rnams/ /sngags kyi rig pa 'di dang ni/ /dam tshig mchog gis dgug par bya/ /'gog pa rdo rje rgyal po ni/ /yongs su rdzogs
pas mdzes mchog gis/ /ye shes rdo rje gsum las byung / /kun nas de ma thag tu mgugs/ /yang na khro bo thams cad ni/ /dben pa'i gnas dang chen po ru/ /sngags pas 'bum du
bzlas pa yis/ /las rnams thams cad byed par bshad/ /rdo rje slob dpon smod pa gzhan/ /theg pa che mchog smod pa dag /rab tu 'bad pas gsad par bya/ /yang na gnas nas spo
bar bya/ /'di yis byang chub mchog gi ni/ /sngags kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /yang gsungs pa/ phyogs bcu'i sems can thams
cad kyi/ /lus dang ngag sems gsod pa ni/ /cho ga bzhin du bsgom byas pa/ /gdug sems can gyi dgra rnams ni/ /khrag dang chu yis gsher ba 'am/ /bshang gcis gsher bar byas pa'i gos/ /
bgos nas ling ga rkang pas mnan/ /khro bo'i rgyal po sbyar bar bya/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni yongs bzlas na/ /sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig /yang gsungs pa/ chu yis gos ni gsher bar byas/ /
khro bo mchog gi bcings pa yis/ /ling ga rkang pas mnan na ni/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig /bshang gcis gsher bar byas pa'i gos/ /ngan pa rul pa'i dri mnam pa/ /
bgos te sngags ni bzlas byas na/ /skad cig gis skams 'chi bar 'gyur/ /thal ba'i skyo mas gsher ba'i gos/ /bgos nas khro bas 'khrugs bzhin du/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas
na ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa'ang 'jig par 'gyur/ /yang gsungs pa/ gcer bur phud de skra bshig la/ /'jigs pa'i tshul can gtsigs shing bsgyur/ /ling ga rkang pas mnan na ni/ /nam mkha'i dbyings
kyang 'jig par 'gyur/ /ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam/ /khang stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang / /mtshan ma gcig dang shing gcig drung / /mngon par spyod pa brtsam par bya/ /mi rus las byas phur bu ni
sor brgyad pa yi tshad dag la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas te/ /dgra yi sgo khar sbas na ni/ /sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog sbyin pa/ /shes dang mi shes rnam spangs pa/ /zla ba phyed nang rdzogs pa
yis/ /nyams sam yang na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /yang na thod pa gang ba dag /khyad par du ni mkhas pas btsal/ /der ni sngags kyi tshig bris te/ /rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas pa bya/ /
dgra yi sgo 'am grong dag tu/ /sbas na nges par skrod par 'gyur/ /tA la'i lo ma'am gzhan dag la/ /khro bo'i sngags ni kun bris la/ /dgra yi khyim mam sgo dag tu/ /sbas na skams shing 'chi
bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rgyu'i rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid nges par 'ching ba
rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ khams gsum pa thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid phur bus gdab pa'i sngags rdo rje 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las

phyung ngo / /oM g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba du Sh+T+rAn phaT phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA pa~M phaT phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra kI la/ badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya bA ka tsita ta badzra~M/ kI la ya hU~MM hU~M hU~M phaT
phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /rdo rje rdzu 'phrul chen po kun/ /brgyal zhing rab tu 'jigs gyur nas/ /nam mkha' rdo rje thugs dran gyur/ /mi rus las byas phur bu 'am/ /
yang na seng ldeng mchog las skyes/ /lcags las byas pa'i phur bu dag /rdo rje sku gsum 'jig par byed/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam gzhag la/ /'od 'phro 'khrug cing mdangs bzang ba/ /
rdo rje sku ni gsum gyi mtha'i/ /gzugs ni bsams nas sbyar bar bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya che/ /yang na 'dod chags rdo rje can/ /gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya che/ /bsams na

rdo rje gsum phur bu/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yis/ /gdug pa'i khro bo tshar gcod pa/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas bya ba yin/ /sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po'i yang / /snying ga nas ni rkang pa'i bar/ /rdo rje phur
bu rnam par bsgom/ /de nyid gong du dam tshig bya/ /phur bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di/ /bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang nges par 'debs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /
phur bus btab na myur du 'chi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku'i dam tshig tsham ngam

gyi rdo rje phur bu'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ dI pa ta badzra tsakra hU~M phaT/ phan tshun dkri ba'i tshul dang ni/ /mthe bong gzhi ni rab tu bsdam/ /
rnam par snang mdzad gnas mnan te/ /rdo rje phur bu nges par gdab/ /btab ma thag tu sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje sku gsum las byung ba/ /dam tshig mchog gis ldang bar 'gyur/ /nyams pa'i
gnas su mi 'gyur na'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gsung gi rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsung gi dam tshig tsham ngam gyi

rdo rje phur bu'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM hrIHb+hU ra b+hu baH/ /ye shes pad mo kha phye ba/ /rdo rje sor mo nges par bzhag /'dod chags rdo rje'i gnas mnan te/ /rdo rje phur bu nges
par gdab/ /btab ma thag tu rdo rje che/ /sku gsum dri med las byung ba/ /dam tshig mchog gis ldang bar 'gyur/ /nyams pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur na'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos
thugs rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thugs kyi dam tshig tsham ngam gyis gnon pa'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM

badzra rA dza hU~M/ rtse mo lnga par bcings nas ni/ /'od 'phro mang po 'khrigs par bsgom/ /sems kyi rdo rje'i gnas mnan te/ /rdo rje phur bus nges par gdab/ /btab pa tsam gyis rdo rje che/ /rdo rje dri med
gsum las byung / /dam tshig mchog gis ldang bar 'gyur/ /nyams pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur na'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga yang dag byas tsam gyis/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje
mtha' klas par/ /phur bus 'debs 'dir gdon mi za/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje phur bu chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog /sems can
khams la phan mdzad pa/ /mnyes shing rab tu dgyes gyur nas/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /e ma'o gsang ba'i gnas kyi mchog /e ma'o snying po kun btus pa/ /e ma'o chos
kyi gnas zhi ba/ /e ma'o rdo rje rnam par 'joms/ /phur 'debs sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams/ /phur
bus gdab pa yang dag bshad/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /phur gdab de nyid las byung ba/ /sku gsung thugs las mchog sbyin pa/ /sngags kyi de nyid bsdus pa'o/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las sku dang gsung dang thugs rmad du byung ba sngags 'gugs pa rnam par sprul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i
le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che/ /thams cad dbang bskur kun mkhyen pas/ /rdo rje gsung ni bka' stsal pa/ /
sme sha can gyi bdag nyid che/ /bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/ /dben pa'i gnas su khyad par du/ /sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub/ /bshang gci'i dam tshig la sogs pas/ /gru bzhi
pa ni cho ga yis/ /dkyil 'khor bya'o de ru ni/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa yis/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su dag /bzhin yang mdzes la rab tu bzang / /rgyan rnams thams
cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /pang par bzhag nas rnam par bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yi 'khor lo yis/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/ /sngags kyi 'khor lo can gyi
gsang / /mchod pa'i gnas ni nyams dga' bsgom/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can/ /rnam par snang mdzad sku chen po/ /bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od
'drar 'gyur/ /gtso blag mkhan ni bdag nyid che/ /bu mo ud pal mthing ga'i mdog /'dra ba dag ni rtag tu bsgrub/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de nyid sbyor ba'i cho ga ni/ /
byas nas las ni brtsam par bya/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/ /de ni de ma thag nyid du/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur/ /
chos rnams kun 'dzin rgyal po mtshungs/ /'dod dang thar pa rab sgrub pa/ /rdo rje chos ni rnam bsgoms pas/ /gar mkhan bu mo rab mdzes shing / /bzhin bzang mig ni dkyus ring ba/ /sgrub
pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub/ /de ni rdo rje chos bdag nyid/ /sa bcu la ni gnas par 'gyur/ /rgyal po gsung gi dam tshig 'dzin/ /kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa'o/ /bram ze rgyal
rigs rje'u rigs dang / /dmangs rigs las byung bu mo ni/ /rdo rje chos bdag nyid 'di ni/ /gsang ba thob par byed pa bsgrub/ /rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni/ /sgrub pa kun tu brtsam par bya/ /
skya rengs shar ba'i dus su ni/ /bsgom pa mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /dri dang me tog rnams kyis brgyan/ /bsgoms na rdo rje sems
dpa' mchog /grub pa myur du thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni sku gsum mchog sbyin pa/ /sangs rgyas mtshan gyis mtshan par 'gyur/ /dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du/ /de yi 'od kyang
snang bar byed/ /dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis/ /sbyor ba thams cad brtsam par bya/ /'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/ /gal te rdo rje can grub 'dod/ /
gshang gci'i dam tshig bza' bar bya/ /'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/ /bshang gci'i dam tshig la sogs pas/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba
yis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub gnas zhi ba/ /de nyid bla na med pa 'grub/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa dang thar pa'i dam tshig rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig
chen po rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje kun tu skrag par byed pa'i khro bo 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las

phyung ngo / /oM hrIHSh+TIHbi kri tA na na sarba sha trU~M nA sha ya/ stam b+ha ya/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ dug ni khrag dang kun tu sbyar/ /lan tshwa ske tshe de bzhin te/ /tsher ma'i me las khros pas bsreg /bu mo'i ming gi tshig dang

bcas/ /nyi ma gung ngam nam phyed na/ /'di ni rnam pa kun tu shis/ /shes rab can gyis gru gsum du/ /stong phrag brgyad ni tshul bzhin bsreg /bu mo dag gi don gyi phyir/ /'di ni nyi ma gsum du bya/ /bskal pa
gsum dang grangs med ni/ /des ni rtag tu gnon par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dang ni chos 'dzin pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gzhan yang rung / /gal te rmongs pas 'das na ni/ /de yi tshe ni der zad 'gyur/ /bcu

bzhi'am yang na tshes brgyad la/ /dur khrod sol ba blangs nas ni/ /cho ga bzhin du sngags btab na/ /de ni rtag tu ster bar 'gyur/ /sngags shes pa yis gang rung ba'i/ /dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/ /
bsam gtan dag gis bris na ni/ /'chi bar 'gyur 'dir gdon mi za/ /tho ba bsam gtan sbyor ba yis/ /de ltar byas na nges par ltung / /hU~M yig rab tu 'bar dang bcas/ /rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu
bsgom/ /gdug pa thams cad 'jig par byed/ /phyag na rdo rje'i rigs dran te/ /rdo rgyus sol ba la sogs pas/ /skyes pa'am bud med gzugs bris la/ /lag par sta re bsams nas su/ /
mgrin pa bcad par rnam par bsgom/ /sangs rgyas sku gsum rin chen mchog /sems can kun la phan 'dod pa/ /'di yis snad par 'gyur ba 'am/ /shi bar 'gyur 'dir gdon mi za/ /las
kyi rdo rje rab 'bar che/ /me stag mang po 'khrigs pa can/ /dbus su rdo rje rnam bsgoms la/ /chu rnams gnon pa'i mchog yin no/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni 'dri ba na/ /rlung la sogs pa byung na ni/ /
mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas su/ /gdug pa'i dgra ni rjes dran bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpas kyang / /sprul par gang zhing gyur pa ni/ /mthong ba tsam gyis 'gag
'gyur te/ /gzhan du byas na 'jigs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /skye bo gdug pa gzhan dag kyang / /sngags 'dis skrag par byas na ni/ /'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi
za/ /de la 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po'o/ /phaT/ ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya/ /sngags shes pa yis gnas bzhi ru/ /btsun
mo rtag tu gzhag par bya/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /mtshan rnams thams cad kyis mtshan pa/ /pad mo rab tu rgyas byas nas/ /sngags 'di rab tu bsgom par bya/ /hU~M/
'od zer lnga 'od rab 'bar ba/ /rdo rje can gyi sbyor ba bsgom/ /rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la/ /phab na byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de ni de ma thag nyid du/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'od 'dra zhing / /
rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /sangs rgyas sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin/ /sems dpa' thams cad skyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /bzhin bzangs phan par 'dod pa yi/ /bud med rnyed
na cho ga bzhin/ /bden par mchod pa brtsam par bya/ /gsang ba blangs nas bza' bar bya/ /de ni de ma thag nyid du/ /'jam dpal dang ni gzi brjid mnyam/ /mi snang bdag po dpal dang
ldan/ /'dzam bu'i gser gyi mdangs 'drar 'gyur/ /bshang pa'am yang na bza' ba 'am/ /sha yang cho ga bzhin du ni/ /mngon par bsngags nas gzhug par bya/ /zos na mkhas rnams kyis
mi mthong / /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bshang ba cho ga bzhin blangs nas/ /kham phor sbyar mar bzhag par bya/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bskul na ni/ /sangs

rgyas nyi mas mi mthong ngo / /khyi yi sha dang rta sha dang / /sha chen dag ni cho ga bzhin/ /blangs nas kha sbyar sbyor ba yis/ /zos na de yis mi mthong ngo / /bshang dang lhan cig ldan pa yis/ /ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/ /
dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo / /khyi yi sha dang sbyar ba yi/ /ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mi

mthong ngo / /sha chen dang ni sbyor ba yi/ /ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo / /ba glang sha dang sbyor ba yi/ /ri lu lcags gsum gyis
dkris pa/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo / /bshang ba las byung srog chags las/ /brtul zhugs can gyis ri lu bya/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /

sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo / /ga bur tsan dan sbyar ba yi/ /ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo / /gi wang a ga ru sbyar ba'i/ /
ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje stobs po cher 'gyur ro/ /ga bur gur gum sbyar ba yi/ /ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor

ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo zhes gsungs so/ /rdo rje can rnams gang yang rung / /phyag rgya chen por byin brlabs na/ /de 'drar 'gyur te dpal dang ldan/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po/ /
dpag tshad bye ba rdzogs pa yi/ /steng du rdo rje 'gro bar 'gyur/ /stong gsum bgrod pa dpal dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /'dod khams gnas pa'i bu mo dang / /lha yi
longs spyod rigs brtul zhugs/ /yang na gzugs khams gnas pa la/ /stobs chen gyis ni 'dod pa spyod/ /bcom ldan 'das dam tshig mi snang ba'i rdo rje chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas
sangs rgyas rab dgyes bdag /sems 'khrugs yid la dbang ba dag /ngo mtshar gyur cing spyan gdangs nas/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /e ma'o 'di rab ngo mtshar che/ /e ma'o gsang

gnas mi 'gyur ba/ /e ma'o ngo bo nyid kyis dag /e ma'o shin tu dri med chos/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /skyed po byed po mi 'gyur che/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje chos chen pos/ /rdo rje'i gsung du bka'
stsal pa/ /sems dpa' rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin rnams mnyes par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab dbye bas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje can mnyes 'gyur/ /rdo rje spyan dang gzugs sogs
kyis/ /gtsug tor mnyes par byed par dran/ /khro bo rnams la'ang de mchog ste/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje rab bsgom pa'o/ /rig pa'i rgyal po chos mchog rnams/ /rin chen tog ni rnam par
bsgom/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo'i sbyor ba la/ /tshe dpag med pa rab tu bsgom/ /thams cad las byed sngags rnams la/ /gdon mi za ba'i ye shes bsgom/ /sngags rnams thams cad nyid la
ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom zhes gsungs so/ /gnod sbyin mo yi sngags rgyud la/ /gshin rje gshed nyid brtag par bya/ /thams cad sbyor ba'i sngags rnams la/ /spyi bo ru ni
bskul ba shis/ /bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bsam gtan 'khor lo 'di yis ni/ /sngags mnyes pa yi dkyil 'khor dag /dam tshig chen po sgrub
byed pa/ /sgrub po rnams la phan pa gsungs/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /gtso bo chos rnams kun dbang phyug /sku dang gsung thugs yongs dag pas/ /ye shes rdo rje bka' stsal te/ /
ri rtse nyams ni dga' ba dang / /nags tshal rab tu dben par yang / /bsam gtan rdo rje rab bya ba/ /sngags dang bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs kun/ /
sngags dang bsam gtan gyis bskul bas/ /gsung gi las kyi bka' bzhin du/ /las rnams sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/ /rdo rje chos kyi gzugs chen po/ /pad ma rA ga'i
'od 'dra ba/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /gnas gsum du ni rigs brtag go/ dbab pa'i cho ga thams cad ni/ /byas na gdon mi za bar 'grub/ /bskul dang rengs pa lha chen po/ /
'phags pa'i sa ni bzhi po dag /rdo rje grub pa dag gis bya/ /de ltar byas na rtag par 'grub/ /bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis ma'am/ /khye'u lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/ /mtshan nyid thams cad
yongs rdzogs pa/ /bzung nas dbab par rab tu brtag /cho ga thams cad byas nas ni/ /las rnams rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /rnam pa gzhan du byas na ni/ /khams gsum skye bos dpyos
par 'gyur/ /de la snying po'i sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig ni 'di rnams so/ /hU~M hAHAHdz+haiH nam mkha'i khams ni sems med cing / /rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs dang / /rdo rje sems dpa'
rang nyid kyang / /'bab par 'gyur ro cho ga yis/ /hU~M yig rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag /hAHyig sku yi rdo rje can/ /AHyig chos 'dzin rgyal po ste/ /'di ni sngags tshig bstan pa'o/ /yi
ge dz+haiHyis bskul bar bshad/ /'khor ba dang ni g.yo ba yin/ /'di ni bskul ba thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba yin par 'di rab bshad/ /khru gang tsam mam khru do 'am/ /ji srid khru brgyad lnga tsam du/ /
rdo rje rgyal po rab bskul na/ /'jigs shing skrag nas 'phar bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin thams cad sngar ji ltar/ /'di ni gsang ba thob byed pa'o/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa kun gyi bdag /sku gsum gnas ni yongs dag pas/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /rtse gcig ma gyur pa yis kyang / /brtul zhugs brtan pas bya ba 'di/ /sbyor ba gzhan min pa
yis bya/ /gdug pa thams cad rnam gzhig pa'o/ /dur khrod sol dang phub sogs las/ /dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/ /skra bshig gcer bur byung ba yis/ /khams gsum dag kyang
'jig par byed/ /dur khrod ro bsregs thal ba yis/ /dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/ /stong brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas kyang / /'chi bar 'gyur 'dir gdon mi za/ /dkyil 'khor gru
gsum byas pa la/ /ba lang sha dang rta yi sha / khyi yi sha 'am sna tshogs kyis/ /rdo rje'ang gdon mi za bar 'jig /sha chen po yis 'jig pa ni/ /thams cad rdo rje las byung dran/ /'di ni
dgra rnams thams cad kyi/ /'jigs pa shin du mi bzad dran/ /chos mchog can gyi bshang gci yis/ /dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/ /tsher ma'i me la khros nas bsregs/ /sangs rgyas
dag kyang nges par 'jig ces gsungs so/ /chu bo'i 'gram gnyis sa yis kyang / /dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/ /dug las byung ba'i tsher ma ni/ /til 'bru tsam gyis yan lag kun/ /dgang
zhing skul ba'i tshig dang bcas/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig /ces gsungs so/ /ske tshe lan tshwa 'bru mar dang / /dug dang d+ha du ra dag ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gsad pa la/ /'di dag
rab mchog gyur par bshad/ /sol khus gsher ba'i gos dag ni/ /gyon te sems ni khros nas su/ /ling ga rkang pas mnan nas ni/ /srin pos 'dzin par gdon mi za/ /rus phye khrag dang dug
rnams kyis/ /gzugs brnyan rab tu byas na ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' drag po yang / /myur ba dag tu 'dzin par 'gyur/ /ske tshe dang ni yang dag ldan/ /bshang gci dag gis rdzogs pa yi/ /ling ga

rkang pas mnan na ni/ /tsha ba chen pos 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po rdo rje khro bo'i snying po'o/ /na maHsa man ta kA ya bAka tsita ta badzrA NA~M/ oM hu lu hu lu/

tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gardza gardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+n+'a bi nA ya kAn/ ma hA ga Na pa ti dzI bi ta an ta ka rA ya hU~M phaT/ sbyin bsreg slar yang bsam gtan
dag /lus dang ngag sems 'jig pa ste/ /ma yengs pa yi sems kyis ni/ /gsod pa yin na mchog 'di bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo che/ /rnam par bgrad pa 'jigs 'jigs lta/ /sta re tho ba phyag na
bsnams/ /bsams nas bsam gtan rab tu brtag /de la 'di ni drag po chen po khro bo'i dam tshig go/ /mkha' dbyings sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /yongs su gang bar rab bsgoms la/ /gdug pa de
yis bsad par ni/ /bsams nas de ma thag tu 'chi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /yongs su gang bar bsgoms nas ni/ /gdug pa'i sems dpas bsad na ni/ /rdo rje
'dzin pa nyid kyang 'chi/ /sangs rgyas gnod byed dgra bo rnams/ /skrag cing 'jigs pas dkrugs par ni/ /sngags mkhan gyis ni mdun bsams na/ /'chi bar 'gyur 'dir gdon mi za/ /srin po

khro bo sna tshogs pa/ /gtum zhing khro bo mi bzad pas/ /skrag par gyur par bsams des ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang 'chi/ /'ug pa khra dang bya rgod dang / /mchu rings pa dang wa rnams kyis/ /zos par
bsams na de yis ni/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig /sbrul nag rab tu khro ba ni/ /'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs byed pa/ /dug gi mchog gi dam tshig ni/ /dpral bar bsams na 'di khyad
'phags/ /sbrul des zos par gyur pa yis/ /bsgrub bya dag kyang nges par 'jig /phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi/ /yams sam nye bar tshe ba rnams/ /'jigs pa dgra la
dbab pa'i mchog /'di ni bskul ba'i mchog yin no/ /tho ba rab tu drag po yis/ /brtul zhugs can gyis snying gar brdeg /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin du/ /dgra yi srog ni med par 'gyur/ /rdo rje
can gyis sta re sogs/ /gshegs cing gtub par bsams na ni/ /sku gsum gyi ni mchog sbyin pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' drag po'ang 'chi/ /bsrung ba la sogs dang po sngags/ /lha rnams kyang
ni phur bus gdab/ /'di ni gsod byed mchog gi mchog /dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/ /phung po rdo rjes dkyil 'khor du/ /sems can ji snyed gnas pa la/ /gsang bdag nyid gtogs
bsams na ni/ /'di ltas mnyes 'gyur gzhan du min/ /ston pa sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje chos dang rdo rje can/ /bsam gtan sbyor bas 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje thugs kyi bka' ji bzhin/ /bcom ldan
'das khro bo chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje khro bos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /thams cad nam mkha' thub chen po/ /thams cad dbang bskur rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /ye
shes rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ /e ma'o ngo bo nyid kyis dag /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis skye bar bstan/ /de la 'di ni las phran tshegs kyi
rdo rje gsang ba'o/ /sbrul ni mi sdug 'jigs byed pa/ /nag po 'bar ba 'khrug cing khro/ /lce gnyis mche ba'i phreng ba can/ /rdo rgyus dag gam sol bas bris/ /de la 'di ni klu khro bo skul
ba'i snying po'o/ /kha~M/ kha yi nang du de bsam zhing / /dug ni ha la ha la 'dra/ /sreg pa me yi kha dog dang / /bsgoms na 'gul bar gdon mi za/ /de la 'di ni dug thams cad dgug pa'i snying
po'o/ /hrIH/ rnam pa sna tshogs las byung dug /khams gsum na ni gnas pa kun/ /de yis khyer bar bsgoms nas ni/ /bab par gyur par rnam par bsam/ /de ni de ma thag nyid du/ /
dug gi rgya mtsho mi bzad 'gyur/ /reg ma thag tu 'gro ba kun/ /'jig pa 'di la the tshom med/ /sdig pa sbal pa la sogs dang / /sbrul rnams sna tshogs pa dag la'ang / /cho ga bzhin du

rab tu bya/ /sbyor ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis/ /de la 'di ni dug thams cad 'pho ba'i snying po'o/ /oM/ lta ba rdo rje'i dug la sogs/ /gzhan yang mi bzad pa yi dug /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor

du/ /ye shes rdo rjes bkug nas 'jug /bcom ldan 'das dug gi dam tshig chen po rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de la 'di ni dug gso ba'i dam tshig rdo rje'i snying po'o/ /hU~M/ snying po 'di ni rdo rje che/ /kha
dog dkar por rnam par bsgom/ /'od kyi sprin ni cher 'bar ba/ /zla ba'i 'od zer bzhin du bsil/ /gnas bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis/ /de ma thag tu sdud pas ldang / /lan gnyis lan gsum rab bsgoms nas/ /

skyug pa dag tu rnam bsams na/ /nam mkha'i khams kun gang ba yang / /skad cig gis ni dug med byed/ /zhes de skad ces kyang bka' stsal to/ /de la 'di ni nye ba'i dug thams cad drang ba'i snying po'o/ /
AH 'bras dang phol mig 'brum bu dang / /gang gzhan nad du bshad pa rnams/ /phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du/ /bsams pa tsam gyis med par 'gyur/ /pad ma chen po 'dab ma brgyad/ /ri bong can bzhin
dri med pa/ /de yi dbus na 'dug bsam pa/ /'od zer lnga ni rab rdzogs pa'o/ /sdud pa na ni dam tshig gnag /skul ba na ni dkar po 'dra/ /bsam gtan gnas 'di gsang ba ste/ /gsang chen ye shes dri

ma med/ /de la 'di ni phyi nang gi nad rnams gso ba'i rdo rje snying po'i sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams ste/ /dzi na dzika / A ro li ki / badzra d+h+rIka / yi ge'i tshig ni gang 'dod pa/ /dad pas yon tan thob par 'gyur/ /de 'dra'i

gzugs ni bsgom par bya/ /nad kyi rdo rje bskul ba yis/ /dam tshig spre'u'i rnam pa 'am/ /yang na khyir ni byung ba'ang rung / /rang gi lus ngag sems gnas las/ /byung ba dag tu rnam par bsam/ /'khor lo
'am ni rdo rje'ang rung / /rdo rje'i go 'phang gnas bsgom la/ /lus dang ngag sems dam tshig rnams/ /des ni phye mar brlag par bsgom/ /de nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /byang chub sems

dpa' grags chen rnams/ /byin brlabs go 'phang dam pa dag /dgyes pa'i spyan gyis rab tu stsol/ /'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to/ /rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la/ /sangs rgyas sprin dag rnam par bsam/ /
rdo rje rgyal po sprin chen po/ /nad las thar bar bsgom par bya/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan rnams/ /khros pa de la bsam par bya/ /'chi bar byed pa

dam pa'i don/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di dag gis/ /las skyes su yang gang grags pa/ /brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas sbyor ba yis/ /nyi ma bdun gyis 'jig par 'gyur/ /yang na rang gi sngags rgyal gyis/ /rdo rje'i
bsam gtan cho ga bsam/ /'di ni nad rnams thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /ye shes kyo ba 'od chen po/ /'dod pa thar pa rdo rje ches/ /gsung ni 'di

skad bka' stsal to/ /chos rnams rmi lam lta bu ni/ /ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes shing / /rang bzhin dag pa'i de nyid la/ /'khrul pa'i rdo rje rab tu gsungs/ /bsam gtan bzlas pa'i don brtson pa'i/ /sgrub
pa pos ni rtag tu mthong / /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su mthong / /de la 'di ni rmi lam chen po'i dam tshig gi gnas te/ /byang chub ye shes mchog thob pa/ /
sangs rgyas 'od ni bzang por mthong / /sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs pa yi/ /skur yang bdag nyid myur du mthong / /sems can chen po khams gsum pas/ /mchod pa byed par de yis mthong / /
