rang gzugs ye shes che 'od mnyam/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis/ /nges par mchod pa byed par mthong / /rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs chen dang / /

grags pa chen po rdo rje chos/ /gsang ba rdo rje grags pa che/ /rmi lam dag na rang gzugs mthong / /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas chen po phyag 'tshal ba/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub

stsol/ /rmi lam 'di 'dra mthong bar 'gyur/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /lha yi bu mo yid 'ong dang / /khye'u bu mo dag mthong na/ /de ni dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams

cad kyang / /zhing na bzhugs par nges par mthong / /thugs ni dgyes par gyur nas kyang / /chos mdzod yid du 'ong ba stsol/ /chos kyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i lus/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs bskor ba/ /bsam
gtan rdo rje la gnas pa'i/ /dam tshig sbyor bas mthong bar 'gyur/ /kun dga' bskyed tshal sna tshogs pa/ /lha yi bu mo sogs pas brgyan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pas/ /bsam gtan dam tshig can

gyis mthong / /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /de ni mngon par dbang bskur mthong / /rig 'dzin rgyal po chen po yis/ /mchod pa byed par nges mthong ngo / /zhes kyang gsungs so/ /rdo rje las byung

sna tshogs pa'i/ /rmyi lam dri ma med mthong des/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /skyes pa bla med 'grub par 'gyur/ /gdol pa khyi yi sbyor la sogs/ /gal te rdo rje blos mthong na/ /blo ldan rdo rje sems
dpa' yi/ /sems kyi gnas ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni rmi lam rnam par dpyad pa'i dam tshig gi snying po'o/ /rang sems sems ni dmigs pa la/ /chos rnams thams cad rab gnas pa/ /nam
mkha' rdo rje'i sems gnas 'di/ /chos med chos nyid med pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig gi the tshom gcod pa rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ci zhig lags/ ngo bo nyid med chos rnams la/ /chos kyi de nyid kun bshad pa/ nam mkha' la ni
nam mkha' bsgom/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar yang dag byung / /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha' ni chos gang dang yang mi ldan te/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /nam mkha' de ni chos thams cad du
gtogs la/ thams cad kyi rjes su blta'o snyam du yang mi sems so/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmi lam dang / rmi lam las byung bar rjes su rig par bya'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ gzhan yang nam mkha' ni brtag tu med pa/ bltar med pa thogs pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
chos thams cad kyang rjes su rig par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ gzhan yang lus dang ngag dang sems dang chos thams cad dang rdo rje'i gnas kyi dam tshig
ni thams cad la rjes su song ba ngo bo nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ sems kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /lus dang ngag dang sems kyi khams gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams de dag gnyis su med cing gnyis su
byar med do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ gzhan yang sems can thams cad ni nam mkha'i khams su gnas te/ nam mkha'i khams de yang 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa
ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams na gnas pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams na yang gnas pa ma yin te/ chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de ni skye ba med pa'o/ /gang la skye ba med pa
de ni chos gang gis kyang brtag par mi nus so/ /de bas na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'o/ /kye bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta
ste/ gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung bar byed pa rdo rje'i gnas kyi rnam pa ste/ byang chub kyi sems de yang lus la mi gnas/ ngag la mi gnas/
sems la mi gnas so/ /chos gang yang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de la skye ba med de/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung bar byed pa rdo rje'i gnas yin no/ /kye bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmi lam ni bdag gis khams gsum du rmi lam gyi gnas mthong bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /mi yang bdag gis rmi lam mthong bar bya'o snyam du mi sems te/
khams gsum gyi bya ba de rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu/ rmi lam dang 'dra ba rmi lam las byung ba'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams dang / sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rmi lam la bdag med pa'i gnas su rjes su rig par bya'o/ /bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni rin po che thams cad kyi gtso bo yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ste/ rin po che thams cad kyi gtso bo yon
tan thams cad dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la sems can gang dag gis gser ram/ rin po che'am dngul yang rung ste/ gang gsol ba btab pa de dag thams cad bsams pa tsam nyid kyis 'byor par byed de/
rin po che la sogs pa de dag kyang sems la mi gnas/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu la gnas pa yang ma yin no/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad
dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang rjes su rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rab tu dgyes pa'i spyan gdangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang la nam mkha'i khams kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rjes su
'brang bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni ngo mtshar che'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la phyag
'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dngos grub kun nas btus te gsungs pa/ sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje kun nas btus pa'i dngos grub
de dag gang la gnas pa lags/ gang nas byung ba lags/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la legs so zhes bya
ba byin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i kun nas btus pa'i dngos
grub ni sngags thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs la mi gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dngos grub thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
thams cad rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje la gnas so/ /lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje de dag kyang 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams
na mi gnas/ sems ni lus la mi gnas/ lus kyang sems la mi gnas/ ngag ni sems la mi gnas/ sems kyang ngag la mi gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' ltar ngo bo nyid dag pa'i
phyir ro/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi chos gang la gnas pa lags/ gang nas byung ba lags/ rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems la gnas so/ /rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems las byung ngo / /
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ sems gang la gnas/ bka' stsal pa nam mkha' la gnas so/ /gsol pa nam mkha' gang la gnas/ bka' stsal pa gang la yang mi gnas

so/ /de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur nas rang gi sems kyi chos nyid la gnas nas sems shing cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i tshig gis gsol ba btab nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin chen gyi mchod pa'i bkod pas mchod pa byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de
bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor seng ge'i dam tshig gi rgyal po'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje sku'i dkyil 'khor 'di sangs rgyas thams

cad nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /de nas de phyir sku'i dkyil 'khor/ /mchog thugs dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog /legs par rab tu bshad par bya/ /khru ni

bcu drug tshad du bya/ /gru bzhi lham pa rab tu mdzes/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor te/ /sku yi rdo rje rab tu gnas/ /de yi nang du 'khor lo ni/ /cho ga rdo rjes bri bar bya/ /sngags rnams kyi ni gsang ba mchog /

dbus su rnam par snang mdzad gnas/ /phyag rgya rdo rje'i gnas bya'o/ /mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'ang bri/ /sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje mchog /grwa rnams kun du dgod par bya/ /khro bo dang po rnams sgor bri/ /
stobs chen pha rol gnon pa rnams/ /rdo rje gsang ba rab bsgom pa'i/ /mchod pa sngags shes pa yis bya/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/ /bshang dang gci
ba la sogs pa/ /bye brag tu ni nges par dbul/ /'di ni sku yi rdo rje can/ /sngags rnams kun gyi dam tshig go/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsung rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs

rdo rje las phyung ngo / /de nas de phyir gsung dkyil 'khor/ /mchog thugs dkyil 'khor rab tu 'dra/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog /legs par rab tu bshad par bya/ /khru ni nyi shu'i tshad du bya/ /gru

bzhi lham pa cho ga bzhin/ /grwa bzhi pa la sgo bzhi par/ /rdo rje bsgom pas thig gdab bo/ /nyid kyi sku yi dkyil 'khor gnas/ /rdo rje'i gsung gi yon tan skyed/ /rgyal po chen po rdo rje chos/ /rig pa'i dbang

po 'jug par bya/ /de dbus 'khor lo chen po ni/ /kun tu zlum po bri bar bya/ /mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni/ /cho ga brtson pas bri bar bya/ /tshe dpag med kyi phyag rgya che/ /de yi dbus su dgod par bya/ /rdo rje'i gnas

ni nyams dga' nyid/ /de dag thams cad yongs su brtag /yongs su gsal bar cho ga yis/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa byas nas ni/ /de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bya/ /de ltas rdo rje can mnyes 'gyur/ /bshang gci khu ba'i

dam tshig gis/ /mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas kun nas sprin gyi bkod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rab tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang chen 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje
las phyung ngo / /rdo rje 'dzin mchog gang yin pa'i/ /gzugs ni dbus su legs bris pa/ /de yi dkyil 'khor gnas su 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang las byung / /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gnas shes pa'i gsang chen rab tu gsang ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas dkyil 'khor thams cad 'khor lo 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags
kyi snying po'i thig gi yi ge'i gnas rnams te/ oM AHhUM/ rdo rje'i thig ni gdab pa dang / /mtshon rtsi rnams kyang dgyes pa dag /sngags kyi sems pas mi bya ste/ /byas na byang chub rnyed par
dka'/ /de bas dam tshig cho ga shes/ /sngags kyi lha rnams bcug nas su/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas bsgoms la/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni rnam par brtag /rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad

dang / /spyan ma yang ni gzhug par bya/ /sku yi dkyil 'khor gnas yid 'ong / /rdo rje'i sku yi yon tan 'thob/ /rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che/ /rang gi chos ma 'jug par bya/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad
kyi/ /mchog tu rtag pa'i gsang ba'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /mA ma kI yang 'jug par bya/ /'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /mchog tu rmad byung gsang chen no/ /de ltar byas pas
myur du rang / /rab dang yid dbang rnams byon nas/ /rab tu dgyes par gyur pa rnams/ /gsang ba mchog ni 'dri bar byed/ /'di skad kyang gsungs so/ /sngags grub pa yis bya ba ni/ /rdo rje gsang ba
rmad byung che/ /khro bo'i rgyal po yis sangs rgyas/ /thams cad bkug nas mchod par bya/ /rdo rje gsum dang gnas dag la/ /dam tshig mchod pa dus gsum pa/ /rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas bya/ /sngags
kyi dngos grub thob par byed/ /'di skad kyang gsungs so/ /sngags rnams thams cad nyid la yang / /rmad byung chen po'i gtor ma dbul/ /bshang gci sha dang 'bru mar dang / /lnga pa sems las

byung ba dang / /khu ba dag gis sngags rnams kun/ /tshim par 'gyur bar kun tu bshad/ /'di ni dam tshig mchog yin te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs byed pa'o/ /thig gdab pa yi cho ga 'di/ /rang nyid gang tshe

spyod pa na/ /rnam par snang mdzad rab bsgoms nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgom/ /yang na rdo rje bdud rtsir grags/ /slob ma rdo rje 'od po cher/ /bsgom bya las kyi go 'phang ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis nges

sten pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rgyal chen lnga rnams ni/ /rdo rje'i thig skud gshegs rnams dgod/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba rab tu rmad byung ba'o/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bye brag gis/ /tshon rtsi dag

kyang rnam par dgye/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang chen byang chub dam pa'o/ /sngags rnams thams cad nyid la yang / /rdo rje hU~M mdzad bsgom par bya/ /mchog gi sku gsung thugs dam tshig /

gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya/ /de ltar byas na nye mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum las skyes/ /rdo rje sems dpa' blo ldan pa/ /'jigs shing skrag nas byin rlob mdzad/ /rdo rje bum pa rnams dgod pa/ /
sngags rgyud bdag pos shes byas pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /brtan pa'i blos ni brtag par bya/ /dngos grub kun 'bras 'dod pa yi/ /sngags shes pas ni sbyin sreg bya/ /bshang gci 'bru
mar sha la sogs/ /bsreg rdzas dag ni dbul bar bya/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'khor lo/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i sbyin bsreg dbul/ /dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs/ /bsams te zhal du dbab par bya/ /

'di skad kyang gsungs so/ /dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni sbyin bsreg bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad sbyor ba yis/ /
slob ma rdo rje gsum las byung / /aHyig lus dang ngag sems la/ /bsgoms nas rdo rjes 'dzin par byed/ /rgyal chen rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /grags chen rnam par snang mdzad ni/ /sku gsung

thugs kyi dam tshig tu/ /byin gyis brlabs ni rab tu stsol/ /de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor chen por gzhug pa'i rdo rje'i dam tshig go/ /AHkha~M bI ra hU~M/ 'di ni dam tshig thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi

snying po'i sngags kyi rgyal po'o/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje chen po dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba'i ye shes gsang chen no/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams/ /yongs su gang bar rab tu bsgom/ /rdo rje'i blo yis

sil snyan dang / /dri sogs dam tshig sprin tshogs bsgom/ /'di skad kyang gsungs so/ /rdo rje sku gsum sngags kyis ni/ /yungs kar brtul zhugs can gyis brdeg /de la de yi tshe na ni/ /rang nyid dbang bskur
rab tu stsol/ /yang ni rdo rje sems dpa' yis/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas bsgom/ /bum pa dam tshig mchog rnams kyis/ /bzung bar mkhas pas bsgom par bya/ /rtag tu slob ma blo brtan pa/ /rdo rje
rnam par snang mdzad bsam/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje can/ /sngags shes pas ni dgod par bya/ /de la 'di ni dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi gsang chen te/ slob dpon thams cad kyis rdo rje'i tshig smra

bar bya'o/ /dbang bskur chen po rdo rje ni/ /khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa/ /rdo rje gsang ba gsum byung ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya/ /de la 'di ni slob ma thams cad kyis rdo rje chen po

gsol ba gdab pa'i cho ga gsang chen no/ /byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la/ /mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba bzhin/ /bdag kyang rab tu sgral ba'i phyir/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol/ /de tshe de la dbang bskur ba/ /

rab dga'i sems kyis sbyin par bya/ /lha yi gzugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /snying khar bdag po gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje slob ma blo ldan la/ /de la dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i/ /

dam tshig gsang ba bsgrag par bya/ /khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya/ /brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya/ /ma byin pa yang khyod kyis blang / /pha rol bud med brten par bya/ /rdo rje'i lam ni 'di dag gis/ /sems
can thams cad rab bkul bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig mchog tu rtag pa'o/ /zhes kyang gsungs so/ /sngags kyis bskul ba smras pa yi/ /de la

sngags kyang sbyin par bya/ /sngags kyi rgyal po'i ting 'dzin ni/ /byin nas gsang ba yang dag brtsam/ /khu ba'am yang na bshang ba'ang rung / /mngon par bsngags nas cho ga bzhin/ /rdo rje'i blos ni zar gzhug

bya/ /'di ltas dngos grub rnyed mi dka'/ /rnam pa 'di bzhi gsang chen te/ /rdo rje can ni kun gyi gsang / /sngags kyi 'khor los bud med gzugs/ /sems can don spyod phyir gnas pa'o/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i
dkyil 'khor sngags thams cad kyis mnyes par bya ba gsang ba'o/ /glang po'i sha dang rta yi sha / sha chen dag kyang bza' bar bya/ /sngags rnams kun la dbul bar bya/ /de ltar byas na mgon
po mnyes/ /nyin re rdo rje slob ma la/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/ /bshang gci sha yi bya ba dang / /rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas kyis kyang / /sngags rnams kun gyi yi ge oM/ /bsgoms

na de ma thag tu 'bar/ /bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi rig pa'i skyes bu chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa ste/ /dam tshig chen po bsgrub pa'o/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub bya ba/ /sangs rgyas

byang chub rang nyid kyang / /mi snang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang / /rdo rje 'gugs pa mchog dag ni/ /rdo rje sku yi bka' ji bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor du ni thams cad 'grub/ /bshang gci dang ni sha chen rnams/ /cha ni mnyam
par byas nas su/ /kham phor sbyar mar bzhag nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig 'khod/ /'di skad ces kyang gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni gsang ba thams cad kyi rdo rje mngag gzhug pa rab tu bsgrub pa'i
dam tshig gi mchog go/ /hIHy-ig 'bar ba 'od bzang po/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas bsam/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams/ /yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgom/ /de yi sku gsung

thugs kyi gnas/ /der ni sngags la dbab par bya/ /de la 'di ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sngags rdo rje'i byin gyis rlob pa'i gnas so/ /oMHkhaM d+hIH phyag na rdo rje gzugs chen po/ /phyag na pad mo 'od chen dang / /gzhan gyis

mi thub gzugs chen dag /bsgoms nas gsang ba'i gnas gzhag go/ /'di la 'di ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas so/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /mi bskyod pa ni rab tu brtag /tshe dpag med pa'i rdo rje che/ /

rdo rje snang mdzad de bzhin te/ /thams cad 'od chen sdug bsngal ni/ /chen pos snying pos bskul bar bya/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi snying po bskul pa'o/ /AHna dung rtse che dang rdo rje che/ /lcags kyu sna tshogs mchog
rnams kyis/ /rdo rje cho ga bzhin du bskul/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grub/ /'di skad ces kyang gsungs so/ /nyams dga' ba dang ri dbang dang / /chu gling rnam pa sna tshogs su/ /
zla phyed nang dang rdzogs pa yis/ /nges par sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /ri rab sum bcu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi/ /'khor gyi tshogs rnams de dag ni/ /byang chub rdo rje can
grub 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /zab mo'i chos ni thos 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas sa yang thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das dam tshig

rdo rje bzhad pa chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de la 'di ni mngag gzhug pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rdo rje gsang chen no/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes che/ /de bzhin gsung gi rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje
sku yi dgod pa ches/ /mngag gzhug pa rnams rtag tu bskul/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje ye shes 'khor lo sngags kyi dam tshig gi gnas rnam pa bzhi ste/ dam tshig bskul ba dang dam tshig gtong ba dang /

dam tshig bod pa dang dam tshig 'ching ba'o/ /mkha' dbyings rgya chen dag pa ni/ /chos rnams thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /gong bu'i tshul gyis rdo rje ni/ /rmad byung gzugs can byed par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan
'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bu gcig pa rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung / /gal te dbang du bya 'dod na/ /rdo rje mchog gsum
'dzin pa che/ /gsang ba chen po 'di bsam mo/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje stobs po che/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas bsam/ /mda' lnga'i rab tu sbyor ba yis/ /dbu rgyan rtse mor yang dag spro/ /gnas
lnga dag tu sngags shes pas/ /rdo rje khro bo dbab par bya/ /byis pa'i blo ni grags chen gyis/ /sngangs shing brgyal bar bsgom par bya/ /bsam gtan 'di ni gsang ba yi/ /skul ba dag gis phyogs gcig

bsgom/ /sngags rnams kun gyi rab tu gsang / /rdo rje'i don gyi blo yis gsungs/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa'i/ /hU~M yig sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mchog /bsam bya rdo rje'i sngags sogs kyis/ /rdo rje gsum
la sogs pa bsgom/ /mig gnas yi ge oM bsams nas/ /'di dag cho gas bstan par bya/ /sngags rnams kun gyi gzugs dag ni/ /sku gsung rdo rje can rnams mthong / /bkres skom la sogs nyon mongs
che/ /sbyor ba 'di ni rnam bsam na/ /rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /sdug bsngal thams cad byang bar 'gyur/ /rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen po/ /don rnams thams cad 'byor bsam la/ /yi
ge ba~M khar gnas pa bsgom/ /oM yig lce la 'dug par bsam/ /bza' bar bya ba kun gyi gnas/ /yid bzhin nor bu rnam brgyan pa/ /zhi ba sdug bsngal thams cad sel/ /ye shes rdo rje rab bskul ba'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das yid bzhin gyi nor bus de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo chen po de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje bsgom pa'i tshig gi mchog
rdo rje gsung las phyung ngo / /bIHnam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bsam/ /rdo rje sku gsum sbyor ba yis/ /bskyed de 'di ni rnam par bsam/ /rgyan rnams
thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /ser po rdo rje rnam par 'gying / /zhi ba thor tshugs dbu rgyan can/ /bsams nas thams cad brtsam par bya/ /dpa' bo rdo rje'i rlabs kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang kun nas nges par bsgrags pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje chen po bsgom pa'i tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs

rdo rje las phyung ngo / /cu~M/ nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /cho ga dag gis sangs rgyas sprin/ /rdo rje gsum mchog grags chen ni/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis ltung / /

skul byed rdo rje ma bsgom mo/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /kha dog dkar mor rab tu bsgom/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /bsams la sngags kyi gnas dgod do/ /rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi 'od

zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas bsam pa thams cad rdo rje'i longs spyod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin 'khor

lo'i tshul 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dzaM/ nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi cho ga yis/ /rdo rje bsgom pas dbab par bya/ /

dza~M b+ha la ni nor bsgrub pa/ /gnod sbyin chen po bskyed par bya/ /zhi ba gnod sbyin gzugs 'dzin pa/ /thor tshugs dbu rgyan rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni cho ga yis/ /gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya/ /
de yi rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu/ /bsam gtan gnas la 'dug pas dbul/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga yis/ /de yi dbu rgyan rnam par bsam/ /de ltar byas na gnod sbyin dbang / /'brog gnas dbang po

'od chen mnyes/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i dam tshig rdzas sgrub pa'i rtog gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa nye bar spyod pa'i dpal

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje'i tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /k+ShiM/ mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas
par/ /gru bzhi lham pa rab tu mdzes/ /thams cad rin chen bzhi las byas/ /me tog spos kyis kun tu 'khrigs/ /gnod sbyin mo ni thams cad kyis/ /mkha' dbyings yongs su gang bar bsam/ /rdo rje gsum
gyi sbyor bas dbab/ /gzugs ni gcig tu bsam par bya/ /rdo rje gsum las bye brag gis/ /de yi bsam gtan bsam par bya/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /dbu rgyan la ni khro bo bsgom/ /snying gar
sngags kyi tshig bsgoms la/ /rdo rje'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya/ /gnod sbyin mo thams cad mnyam pa nyid gnas pa bsgom pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo

rje de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje'i sngags thams cad dngos grub kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phra mo'i dngos grub 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje
las phyung ngo / /sku dang gsung thugs yang dag grub/ /sangs rgyas gzugs 'dzin 'od bzang po/ /'dzam bu chu yi gser 'od 'dra/ /dngos grub phra mo dag la gnas/ /mi snang la sogs kun grub
ni/ /gtso bo rdo rje 'chang du 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin rgyal mo grub pa che/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dngos grub thams cad kyi gzugs gsang ba sngags kyi dngos grub rnams
so/ /sngags kyi dngos grub yid 'ong ba'i/ /mdzes pa'i gzugs rnams thams cad ni/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /mthong ba nyid kyi dga' bar 'gyur/ /gtsug tor thams cad grub pa yi/ /
yid bzhin nor bu'i bdag por 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog /sangs rgyas nyid kyang rab bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rdo rjes
de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi
rig pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs/ rdo rje las phyung ngo / /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams/ /lus dang ngag sems dmigs pa ni/ /rang gzugs nyid
kyis de bya ste/ /de ltas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'i rig pa'i brtul zhugs so/ /gzugs ni thor tshugs dbu rgyan 'chang / /chen po kha dog
dkar po 'dra/ /cho ga bzhin du thams cad bya/ /sngags kyi sdom pas kun du bsdam/ /lo grangs bcu drug lon pa ni/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs/ /bzhin sdug mig gi dkyus ring

ba/ /rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad/ /spyan gyi go 'phang longs spyod cing / /rdo rje'i mtshan ma yis ni bya/ /phyag rgya sngags kyi cho ga shes/ /sngags dang rgyud ni legs par brlabs/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i btsun mor bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub la rab gnas/ /brtul zhugs chen pos thun bzhir ni/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu bya/ /sdong bu rtsa ba 'bras bu rnams/ /bza' dang bca'
ba thams cad spyad/ /'di yis myur du sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /bdag po ye shes rgya mtsho che/ /zla ba drug gis de dag kun/ /gdon mi za bar 'dir thob 'gyur/ /rtag tu gzhan gyi nor brku zhing / /
gsad pa'ang rmad du byung ba che/ /'dod chags rdo rje'i gnas spyad pa/ /sdom pa 'dis ni kun du bsdam/ /'dod chags rdo rje'i lcags kyu yum/ /yon tan lug rgyud mA ma kIr/ /gsung gi rdo rje mchog thugs
kyis/ /'di ni rnam pa kun du rigs/ /rang gi phyag rgya'am sems kyis bsam/ /bsam gtan yig gsum rdo rje can/ /de ltar sangs rgyas kun mkhyen yang / /mnyes par 'gyur 'dir gdon mi za/ /sgrub pa po ni

blo brtan pas/ /nags tshal dag tu bsod snyoms tshol/ /kha zas bzang po bstar ba dag /'jigs shing skrag nas ster bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje gsum bdag nyid 'das na/ /'jig cing rdo rje'i yi ger 'gyur/ /lha mo klu mo

gnod sbyin ma/ /lha ma yin mo mi mo'ang rung / /rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya/ /rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes bstan/ /'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba'i de nyid tshul chen te/ /rdo rje gsum gyi ye

shes 'byung / /sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'jug pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las dngos grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba
btab pa/ mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas pa che/ /rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/ /gsang ba gsungs khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che/ /rdo rje zhi
ba dga' ba che/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal chos rnams ni/ /ston mdzod rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab/ /rdo rje nam mkha' dri med mkha'/ /rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med/ /gsang ba

gsungs shig khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che/ /mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje can/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes/ /rdo rje gsungs khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /

bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad/ /dag pa ngo bo nyid las byung / /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bskul ba yi/ /bstod tshig zhi ba 'di rnams kyis/ /rdo rje longs spyod

bstod na ni/ /de yang sangs rgyas mnyam par 'gyur/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas kun la rjes brtse bas/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas dag pa/ /rdo rje gsung ni bka' stsal to/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge che/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal dag pa ni/ /nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin dri ma med/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi sku rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /sangs rgyas ye shes mtsho 'od kyis/ /dam tshig bzhi ni bsrung bya ste/ /sha chen rtag tu bza' bya'o/ /'di ni dam tshig mchog yin no/ /

de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag pos sangs rgyas thams cad gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bya ste/ /gsung gi rdo rje yi ge ches/ /

bshang gci rtag tu bza' bya nyid/ /'di ni gsung ba rmad byung ba'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid sku gsung

thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /rdo rje sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul ches/ /dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bya ste/ /khrag dang khu ba sbyar ba dag /brtul zhugs brtan pas rtag tu bza'/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /

dam tshig de ni rmad byung che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rtag pa ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin phyir yang dag bsrung / /gang zhig dam tshig 'di srung ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che/ /de yi sku gsung thugs rtogs pa/ /de

ma thag tu sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rang sangs rgyas kyi don gyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /ston pa lus kyis de

rnams ni/ /rdo rje sku la rab tu gnas/ /sems can 'jug pa'i ngang tshul te/ /mchog tu rtag pa'i dam tshig go/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos nyan thos kyi bslab pa'i
dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dge ba bcu yi las kyi lam/ /byed pa ye shes spangs pa rnams/ /dman par mos pa thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig de ni rmad byung che/ /
de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos tshangs pa'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /gti mug lam gyis las gang rnams/ /byed pa 'jigs
shing mi sdug pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ston pa ste/ /sku yi rdo rje nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos drag po'i dam tshig 'di
nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /khams gsum par ni gnas pa yi/ /bud med rdo rje las byung kun/ /sna tshogs dngos pos spyad pa ni/ /dam tshig mchog
tu rmad byung ba'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos khyab 'jug gi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /
sems can skyes pa ji snyed pa/ /sku gsum dbyer med la gnas rnams/ /bsam gtan rdo rjes gsad par bya/ /rdo rje mkha' khams bdag nyid kyang / /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gi rdo rje 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /sku yi rdo rje tshangs par 'gyur/ /gsung gi rdo rje dbang phyug che/ /thugs kyi rgyal po rdo rje
'dzin/ /de nyid khyab 'jug rdzu 'phrul che/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung
ngo / /sha dang khrag ni za ba dang / rtag tu bud med 'dod mchog gzhol/ /rdo rje chen po 'di rnams kyi/ /dam tshig bsten dkas mnyes par bya/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi bdag pos klu'i dbang po'i rgyal mo thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /phra ma dang ni 'o ma 'thung / /'dod dang dri ma rtag tu 'bad/ /dam tshig 'di
rnams kyis bsgrub bya/ /gzhan du nges par nyon mongs 'gyur/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lha ma yin gyi bu mo'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs

rdo rje las phyung ngo / /khro zhing nga rgyal khur gyis non/ /spos dang me tog spyod pa skyes/ /dam tshig rdo rje sa 'og tu/ /gdul dka' rdo rje 'jigs byed de/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi bdag pos srin mo rnams kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /thod rus gdug pa'i 'bru mar dang / /zhag gis rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /'byung po kun

gyi dam tshig 'di/ /dag byed rdo rje don chen byed/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje

las phyung ngo / /bshang ba gci ba khrag bza' zhing / /chang la sogs pa rtag tu btung / /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor bas/ /gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyis gsang bya/ /ngo bo nyid kyis kun 'byung ba/ /khams
gsum dag tu rnam par spyod/ /dam tshig ma lus dngos grub kun/ /phan par 'dod pas spyad par bya/ /khams gsum pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lus kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig rdo rje nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /lus kyi rnam gsum thams cad
ni/ /rdo rje yang dag byung bar bya/ /sems can khams ni rnam kun du/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas sku byed pa'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos ngag gi dngos grub kyi
rdo rje'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /ngag gi las lam ma lus par/ /khams gsum dri med dkyil 'khor du/ /ngag gi grub gnas nyams dga' 'di/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da'
dka' ba'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sems rnam par dag pa'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /yid kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun/ /

brtan pa rdo rje'i blo yis bsgom/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum ldan gyi/ /dam tshig bshad pa 'di yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /rang rgyal nyan thos de
bzhin te/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /phyag 'tshal na ni nyams par 'gyur/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs

rdo rje'i bsam gtan gyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /kun tu sku dang gsung thugs kyi/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor ba yis/ /bsam gtan sngags
zlos pas bsgom bya/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags rdo rje thams cad kyi sdom pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /sems can khams
rnams bsdus nas ni/ /bsam gtan rdo rjes bskul bar bya/ /rdo rje gsum phyag mchog gi mchog /dam tshig rdo rje 'byung ba'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos

bsnyen pa dang / /bsgrub pa dang nye bar sgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen po'i sdom pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /rdo rje bshang gcis nam mkha'i dbyings/ /yongs su gang bar rnam par bsam/ /dus

gsum rdo rje dag la dbul/ /dam tshig rab tu rtag pa'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje thams cad mi snang ba'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /thun

bzhi po ni gang zhig mchog /rdo rje mo ni nyin re spyad/ /slar yang rdzas kyang rtag tu dbrog /rdo rje rdzogs byed dam tshig go/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos nam mkha'i

rig pa 'dzin pa'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams/ /dbu rgyan gyi ni bsam gtan bsam/ /rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig kun/ /khros pa rnams kyis rgyal mi nus/ /

de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags 'chang las dang po pa thams cad kyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /kha zas la ni sku'i rdo rje/ /phyi rol rdo rje 'dzin

pa dang / /rdo rje chos su rtag tu bya/ /mdo 'don cho ga'i bya ba la/ /bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pa rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje 'dzin

pa thams cad sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje snying po rdo rje mnyam pa nyid rnam par dgongs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ri
rab kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du cang mi gsung bar bzhugs pa lags/
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku/ gsung

thugs kyi bdag po 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dmigs su med pa'i ngo bo nyid mi 'gyur ba'i gnas la gang ngo bo nyid med pa mi 'gyur ba'i gnas rnam par dpyad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /
rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di ni 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ sku yi yi ge ma skyes pa/ /gsung dang thugs kyang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i rtog par byung / /
log par bzung bas gzung ba yin/ /de nas 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsung rdo rje'i tshig la log pa kun 'byung bas mi brtag tu gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i
dbyangs kyi ngo bo nyid spyod pa gshegs pa dang byon pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di yin no/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ tshangs pa la sogs pa'i byang chub chen po sems pa mngon par

shes pa chen po'i ye shes thob pa rnams chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid mi shes pas 'di snyam du yongs su rtog par byed de/ ci rdo rje chen po'i bdag nyid 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
thams cad kyi rdo rje de kho na nyid mngon par ma mkhyen nas gsang ba'i yi ge 'chad dam snyam pa yang mchis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub
sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /re shig byang chub chen po sems dpa' khyed rnams lta ci smos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i yi ge rnyed pa nged

kyis kyang sku gsung thugs kyi byang chub mi shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid med pa/ mi 'gyur ba las byung ba/ skye ba med pa'i rdo rje mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas so/ /rigs kyi bu dag sems

can gyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub la gnas pa sangs rgyas rdo rje'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yong ye sems can 'di dag ni sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid nye
bar bzung nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i ye shes thob pa'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang
chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rang bzhin dag cing bdag med pa/ /chos kyi dbyings ni ma lus gnas/ /rtog pa rdo rje yang dag byung / /smra bya smra bya yang ma yin/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub gang nas yang dag par 'byung / gang du gnas gang du med par 'gyur ba lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud la rdo rje rab tu gnas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad
dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / khams gsum ji snyed pa dag kyang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub dang / khams gsum pa thams cad gang na gnas/ ye shes rdo rje'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub dang / khams gsum pa thams cad ni nam mkha'i khams la gnas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das nam
mkha' gang na gnas/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ gang na yang ma yin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar
gyur nas dbyangs 'di dag brjod do/ /e ma'o rdo rje e rdo rje/ /e ma'o rdo rje'i bstan pa ni/ /gang du lus dang ngag sems med/ /de ru sku ni rnam sgom pa/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas
kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /rdo rje gsum mchog mchog chen mchog /rdo rje gsum mchog dbang phyug gis/ /dngos grub dag ni thams cad kyi/ /rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa gsungs/ /mkha' dbyings rdo
rje'i dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /sku yi rdo rje rab bsgoms nas/ /spyi bor rdo rje rab tu bsgom/ /zhal gsum sku gsum yang dag byung / /rnam par 'phro ba
bsam par bya/ /rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin bsams na/ /myur du byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /thams cad rigs kyi bye brag gis/ /gsang ba 'di ni rnam par bsam/ /gzhan du rnam par
bsgom pa ni/ /de dag dngos grub mchog mi 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khams gsum las byung rgyal mo che/ /mnyes
par byed pa rnam par bsam/ /'di ltas mnyes 'gyur khyu mchog ni/ /rdo rje sku gsum mtshan pa rnams/ /gang zhig la la 'di sgom pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams/ /

'od chen pos ni zhag bdun gyis/ /sku gsum dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sku gsung thugs rdo rje bsdus pa'i gsang ba gsang

chen nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni/ /phyag rgya chen po'i don rtogs pa/ /kun mtshan nyid kyis cho ga bzhin/ /bsgoms na sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /de nas phyag

na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos yang sgrub pa po thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi gsang chen nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /gal te byang chub mchog 'dod
na/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing ngo / /sngags rnams kun gyi dam tshig 'di/ /rgyal ba rnams kyang mi 'da'o/ /de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /bshang gci khu ba khrag rnams ni/ /smad pa nyid du yong mi bya/ /cho ga bzhin du rtag tu bza'/ /gsang 'di rdo rje gsum byung yin/ /de nas yang

bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar/ /bud med ji snyed

yod pa rnams/ /thams cad cho ga bzhin du spyad/ /gsung gi rdo rje mi smad do/ /de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos thugs kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje

las phyung ngo / /rdo rje sku gsum la gnas pa'i/ /dam tshig ji snyed yod pa kun/ /rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis/ /mgu bya thugs rdo rje mi smad/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig chen pos de skad

ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /mdor na phung

po lnga rnams ni/ /sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu bsgrags/ /rdo rje'i skye mched rnams nyid ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos khams gsum

bsags pa'i rdo rje nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /sa ni spyan zhes bya ba yin/ /chu'i khams mA ma kI zhes bya/ /dkar dang sgrol ma zhes bya ba/ /me dang rlung du rab tu bsgrags/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dam

tshig ni/ /de nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi dbang phyug rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byams pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag
'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang chen gsang ba 'dus par mngon par dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon
la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byang chub kyi sems rdo rje nyid du blta bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rje dang slob dpon 'di ni gnyis su med
cing gnyis su byer med do/ /rigs kyi bu ji snyed mdor bsdus te bstan na ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams bzhugs pa dang 'tsho ba dang
skyong ba de rnams thams cad kyang dus gsum du byon nas/ rdo rje slob dpon de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rnams kyis/ yang dag par mchod nas rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
'gro zhing / ngag rdo rje'i yi ge'i tshig 'di skad du yang 'byin to/ /bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha'o/ /bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma'o/ /bdag cag de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi ston pa'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /'di lta ste gzhan yang rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bsu bcing / ji snyed bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi sku

dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa de bas kyang / slob dpon gyi ba spu'i bu ga gcig gi bsod nams khyad par du 'phags so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu

byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa bskyed pa gnas par gyur pa nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin pa'i bar du'o/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams
pa yid 'jigs shing skrag nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog dang / de bzhin gshegs pa/ 'od dpag
med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa dngos grub kyi dam tshig thams cad dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams thams cad nyon cig /gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das dus gsum gyi rdo rje ye shes yang dag par byung ba de rnams kyang byon nas gsang ba 'dus pa'i slob dpon la mchod pa byed cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nyid de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ston pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung
thugs kyi dngos grub rnams gang la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ sku gsum gsang ba'i sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje la gnas
so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje gang la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la yang mi gnas so/ /de
nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du byung bar gyur nas cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsang ba'i
rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po nyon cig /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa'
de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ /
nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas bsam/ /gru bzhi lham pa rab tu mdzes/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /bsam gtan rdo rje rab bskul bya/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis/ /
'khor lo can kun gdan du bya/ /mchod pa cho ga de nyid kyis/ /blo dang ldan pas rtag tu bya/ /slob dpon snying gar rab bsgoms nas/ /dbang bskur ba ni yang dag spyad/ /mkha' dbyings sangs rgyas
thams cad kyis/ /yongs su gang bar rnam bsgoms la/ /thams cad dbang bskur gnas gsum gyis/ /cho ga bzhin du dbab par bya/ /'di yis sems can thams cad la/ /phan bzhed byang chub thob
'gyur zhing / /dngos grub thams cad rmad byung che/ /sku gsung thugs ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba bsam gtan gyi dkyil

'khor ro/ /de nas slar yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba nyid kyi sku
gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /hU~M hrIHkha~M/ sha rus la sogs dkyil 'khor ni/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas bsam/ /sku dang gsung thugs gsum snying po/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par

bya/ /drag po mi sdug kun tu khros/ /ud pal sngon po'i kha dog 'dra/ /phyag bzhi pa ni cho ga yis/ phyag na thod pa bsnams par bsgom/ /lnga yi 'od zer rab gsal ba'i/ /rang lce brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom/ /bsam

gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /khrag drang ba yi mchog yin no/ /rtse gsum rdo rje dam tshig dang / /phur bu drag po mchog dag gis/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyi sku dag kyang / /rdo rje'i sbyor bas gzir bar bya/ /de nas phyag

na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos slar yang rdo rje kha zas kyi dam tshig gis bya ba nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /bza' ba'am btung ba gang cung zad/ /brtul zhugs can

gyis gang za ba/ /bshang gci sha yi sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga bzhin du yongs su brtag /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung

dang thugs rdo rje mchod pa'i mchog nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /nyer spyod lnga yi mchod mchog gis/ /mchod bya de dag kyang mchod bya/ /'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka'

ba'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchod pa gsang ba nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /
dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /rang gi khu ba sogs bzung bas/ /cho ga bzhin du kun mchod bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi sdom pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /sems can khams rnams mtha' yas kyi/ /ma rnams dam tshig 'dzin

pa ni/ /dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rjes spyad/ /sdom pa 'di ni rmad byung che/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos thams cad sgrub pa'i sdom pa'i rdo rje nyid kyi sku gsung thugs
rdo rje las phyung ngo / /lus dang ngag sems longs spyod rdzogs/ /gsang ba gsum gnas rdo rje skyes/ /bzang po bdag gis bsgrub par bya/ /min na thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /de nas yang phyag
na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos thams cad sgrub pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sdom pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /mtho gang tsam gyis spags par ni/ /mgo bor
dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/ /oM yig dbus su gnas bsams nas/ bdud rtsi lnga bo dbab par bya/ rdo rje sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ skad gcig gis ni gzi can 'gyur/ lus dang ngag sems
bder gnas par/ 'gyur bar 'dir ni the tshom med/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags thams cad 'dzin pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems kyi
gsang ba nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /mchod rten dag gi las mi bya/ gleg bam bklag pa'ang mi bya zhing / /dkyil 'khor dag kyang yong mi bya/ /rdo rje mchog gsum phyag mi bya/ /
de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos dug thams cad bsal ba gnon pa 'dren pa'i gsang ba nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM/ 'od zer
dkar 'bar phreng ba can/ /'khor lo'i dbus su chud par bzhag /'od zer ser po 'khrigs pa yis/ /ser po lta bur bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje gsum 'od dam tshig gis/ /sa bon 'di ni gsang gsum byung / /

de nas slar yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lus dang ngag dang sems srung ba'i 'khor lo'i sngags rdo rje dang ldan pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM hu lu hu lu/

tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+ha ban+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ a mrI te hU~M phaT/ gro ga sogs la 'khor lo ni/ /las kyi rdo rje la gnas par/ /hUM yig dbus su bzhag nas su/ /ming ni dbus su bri bar bya/ /sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams kyis/ /

yang dag brgyan te rtag tu bzhag /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba gsum gyi gnas bsdus pa'o/ /de nas slar yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje an dza'i gnas nyid

kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /lam gyi bzhi mdo'am shing gcig drung / ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gnas su/ /de ru rdo rje an dza na/ /thod par rtag tu dbab par bya/ /mar khu chen po dang / khrag dang bshang ba dang pad

ma'i skud pa dang ar ga'i skud pas me mar gyi snying po byas la mar ngo'i bcu bzhi'i nam phyed na/ rdo rje an dza na mkhas pas dbab par bya'o/ /sngags de nyid lan brgya rtsa brgyad btab na dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur
ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i yi ge du rtogs pa dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gis spyad pa'i

rdo rje 'di la dad cing sgom par 'gyur/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad gsang ba'i yi ge gsum rtogs pa dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa 'di la dad cing sgom par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ gsum po gang zhig lags/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje
dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje ste gsum po 'di dag go/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas
cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
cad la bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngon byung ba na brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi/ rdul phra rab dang
mnyam pa'i bskal pa 'das nas/ gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
mar me mdzad kyang 'das nas/ thub pa chen po 'od bsrungs
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyis kyang ma gsungs so/ /de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i gnas kyi don ma bshad pa ni de'i tshe de'i dus na sems
can rnams la skal ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba 'dus pa 'di la skad cig thang cig yud tsam nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rdzogs
par byed do/ /gang zhig gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dpag tu med pa snyed kyi kal par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'bad cing btsal kyang byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ba de gsang ba 'dus pa la
mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpas tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsung rdo rje'i yi
ge'i tshig 'di thos nas rab tu ngus so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams ma
ngu shig /sdug bsngal gsum ma bskyed cig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad ji ltar mi ngu bar bgyi/ ji ltar sdug bsngal gsum mi bskyed par bgyi/ de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba gsum gyi yi ge'i skal ba ma mchis te/ tha na ming thos pa'i skal ba yang
ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de skad ma zer cig /yi ge ni thun mong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar khyed rnams kyis mi shes pa dang ma thos pa de
bzhin du/ nged de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang rigs kyi bu gang gsang ba gsum gyi yi ge 'di dag yang dag par ma thob cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs
ma rgyas so/ /de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba gsum gyi yi ge rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
gsung thugs kyi btsun mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la dga' bas bstod pa/ sems can khams ni gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod
ni rdo rje'i thugs/ /dga' ba yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la bskyab tu gsol/ /mgon pos gal te de ring bdag ni gsan par mchis bzhed na/ /sems can yab gnyen mchog chen bdag la
bgyes par mdzad du gsol/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi btsun mo mA ma kIs bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/ pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen po la rdo rje 'dod
pa dga' ba mchod pa'i mchog gi yi ge'i tshig 'dis yang dag par bstod pa/ rdo rje'i sku khyod bka' yi 'khor lo sems can mang por phan/ sangs rgyas rnams don byang chub mchog don
phan pa rjes ston pa/ /mgon pos gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /chags pas 'dod chags dam tshig bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ /de nas 'jig rten dbang
phyug gi btsun mo sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i spyan gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen po la 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa'i dam tshig gis yang dag par

bstod pa/ khyod ni rdo rje'i gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba/ /'jig rten dag ni dgos pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson/ /mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /rab dga'i spyod pa kun du
bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs dam tshig rdo rje'i btsun mo'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen

po la bde ba dang yid bde ba'i dga' ba 'dis bstod do/ /khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan don che/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam nyid rjes su thugs brtse ba/ /mgon pos gal te de ring bdag
ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /yon tan rin chen dam pa'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'i
dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo de dag la dam tshig gi 'khor los 'dod pa spyod cing cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /
de nas nam mkha'i dbyings 'di dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig gis/ yongs su gang ste/ bum pa rdo rje chus
gang ba ltar gnas par gyur to/ /de nas rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings 'di na gang sems can sku gsum yang dag par 'byung ba de rnams rdo rje'i dpal gyis yang dag par rig pa de dag thams cad de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes can du gyur to/ /de nas brtsams te sems can thams cad kun nas bzang po/ kun tu bzang po zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes dbang bskur bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mthong ngam/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes mnyam pa nyid dang / rdo rje ye shes kyi spyod pa mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i b+ha ga las mngon par byung nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje chen
po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang gi phyir 'dod chags kyi yi ge'i tshig gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rjes su rtogs par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ /
bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de skad ma gsungs shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni nam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig
dang mtshungs pa'i phyir gzugs kyi phung po ma yin/ tshor ba'i phung po ma yin/ 'du shes kyi phung po ma yin/ 'du byed kyi phung po ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po ma yin/ khams ma yin skye
mched ma yin/ de bzhin du 'dod chags ma yin zhe sdang ma yin gti mug ma yin/ chos ma yin chos ma yin pa yang ma yin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi
khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje gsang ba 'di bsgom par gyis shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams la chos
kyi rnam grangs 'di'i skal ba yod pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam
tshig gi de kho na nyid 'di zung shig /khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug rdo rje zhes bya bar dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rdo rje chos kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes/ gsol nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge gsum la rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs zhugs
par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad khams gsum pa thams cad kyi lus rdo rje la gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi
gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rdo rje khams gsum pa thams cad kyi ngag rdo rje la gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang
mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje khams gsum pa thams cad kyi sems rdo rje la gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas
cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig
dang sdom pa rdo rje'i byin gyi brlabs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa

zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// //stag lung rgyud 'bum dang bstun pa'i ma la zhus dag / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad d+hA ka ra warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos

bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ slad kyis paN Di ta bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po rje btsun nyi ma'i dbang po'i zhal snga nas chag lo ts+tsha ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis gus pas zhus shing dag par
bcos te gtan la phab pa/ /thang chen pa dang rgyal mtshan ring mos zhus chen bgyi'o/ / @#/ /rgyud phyi ma/ de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba dang sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba bstan pa la dngos po thams cad kyis ji lta ba dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing thos la khong du chud nas chos gzigs pa
dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /e ma'o kun du bzang po yi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi nges par dag /rdo rje gsum gyis kun du ni/ /rdo rje gsum la
kun tu bzhugs/ /sems can thams cad dus gsum gyi/ /rdo rje'i ngo bor yang dag byung / /sangs rgyas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che/ /byang chub rdo rje'i gnas thob pa'o/ /e ma'o 'di rab ngo mtshar che/ /
e ma'o zhi ba dbang po 'das/ /e ma'o 'khor ba dag gi rgyun/ /e ma'o mchog tu mya ngan 'das/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de de bzhin no/ /sems dpa' chen po de de bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad yang 'dus par gyur
nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la gsang ba dang / phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas phyag byas te mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/ /e ma'o shin tu
rnyed dka' ba/ /byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs 'di yin/ /rgyud kyi mchog gi mchog gyur pa/ /gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya'i rgyud/ /sbas pa de ni rtogs phyir dang / /sems can rnams la phan
'dod pas/ /yang dag gsung bas gang bshad pa/ /mgon po khyed la gsol bar 'tshal/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la
'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gang zhig sbas pa'i rgyud tshig de/ /de dag thams cad 'dri 'dod pa/ /sems dpa' chen po legs so legs/ /yon tan 'byung gnas legs so legs/ /
de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun/ /rab tu dga' bas mig gdangs te/ /yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas/ /'di yi som nyi zhus par gyur/ /gsang ba zhes 'di gang la bgyi/ /'dus pa zhes ni
gang la brjod/ /rgyud kyi 'brel pa ji lta bu/ /rnal 'byor rgyud 'dir ci la bgyi/ /de nyid rnam pa du ru bshad/ /de bzhin gsang ba rnam pa du/ /gsang chen zhes ni gang la bgyi/ /dam pa rnam pa du zhig

mchis/ /byang chub sems zhes gang la bgyi/ /de bzhin rig pa'i skyes bu ci/ /badzra d+h+rIka ces ci la bgyi/ /de bzhin dzi na dzika ni gang / /de la rata na d+h+r-ika ni gang / /de bzhin A ro lika ni ci/ /
pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika ces gang la bgyi/ /rigs 'dir de bzhin gang zhig lags/ /mo ha zhes ni gang la bgyi/ /dwe Sha zhes bya 'dir gang lags/ /rA ga zhes ni ci la bgyi/ /badzra sngags ni gang la bgyi/

ra ti zhes 'dir gang la bgyi/ /phun sum tshogs pa gang zhig lags/ /ya mAn ta kr-ita don ni gang / /de bzhin pradz+nyA na ta kr-ita ci/ /pad mAn ta kr-ita ming ci lta/ /de bzhin big+h+nan ta kr-ita ci/ /
kun du spyod pa gang ci lags/ /de bzhin sngags kyi spyod pa gang / /'dir ni bzlas pa gang zhig lags/ /rgyas btab pa zhes gang la bgyi/ /chos 'byung ba ni ji ltar bsgom/ /de bzhin
sdom pa ji lta bu/ /zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags chos/ /sems can don mdzad ji lta bu/ /dkyil 'khor zhes ni gang la bgyi/ /phyag rgya'i dgod pa ji ltar lags/ /'dir ni me tog ci
zhig lags/ /mchod rten zhes ni gang la bshad/ /ye shes 'khor lo ji ltar shes/ /'dir ni gnas shes gang la bshad/ /mgon po bskul ba ji lta bu/ /gtong ba dag kyang ji lta bu/ /
ji ltar de rnams spyan drang bgyi/ /bcing ba 'dir ni ji lta bu/ /dbang bskur ba ni ji ltar stsal/ /de bzhin rig pa'i brtul zhugs gang / /bdud rtsi lnga rnams ci ltar bza'/ /de bzhin dpa' bo lnga gang
lags/ dngos grub tha mal ji lta bu/ /de bzhin mchog kyang ji lta bu/ /de la thabs ni rnam pa du/ /de bzhin thabs byung ji lta bu/ /rnal 'byor rdo rje can kun gyi/ /bka' ni ji ltar bsgo bar bgyi/ /las
kyi mchog gi tshogs rnams ni/ /sna tshogs ji ltar byed par 'gyur/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis zhus pa'i tshig nye
bar gsan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa la dmigs par mdzad nas skad cig cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' che/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid rab dga' nas/ /
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs/ /mgon la yang dang yang rab bskul/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje la/ /bzhag nas byang chub sems dbang po/ /zhus pa rgya chen mnyan par gyis/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis rjes su gzung pa'i bka' spyi bos rab tu mnos te/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /bde bar gshegs pa legs so

legs so zhes gsol nas/ rang rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la dmigs te cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi thugs thugs rdo chen po la dmigs par byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag rnams la zhus pa de dag gsung gcig gis
bka' stsal pa/ sku gsung thugs ni rnam pa gsum/ /gsang ba zhes ni bstan pa yin/ /sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba/ /tshogs pa 'dus pa yin par bshad/ /lnga pa dang ni dgu pa dang / /bcu bdun
pa dang bcu gsum pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis/ /bstan pa dag ni sgrub chen yin/ /bzhi pa dang ni bcu drug pa/ /brgyad pa de bzhin bcu gnyis pa/ /slob dpon spyi yi las dang ni/ /
dngos grub brtul zhugs sdom pa yin/ /drug pa dang ni gnyis pa dang / /bcu pa dang ni bcu bzhi pa/ /drag spyod rjes su chags pa dang / /nye bar sgrub pa'i sdom pa'o/ /bdun pa dang ni gsum pa dang / /
bcu gcig pa dang bcwa lnga pa/ /dngos grub zhing dang mtshan ma ni/ /bsnyen pa sgrub pa'i sdom pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi las/ /tshar gcod phan 'dogs spyod pa dag /dul dang gdul dka' zhi
ba yi/ /sems can rnams kyi 'jug pa'o/ /bskyed pa'i rim dang 'brel ba yi/ /bsnyen pa rdo rje'i cho ga bzhi/ /thun mong dngos grub 'brel pa yin/ /mchog tu gyur pa'i gzhung nyid do/ /dkyil 'khor
brtul zhugs 'brel ba yi/ /gzhung ni slob dpon phun tshogs pa'o/ /bla mas sngags kyi lam gyis ni/ /slob ma yongs su smin bya ba/ /brtul zhugs bzang dang dbang bskur ba/ /rang gi slob ma bdag
nyid che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis/ /ston pas yongs su grol ba yin/ /thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa/ /rnal 'byor zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /gang zhig dngos med shes

rab ste/ /thabs ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid do/ /rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar grags/ /rgyun de rnam pa gsum 'gyur te/ /gzhi dang de bzhin rang bzhin dang / /mi 'phrog pa yis rab phye ba/ /rnam pa rang bzhin rgyu yin te/ /

de bzhin mi 'phrogs 'bras bu'o/ /gzhi ni thabs shes bya ba ste/ /gsum gyis rgyud kyi don bsdus pa'o/ /rig ni lnga dang gsum dag dang / /ngo bo nyid gcig rigs brgya'o/ /byang chub rdo rje bcas gsungs pa/ /de ni phyi ma'i

rgyud du 'dod/ /de nyid rnam pa lnga ru bshad/ /gsang ba rnam pa gsum du bshad/ /lhag ma'i lha ni gsang chen te/ /dam pa'i rigs ni rnam pa brgya/ /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/ /dngos dang dngos med zad pa'i gtso/ /stong nyid snying rje

mi phyed pa/ /byang chub sems zhes bya ba yin/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /mi phyed dbye ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /rigs dang lhan cig ldan pas na/ /rig pa'i skyes bu zhes brjod do/ /rgyu lnga dang ni 'bras bu lnga/ /
rdo rje zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /'chang ba 'dzin pa ces grags te/ /badzra d+h+rika ni rnam shes yin/ /yod dang med dang dbus las 'das/ /'byung dang 'byung las gyur las byung / /sems can kun gyi lus yin

te/ /skye las rgyal ba dzi na dzika / don rnams thams cad 'byung bas na/ /sems ni rin po che zhes bya/ /tshor ba po yis nges tshor bas/ /tshor ba rad Na d+h+rig tu 'dod/ /mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid dngos po yis/ /
kun la kun gyis thams cad du/ /dga' ba'i mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi ni/ /A ro lika ces bshad pa yin/ /rnam shes rab mthar phyin byed pa/ /gang yin de ni shes rab ste/ /'du byed sems

pa 'dzin pas na/ /pradz+nyA d+h+rika ces bya bar bshad/ /rigs ni rgyud ces bya bar bshad/ /rgyud ni thog ma zhes brjod de/ /mi 'jig skye ba med gang yin/ /mgon po de ni yin par bshad/ /rgyu 'bras gnyis la sdang

bas na/ /rnam shes zhe sdang yin par bshad/ /bems po bcings pa'i rang bzhin pas/ /gzugs ni gti mug ces byar bshad/ /bdag tu rlom pa'i ngo bo bas/ /tshor ba dregs pa yin par bshad/ /dngos la chags pa'i mtshan

nyid can/ /'du shes yang dag chags bdag nyid/ /rgyan gyis drang ba'i bdag nyid can/ /'du byed rtag tu phrag dog yin/ /byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid/ /srid pa kun 'byung thams cad du/ /'dod chags zhe sdang rmongs

ldan pa'i/ /sems ni 'dod pa zhes byar bshad/ /dam tshig sna tshogs 'dra ba yin/ /mngon phyogs las las skyes 'bras bu/ /gnyis med ye shes chos rnams la/ /nga rgyal byed pa rmongs shes bshad/ /de la phan

tshun 'dzer ba ni/ /zhe sdang zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /mtshan nyid 'dod chags zhen pa yin/ /ye shes thabs ni rdo rjer bshad/ /dga' ba rdzogs pa'i longs spyod mchog /bud med bde mchog phun sum tshogs/ /

gti mug zhe sdang 'dod chags dang / /rdo rje la dga' rtag par gnas/ /de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs/ /rdo rje theg pa zhes bshad do/ /mi 'jig bdag nyid chos rnams ni/ /ma skyes pa yi ngo bo nyid/ /
dngos po kun gyi dam tshig ste/ /de nyid gshin rje mthar byed do/ /rnam shes min bdag chos rnams ni/ /don dam mi 'gyur dag gyur te/ /sems kun gyi ni dam tshig ste/ /de nas
rgyal ba shes mthar byed/ /brjod med bdag nyid chos rnams ni/ /ming dang gzugs blo dngos po med/ /chos rnams kun/ gyi dam tshig
ste/ /des na khyab bdag pad mthar byed/ /mi rtog bdag nyid chos rnams ni/ /rang bzhin gyis ni zhi
ba'i dngos/ /rdo rje kun gyi dam tshig ste/ /des na gtso bo bgegs mthar byed/ /mi 'jig rnam par mi shes pa/ /brjod du med dang rtog bral ba/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di/ /shes na bde ba
thob par 'gyur/ /gti mug gti mug longs spyod pas/ /gti mug zad phyir gshin rje gshed/ /des na lus mthar byed pa ste/ /des na shes bya mthar byed 'gyur/ /nyes pa nyes pa longs spyad
pas/ /nyes pa zad phyir shes mthar byed/ /des na sems ni mthar byed de/ /des na nyon mongs mthar byed 'gyur/ /'dod chags 'dod chags longs spyod pas/ /'dod chags zad pas pad
mthar byed/ /des na chags pa mthar byed de/ /de bzhin snyoms 'jug mthar byed 'gyur/ /nyon mongs kun zad gang yin dang / /de bzhin las ni thams cad zad/ /sgrib pa kun zad ye
shes ni/ /bgegs mthar byed ces bya bar bshad/ /nyon mongs rdo rje'i sgrib dag na/ /las rnams thams cad rnam par dag /las rnams thams cad rnam dag pas/ /las skyes
'bras bu rnam dag 'gyur/ /gzung dang chags pa nyid dang ni/ /rnam pa de bzhin mi g.yo dang / /rgyu nyid 'bras bu nyid dag ste/ /drug las thugs ni kun du 'byung / /'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs
drug /khro bo'i dbang por rnam par grags/ /dam tshig rdo rje la sogs drug /sa la sogs pa rnam pa lnga/ /'byung dang 'byung las gyur par grags/ /rig pa'i rgyal por zhes bshad do/ /gzugs
kyi rdo rje la sogs drug /rdo rje'i bdag po zhes bshad do/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /bdag nyid chen po kun du 'byung / /thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i/ /phung po khams dang skye
mched gzugs/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sngags pas sbyor ba nges byas la/ /thams cad dag par mos pa yis/ /'jigs pa thams cad spangs nas su/ /dogs pa med pa'i
sems kyis ni/ /sngags pas seng ge bzhin du spyod/ /'di la mi bya ci yang med/ /de bzhin mi bza'ang yod ma yin/ /smra bar mi bya cung zad med/ /rtag tu mi bsam ci yang med/ /mnyam par ma
bzhag sbyor ba yis/ /rtag pa nyid du mnyam par 'jog /gang gis sems kun la spyod pa/ /kun du spyod pa zhes bshad do/ /dbang po dang ni yul rnams kyi/ /rkyen gyis gang dang gang byung
yid/ /yid de man zhes bya bar bshad/ /ta ni skyob par byed pa'i don/ /'jig rten spyod las rnam grol bar/ /gang bshad dam tshig sdom pa ste/ /rdo rje kun gyis bsrungs pa ni/ /sngags kyi spyod
pa zhes bshad do/ /rang rang gi ni ngo bo nyid/ /snying po yid kyis rnam bsams te/ /gsang sngags zlos pa'i dbye ba yis/ /zlos par byed cing spro zhing bsdu/ /sangs rgyas sna tshogs rdo rje'i bdag /ye
shes sa bon dag gis bsdu/ /byang chub bdag med sa bon gyis/ /brtul zhugs can gyis bdag med gzung / /sna tshogs bzhin du sna tshogs spro/ /dus gsum sa bon dag gis bzla/ /bzlas pa

smra bar grags pas na/ /ngag kun bzlas pa zhes bshad la/ /sngags kun 'bod pa zhes bshad de/ /de nyid bskul bar smra ba'o/ /ji ltar thugs sogs byin rlob pa/ /ting nge 'dzin kyang de bzhin no/ /de rnams

spyi bor dbang bskur dang / /de bzhin kun tu mchod pa'o/ /rdo rje 'chang ba gang yin pa'i/ /rig pa yod pa'i sbyor ba dang / /bdag byin brlab sogs de bzhin te/ /de yi longs spyod bzhir shes bya/ /dpa' bo rdo rje

gcig pu yi/ /spyi bor dbang bskur re re ste/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags tsam dang / /rang rigs rim gyis rgyas gdab pa'o/ /'bras bus rgyu ni rgyas gdab cing / /rgyu yis 'bras bu rgyas gdab par/ /bsgom

gyi gzhan du dngos grub ni/ /bskal pa bye bar 'byung mi 'gyur/ /longs spyod bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje can/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/ /gru gsum du ni rnam par bsgom/ /
kun nas ser ba'i 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs bcu de dbus rnam par bsgom/ /rtsibs kun la ni khro bo bcu/ /ye shes bdag nyid bcu las byung / /'gog pa'i rdo rjes bsgom bya zhing / /mchog tu mdzes
pas bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i sprin spros pas/ /mi g.yo ba dang mtshungs par 'khor/ /de ltar chos 'byung ye shes ni/ /rang bzhin dri ma med zhi ba/ /bsgoms pas skad cig nyid kyis ni/ /
sangs rgyas spyan ni rab tu 'byung / /rdo rje can gyis chos bstan pa/ /rim pa gnyis la yang dag brten/ /bskyed pa yi ni rim nyid dang / /de bzhin rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o/ /sgrub pa dang ni
nan tan dang / /dam tshig de bzhin sdom pa rnams/ /sngar ni de kun rgyas par ni/ /rim pa'i dbye bas phye ba yin/ /gzugs dang sgra sogs 'dod pa ni/ /bde sdug gnyi ga'i bdag nyid can/ /

'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs/ /rtag tu snying la skye bar 'gyur/ /chags la 'dod chags rdo rje can/ /rdo rje 'dra bar rin chen 'byung / /rin chen bzhin du dam tshig shes/ /'dod pa de rnams dam tshig mtshungs/ /

rnam bcas dang ni rnam pa med/ /kun 'gro yi ge gsum bdag nyid/ /bya ba dang ni dbrog pa dang / /spyo dang rang gi bzlas pa bya'o/ /de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dag /sa gsum du ni bskyed par bya/ /gsang ba'i bdag

pos rgyas btab cing / /rdo rje can gyi don byed do/ /zhe sdang sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /zhe sdang 'khor lo bskyed nas su/ /rdo rje drag pos bcom nas ni/ /ye shes rdo rje can gyis bsdu/ /de ni spro bas rtogs
byas la/ /de bzhin slar yang bsdu bar bya'o/ /'di lta'i sbyor ba goms byas na/ /zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur/ /khams gsum po ni ma lus pa/ /gsad dang de bzhin gso ba dang / /skad cig tsam
