gyis byed par ni/ /mngon du nus par the tshom med/ /gti mug sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /gti mug 'khor lo bskyed nas ni/ /rgyan la sogs pa gang ci'ang rung / /de dag thams cad rtag tu
brku/ /gti mug sems kyi rgya mtsho bsgom/ /rin chen kun gyis rab tu dgang / /gti mug 'khor lo can kun gyis/ /sbyin pa'i char ni rab tu 'bebs/ /rdzas rnams thams cad ma lus par/ /
rab tu sbyin dang dbrog pa nyid/ /sems kyi rdo rje bstan po yis/ /skad cig tsam gyis dbye bar 'gyur/ /'dod chags sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /'dod chags 'khor lo bskyed nas ni/ /lha mo
thams cad phrogs nas su/ /'dod pa'i sbyor bas 'dod pa spyod/ /dga' sdug bde bas rangs pa yis/ /'dod pa'i rtsed mos rnam par 'phrul/ /de nas 'khor lo can kun la/ /lha mo rab tu dbul
bar bya/ /khams gsum dag du byung ba yi/ /lha dang lha min chung ma yang / /skad cig tsam gyis 'dod spyod na/ /mi yi bud med smos ci dgos/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang bskur dang / /las mchog gi ni
tshogs rnams dag /nyams su len cing byin rlob pa/ /grub pa'i bgrod pa gzhan yin no/ /b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes grags dang / /byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang / /lus kyi dkyil 'khor
zhes bshad pa/ /gsum po dkyil 'khor yin par gsungs/ /phung po skye mched khams rnams ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rgyas btab pa'o/ /des ni rtag par rgya dgod pa/ /dkyil 'khor zhes ni
bstan pa yin/ /lcags kyu dbyig to rtse gsum dang / /ral gri mtshams su rnam par dgod/ /'dod rgyal dbyig sngon stobs mi g.yo/ /steng du 'khor lo 'og gnod mdzes/ /rig rgyal rdo rje can rnams

kyi/ /'khor los sgyur ba drug gi rgya/ /sa la sogs pa sems dpa' yi/ /phyag rgya rang gi dkyil 'khor pa/ /me long pi bang dung dang ni/ /de bzhin snod dang sna tshogs ras/ /chos 'byung ba yi phyag rgya drug /
rdo rje'i bdag po rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /khro rgyal rnams kyis rgyas gdab bo/ /de nas gzhan yang dpa' bo gcig /rigs ni kha dog dag gis brtag /lha mo
dgu dang nam mkha'i khams/ /me tog ces ni bshad pa yin/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/ /rigs kyi rim gyis dgod par bya/ /mchod rten sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /bzhugs gnas pho brang
yin par bshad/ /ye shes sems dpas gang reg pa/ /ye shes 'khor lo zhes bshad do/ /mi 'gyur rdo rje gsum yi ge/ /sa bon yi ge gnas zhes bshad/ /sku gsung thugs kyi de nyid ni/ /sad

par byas pas bskul bar bshad/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams su/ /'od zer 'gyed pa gtong ba'o/ /rdo rje can kun spyan 'dren pas/ /rdo rje can kun spyan drang ba'o/ /rdo rje can gyi gnas de yi/ /'od

zer gyis ni rdo rje kun/ /bsdus nas gong bu'i tshul gyis su/ /bcings pa bcing ba yin par bshad/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /sku gsung thugs ni rgyas btab ste/ /
ri mo'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/ /dbang bskur dbye ba rnam gsum du/ /rgyud 'di la ni rab tu brtag /bum pa'i dbang bskur dang po ste/ /gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba/ /shes rab ye shes gsum
pa ste/ /bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no/ /mig yangs sngags kyi snod du rung / /me tog bcas shing sa bon byung / /blangs nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba/ /sngags pas slob ma dag la sbyin/ /nam mkha'i

dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /dri chu rkang dang yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje pad ma'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje can kun yang dag bsdu/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /de dag thams cad snying gar bsdu/ /rdo rje'i lam
nas byung nas su/ /slob ma'i khar ni dbab par bya/ /'di ni gsang sngags de kun gyi/ /dbang bskur ba yi go 'phang mchog /las mchog gi ni tshogs rnams dang / /gsang sngags thams cad 'grub
par 'gyur/ /mchog tu dad cing shes rab che/ /gzugs bzang sgrub pa po la dga'/ /sbyor ba gcig gis bya ba goms/ /dam tshig dag gi dam tshig can/ /bla ma la ni slob ma yis/ /yon rnams
rab tu phul nas ni/ /bla mas de ni byin brlabs te/ /sgrub pa po la sbyin par bya/ /rmongs pas gti mug bdag nyid sbyor/ /gti mug dga' dang yang dag ldan/ /gti mug rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/ /gti

mug rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur/ /zhe sdang sdang ba'i bdag nyid sbyor/ /zhe sdang dga' dang yang dag ldan/ /zhe sdang rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/ /zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur/ /chags pas 'dod chags bdag nyid
sbyor/ /'dod chags dga' dang yang dag ldan/ /'dod chags rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/ /'dod chags rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur/ /shes rab ye shes bdag nyid sbyor/ /rdo rje dga' dang yang dag ldan/ /
ye shes rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/ /shes rab ye shes bdag nyid 'gyur/ /rig pa'i lha mo de nyid ni/ /rdo rje can gyi slob mas blang / /lag par lag pa bzhag nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang byas
la/ /slob ma'i mgo bor lag bzhag ste/ /bla ma rdo rje can gyis bsgo/ /thabs gzhan gyis ni 'tshang mi rgya/ /de bas rig pa 'di mchog yin/ /chos kun gnyis su med pa la/ /dngos po gnyis su btags pa
yin/ /de bas 'khor ba rnam bral bar/ /rtag tu khyod kyis mi bya'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla med pa'o/ /rmongs pa gang zhig 'das gyur na/ /de yi dngos grub mchog
mi 'gyur/ /thal mal lus kyi chos la ni/ /dri ma lnga rnams snang ba ni/ /ye shes lnga yis byin brlabs pas/ /bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya bar bshad/ /sbyar dang de bzhin bsreg pa dang / /snang bar byed
dang gzugs snang ba/ /sngags kyi lus su rab sbyor bas/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' bar bya/ /rdo rje hU~M las byung ba ni/ /bar snang la gnas bsam par bya/ /A las byung ba'i pad ma ni/ /de yi
'og tu bsgom par bya/ /oM gyis mtshan pa'i bdud rtsi ni/ /de yi dbus su gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje'i pad ma mnyam sbyor ba/ /'bar bas rnal 'byor tshim par bya/ /shel dang mtshungs par snang
gyur cing / /ye shes nyi ma gnyis par gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi/ /mtshon cha mchog gis drang nas ni/ /bdud rtsi de ru phab nas kyang / /bza' ba'i sbyor bas bza'
bar bya/ /bsgrub bya'i dngos grub cho ga yis/ /de bzhin dpa' bo lnga rnams bza'/ /yig gsum sa bon las bskyed bya/ /gzhan du de ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /mi snang la sogs dngos grub ni/ /
tha mal pa zhes bshad pa yin/ /sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub sangs rgyas kyis/ /dngos grub mchog ces gsungs pa yin/ /thabs ni rnam pa bzhi po dag /byang chub rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /
rnal 'byor rgyud ni thams cad du/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rtag par sngags/ /bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang po ste/ /nye bar sgrub pa gnyis pa yin/ /sgrub pa yang ni gsum pa ste/ /sgrub pa chen po
bzhi pa'o/ /thun mong mchog gi bye brag gis/ /bsnyen pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur/ /rdo rje bzhi po thun mong ste/ /ye shes bdud rtsi mchog yin no/ /dang po stong nyid byang chub ste/ /gnyis pa
sa bon bsdus pa yin/ /gsum pa gzugs ni rdzogs pa ste/ /bzhi pa yi ge dgod pa'o/ /rdo rje rnam bzhi 'di dag gis/ /tha mal sgrub la bsnyen pa bya/ /mchog gi ye shes bdud rtsi
nyid/ /sbyor ba drug gi bya ba yi/ /bsnyen pa yan lag drug gis ni/ /byas pas sgrub pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /gzhan du sgrubs par gyur na ni/ /so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang / /srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin
pa dang / /rjes su dran dang ting 'dzin te/ /sbyor ba'i yan lag drug tu bshad/ /dbang po bcu po rnams kyi yang / /rang gi 'jug gnas thams cad du/ /'dod pa so sor sdus pas na/ /so sor sdud pa
zhes bshad do/ /'dod pa lnga ni mdor bsdus nas/ /sangs rgyas lnga ru sbyor ba yis/ /brtag pa bsam gtan zhes bshad de/ /bsam gtan de ni rnam lngar 'gyur/ /rtog dang dpyod
dang dga' ba dang / /de bzhin bde ba nyid dang yang / /sems kyi rtse gcig nyid dag ste/ /lnga po der ni bsam gtan bsdu/ /gsang ba'i rgyud ni thams cad du/ /rnam pa du mar yongs

bshad pa/ /gsang ba gsum 'byung rtog pa ste/ /de yi longs spyod byed pa'o/ /dga' dang 'dra ba gsum pa ste/ /bde ba bsdus pa bzhi pa'o/ /shes dang shes bya byung zad pa'i/ /rang sems lnga par shes par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos

zhi ba ni/ /'dod pa kun la rab tu gnas/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs/ /'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid/ /gong bu'i gzugs kyi phyung nas ni/ /sna yi rtse mor rab tu brtag /rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa/ /srog dang rtsol ba zhes byar bshad/ /

rang sngags snying gar bsam nas ni/ /srog ni thig ler gyur par bzhag /rang dbang rin chen dag pa yin/ /gzung ba 'dzin pa yin par bshad/ /sems ni 'gog pa'i rdo rjer gyur/ /mtshan mar nyer 'dzin 'byung bar 'gyur/ /

mtshan ma'i khams ni rnam pa lngar/ /byang chub rdo rjes gsungs pa yin/ /smig rgyu 'dra ba dang po ste/ /du ba lta bu gnyis pa yin/ /mkha' snang 'dra ba gsum pa ste/ /mar me ltar 'bar bzhi pa'o/ /sprin med nam mkha' lta

bur ni/ /rtag tu snang ba lnga pa'o/ /brtan gyur rdo rje'i lam nas ni/ /nam mkha'i khams su spro bar bya/ /rjes dran gang zhig rnam bsgom pa/ /de dang 'dra bar spro bar bya/ /rjes su dran pa zhes bshad de/ /so sor snang ba de la skye/ /
thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pas/ /dngos po thams cad mdor bsdus pa/ /gong bu'i tshul gyis bsdus nas ni/ /dbus su gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/ /yud kyis ye shes rdzogs byed pa/ /ting nge 'dzin ces bya
bar gnas/ /so sor sdud la snyoms 'jug na/ /sngags rnams thams cad byin gyis brlob/ /bsam gtan ye shes snyoms 'jug na/ /mngon shes lnga po 'thob par 'gyur/ /srog dang rtsol bas nges

par ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gzigs/ /rtag tu 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'byung / /rjes dran mnyam par sbyor ba yis/ /nor gyi dkyil 'khor 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin dbang

gyur tsam gyis ni/ /sgrib pa rnams dang bral bar 'gyur/ /snying po de ni thugs ka ru/ /zla ba rdo rje'i sbyor bas blta/ /mtshon cha mchog gis drangs nas ni/ /sems ni sngags kyi dngos byas te/ /sngags kyi gzugs kyi tshul gyis

ni/ /byang chub tshigs bcad brjod par bya/ /cho ga yang dag sbyor bsgom pas/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ /sems de ye shes gzugs kyis ni/ /bsgom pa nye bar bsgrub pa'o/ /ji srid mthong ba de srid du/ /rnam

gnyis zla ba drug tu bsgom/ /'dod pa kun la longs spyod pas/ /thams cad du ni rtag tu bya/ /gal te zla ba drug gis ni/ /ji skad gsungs pa ma mthong na/ /ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga dang / /sdom pa lan gsum brtsam par

bya/ /de ltar byas kyang sgrub pa pos/ /mthong ba 'byung bar ma gyur cing / /gang tshe bya ba ma grub na/ /drag shul sbyor bas bsgrub par bya/ /de tshe de yi ye shes ni/ /'grub pa nges par nye bar 'byung / /rigs kyi dbye ba'i sbyor

bas ni/ /rdo rje phur bus phur bu gdab/ /de nas dbang du bya ba dang / /bsrung ba'i sbyor ba dag kyang bya/ /'dod chags chen po'i tshul nyid kyis/ /ye shes 'khor lo can rnams bsdu/ /lha mo dgu ni spros nas su/ /bsgrub par

bya ba'i lus la dgod/ /yongs su gyur las phyag rgya bzhi/ /dkyil 'khor der ni rtag par bya/ /bdag nyid dbus su gnas byas la/ /'khor lo can kun bsdu bar bya/ /thams cad rdo rje'i dngos byas la/ /de 'og byang chub
bsgom par bya/ /bskul ba'i glu dbyangs bzhi yis ni/ /lha mos snying po bskul ba yis/ /dus gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhin sems/ /
ye shes lta bur lus bsgoms mo/ /dregs

pas kha dog rnam par dbye/ /de bzhin nyams kyis snying po ste/ /dbang bskur bas ni rang gi rgyu/ /gzhi yis 'bras bu phye ba yin/ /sngags kyis chos ni byed 'gyur la/ /rig pa'ang chos kyi phyag rgyas so/ /
'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po drug /gtsug gtor zhes ni rnam par grags/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po longs spyod bzhi/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo zhes byar grags/ /de bzhin rdo rje'i bdag po rnams/ /'dod pa thams cad
ces byar bshad/ /bsam gtan rdo rje thams cad la/ /dbang bskur ba ni rab tu bsngags/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /ye shes lus dang lhan cig tu/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /gnyis su med
par byed sgrub pa/ /sngar bshad pa yi rim gyis ni/ /rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje can/ /bdag dang 'dra bar dkyil 'khor bskyed/ /bsgrub pa chen po zhes bshad do/ /bsnyen pa'i dus su gtsug tor che/ /
sbyor ba nyid kyis gzugs su dmigs/ /nye bar sgrub pa'i dus su ni/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i gzugs kyi bar/ /sngags pa cho ga shes pa yis/ /sgrub pa rang lha'i sbyor bas bya/ /sgrub pa chen po'i dus

su ni/ /gtso bo sangs rgyas bdag po'i sku/ /'di ni rdo rje can kun dang / /rnal 'byor mchog gi gsang ba che/ /de lta'i rnam phyes shes byas nas/ /dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /gzhan du bskal pa

bye bas ni/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa rnams kyis kyang / /dngos grub mchog ni zhi ba dag /nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bsgrub bya bsgrub par yang dag sbyor/ /gang yin de ni bsnyen par bshad/ /rdo rje

pad ma mnyam sbyor ba/ /nye bar sgrub pa zhes bshad do/ /yi ge hU~M dang phaT ldan pa/ /bskyed pa sgrub pa zhes bshad pa/ /ngo bo nyid ni zhi bde ba/ /sgrub pa chen po zhes bshad do/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas
kun gyi bdag /rdo rje 'chang ba chen po'i gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs las byung / /de nyid chos rnams chos nyid do/ /las dang rjes 'thun gang gang gis/ /rnal 'byor pa yis sbyor ba
dmigs/ /dkyil 'khor de dang de bskyed nas/ /dam tshig mi zad bsgo bar bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /dam tshig dang po bsrung bar bya/ /de nas gtsug tor dam tshig ni/ /cho ga ji skad gsungs
las byung / /las dang gang gang rjes mthun pas/ /rang gi 'khor la bka' yang bsgo/ /bsgrub bya'i lus gang yin pa la'ang / /dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgoms nas su/ /de yi lus gnas 'khor
lo la/ /de yi nyes pa bsgrag par bya/ /de nas de rnams des bcom nas/ /byung bar gyur pa rnam par bsgom/ /dngos po kun gyis rnam bsgoms nas/ /dngos po kun gyis drangs nas ni/ /de ni rang
gi 'khor lor gzhug /ji skad gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis/ /de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/ /khro bas khyab pa'i sems kyis ni/ /rkang pas mtshan ma gnon par bya/ /de nas bka'

mnos khro bo ni/ /sna tshogs tshogs kyis bskor ba rnams/ /sgrub pa rdo rje can gyis ni/ /bsgrub bya gsang phyir gtang bar bya/ /khro bo'i rgyal po des bskor nas/ /de ni bcing zhing brdeg pa dang / /de nas gdungs
shing skrag gyur pa/ /sgrub pa pos ni dgug par bya/ /rdo rje gsum gyi sngags kyis ni/ /de yi gzugs brnyan la phab nas/ /sngags pas rdo rje dag gis ni/ /spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga ru/ /phur ba'i
sngags kyis phur bu gdab/ /yams dang nye bar 'tshe ba kun/ /sna tshogs yul las byung ba rnams/ /gzugs de la ni phab nas su/ /de rnams kyis ni phur bus gdab/ /de nas sbyor ba thams cad kyis/ /
cho ga ji skad gsungs pa bzhin/ /'khrul 'khor sngags kyi sbyor la sogs/ /las kyi dbye bas sbyar bar bya/ /mtshan ma mnan nas bzlas pa'am/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg
gam/ /bsgom pas gdug pa'i sems can gyis/ /zos par gyur par rab tu brtag /zhi la zhi ba'i sems kyis bya/ /rgyas la dga' ba'i yid kyis te/ /dbang la chags pa'i yid du bya/ /khro la
gtum pas rab tu bsgrub ces pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyi the tshom thams
cad bcad par mdzad nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la bzhugs par rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis dmigs
nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis
bstod do/ /thams cad sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad gsung la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /thams cad thugs khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi/ /
sku gsung thugs ni thob 'gyur bas/ /sems can sangs rgyas mi mnyam mnyam/ /bsgrub bya su yin sgrub po gang / /sgrub pa'i dbang po bdag nyid che/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gsod pa yis/ /ji ltar sdig
pas gos mi 'gyur/ /gal te gos 'gyur 'bras bu gang / /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la legs so legs
so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems dpa' chen po legs so legs/ /bdag nyid chen po legs so legs/ /gsung dbyangs chen po legs so legs/ /mchod pa chen po legs so legs/ /slob dpon byang
chub rdo rje can/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag /dngos rnams thams cad sgyu ma bzhin/ /skyed dang sdud par mdzad pa po/ /des na de yi sdig mi 'gyur/ /bsod nams dag kyang de bzhin no/ /gang

la sdig dang bsod nams med/ /de ni byang chub yin par gsungs/ /mgon po de yi slu ba yis/ /lus can thams cad 'jig mdzad kyang / /ngan 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur zhing / /byang chub kyang ni rnyed mi dka'/ /
sngon ni mi bzad las byas pas/ /gal te dmyal ba rnams su ni/ /skye bo skye 'gyur de rnams kyi/ /dmyal ba rnams kyi 'bras bu che/ /byang chub rdo rjes sgrub bya 'di/ /ye shes kyis ni rgyas btab pas/ /
sems can rnams la sbyor ba des/ /mchog tu phan btags shes par bya/ /tshar gcod pa dang rjes bzung las/ /bdag nyid chen po de yis bya/ /sgrub pa chen po'i mthar thug par/ /byas nas
las rnams brtsam par bya/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams rdo rje can thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i tshul gyi chos thos pas dga' zhing rab tu dga' la
'gu ba'i yid kyis legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/ mgon po chen po legs so legs/ /thub pa chen po legs so legs/ /chos rnams chen po legs so legs/ /thugs rje chen
po legs so legs/ /e ma'o kun tu bzang po yi/ /thugs rje chen po dri ma med/ /gdug pa'i mi bzad las kyis kyang / /sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu stsol/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de
dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur

ba'i gsang ba 'dus par dbang bskur ba'i sngags pas 'jigs par mi bya zhing / /skrag par mi bya/ dngang bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub rdo rje las byung ba/ /zhe sdang rdo rje che la sogs/ /
sngags kyi rgyun ni bsdus pa dag /yongs su spang bar mi bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la mgrin gcig tu
tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do/ /dus gsum rdo rje'i thugs yin srid dang thar gyur gang / /zhi zhing sgrib med nam mkha' dag pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /sangs rgyas rnam rgyas byang chub dbang phyug

rdo rje can/ /de la lus ngag yid kyis rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes 'du byed dang / /rnam par shes dang skye mched drug dang dbang po drug /sa chu me dang rlung dang nam
mkha' thams cad ni/ /byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gti mug nyes pa 'dod chags rdo rje chos bcas gang / /rig pa'i sbyor ba las byung rtag tu rab 'brel bar/ /rnam pa sna tshogs
dga' bas myos pa'i dngos gyur pa/ /byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spro dang dga' dang rnam pa de bzhin mi 'gyur dang / /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin sems su rjes gtogs
chos/ /rmongs dang zhe sdang 'dod chags sgrib pa rdo rje ste/ /byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig thog med dngos po rnam dag 'di bsgom pa/ /thabs dang shes rab las byung

spros dang rnam par bral/ /gsang ba'i dbang bskur brtul zhugs dam tshig sbyor ba brtag /byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal/ /gang zhig dngos grub mchog gi thabs ni 'di sgom zhing / /

bsnyen pa'i cho ga nye bar sgrub dang sgrub pa dang / /sgrub pa chen pos blo mi 'gyur ba'i sgrub dbang po/ /byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal/ /gang zhig thun bzhi'i rdo rje dag ni sgrub byed pa/ /

mi snang la sogs sna tshogs mchog dang dman grub cing / /bla ma'i drin gyis 'di na ma nor lam rtogs pa/ /byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal/ /gang zhig rab gsang 'dus pa'i rgyud 'di
nyan pa dang / /'don par byed dang klog pa dang ni sems pa dang / /mchod pa byed pa dang ni 'dri'am 'brir 'jug pa/ /byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal/ /gang du zhi sogs las

tshogs shin tu brtags pa yis/ /'khrul 'khor sngags kyi cho ga de bzhin rgyas 'debs pa'i/ /sgrub bya 'di dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa'i dbang po ni/ /byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal/ /gang gis
gtso bo sgrub pa po mthong reg pa dang / /legs par dran dang ming tsam nges par thos pa dang / /dad par byed cing phyogs gcig tsam zhig 'dzin pa dag /byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag
phyag 'tshal/ /bstod pa'i tshig ni zhi ba 'dis/ /'dren pa kun la bstod pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mchod chen la/ /mgon po de dag rjes yi rang / /'dus pa gsang ba las byung ba/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /rgyud kun bdag po'i dbang po yis/ /rgyud 'di legs par gsungs pa yin/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / byang chub
sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis de skad ces gsungs nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la bzhugs te/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rang
gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la dmigs te cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba chen po gsang ba 'dus pa las gsang

ba thams cad ston pa rdo rje'i ye shes kyis byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po a tsAr+ya shrad d+hA ka ra war+m+ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA
ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur te gtan la phab pa/ /ltag lung rgyud 'bum la bstun pa'i thang chen pa dang rgyal mtshan ring mo zhus dag grub/ /
@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra mA la a b+hi dA na ma hA yo ga tan tra sarba tan tra hri da ya ra ha s+ya bi ka Ta~M i ti/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par
brjod pa rgyud thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la tshad med pa'i phyag rgya chen pos mngon par rtogs pas bzhugs te/ dpag tu med
pa'i rdo rje'i rigs dang 'brel ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang thabs gcig tu thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po mngon par rtogs pa mngon du bya ba la bzhugs
pa/ gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po nyams su myong bas dgyes pas mchog tu pad ma dgyes pa/ chos thams cad kyang ji lta ba bzhin nyams su myong ba mthong bas rnam par mi
rtog pa'i ye shes kyi de kho na nyid la mngon du phyogs pa/ rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dam tshig bla na med pa'i dbang du gyur pa la rab tu mkhas pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po dam tshig rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe sdang rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chags pa rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

rdo rje las dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu rdo rje dang / byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rlung rdo rje dang / de lta bu rnams gtso bor gyur pa dam tshig chen po'i rigs
dang 'brel ba byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis dang / gzhan yang rigs chen po dang 'brel pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la ni 'di
lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' rnam par rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i gtsug tor dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshams rnams
kyis nges par grol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rdo rje blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po rdo rje dam tshig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje longs spyod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po rdo rje spyi bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i spyin
gtsug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i dam tshig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sna tshogs dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rje dang / gzhan yang dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje'i theg pas lhag par
grol ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de yang chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa shin du yongs su
mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa de 'khor la zhal rab tu 'dzum par bcas pas bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po'i 'khor rgya chen po rnams la gzigs nas/ de dag snod du rung bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje phreng ba mngon par byang chub pa'i rdo rje theg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
nas/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po bkye ste bzhugs so/ /'od zer gyi dra ba chen po des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la reg pas mchog tu dga'
ba thob pa ni gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po ji lta ba bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag nyid dga' ba dang bde ba dang
mchog tu mgu ba skyes nas brgyal bar gyur to/ /de nas yang de'i dus su bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spur 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po bsdus par gyur to/ /bsdus pa de yang rdo rje'i lam nas lcags

kyu'i rnam pa can gyi 'od zer chen po nye bar phyung bar gyur pa des brgyal ba de dag la reg nas rdo rje phreng ba lta bu nyid rdo rje'i lam nas gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo la zhugs nas gnas so/ /slar yang

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag bde ba chen po rjes su myong bar gyur te/ rdo rje'i yi ge hU~M brjod pa de nyid kyis bde ba chen po de nyid nyams su myong ba nyid kyi thugs ka'i lte ba'i
rtsa sbubs nas 'od zer chen po phyung ste rang rang gi stan la 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas de rnams chu'i gting nas 'thon pa lta bur sems dga' ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo mtshar chen po'i cho
'phrul mthong nas shin tu mig gdangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs gcig gis yang dag par bstod do/ /bcom ldan ro gcig gyur pa yi/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas rgyas/ /bcom ldan mchog
tu ngal bso kye/ /ngag gi lam gyi spyod yul 'das/ /bcom ldan nyid kyi dgyes nyams ltar/ /'gro ba gsum po yang dag bde/ /e ma'o lhan cig skyes bdud rtsi/ /ro bsten thugs rje chen po skye/ /
bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi/ /sems can don kun gsal bar mdzad/ /de nyid gsum gyi ro gcig pa/ /phyag rgya chen po rab dbye ba/ /bcom ldan rnal 'byor che la dgyes/ /'ching ba
thams cad gcod mdzad kyi/ /bcom ldan dgyes pa cher mdzad cing / /'gro ba skal bzang nges par mdzad/ /e ma'o rdo rje theg pa bde/ /rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba stsol/ /e ma'o sngags ni rab rgyas
pa/ /rang byung go 'phang sgrub pa po/ /e ma'o shin tu zab mo'i chos/ /dmigs pa med par ston par mdzad/ /e ma'o rdo rje 'chang chen gtso/ /gsang ba'i bdag po shin tu gsang / /e ma'o mchog
tu byang chub pa/ /e ma'o spros pa rnam spangs shing / /bden pa'i don ni gsal mdzad pa/ /theg pa'i sgron mas snang bar mdzad/ /mgon po bdag cag khyed drin gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang thob/ /
mgon po bdag cag lam log zhugs/ /khyed gyis yang dag lam la bkod/ /mgon po bdag cag mun par 'thoms/ /ye shes snang ba thob par mdzad/ /dam tshig rdo rje nyi ma
kyai/ /phyag rgya chen po'i don ston mdzad/ /bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thugs rje'i phyag rgya che bdag nyid/ /phyag 'tshal gnyis med dga' ba'i mkha'/ /dga' ba'i zla ba khyed la 'dud/ /
ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa mdzad nas slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ rdo rje'i phreng ba mngon par brjod pa zhes bya ba shin tu phra ba'i sa ji lta
ba'i ngo bo 'dri bar 'dod nas yid la byed pa gcig pa dang / sems rtse gcig gis dga' bar byed pa'i gsung nyan par 'dod nas ba spu ldang ba dang dbugs g.yo ba dang bcas pas yang dang yang
du bcom ldan 'das la phyag byed cing rang gi stan la 'khod nas sems re dogs dang bcas pas gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi de lta bu'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis
mkhyen nas slar yang rdo rje phreng ba mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang ba'i rdo rje las rang gi rig ma 'phyung ste/ sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang
ldan pa bdag nyid kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs spangs nas sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i gzugs blangs nas rang rang gi rig ma la 'khyud de/ phyag rgya chen po'i
rnal 'byor la rjes su zhugs nas/ slar yang de dag de lta bu'i gzugs nyid du mthong ste ngo mtshar skyes nas mig gdangs te ri mo'i bkod pa lta bur mthong ba nyid kyis ci yang mi smra bar
gyur pas de la 'khor rnams yang dag par 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rang gi rig ma yang dag par bskul te/ phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor dor nas nyid kyi sku gsung
thugs rdo rje las rdo rje btsun mo rdo rje rigs kyi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM AHhU~M/ de nas de skad du gsungs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i bu' ga las de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad dang / rig ma dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo'i rgyal po rnams phyung bar gyur to/ /phyung nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su rang rang gi stan la gnas par gyur te/ kha
cig ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs kyis so/ /kha cig ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gzugs kyis so/ /kha cig ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i gzugs kyis so/ /ji srid gnod mdzes rgyal po
dang gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bar gyis gzugs kyis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das cung zad cig ci yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de
dag thams cad kyis dbyangs cig gis ched du brjod nas smras pa ni/ e ma'o rdo rje rigs chen po/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i don ston mdzad/ /e ma'o rdo rje theg gsal ba/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi
don ston mdzad/ /ces lan gsum brjod nas de dag gis rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de la byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rgya chen po 'dus pa de dag mthong nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
ye shes rdor dbang phyug /gsang ba'i pad ma'i nang bzhugs pa/ /dam tshig chen po'i rnal 'byor dbang / /thugs rjes bdag gi tshig gson cig /bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas
rnams/ /rdo rje theg pa mngon 'dod pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /'di dag lus kyis phyag 'tshal 'khod/ /snyigs ma lnga yi dus na ni/ /ma 'ongs pa yi sems can rnams/ /brtson 'grus

chung zhing bsod nams chung / /lta ba ngan pa mang po dang / /tshe thung ba yi sems can rnams/ /go 'phang mchog ni thob cing zhu/ /rgyal ba'i sras ni de dag dang / /ma 'ongs pa yi sems can rnams/ /'khor
ba las ni pha rol du/ /gang gis myur du thar bar 'gyur/ /gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen la/ /'di ltar bdag ni gsol ba 'debs/ /'gro ba'i gtso bo khyod drin gyis/ /de nyid mchog ni bdag gis 'tshal/ /
sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba yi/ /rgyud rnams kun gyi don bsdus pa/ /bla na med pa'i rim pa gnyis/ /rdo rje phreng ba mngon rtogs pa/ /cung zad 'dri bar 'tshal lags kyis/ /rdzogs pa'i rim
pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /khyod kyis bdag la bstan du gsol/ /dpal ldan 'dus par brda tsam gang / /rnal 'byor bla na med rgyud du/ /thub pa chen pos chos phung po/ /brgyad khri dang ni bzhi stong
ngo / /de skad smras nas mdun 'dug ste/ /lus kyis phyag ni byas nas kyang / /ye shes chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'gro ba'i bla/ /rdo rje gsum ni ro gcig don/ /de nyid gsum gyi

go 'phang ston/ /rnal 'byor rgyud kyi sbas pa'i don/ /bdag la bstan par mdzad du gsol/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i ming ni ci/ /'dus pa ci zhig stong ba ci/ /thig le'i dbye ba dang ni sgra/ /gsang ba dang ni

dam tshig dang / /sdom pa dang ni sgra tsam dang / /rlung gi de nyid bde chen ci/ /rdo rje pad mo mnyam sbyor dang / /sngags kyi de nyid rnal 'byor pa/ /rlung rnams dang ni 'khor lo dang / /grangs ni ci tsam gang
du gnas/ /rnal 'byor lus la rtsa gang lags/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sogs skad cig /dga' ba bzhi dang rdzas dang ni/ /sngags dang rlung dang thig le dang / /yi ge gsum gang de nyid gsum/ /
de bzhin sna yi rtse mo gsum/ /lus kyi stong nyid ye shes dang / /lha rnams kyang ni ji ltar gnas/ /de rnams kyi ni ming ni ci/ /'char ba dang ni nub pa ci/ /mgon po dga' rnams ji ltar ni/ /
yang dag skye ba gsal bar gsungs/ /sngar bshad rtsa rnams rtag tu ni/ /rdo rje'i lus la ji ltar rgyu/ /mtshams kyi rtsa gsum de dag ni/ /gtso bo ru ni ji ltar gsungs/ /rlung rnams ji ltar
ldang ba dang / /gtso bo de rnams ji ltar thim/ /de ni mkha' 'gro mar sdud pa/ /gtso bo ji ltar yang dag 'thob/ /rnam rtog rlung ni rab bcad nas/ /rnam rtog med par ji ltar 'char/ /rtsa rnams

ji ltar nub pa dang / /sbyor ba drug gis ji ltar rtsom/ /dus kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu/ /gsang ba'i yang ni 'bras bu ci/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje dang / /rigs kyi dbye ba ji lta bu/ /phyag rgya'i dbye

ba ji tsam zhig /phung po la sogs skye mched dang / /phyag rgya chen po'i ming ni ci/ /ro rnams kyi ni dbye ba dang / /bdag gi sgra ni gang la gnas/ /stong nyid dbye ba bsdus pa dang / /stong pa nyid ni
gang du skye/ /nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo gang / /A li kA li brda dang ni/ /mtshams kyi 'char ba ji lta bu/ /rgyud gsungs sngon ni bsnyems pa sogs/ /cho ga nyi shu'i las dang ni/ /rgyu mtshan ci
zhig 'bras bu'ang ci/ /mchod pa'i cho ga ji ltar gsungs/ /de bzhin lha mo'i rang bzhin dang / /lha mo'i ming ni ji ltar gsungs/ /rgyud du thog mar gsungs pa yi/ /'di skad bdag sogs

ji lta bu/ /'di skad ces sogs dang po'i ngag /don rgyas par ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /nang gi bdag nyid sbyin bsreg ci/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' ba dang / /rnal 'byor ma tshogs 'dus pa dang / /de bzhin gsang ba'i

brda dang ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni ji ltar gsungs/ /sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun gyi/ /ming rnams bshad pa ji lta bu/ /bla ma ston pa slob dpon dang / /rdo rje 'chang ni

bshad pa ci/ /slob ma'i yon tan gang ldan na/ /rnal 'byor rgyud kyi snod du 'gyur/ /de yi spyod pa'i dbye ba du/ /de yi 'bras bu ji lta bu/ /zhi ba rgyas pa dbang dang ni/ /de bzhin bsad dang bskrad pa dang / /

rengs par byed pa nyid dang ni/ /ji ltar bsgrub par sbyor ba dang / /bsgrub bya la ni mngon spyod dang / /sngags kyi tshig ni ci zhig dang / /mgon po khro bo'i bzlas pa ci/ /dngos grub brgyad ni thob pa dang / /mngon
shes lnga ni ji ltar thob/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyis de nyid mthong / /skad cig gcig la mngon byang chub/ /lus brtan pa dang rgas pa med/ /bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba dang / /gser 'gyur sogs

kyi sbyor ba dang / /rdo rje'i phyag rgya dngos grub che/ /'gro ba'i bla ma ji ltar 'thob/ /lus kyi rang bzhin gzhal yas khang / /de ni rang bzhin ji lta bu/ /'dis ni gnas sogs ji ltar gnas/ /thim dang
longs spyod bdag po dang / /rlung ni gang gi mtshan nyid ci/ /de dag 'jig par ji ltar 'gyur/ /de ltar dri tshig rdzogs pa dang / /lag na rdo rje thal sbyar te/ /'gro ba'i bla ma'i mdun 'dug nas/ /lus
kyis phyag byas de nas ni/ /gtso bos rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /legs so bya ba byin nas ni/ /tshangs dbyangs zab mo snyan pa yis/ /'gro ba'i mgon pos gsungs pa yin/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i
rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las gsol ba gdab pa dang dri ba dang / slob ma'i las nyid la sogs pa rgyud kyi gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// //
de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /de nyid gsung gis 'gro mgon gyis/ /lag na rdo rje la bos te/ /yang dag dris pa nges bshad pa/ /snying po'i don ni don bsdus pa/ /dbye bar dka' ba'i
dngos po kun/ /khyod kyis dri bar byas pa rnams/ /rdo rje dbang phyug gsang chen bdag /bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud rnams dang / /rnal 'byor rgyud ni gang du yang / /mchog tu gsang ba ma gsungs pa/ /rdo
rje'i dbang phyug de nyid mchog /dris pa'i lan rnams gsal por ni/ /nges par nga yis rab bshad bya/ /skad cig gis ni spyan phye la/ /mchog tu rmad byung ston mdzad la/ /thugs rjes khyab pas
de skad gsungs/ /de phyir khyod ni legs par nyon/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rjes thugs brlan cing the tshom thams cad gcod pa la phyag na rdo rjes gsol ba btab ste mchog tu gsang
ba'i tshig gis bshad pa gsungs pa ni/ dbang bskur ba ni gtso bo ste/ /dngos grub thams cad rtag tu gnas/ /nga yis ji bzhin don bshad kyis/ /de phyir thog mar yang dag nyon/ /
thog mar slob ma gang gi tshe/ /blo ldan yang dag dbang bskur na/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /de yi tshe na snod du 'gyur/ /yang dag dbang bskur gyis dben na/ /sgrub pos rgyud kyi don
shes kyang / /slob dpon slob mar mtshungs par ni/ /mi bzad dmyal ba chen por 'gro/ /de phyir yang dag bla ma ni/ /rab tu gus pas bsnyen bkur bya/ /dbang bskur thob cing de nyid

shes/ /blo ldan snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /zab cing rgya che dri ma med/ /gnod dang 'tshe ba rnam par spangs/ /skal bzang lus ni rdzogs pa dang / /mtshan dang dpe byad rnam par brgyan/ /chags pa che
la gcig tu dga'/ /yul la phrag dog rnam par spangs/ /bag yod rtag tu dga' ba dang / /rnal 'byor ma yi mngal nas skyes/ /rdo rje theg pa gcig tu mos/ /theg pa dman la rgyab kyis
phyogs/ /de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan/ /bla ma slob mas bsnyen bkur bya/ /yang dag bla ma rnyen nas ni/ /slob ma'i rang bzhin dri ma rnams/ /dag dang rtogs dang smin byas nas/ /
ji bzhin ye shes bzang dang ldan/ /ji ltar rin chen bdar ba dang / /gser ni bsregs dang bcad pas brtag /de bzhin du ni slob ma yang / /lo ni bcu gnyis bar du brtag /de phyir phan
tshun de lta bus/ /dus kun du ni de ltar brtag /gzhan du bgegs ni 'byung 'gyur te/ /dngos grub 'joms shing sdug bsngal ster/ /dug ni sngags kyis 'joms pa bzhin/ /sngags kyi dag
byas bcud len byed/ /de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /sngags kyi slob ma rtogs byas nas/ /bla ma dbang bskur la sogs kyis/ /dngos grub phyir ni ji lta'i don/ /de phyir dbang bskur
slob ma ni/ /ma dag pa yang dag par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen la/ /de la lag na rdo rjes zhus/ /dbang bskur ji ltar rgyud du ni/ /gtso bo ru ni gsungs pa lags/ /rdo rje
sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen/ /the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa/ /de kho na nyid mkhyen pas ni/ /lag na rdo rje la gsungs pa/ /don de ji lta ba bzhin du/ /nga yis yang dag

bshad kyis nyon/ /dbang bskur ba yi dbye ba ni/ /dang po'i dbang ni gtso bo ste/ /gnyis pa gsang ba'i ming can no/ /gsum pa kun nas sbyor ba ste/ /bzhi pa'i don ni dam pa'o/ /gtso bo dbye ba bcu gcig ste/ /bcu

gnyis pa ni gsang ba'o/ /bcu gsum pa ni yang dag sbyor/ /bcu bzhi pa ni don dam ste/ /dbang bskur re re sa re'o/ /rnam pa gsum ni rgyu yi dbang / /bzhi pa 'bras bur shes par bya/ /dga' ba la sogs rim pa

yis/ /thams cad la ni nga yis khyab/ /mar ngo yi ni tshes gsum dang / /de bzhin tshes bcu tshes bcu bzhi/ /yon tan bzang ldan slob ma la/ /bla mas cho ga bzhin dbang bskur/ /lus phra lo ni bcu drug lon/ /

gzugs dang skal ba dag gis brgyan/ /sngo bsangs mig ni yangs pa dang / /snying rje'i bsam ldan yang dag mos/ /dge snyan dbang bskur thob pa dang / /rnal 'byor rgyud la lhag par mos/ /yang na lo ni nyi shu
lon/ /nyams dga' bde bar byed pa ste/ /de las lhag par skal med 'gyur/ /de ni dngos grub ring du byed/ /lhag par 'jam pa'i bu mo la/ /chung ma'am yang na sring mo 'am/ /yang na bu mo'am dad
pa yis/ /bla ma la ni dbul bar bya/ /gser dang rin chen gos dang ni/ /mu tig phreng ba sna tshogs pas/ /mchod nas bla ma'i mdun 'dug nas/ /slob ma yis ni 'di skad brjod/ /deng nas brtsams
te bdag bran du/ /gtso bos bdag ni mchod pa bzhes/ /de lta'i rnam pas mnyes nas ni/ /bdag nyid kun gyis bla ma mchod/ /bla ma'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang / /de phyir yang dag bla ma mchod/ /de nas bcom
ldan yum phyag rgya/ /yang dag mchod nas bsten par bya/ /bsten pa las ni gang byung ba/ /ltung ba skal bzang kha la ni/ /sbom po tha ltag sbyor ba yis/ /yang dag par ni longs spyod bya/ /
de las skyes pa'i ye shes ni/ /bde ba chen po rang rig pa/ /dbyung rngub pa ni ro gcig cing / /rab tu dga' bas mchod par bya/ /hU~M phaT sngags kyi nor bu'i sgor/ /bkod de rdo rje rab bskyod bya/ /
dga' rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ /skad cig de la skyes gyur pa/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis bde ba la/ /rdo rje btsun mo'i kha nas brjod/ /de yang slob ma'i lag tu ni/ /gtad nas gsal bar
'di skad brjod/ /ji ltar pad mchod bya ba ni/ /byas la e ba~M mchog gi gdong / /gang phyir rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug /rang nyid 'di yi snying la zhugs/ /thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /
rnal 'byor pa yis thob mi 'gyur/ /shin du phra ba'i dngos de yang / /bde chen rnal 'byor pa yis rtogs/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsten par bgyis/ /lhan cig skyes dga'i mtshan nyid ni/ /
dbang bskur gtso bor gyur pas na/ /thams cad ji lta ba bzhin thob/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las slob dpon dang slob ma brtag pa dang dbang
bskur ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas de nyid gzhan yang nyon/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i don gsal ba/ /rgyud rnams kun du sbas pa ni/ /dri ba gzhan la brjod mi
bya/ /rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya'i ming / /de yang sa ni bcu gsum pa/ /dga' ba bzhi yi don gyi gnas/ /thams cad stong pa dga' ba ste/ /ngag gi spyod yul rnams las 'das/ /
gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /skal bzang rnal 'byor kun gyi mtha'/ /rnal 'byor ma yi ngag gi yul/ /stong nyid ye shes rdo rje dang / /rdo rje phreng ba zhes bshad do/ /stong
nyid rdo rje gsang pad ma/ /rtsa ni rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug /ye shes mchog tu bde ba che/ /lhan cig skyes dga' rmad byung ba/ /rdo rje de yang rnam rtog rnams/ /'bigs par byed par yongs su

grags/ /phreng ba de rnams kyi yang rgyun/ /byang chub sems kyi rdo rje rnams/ /mi phyed pas ni rdo rjer gsungs/ /rgyud rnams kun du sbas pa ni/ /gang yang rung bas brjod mi bya/ /de ni dbugs su yongs
su grags/ /phreng ba rgyun ni mi 'chad par/ /dga' ba rab 'bab bdag nyid kyis/ /rnam rtog rlung kun 'bigs par byed/ /rlung la 'bigs par mi nus so/ /nyin dang mtshan mo rtag tu ni/ /brgya dang
brgyad lhag gsal bar yang / /rnam rtog rang bzhin rlung rnams ni/ /'char ba dang ni 'joms pa dag /ji lta ba bzhin rab dbye yis/ /rlung rnams kyi ni ming nyon cig /btang bzung dang ni
dung phyur dang / /myos pa dang ni blo ngan dang / /bsil byed dang ni g.yab sa dang / /ngar rnams dang ni sta re dang / /gzegs pa chu srin dza sha dang / /rnam par gtsigs dang myos pa'i dus/ /'dod

myos chu ba chu srin dang / /sna tshogs skyed dang 'dud pa dang / /snyems dang rnga dang sgra sgrogs dang / /rlung lha dang ni gnad 'bigs dang / /me dang dus dang ci bgyi dang / /rdo rje mchog sbyin tsu ta dang / /
sbra ma dang ni zla ba'i 'od/ /kam po dza dang ral pa can/ /yungs nag rab bkram dus 'gugs dang / /sdig pa dang ni g.yon can sten/ /grims mo dang ni mgrin pa dang / /kun sel mchog ster

smyo byed dang / /nga rgyal mtsho dang tshogs bdag dang / /rtsangs pa dang ni sa yi blo/ /theg pa bzang dang mchog tu skyes/ /dri med phru gu nyi ma dang / /gsal byed dang ni nyi ma gnon/ /stobs bzhin nga

ro dang ni dus/ /sdom pa dang ni mchongs nas 'gro/ /sbrang ma khyi dang mtshan ma dang / /thod dang sgur po drang po dang / /sa dang sa la 'gro ma dang / /bram ze dang ni sna 'gyur gnas/ /ma mo'i rigs dang lce

bskyod pa/ /mi smra dang ni rnga sgra'i sprin/ /dga' bar byed dang mig yangs dang / /dri med 'od bsrung ne tso dang / /sna tshogs mchu dang mig mnyam dang / /mdzes dang chos kyi dbyig pa dang / /'gro kun

snying stobs brtan pa dang / /za phod bong bu snyom las dang / /kha gdangs sgra chen stobs kyis rtse/ /rtsa bran dbang byed g.yo sgyu can/ /gtso bo che dang rtag tu dga'/ /glog phreng dang ni dga' byed dang / /

dbugs dbyung ra ga lce dang ni/ /bde mchog u dum ba ra rmongs/ /pad ma'i dra ba pad ma bskor/ /dgra sta rma bya rlung dang ni/ /rdo rje dbang phyug rlung gi ming / /de ltar nga yis bstan pa yin/ /bcom
ldan dris pa'i rlung rnams kyi/ /gnas rnams kyi ni dbye ba yis/ /de dag gang las ldang ba dang / /mched pa rnams su bgyid pa lags/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rlung gi gnas kyi
mtshan nyid ni/ /'khor lo drug la khyab pa'i rlung / /chos kyi 'khor lo rtag tu gnas/ /srog ces bya bas 'gro la khyab/ /rnam rtog med pa mtshan phyed na/ /nam mkha' mchog las shar nas ni/ /rlung
gi rang bzhin 'joms par byed/ /rlung de dgu yi rnam par rgyu/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i cha na gnas/ /mtshan phyed dus nas brtsams nas ni/ /'khor lo drug la dgu bdag nyid/ /nyi ma phyed kyi mtha'

ru ni/ /rlung rnams kyang ni ldang bar byed/ /nyi ma phyed nas brtsams nas ni/ /'khor lo drug las dgu bdag nyid/ /mtshan phyed kyi ni dus kyi mthar/ /rlung rnams gsal bar rgyu ba na/ /de nyid gnas kyi
dbye ba yis/ /sna tshogs pa yi rtog par 'gro/ /rnam par rtog pa rnams phye nas/ /de dag ming rnams bshad par bya/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /rgyags dang nga rgyal mngon par zhen/ /

phra dog khro dang ser sna dang / /g.yo dang sgyu la cha lugs ngan/ /blo rgod brkam chags gnyid dang ni/ /the tshom dang ni ngar 'dzin dang / /dga' dang chags bral dregs pa dang / /'chab dang sred dang bag chags dang / /sgyur
dang rmongs dang 'dod chen dang / /rtsod dang rtse 'jo spyi brtol dang / /tshul 'chos dregs dang kun nas gdungs/ /rnam 'gyur ma zhi shes bzhin med/ /bems po log pa'i nga rgyal dang / /'gyod dang

khrel ni med pa dang / /gus pa med dang ches pa med/ /blo dman ngo tsha med dang 'ching / /ngo tsha shes dang ngo tsha dang / /mi ster ba dang mya ngan dang / /yid gnyis dang ni rlom sems med/ /bsgrims dang the tshom

ngal ba dang / /dbang dang 'khrul ba'i snying stobs dang / /snyam sems pa dang brgyal ba dang / /thim pa dang ni mi srun dang / /gya gyu snyoms dang myos pa dang / /rig byed min dang bag yod dang / /gnas ngan len dang

nyam chung nyid/ /yid mi bde dang lhag par rtog /skrag dang rmugs dang gnyid dang ni/ /brkyam chags rol pa khrung khrung dang / /'tshe ba le lo yon po nyid/ /bsam dang spyod dang zhum pa dang / /kun rdzob
de nyid don yod dang / /ster dang dga' ba'i 'dod pa dang / /'jigs dang 'dar dang phra bdag nyid/ /gsal dang rnam gsal lhad 'jug dang / /'bral dang rtag pa'i de nyid dang / /ru sbal
ngoms med gnod pa dang / /mi gsal ba dang yid du 'ong / /gnas med mang du smra ba dang / /bdag nyid skyes bu nyid dang ni/ /ya mtshan dga' dang skye bo ngan/ /dman pa'i de nyid sdug

bsngal gsum/ /'khor ba la ni chags pa dang / /rtag tu brgya dang brgyad lhag pa/ /nyin dang mtshan mor rtag tu ni/ /rlung gi rang bzhin rgyu ba yin/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon
par rtogs pa las rdo rje phreng ba'i tshig dbye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje gsum nyi ma/ /gsang ba'i pad ma kha 'byed pa/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang bzhugs/ /'dus pa'i
mchog don rab gsungs pa/ /'dus pa 'dres pa zhes ni bshad/ /'dres pa nga yis khyod la bshad/ /'khor lo bzhi dang tha mi dad/ /sngags ni lhan cig cho ga bzhin/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma
sbyor ba/ /gang tshe gsang ba'i rtsa gnyis ni/ /yang dag sbyor ba reg gyur pa/ /de tshe nam mkha' rnam rgyas nyid/ /nam mkha' las ni skyes pa'i rlung / /de yis me ni rab tu 'bar/ /rtsa ni
stong phrag bdun bcu gnyis/ /rtsa rnams rab sad gzi brjid kyis/ /bde ba kun gyi go 'phang mchog /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor khyab/ /bde ba chen po'i byang chub sems/ /rnam par zhu
nas rtsar gnas pa/ /rdor gsum rang bzhin gcig 'gyur phyir/ /khams rnams ro gcig gyur pa dang / /phung po rnams ni yongs zad dang / /ngal bso ba la rlung rnams ni/ /dga' ba
rnams ni yang dag skye/ /de nas byang chub sems kyang ni/ /gnas kun nas ni zhu gyur nas/ /ngo bo gcig tu gyur pa dang / /rtsa ni gcig gi 'bras bu ni/ /ro gcig tu ni gyur pa la/ /
'dres pa zhes ni de la gsungs/ /phung po khams dang dbang po dang / /yul rnams su ni sbas pa rnams/ /rnam rtog kun nas zad pa las/ /bde ba chen po yang dag skyes/ /
ro gcig pa ni ngal bso ba/ /de ni 'dus pa 'dres pa ste/ /de kho na nyid mchog gsang ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gsungs/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon
par rtogs pa las 'dus pa'i tshig lhag par bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon/ /stong nyid don ni rab rgyas pa/ /stong pa nyid ni chos rnams kun/ /
nang du khyab pa'ang chos nyid de/ /de nyid yang dag shes pa ni/ /de bzhin nyid dang rnam mi rtog /bdag dang gang zag chos rnams ni/ /bdag med rang bzhin gcig pa nyid/ /stong pa nyid dang rang
rig dang / /thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs pa/ /rnal 'byor gcig pus rtogs pa ste/ /rtog ge pa yi spyod yul min/ /chos rnams thams cad mdor bsdus pa/ /'khor lo drug tu rnam
par brjod/ /de nas nang du'ang khyab pa ni/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo legs rgyas pa/ /de ni nam mkha' khyab cing phra/ /khyab byed zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can/ /dmigs pa med cing rten pa med/ /gzugs med
nyon mongs med pa dang / /rnam par mi rtog mchog tu zhi/ /rang bzhin med cing dri ma med/ /gnyis su med cing bya ba med/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /dus dang dpe las 'das pa
ste/ /ngag gi lam gyi spyod yul bral/ /chos nyid chos ni thams cad kyis/ /ji lta ba bzhin mngon par brjod/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par bral/ /dge dang mi dge'i srid las grol/ /de ni kun nas
bsgribs pa med/ /nam mkha' lta bur mchog tu khyab/ /chos rnams ji lta ba bzhin skye/ /de ni de bzhin nyid ces brjod/ /gang nas kyang ni ma 'ongs shing / /gang du yang ni 'gro ba med/ /rmongs dang

'khrul pa gcig pu las/ /de ni rab tu spro bar snang / /bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal spangs/ /'dod chags zhe sdang sogs mi gos/ /'khrul dang rnam par 'khrul par 'brel/ /rtog pa dang bral dri ma med/ /bdag

dang srog dang skye ba po/ /skyes bu de bzhin gang zag dang / /shed las skyes dang shed bu dang / /byed pa po dang tshor ba po/ /shes pa po dang mthong ba po/ /sgro 'dogs pa yi rnam par spangs/ /phung po skye
mched khams la sogs/ /rnam shes dang ni gzung ba yis/ /sgrib pa med cing mchog tu phra/ /nam mkha' mchog la yang dag gnas/ /de ltar ma lus stong nyid do/ /brjod dang brjod bya'i don

dang bral/ /ming tsam gcig pu kho na yang / /rang byung mchog tu rmad byung ba'o/ /brjod pa yi ni kun rdzob tu/ /de ni nga yis yang dag bshad/ /rang rig shin tu phra ba'i phyir/ /de kho na nyid mthong
ba med/ /bdag nyid rang gi ngo bor rig /pha rol gzhan gyi spyod yul min/ /de ni rang rig par bshad do/ /chos kun gnas ni zhi ba'o/ /rnam rtog gis 'khrul rtog ge gang / /mi shes pa yi
rmongs pa rnams/ /don dam par ni mi shes shing / /kun rdzob dgra yi mdzod 'dzin pa/ /ye shes mchog ni mi shes shing / /rtog ge stong nyid smra bar byed/ /rnal 'byor bsam gtan rnal 'byor
pas/ /de ni mchog tu phra bar spyod/ /stong nyid yang dag nam mkha' che/ /shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs/ /rtog pa'i rnam pa rnams dang bral/ /stong pa nyid kyi 'khor lor brjod/ /phung po lnga

yi bdag nyid lus/ /'khor lo drug gi phug nang na/ /zla ba phyed pa'i cha lta bu/ /stong nyid rlung gi 'khor lor gnas/ /phyed min gang ba med pa dang / /ji ltar bag chags chu zla bzhin/ /rlung gi 'khor
lo srog tu bshad/ /mtshan phyed skad cig ma la 'char/ /de ltar yang dag bsgom pa ni/ /'di ni stong nyid sgom byed pa'o/ /don dam gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis/ /yang na rgyu 'bras sbyor
ba'i phyir/ /de ni rang bzhin 'grub par bsgom/ /don dam rang gi ngo bor ni/ /kun rdzob kyang ni de bzhin du/ /bsgoms pas 'khor ba 'joms par 'gyur/ /ji ltar til la til mar ni/ /gnas
pa nyid la mthong mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin lus la stong pa nyid/ /gnas kyang bsgribs pas mthong ba med/ /bla ma'i zhal las 'di shes par/ /yang dag rig pas kun rdzob spangs/ /rnal 'byor
chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las stong pa nyid kyi don bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ /thig le'i
dbye ba bla na med/ /'jig rten thig le dbye bas dben/ /'khor bar yang dang yang du 'khor/ /mdzod spu'i dbus na gnas pa ni/ /thig le rlung du yang dag bshad/ /sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni 'byed/ /
rnal 'byor mdud pa bkrol nas ni/ /rlung gi de nyid rig pa de/ /mchog tu 'byed pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sbyor ba de yang mi shes par/ /rlung dang sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rjod dang brjod bya'i dpe
las 'das/ /mig gsal log par mthong rnams kyis/ /bsam gtan bsgom bya dang bral ba'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni thob pa dka'/ /rnal 'byor ma yi drin gyis ni/ /zhal nas zhal du
brgyud nas gnas/ /bcom ldan bde ba chen po la/ /rdo rje sems dpas slar zhus pa/ /'gro ba'i mgon gyis bstan du gsol/ /thig le'i dbye ba rig bcas pa/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni gang
gis shes/ /sbyor bas mdud pa 'byed par byed/ /khams gsum pa yi 'gro ba 'di/ /myur du dngos grub mchog tu 'gro/ /de skad zhus nas rdo rje can/ /rdo rje dbang phyug la gsungs pa/ /mchog tu
gsang ba 'di nyid ni/ /gang du'ang gsal bar ma gsungs pa/ /thig le'i dbye ba de yang ni/ /nga yis bshad kyis de nyid nyon/ /snying gi pad sbubs nam mkha' la/ /ye shes rdo rje rtag tu bzhugs/ /
steng dang 'og la brten nas ni/ /srog dang thur sel rlung chen gnas/ /de yang dbye bar dka' ba yi/ /dbus su mdud pa gsum gyis dkris/ /de yis mchog dang bcom byas pas/ /

steng du 'gro ba thob mi byed/ /des bcom slar yang rnam lnga rgyu/ /srog dang thur sel gyen rgyu dang / /khyab byed dang ni mnyam gnas nyid/ /rtse mo lnga las rgyun du ni/ /rtsa lnga la ni yang dag brten/ /rgyags
dang rnam par rgyas pa dang / /myos dang btung dang 'dza' bo ste/ /de dag rtsa ni lngar shes bya/ /rdo rje'i 'og tu gsal bar khyab/ /steng gi srog gi dbus na yang / /rdo rje'i lte ba'i mkha' dbyings
'gro/ /srog ces bya ba'i rlung chen po/ /lte ba mdud pa dang phrad pas/ /bcom nas kyang ni rnam lngar rgyu/ /rtse mo rnams la rtsa lngar ni/ /zla ba'i cha dang sna dang ni/ /bsnyen bkur lkog shal

mchin pa ste/ /rtsa ni lnga yi ming yin no/ /rtsa ni lnga las rgyu ba'i rgyun/ /klu dang rus sbal rtsangs pa dang / /lha sbyin dang ni gzhu las rgyal/ /de ltar rtsa de dang bcas pa/ /lus kyi thur du 'gro bas
na/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams ni/ /yang dang yang du bskul byas nas/ /bskul bas kyang ni rgyas pa na/ /gti mug chen pos dbang du byed/ /de steng chos kyi 'khor lo na/ /
gnas pa'i rtsa ni bskul byas nas/ /de rnams lhan cig rtsa de dag /zhe sdang gis ni dbang du byed/ /yang dag bskul nas de steng gi/ longs spyod mchog tu ngo mtshar skye/ /rtsa de rnams dang
lhan cig tu/ /chags pa chen pos dbang byas nas/ /bskul ba dang ni de steng gi/ spyi bo'i 'khor lo'i bde chen du/ /rtsa de rnams dang lhan cig tu/ /byang chub sems kyis gang bar byed/ /rnam rtog
rnam par rgyu byed cing / /sna tshogs dbye ba thams cad las/ /steng ma rnams kyang thur du 'gro/ /srog gis rab tu bcom nas ni/ /de dag thams cad rdo rje'i rtser/ /zhugs nas thur du kha bltas
pa'o/ /de yang thur du mi 'gro ste/ /ma rig mdud pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /rnam par shes pa'i shing rta'i rlung / /de ni bag chags dang 'dres pas/ /mig dang rna ba de bzhin sna/ /lce ste rnam par
shes pa bzhi/ /rtse mo bzhi nas phyung nas ni/ /bag chags rnam shes dang 'dres nas/ /rnam shes dbang po lhan cig tu/ /don ni rab tu rgyas par byed/ /slar yang lam de nyid nas ni/ /ji lta
ba yi rim pas 'jug /de yi dngos nyid de sbyor bas/ /rnam shes bsten pa'i skad cig la/ /de yi bag chags bcas kyis 'phel/ /'khrul bcas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las/ /de ltar
bag chags kyis bslad pa'i/ /rnam shes las kyi ngo bor 'gro/ /de nyid kyang ni srog sbyor bas/ /khams gsum par ni 'khrul pa'o/ /byed po las kyi 'bras bur myong / /gzhan nyid du ni
'khor ba med/ /de phyir 'khor ba gzhom don du/ /thig le go 'phang gsal bar dbye/ /bsgom pa la ni 'bad par bya/ /ma rig gzhan ni mi shes pa/ /dbus kyi mdud pa de
yang ni/ /de phyed na ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor grub pa ste/ /ye shes lnga ni thob nas ni/ /mngon shes lnga ni thob pa dang / /mchog tu gsang ba thob nas ni/ /blo bzang ji lta ba
bzhin gnas/ /phreng ba mi dgos bsgom mi dgos/ /bya ba mi dgos dgag mi dgos/ /sngags kyi de nyid gcig pu yis/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'thob/ /las chos dam tshig phyag
rgya yi/ /dbye ba 'di ni ma gsungs so/ /'khor lo'i dbye bas ma yin zhing / /de bzhin dga' ba sogs kyi min/ /phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang gsal/ /sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni 'thob/ /stong

nyid ye shes rdo rje dang / /gnyis med bde ba de nyid dang / /gsang ba'i thig le'i dbye ba dang / /rnal 'byor grub pa'i bde chen po/ /ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed cing / /'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri bo 'joms/ /
phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub dang / /rab tu byed pa mchog tu bshad/ /sngags kyi de nyid nges sbyor bas/ /rigs shing yan lag gsal ba gang / /rnal 'byor ma yi bka' drin dang / /bla ma'i zhal
las nges rtogs 'gyur/ /man ngag med pa'i bzlas pa ni/ /sngags kyi rgyal po blo rmongs byed/ /de yis dka' ba gcig pu dang / /chu bsrubs mar ni mi 'gyur ltar/ /de bzhin man
ngag dang bral sngags/ /skyes bus ji srid 'tsho yi bar/ /bzlas kyang de yi 'bras bu yi/ /cha tsam thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /mi shes pa yi mi 'ga' zhig /rgya mtsho bzhi yi
pha mtha' yi/ /sa la shin tu 'gro 'dod pa/ /lam ni gang yin mi 'dri gang / /de ltar bdag nyid 'gro bar byed/ /de bzhin dka' ba cher byed pa'i/ /man ngag dang bral sgrub pa
po/ /'bras bu med cing mkhas pa yang / /sgrub pa po ni khong khro skye/ /khong khro skyes pa'i skad cig la/ /'bras bu med cing ngu 'bod 'gro/ /de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /dad
pas bla ma brgyud pa las/ /man ngag dag ni bslab par bya/ /gang phyir brgyud pa'i lung gis khyab/ /brgyud pa'i rim pas gnas par byed/ /de ni rnal 'byor ma zhal dang / /bla ma'i
zhal las 'bad pa yis/ /de nyid mchog ni bslab par bya/ /sngags kyi man ngag brgyud pa'i lung / /de thos lag na rdo rjes kyang / /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /the tshom thams cad
gcod pa la/ /phyag byas nas ni zhus pa ni/ /khyed kyis bstan pa 'di nyid mchog /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ni/ /sngags kyi dngos grub bla na med/ /gang brlabs skad cig dngos grub
'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /sngags kyi de nyid rab gsal ba/ /de nyid mchog tu gsang ba ni/ /gang du'ang nga yis ma bshad pa/ /skal ba med pa bsam pa'i rgyus/ /rgyud rnams kun du

sbas byas la/ /de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon/ /sngags kyi rgyal po bla na med/ /sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa yis/ /gang gi myur du dngos grub 'gyur/ /thog mar uSh+ma'i tha ma bri/ /dbyangs yig drug pas
rnam par brgyan/ /sde tshan tha ma'i mtha' dang ldan/ /dbyangs med pa yi cha dang bcas/ /uSh+ma'i mtha' la dbyangs yig 'di/ /dgu pa dang ni yang dag ldan/ /mthar ni tsheg drag mchog gi sgra/ /sngags

kyi gtso bo btu bar bya/ /de ltar yi ge gnyis kyi ming / /sngags kyi brda ni rmad byung ba/ /'dzin pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir/ /sgra dang thig le'i ming du byas/ /rlung gnyis kyis ni phye nas ni/ /ma

rig mdud pa 'byed par byed/ /phyag rgya chen po mchog gi rgyu/ /mchog tu zhi ba'i yi ge gnyis/ /man ngag thob pa'i 'dod pa'i don/ /gang gis zla ba drug bzlas na/ /thig le'i sgra yi go 'phang gsal/ /'dod
pa'i don kun sgrub par byed/ /skye bos dben pa lha yi gnas/ /sgra yi tsher ma rnams dang bral/ /bgegs med skal bzang nyams dga' ba/ /bskyed mos tshal gzhi bde ba che/ /'dod pa lnga la longs
spyod pas/ /sngags kyi gtso bo 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di ni gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ /khyim du bde ba'i phyag rgyas gnas/ /gang gis dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ /sgrub po bde ba'i stan 'dug
nas/ /mig gnyis sna rtser gtad byas nas/ /sna ni lte ba'i tshad du bzhag /phrag gong bsnyams la lce rkan sbyar/ /so dang mchu ni bde bar bzhag /dbugs kyi 'byung rdub klod nas ni/ /cung zad
cung zad rtsol bral nas/ /ji lta ba bzhin 'byung rdub ni/ /rdo rje dkyil krung legs gnas pas/ /de ltar phyag rgya dang ldan pas/ /yi ge gnyis ni rtag tu bzlas/ /thig le'i dbye bas bde ba che/ /
zla ba drug gis rnal 'byor mchog /thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud ni dang po 'di/ /a ba d+hU tI dri med gnas/ /rlung gi de nyid ye shes ches/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yi ni rgyu/ /ri
lu ral gri ro langs dang / /rgyal po mig sman bcud kyis len/ /dmag dpung rengs dang brtsigs pa 'bigs/ /rig 'dzin gyi ni go 'phang mchog /mi snang ba dang gter mthong ba/ /'dod
dgur bsgyur dang gzugs mthong dang / /gser 'gyur dang ni dug las rgyal/ /me yi nang du 'jug pa dang / /mngon shes lnga yi go 'phang dang / /ye shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/ /de ltar skad cig

gcig la ni/ /byang chub mtshan nyid go 'phang ngo / /dka' ba spyod pa spangs nas ni/ /shes rab snying rje yang dag ldan/ /bshad pa'i bde ba chen po ster/ /sdom pa mi dgos sbyin sreg min/ /phreng ba mi dgos

bgrang mi dgos/ /'di ni bskyed rim dbye mi dgos/ /gsungs pa'i dka' thub sogs mi dgos/ /sngags kyi rnal 'byor gcig pu yis/ /bla ma'i zhal las brgyud pa dang / /zla ba drug tu mngon sbyor bas/ /go 'phang mchog

ni thob par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las thig le'i dbye ba dang rnal 'byor mchog thob par byed pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon/ /

bla na med pa nA da'i don/ /gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub 'gyur/ /sgra yang mi shigs par ni bshad/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal dri ma med/ /rnam pa kun las rnam par grol/ /lte ba

sprul pa yang dag gnas/ /sbrul gyi lce ltar phra ba ni/ /gnyis med ye shes rmad byung ba/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po dang / /dbang phyug dang ni rtag zhi ba/ /de dag de ltar rin po che/ /skyed pa po yi pha dang mas/ /

yi ge med cing gong bu med/ /'byung ba chen po rnam par spangs/ /dus dang rtog pa rnams las grol/ /skye med zad med rmad du byung / /'dzin pa kun la zhen la sogs/ /spangs shing lhag ma med pa dang / /mchog

gi mchog ste zhi ba med/ /dngos po kun gyi dbus na gnas/ /rnam rtog med cing brten pa med/ /kun gzhi rnam shes zhes gsungs pa/ /nyon mongs can gyi yid kyis ni/ /bems po rnams kyis sad par byed/ /mchog
tu gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis/ /thob pa'i go 'phang bla na med/ /gnyis med mchog tu gsal ba dang / /rlung gi de nyid yang dag rten/ /yi ge hoHyis bskul nas ni/ /me yi 'khor lo sad par byed/ /de

lta'i nA da'i go 'phang don/ /bla ma'i zhal las yang dag gnas/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las nA da'i tshig rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang

gsang ba'i don/ /bla na med pa bshad kyis nyon/ /gsang ba b+ha ga zhes su gsungs/ /b+ha ga de bzhin chos 'byung ba/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang brten/ /dga' ba skyed par byed pa'i rgyu/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
yi ni gnas/ /ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid gsal/ /ye shes chen po spros pa med/ /rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs/ /bral dga'i mtha' ste mchog tu phra/ /lhan cig skyes dga' kun bdag gnas/ /
dga' bral la sogs skad cig gnas/ /phra ba yang dag byang chub sems/ /srog la phan par 'tsho ba ste/ /srang mda'i 'khrul 'khor lta bur gnas/ /dus bral rnam rtog med pa ste/ /stong nyid skye med
'chi ba med/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lor thim pa dang / /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo skye/ /bsam gyis mi khyab zhi ba ste/ /chags bral 'gro kun skye ba med/ /rdo rje pad ma mnyam sbyor bas/ /
bde ba thams cad ster bar byed/ /rlung gi de nyid rig pa yis/ /rtsa yi dbus su 'dzin par byed/ /gang de skye ba nyams myong bar/ /gsang ba zhes ni bya bar grags/ /de nyid
gsang ba yi ni mchog /bla ma'i zhal la lhag par gnas/ /phan tshun brgyud pa'i rim pa yis/ /bla ma bzang po'i zhal las shes/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba
mngon par rtogs pa las gsang ba chen po'i tshogs ma lus par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //
de nas gzhan gang sdom pa'i don/ /de kho na nyid bshad kyis nyon/ /sdom pa srung bar byed pa gang / /de ni byang chub sems zhes brjod/ /rdo rje'i rtse mor sems 'dzin pa/ /de ni bsrung
ba zhes ni grags/ /dbang po rnams ni yul rnams la/ /'jug cing rtag tu gang gnas pa/ /de ni sdom pa bsrung ba dang / /dam tshig bsrung bar bshad pa yin/ /gdul dka' tshul 'chos g.yo sgyu can/ /rmongs
dang sems khros g.yo can dang / /dad med rtog ge ba lhan cig /rtags kyis nye bar 'tsho ba dang / /nyan thos nor la brkam chags can/ /de kho na nyid sun 'byin cing / /don dam pa ni mi shes pa/ /

med par lta dang tshul khrims 'chal/ /gtam dang tshig gi kyal pa dang / /'dri ba la sogs mi bya zhing / /se gol togs pa tsam du yang / /de dang lhan cig gnas mi bya/ /las kyi phyag rgya nyams dga' ba/ /
gal te byis pa'i skye bo dang / /de dang lhan cig dam tshig ni/ /mi bya rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur/ /skyed na dam tshig dbus zhugs dang / /pad snod phyag rgya sogs brtan dang / /brkam dang 'brel pas

'jug pa dang / /dam tshig la ni 'jug mi bya/ /snod dang cang te'u gri gug dang / /glegs bam dang ni bgrang phreng dang / /dam tshig med pa gzhan dag la/ /gang du'ang bstan par mi bya'o/ /dge slong sdom la gnas

pa la/ /rnal 'byor spyod sogs bya ba dang / /man ngag rnams ni bstan mi bya/ /ras ris la sogs mi bstan cing / /gang gis dam tshig lhan cig tu/ /ji ltar spyod pa yang dag spyod/ /bla ma la yang smra min na/ /gzhan

rnams la ni smos ci dgos/ /dbang po yul la spyod pa ni/ /gang nas de ni bsdams nas ni/ /stong nyid gnyis med sgyu ma la/ /sogs pas kun rdzob lhag spyad na/ /shes rab ye shes dbang bskur sogs/ /nyams su

myong ba'i bde ba yis/ /bde ba chen po'i dran pa yis/ /dbang po rnams ni yul las ldog /bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa dang / /ye shes snyems sogs nges spangs pa/ /blo ldan rdo rje dbang phyug gi/ yang dag

sdom pa bshad pa yin/ /de lta bu sogs dam tshig ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rtag bsrung bya/ /gzhan du rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa rdo rje can/ /bgrang phreng dang ni dbu rgyan dang / /rus

pa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya dang / /glegs bam bsam gtan ras ris dang / /thod pa la sogs rnal 'byor ma/ /thams cad du ni dngos grub phyir/ /bla ma la yang sba bar bya/ /sngags ni tshig tu brjod mi bya/ /mchu

'gul bar yang mi mngon zhing / /cung zad mgrin par brjod bya yis/ /sngags kyi rgyal po de ltar bzlas/ /gsang las dngos grub mtshungs pa med/ /gang phyir de ni sdom par bshad/ /snod min nor ni chen po dang / /ldan

yang rgyud las skyon du gsungs/ /bla mas bla med dngos grub phyir/ /'bad pa yis ni spang bar bya/ /bza' btung gos la sogs pa dang / /nor ni chen po la chags shing / /snod min slob ma man ngag mchog /rmad du byung ba

smra ba gang / /rnal 'byor shes pa tshe 'di la/ /de ni dmyal ba ngu 'bod 'gro/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las sdom pa'i tshig gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //

de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon/ /dam tshig don ni bla na med/ /bza' ba yi ni dam tshig gang / /de ni de yi don bshad bya/ /bza' ba ru ni bshad pa gang / /de ni bdud rtsi lnga ru brjod/ /rlung gi de nyid sbyor ba yis/ /zhu nas ro gcig slar

yang ni/ /rdo rje lam nas steng song ste/ /gcig tu gyur pa bza' ba'o/ /dam tshig lus dang ngag yid kyis/ /de nyid gsum dang gang shar dang / /'khor lo bzhi po rnams la yang / /bde ba nyams su myang ba gang / /de dang ro gcig
rnal 'byor pa/ /rtag tu spyod pa bza' ba'o/ /byang chub sems kyi de nyid mchog /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang thim/ /zhu ba rlung gi de nyid kyis/ /bza' ba bsam gtan bzang po'o/ /spyi bo thod

pa'i slad nas ni/ /de tsam rnal 'byor pas rtag tu/ /de la snying rje btung ba ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' bde ba che/ /snod mchog gsang ba'i pad mar blugs/ /rten ni bza' ba rab rtogs byed/ /sems kyis bdud

rtsi mthung byed na/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi ro rdzas 'thung / /de za ba ni rdo rje 'chang / /glang mo rta khyi ba lang mi/ /byang chub sems dang bcas pa'i khrag /bsres nas skad cig de la bza'/ /de ni bdud rtsi lnga zhes

brjod/ /rnam rtog dang ni kun rtog gis/ /stong pa nyid du gsal ba'i snod/ /rdo rje can gyis rtag tu bza'/ /stong nyid ye shes pha rol 'gro/ /dga' ba gsum pa'i bde ba ni/ /lhan skyes lhan cig snod du ni/ /
rdo rje can gyis rtag tu bza'/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas/ /rnam rtog rlung rnams thams cad ni/ /zhi ba'i de nyid snod bzang por/ /rlung gi de nyid shes pas bza'/ /rnam rtog med pa'i

go 'phang gnas/ /phyag rgya gsum dang yang dag sbyor/ /phyag rgya chen por bshad snod du/ /rnal 'byor de nyid shes pas bza'/ /srog dang rtsol ba'i go 'phang gnas/ /rnam rtog dang ni kun rtog gis/ /sgom dang sgom

min sogs 'khrul pa/ /srog chen po yi snod du ni/ /rnam rtog dra ba'i sa bon tshogs/ /phung po'i bud shing snod bzang por/ /ye shes chen po'i me yis min/ /sngags kyi de nyid rtogs pas bza'/ /bdud bzhi'i khro bo

chen po yi/ /stobs kyi rig pas sgrub pa pos/ /sgrub pos legs par mnyam gzhag nas/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor snod du bza'/ /rlung dang sngags dang rdzas rnams kyi/ /thig le gsum ste bla na med/ /mi shigs go 'phang

snod du ni/ /zos na rnal 'byor pha rol 'gro/ /stong nyid ye shes mtshungs med pa/ /snying rje'i snod kyis mchog tu ni/ /ye shes chen po mnyam bzhag nas/ /btung zhing rtag tu btung ba'o/ /phyag rgya'i dam tshig ces

su bshad/ /rdo rje pad ma yang dag sbyor/ /de kho na nyid mchog skyes gang / /de ni skal ldan snod la ni/ /rnal 'byor pas 'thungs nyams dga' ba/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i de nyid mchog /nyon mongs dang bral lhan cig skyes/ /phyag

rgya chen po'i don bsgrub bya/ /de lta bu sogs dam tshig sogs/ /gzhan ni gang du'ang ngas ma bshad/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang mchog /bla ma'i zhal las gsal bar rtogs/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon

par rtogs pa las dam tshig gi don gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ /sgra tsam don ni bshad par bya/ /gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /'pho ba med pa'i go 'phang

'thob/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i pad sbubs su/ /sgra tsam yang dag gnas pa ni/ /chags med snang ba med pa dang / /gnyis su med cing dri ma med/ /dpe bral g.yo ba med pa dang / /gzhi med bla gab med pa dang / /lha yi dbang phyug

ye shes mchog /'byung dang rngub pa rnam par spangs/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi lha dbang phyug /de lta bu ni rnyed par dka'/ /mchog tu zhi ba bde ba che/ /gzugs mchog 'chi ba med pa'i mchog /rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin

gyis/ /rgun chang ro yis myos pa ltar/ /mchog tu nang du song gyur nas/ /de bzhin rnam pa kun gyi gnas/ /sngags kyi de nyid rig pa'i rten/ /rang gi nyams myong rtog pa'i gnas/ /de nas ston pa bla med pa/ /rdo rje sems dpas zhus

pa ni/ /bcom ldan de nyid zhi ba mkhyen/ /sngags kyi de nyid rab dbye ba/ /gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /de kho na nyid 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /sngags kyi de nyid bla na med/ /mchog dang rab mchog
phra ba dang / /ye shes chen po mchog chen po/ /snying po yi yang snying po mchog /yang dag bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ /rgyud rnams kun du sbas pa rnams/ /gsang ba'i go 'phang 'pho ba med/ /lte ba'i

'khor lo de nyid mchog /sgra tsam du ni yang dag gnas/ /stong nyid chen po'i dbus su thim/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gsal/ /gnyis med 'jigs bral zhi ba dang / /snang ba med cing kun rdzob med/ /gnyis med ting

'dzin sbyor ba yis/ /sngags kyi de nyid rab gsal ba/ /thog ma med cing zhi ba dang / /dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni/ /de tshe thog mar stong nyid sgom/ /snang

ba med pa'i go 'phang zhi/ /rang bzhin med gnas nyams dga' ba/ /rnam rtog med la mchog tu brten/ /stong nyid ye shes mtshungs pa med/ /byang chub sems kyi rgyud dang ni/ /yi ge hU~M las yang dag byung / /rnal

'byor shes pa rmad byung che/ /de nyid gsum ni ro gcig don/ /a ba d+hU tI'i go 'phang gnas/ /slar yang dga' ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /'jug pa la sogs rnam par spangs/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang ni/ /byang chub sems

ni dri ma med/ /sna tshogs skad cig dbyer med pa/ /brjod pa'i bdag nyid dbyangs bral ba/ /rtag tu gnas pa'i rgyun gyis kyang / /byang chub sems ni 'bab pa ni/ /sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni thob/ /skye

med zhi ba'i thig le tsam/ /sngags kyi spyod pas spyad pas na/ /ye shes mchog ni rang rig pa'o/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las sgra tsam gyi don gtan la dbab pa'i
le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas rlung gi de nyid mchog /don dam pa ni bshad kyis nyon/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rlung bsgoms na/ /myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rlung gi thig le ye shes

che/ /phra zhing de nyid go 'phang gsal/ /dngos grub kun byed nyams dga' ba/ /gnyis med rnal 'byor mi zad pa/ /skye med kun 'gro zhi ba dang / /lus rnams kun la khyab pa dang / /ma pham stong pa bsam mi khyab/ /
thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /sgom dang bsam gtan rnal 'byor gyis/ /thig le rang gi ngo bo shes/ /chos rnams gcig tu gyur pa'i gnas/ /sngags kyi de nyid kyi ni rgyu/ /bag chags kun las
rnam par grol/ /kun mkhyen bde ba kun gsal ba/ /sna yi rtse mor de nyid mchog /'od zer thig le bsam par bya/ /srog dang rtsol ba yang dag sbyor/ /rtog pa rnams kyi grangs ster ba/ /skal bzang

ye shes lnga yi bdag /sangs rgyas lnga yi cho ga ni/ /rin chen lnga yi sbyor ba'i gzugs/ /'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid tsam/ /thog ma lus kyi phyag rgya'i dngos/ /ngag gi grangs kyi zlos mtshan nyid/ /yid

kyi rnal 'byor che la zhen/ /sgom pa'i go 'phang mi zad pa/ /dbugs kyi tshogs ni bgrang ba dang / /rlung gi rnam par dpyad pa dang / /gnas kyi dbye ba rtsa rnams kyi/ /dus kyi dbye ba rtogs pa dang / /rlung rnams

kyi ni zlog pa dang / /rtog pa dang bcas spangs pa ste/ /de ltar mdor bsdus rnam drug gis/ /'byung dang rngub pa zhes su brjod/ /thog mar 'byung dang rngub pa rnams/ /nyi khri dang ni chig stong dang / /de bzhin

grangs ni brgya phrag drug /nyin dang mtshan mo nges pa ni/ /ji srid grangs ni thob pa'i gnas/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun du/ /grangs kyi rjes su sbyor ba yis/ /grangs ni yang dang yang du brtag /dus mtshams

kyi ni rab dbye bas/ /de nas rjes su zlos par 'gyur/ /thun tshod so sor srog rnams dang / /rtsol ba ru ni brtag pa ste/ /nyis stong bdun brgya'i grangs kyis ni/ /yang dag par ni nges bzung med/ /yongs

su gsal bar bcad nas ni/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun la/ /'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis/ /nyin dang mtshan du nges par ni/ /de rjes gnas kyi rtsol ba yis/ /tha dad du ni rab tu brtag /rtsa yi 'khor lo rgyu ba

yis/ /'byung dang rngub pa nges par ni/ /nges par gzung ba'i sbyor ba las/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo spyad par bya/ /de yi 'khor lo'i rtsa dbye bas/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun las/ /de rjes gnas kyi sbol pa'i sa/ /gnas kyi dbye bas

brtag par bya/ /gnas ni so sor brtags pa yis/ /brgya dang brgyad ni lhag par rgyu/ /rnam rtog med pa'i sbyor ba mchog /rtog pa spangs pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag /brgya dang brgyad ni lhag par rgyu/ /'di

ni yang dag rnal 'byor mchog /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun gyis/ /mtshan nyid sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /ji ltar gnas par rang ngo bo/ /rtog dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /de nas rnal 'byor log nas ni/ /rtog pa dang bral rlung chen po/ /

rtsa yi 'khor lo rnam par rgyu/ /de thob nas ni log pa dang / /kun nas nyon mongs rnal 'byor pas/ /nges pa la ni don dam pa/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun las/ /las dang po pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /blo dang ldan pa log pa las/ /de nas dgag pa de dag

kyang / /yang dag rnal 'byor stobs kyis ni/ /srog dang rtsol ba'i rnam rtog rnams/ /kun nas rab tu spangs nas ni/ /rlung gi de kho na nyid rgyu/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /gnyis med mchog gi rnal 'byor gyis/ /nyin

zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun la/ /rlung gi de kho na nyid rten/ /'khrul pa'i rnal 'byor dag pa ni/ /de la rtse gcig sems kyis ni/ /rtog med de kho na nyid kyis/ /rlung gi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog /yang dag rtsol la byas pa gsal/ /khang bzang

byed pa bzhin du ni/ /thog mar sa ni yongs su sbyang / /de steng bgegs dang bral byas la/ /gnas ni legs par dag par bya/ /khang bzang skal ba nyams dga' ba/ /blo ldan ji ltar 'dod par bya/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor spyod pas

mchog /rlung gi de nyid rnam par bsgom/ /snga ma bzhin du mnyam bzhag nas/ /srog dang rtsol ba'i sbyor ba dang / /rnal 'byor mchog gi ye shes che/ /rnal 'byor rig pa bsgom par bya/ /thog mar rlung gi de nyid

dang / /de nas sngags kyi de nyid gsal/ /de la rlung gi 'od zer mchog /gsal ba chen po'i kha dog lnga/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rang bzhin/ /phung po lnga yi rang ngo bo/ /de ni ye shes lnga dag pa/ /rlung lnga ru

ni rgyu bar byed/ /mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga'i/ /de nyid mtshan nyid go 'phang mchog /sna yi rtse mo de nyid mchog /rlung lnga dang ni rang ngo bo/ /rlung gi thig le zhes ni bshad/ /yang dag de nyid gsal ba yang / /
sna rtser yungs kar de yang ni/ /rgyud gzhan rnams su gsungs pa ni/ /sna rtser yungs kar de yang ni/ /srog dang rtsol ba'i brtag pa ste/ /srog dang rtsol ba la gnas pa/ /'od lnga sangs rgyas rnams su

bsgom/ /steng gi sna las nges 'byung ba/ /g.yas dang g.yon dang gnyis ga yang / /dal bar rgyu dang rnam bzhir 'gyur/ /nang gi dus ni yin par bshad/ /lkog ma snying ga lte ba dang / /gsang ba'i pad mar 'gro 'ong

ston/ /thun phyed kyi ni dus dag tu/ /go rim ji bzhin gnas pas bstan/ /g.yas pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams/ /me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/ /kha dog dmar zhing gsal ba nyid/ /pad ma'i mgon po rgyu ba'o/ /

g.yon pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba/ /ljang ser dag tu snang ba ste/ /las kyi mgon po rgyu ba'o/ /gnyis ka las ni 'byung ba'i khams/ /gser gyi mdog tu snang ba ste/ /dbang chen

gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid/ /rin chen mgon po rgyu ba'o/ /dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams/ /dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba ni/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/ /rdo rje mgon po rgyu ba'o/ /lus kun la ni gnas
pa'i rlung / /bya ba kun la 'jug pa'o/ /'di ni rnam snang ngo bo ste/ /'chi ba'i lus la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rlung gi de nyid gsal ba 'di/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can/ /rnal 'byor byis pa'i
yul min zhing / /rtog ge pa yis mi shes so/ /dngos grub thams cad gsal byed pa/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi dngos grub pa/ /de nyid kun gyi go 'phang gsal/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi don bsdus pa/ /rdo rje sems

dpa'i go 'phang gsal/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /de nyid mchog ni shin tu phra/ /bla ma'i zhal las rtogs par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rlung gi

de kho na nyid bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ /bde ba chen po gsal ba'i tshig /rdor sems go 'phang mi phyed pa/ /rang rig pas ni mchog gi mchog /kun rtog gi brtags

kyis stong pa/ /bde ba chen po zhes 'di brjod/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dus du ni/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /bde dang sdug bsngal rnam par spangs/ /zhi ba gnyis med rnam par bral/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag /

bde chen zhes ni 'di la brjod/ /rdo rje ye shes lnga yi dngos/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin can/ /lnga ni rtsa nas 'bab pa'i rgyun/ /stong nyid rdo rje'i go 'phang gsal/ /rang bzhin med cing rten med pa/ /gnyis med dngos po rnam bral zhing / /

cha med cha ni rnam par spangs/ /rtag tu rtog pa kun las grol/ /'pho ba med cing zhi ba dang / /zad med bde ba thams cad gsal/ /nyon mongs kun las rnam grol ba/ /bde ba thams cad la 'jug pa/ /stong pa stong pa chen po dang / /shin du stong pa

mchog gi mchog /stong pa dang gzhan stong pa'i gnas/ /nam mkha' lnga yi ngo bo nyid/ /mi mchod mi 'gyur ngo bo nyid/ /mi tshig pa dang mchog tu 'bigs/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi ye shes mchog /rang bzhin rdo rje zhes ni brjod/ /snying rje rnal 'byor yang

dag 'dres/ /mchog tu skye ba'i bde ba 'di/ /de nyid gcig pu ro gcig pa/ /rjod dang brjod bya rnam par spangs/ /bde chen zhes bya'i 'khor lor gnas/ /dbang po rnams kyi spyod yul min/ /mchog tu gnyis med rnal

'byor gyis/ /zhi ba dga' ba'i mtshan nyid gcig /'khor lo bzhi yi rim gyis thob/ /rnal 'byor bzhi yi go 'phang gsal/ /stong nyid lnga yis kun nas gang / /cha bzhi yis ni rnam bkag pa/ /rdo rje mor ni 'dzin pa ni/ /

sems dpa' zhes byar gtan la dbab/ /nam mkha' lnga yi cha yis gang / /'di ni rdo rje sems dpar brjod/ /de nyid bde chen go 'phang ste/ /bzhi pa dga' ba kun la khyab/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma sbyor skyes/ /

mi phyed dbye ba rnam par spangs/ /de yi ngo bo de nyid de/ /rang nyid tshor ba rig pa'o/ /pha rol gzhan gyi spyod yul min/ /dpe bral mtshon par dka' ba dang / /rang gi blo la yang dag gnas/ /rang rig pa zhes bshad

pa'o/ /gzhon nu ma yi rab dga' bzhin/ /mchog tu gsal bar nyams su myong / /de nyid mchog dang pha rol 'gro/ /mchog ni thub pa kun la sogs/ /rtog pa gsal ba'i go 'phang ni/ /de ni mchog dang bde ba che/ /de

nyid gsum du mtshan nyid gcig /dngos dang dngos med las grol bde ba'i bdag nyid 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las ni grol bar rtogs/ /gnyis dang gnyis med rnam dpyod rang bzhin dang bral blo ni zhi ba'i bdag nyid

can/ /gsungs pa'i nyon mongs gcod cing 'jig rten kun rtog dang ni bral ba zhes/ /shes dang shes bya'i rnam rtog dben pa spangs shing bden pa'i rang bzhin dang / /mthar gyur kun khyab zhi ba mchog dang mchog rab de nyid

'gro ba bde la stsol/ /dus ni dus kyi mtha' zhes brjod/ /bzhi pa'i dus sbyor zhes bya ba/ /'khor ba 'khrul ba'i rtog spangs shing / /mya ngan 'das pa thob pa spangs/ /mnyam pa'i nyams ni chen por myos/ /mnyam nyid ye shes
mtshan nyid can/ /gzung ba rnams kyi yul rnams zhes/ /kun nas gzugs la sogs pa las/ /'dzin pa dbang po rnam shes rnams/ /mig la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /de dang bral
zhing mchog tu phra/ /ye shes bde ba kun gyi bdag /sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /bde ba sems ni zhi ba nyid/ /sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid des/ /

de las rnam grol 'jigs pa med/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po/ /stong nyid ye shes chen po'i bdag /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung zhing / /thugs rje zhi bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i bde mi

gnas/ /nyan thos ye shes zhi ba nyid/ /gnyis med mchog dang bse ru'o/ /de dag bde ba rtogs pa yi/ /de dang bral ba'i bde chen po/ /dgang phyir mchog tu dka' ba'i dus/ /nyan thos ye shes zhes brjod do/ /de mtha' bral
