ba'i dga' ba ni/ /rang rgyal mya ngan 'das pa dang / /de ni gnyis med ye shes zhi/ /bde ba yis ni bye brag byas/ /dngos po mkhyen pa'i ye shes che/ /byang chub sems kyang 'dzin par byed/ /rtsa rnams kun la bde ba ni/ /bde ba chen

po'i go 'phang gnas/ /de yi bdag nyid de nyid ni/ /bde ba chen po zhes ni brjod/ /rnal 'byor gcig pus de nyid ni/ /rtog pa rnam rtog bdag nyid min/ /bsnyen nas bzlas pa sbyin sreg min/ /bsam gtan rlung ni bgegs

pas min/ /bya ba ma yin phreng bas min/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgoms pas min/ /cung zad bzhi pa'i dbang bskur gyis/ /bla ma dam pa'i zhal nas 'thob/ /rnal 'byor ma kun kun spyod ni/ /mchog gi ye shes bde
ba che/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las bde ba chen po'i tshig rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ /

rdo rje pad ma mnyam par sbyor/ /gang gis yang dag dngos grub 'gyur/ /tshe 'di nyid la rnal 'byor pa/ /mi phyed rdo rje zhes ni brjod/ /de ni rlung du yang dag grags/ /yi ge a ni phye ba yis/ /rnal 'byor shes pas rtog

mchog stsol/ /de rten snying ga'i pad ma yis/ /'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skal ba bzang / /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /de yi 'dab ma la skyes pa/ /rnam shes brgyad ni

kun rdzob bo/ /mig la sogs pa yang dag rten/ /'gro ba gsum du rnam par spyod/ /de dag 'joms pa rlung rdo rje/ /bgegs mthar byed pa zhes ni brjod/ /rnam shes rnams dang gang de la/ /'jig rten skyong ba rnams
su brjod/ /'jig rten gsum du kun nas khyab/ /'jig rten pa yi lha rnams gnas/ /skyong ba yang ni thams cad kyis/ /yul la sogs pa'i 'bras bu gnas/ /de la rlung gis yang dag sbyor/ /rdo rje pad mo zhes

ni brjod/ /rdo rje snying rjer shes par bya/ /pad ma yang ni stong pa nyid/ /de dag sbyor ba'i mchog tu shes/ /rdo rje pad ma mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje nyi ma zhes ni gsungs/ /'od zer tshogs kyi bdag nyid can/ /de rnams

kyis ni 'byed pa gang / /de ni pad ma zhes su brjod/ /de yi rnal 'byor mchog tu shes/ /rdo rje pad ma mnyam sbyor ba/ /byang chub sems kyang rdo rjer 'gyur/ /bde chen 'khor lo pad ma'o/ /de la'ang de yi sbyor ba gang / /

sbyor ba mchog tu rmad du byung / /bla ma'i gsung ni rdo rje ste/ /slob ma bzang gis thos pa'i snod/ /pad ma de yi gnas de la/ /de yi sbyor ba'ang mchog tu gsal/ /zhi gnas pad ma zhes gsungs la/ /de la

lhag mthong rdo rje'o/ /de gnyis gcig gyur rnal 'byor ni/ /sgom pa yis ni de nyid mthong / /rnal 'byor ma zhal pad mar gnas/ /rdo rje bde chen bla na med/ /pad ma slob ma bzang gi kha/ /man ngag gi ni don gyi snod/ /

de gnyis rnal 'byor kun bdag nyid/ /yang dag de nyid don mthong byed/ /blo ldan rnam rtog bral ba yi/ /rdo rje ling ga zhes ni bshad/ /rnam rtog bral ba'i blo ldan gyis/ /b+ha ga pad ma zhes ni brjod/ /

dam tshig gis brlan rnal 'byor ma/ /de gnyis dngos gcig yang dag sbyor/ /gnyis med ye shes mthong bar byed/ /stong phrag gnyis dang bdun khri yi/ /rtsa rnams rdo rje zhes ni brjod/ /byang chub sems ni 'bab pa'i rtsa/ /

pad ma zhes ni yongs su grags/ /de ni kun du sbyor ba des/ /dga' ba skyed par byed pa yis/ /rdo rje yi yang nyams dga'i stan/ /rang rig rdo rje 'chang pad ma/ /de la de gnyis mnyam sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas ye shes go 'phang

gsal/ /dbang bskur mchog ni rdo rje ste/ /bla ma slob ma snod bzang po/ /de gnyis mchog tu yang dag sbyor/ /yang dag de gnyis kyi ni rgyu/ /e ni pad ma zhes su brjod/ /yi ge ba~M ni rdo rje nyid/ /thig le de nyid mi

shigs pa/ /de gnyis sbyor ba'i ngo mtshar ni/ /de ltar sbyor ba mchog tu shes/ /rdo rje pad snod sdom pa ni/ /rnal 'byor ma yi man ngag dang / /bla ma'i drin gyis yongs su shes/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje

phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rdo rje pad ma yang dag par sbyor ba bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // sngags kyi de nyid ye shes mchog /bshad kyis rdo rje can ni nyon/ /sngags kyi spyod pa spyad pa

yis/ /ngag gis dngos grub myur 'grub 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams/ /sngags ni gzungs bzhin bzlas brjod bya/ /de yis myur du dngos grub 'gyur/ /rlung gi de nyid pha mthar phyin/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya go

'phang zhing / /phyag rgya chen po'i sdom pa'i don/ /mchog gi de nyid ye shes che/ /sngags kyi de nyid bstan pa yin/ /dmigs pa med pa'i go 'phang gsal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nges pa'i rgyu/ /sngags ni yon tan kun gyis
gsal/ /lus ngag yid kyi sdom pa'o/ /de nyid de skyes ye shes mchog /de nyid kun gyi don bsdus pa/ /snying ga'i pad+mar mchog tu gsal/ /de nyid ye shes bla na med/ /zla drug bzlas pas 'grub par ni/ /
'gyur te gzhan du ma yin no/ /rnal 'byor mchog gi thabs dang ni/ /rnal 'byor pas ni yongs su grags/ /dmigs med zhes ni gang gsungs pa/ /de ni don dam par ni brjod/ /sbrul sogs pa yi dbye ba yis/ /
sngags mi bzlos pa gnyis su med/ /'on kyang mi phyed de nyid gsum/ /sngags kyi don dam bsdus pa'o/ /bzlas pa'i dngos grub mtshungs pa med/ /yang dag mnyam par bzhag bzlas na/ /dngos grub mtshungs pa
med par 'gro/ /rnam dag go 'phang bzang po gsal/ /gang shes de ni 'gro ba'i bla/ /sngags don sngags de nyid dang ni/ /sngags kyi man ngag kha brgyud pa/ /sngags kyi man ngag mi gsal ba/ /gang shes
de ni 'gro ba'i bla/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /kun mkhyen 'gro ba'i bla ma la/ /rdo rje sems dpas yang nas yang / /phyag byas nas ni yongs su zhus/ /sngags kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis ming dang don/ /rang bzhin ci zhig rab gsal ba/ /sngags kyi de nyid man ngag ni/ /sngags kyi sdom don ji lta bu/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /rnal
'byor gsum gyi 'bras bdag nyid/ /sngags kyi don dang ming mchog dang / /gnyis med ye shes mtshan nyid can/ /de kho na nyid bshad kyis nyon/ /snying po'i snying po'i don bsdus pa/ /
thog ma med cing zhi ba dang / /dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ /sngags don rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /nyon mongs med cing mi gsal ba/ /rang bzhin
med pa'i mchog gi mchog /ming med rang bzhin med pa dang / /rnam pa med pa'i chen po'i mchog /gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /bde ba yang dag 'phel bar byed/ /skal bzang bde ba 'phel bar

byed/ /thams cad shes shing cha dang bral/ /gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor skyes/ /de nyid de ni don dam yang / /de nyid de bzhin nyid gzhan min/ /de nyid rdo rje 'chang ba'i dngos/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid/ /
khyab pa kun 'gro stong pa nyid/ /nyon mongs thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /dri med dri bral dga' ba dang / /rang rig pa yi go 'phang mchog /dang po'i lha ste nyams dga' bzang / /cha yi tshogs rnams rgyas

par byed/ /man ngag gnas kyi bye brag gis/ /'khor lo'i dbye bas btu bar bya/ /rtsa dang mgrin pa snying ga rkan/ /rtsol ba ji bzhin brjod pa yi/ /de bzhin du ni las bya ba/ /zhi ba la sogs go rim bzhin/ /

ji bzhin dngos grub ye shes dang / /ji bzhin nyams su myong mtshan nyid/ /rang bzhin rdzogs pa ji lta bu/ /rgyun gyi dbye ba ji lta bu/ /rig pa ji bzhin sbyor ji bzhin/ /'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin gnas/ /yang dag
bsam gtan phyag rgya'i rim/ /gzugs rdzogs pa la sogs pa yi/ /bla ma brgyud pas yang dag gnas/ /rab tu 'bad pas bslab par bya/ /gser dang do shal gos dang ni/ /rin chen sna tshogs yon tan mchog /

bran dang las byed grangs med dang / /dad cing gus pa la sogs kyis/ /ji ltar bzhed pa ston pa la/ /rnyed par dka' ba'i dngos rnams kyis/ /sngags kyi don ston bla ma ni/ /dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya/ /phyag byas de

rjes sngags pa yis/ /yang dag bzung nas 'bras bu'i don/ /mi yi rus pa'i smyu gu dang / /sa gzhi rin chen rab 'bar ba/ /yang na dur khrod thal ba ni/ /rab brdal dngos grub ster bar byed/ /thog mar dbang bskur

blang byas nas/ /mdun du dkyil 'khor la sogs bya/ /bgegs mthar byed la gtor ma ni/ /chen po gtsug lag khang du sbyin/ /sku gsung thugs ni sgrub byed pa'i/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i sngags btu bya/ /dang po'i

yi ge thog mar bri/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa yang dag ldan/ /sde tshan tha ma'i mtha' cha ldan/ /sku yi sa bon du ni brjod/ /thog ma'i yi ge nyis 'gyur la/ /uSh+ma Sha yi cha dang ldan/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i sngags btu

bya/ /gsung gi rdo rje snying po mchog /uSh+ma Sha yi cha dang bcas/ /dbyangs yig drug par yang dag ldan/ /sde tshan mtha' yi mtha' char bcas/ /thugs kyi rdo rje go 'phang gsal/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dam

tshig gsum/ /'jig rten gsum yang 'grub par bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yi de nyid mchog /sngags btu ba ni bla na med/ /de nyid dngos grub thams cad byed/ /sngags rnams kun gyi don bsdus pa/ /sngags kyi theg pa

kun yin no/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu sa nyid la/ /dngos grub rnams kyi rnal 'byor mchog /rnal 'byor ye shes bla na med/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po ni/ /ye shes bla na med pa'i mchog /man ngag ji bzhin sngags

zlos pa/ /dngos grub phyir ni lung bzhin gyis/ /de yi dngos grub rgya chen 'gro/ /tshe 'di nyid la sngags shes pas/ /ye shes chen po zhes bshad pa'i/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor che/ /rab gsal sngags ni

mtshungs pa med/ /'dod pa kun la longs spyod byed/ /gang zhig sngags ni mgul pa ru/ /rtag 'chang de kho na nyid shes/ /rtog pa kun yang 'grub par byed/ /dkyil 'khor kun du zhugs pa dang / /dam tshig thams
cad shes pa dang / /blo bzang 'jig rten gsum yang 'grub/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las sngags kyi de kho na nyid gsungs pa'i le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o// //

de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ /grangs kyi rim pa bla na med/ /ji ltar gnas pa'i rlung rnams kyi/ /rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ /gang gis thob pa skal ba bzang / /srog ni thams cad bdag nyid gnas/ /gang

gis yang dag yongs su shes/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni thob par byed/ /rlung gi mtshan nyid mi shes pa/ /'jig rten gsum du rnam par 'khor/ /goms pa thob pa de yang ni/ /bla ma rnal 'byor de shes brgyud/ /rlung gi
mtshan nyid ji lta bu/ /lo tshigs kyi ni mtshan nyid ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /sprin gyi dpal las gsal ba gang / /mdor bsdus nas ni dus ni drug /lo tshigs su ni yongs su grags/ /sbyor ba

gnyis ni dus yin te/ /dus de nyin zhag drug bcu'o/ /nyin dang mtshan du nges pa la/ /nyin zhag gcig ces yongs su grags/ /nyin mtshan chu tshod drug bcu ste/ /de bzhin dbyugu tsa sha'o/ /'byung dang rngub pa'i dus drug

la/ /tsa sha zhes ni yongs su grags/ /skad cig ma drug la ni dbugs/ /de nyid se gol gtogs pa'i tshad/ /thang cig gsum la skad cig go/ /de la yungs kar bskor ba tsam/ /dbugs gsum la ni thang cig go/ /thang cig

de ni yud tsam mo/ /thang cig gsum la mig btsums te/ /de yang mig ni 'dzums pa yi/ /tsam gsum la ni mig btsums te/ /tsam ni thal mo brdabs pa'o/ /bde ba 'char ba de gsum tsam/ /de ni thig le 'pho ba'o/ /sngags pa

gsum la bde bar gnas/ /de ni rab 'gyel 'jigs par brjod/ /dus gsum la ni 'jigs par bshad/ /dus ni phra ba skad cig bdag /'das pa dang ni da ltar dang / /ma 'ongs pa yi mtshan nyid do/ /'das pa'i skad cig gsum

du gsungs/ /da ltar yang ni skad cig gsum/ /ma 'ongs skad cig gsum du bshad/ /de las slar yang skad cig gsum/ /de ltar skad cig gsum gyi cha/ /de las cha gsum de las cha/ /de srid grangs ni ji srid du/ /

rtog pa stong pa gnyis su med/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /srog gi gnas ni bla na med/ /phyogs dang dus kyi rtog pa bral/ /rigs pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa dang / /de yi srog ni shar nas thim/ /gnyis

med de ni bsdus pa'o/ /gzhan yang bshad par bya yis nyon/ /srog ni thim dang 'char ba yi/ /gang tshe skad cig la sogs rtogs/ /kun nas rab tu ma zhi ba/ /de srid srog ni rlung gi gnas/ /grol ba'i gnas ni mi shes

so/ /bshang sgo gsang ba'i dbus na gnas/ /ming ni ma skyes cha chen po/ /de yang rnam shes dang bral ba/ /ye shes lus ni bdag med pa/ /der ni skye ba mchog gi mchog /srog chags rnams kyi mchog tu brjod/ /

rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo ston/ /thog mar 'byung ba bzhi po la/ /sgro 'dogs bskyed pa'i ngo bor byed/ /de tshe rang gi gnas su thim/ /rnam shes las ni skye ba rlung / /de las me ni skye bar 'gyur/ /me las chu ni 'byung bar

byed/ /de las sa ni yang dag skye/ /de dag rnams las phung por byung / /de phyir skye mched rnams dang ni/ /de las rnam shes rang bzhin med/ /brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag pa'i rim/ /ji ltar skye bo de yi gnas/ /thim nas

'gro ba'i rang bzhin du/ /rgyags pa bskyed pa'i rlung chen po/ /nyon mongs yid ni 'das nas ni/ /sngags thob nas ni rnam rgyas te/ /skye mched rnams ni sdud par byed/ /de las rgyags pas chu yi rlung / /rgyags pa bskyed pa

za ba'i phyir/ /phung po rnams kyang sdud byed nyid/ /rim gyis lus chen sgra sgrogs byed/ /de las rgyags pa'i cha ni 'byung / /rgyags pa'i chu ni sdud par byed/ /'byung ba rnams kyis bsdus nas kyang / /go rim ji lta ba
bzhin du/ /de la rlung ni btang bzung 'byung / /rgyags pa'i cha ni za bar byed/ /de nas kyang ni rlung ni sdud/ /khyab cing phra la sgrib par byed/ /de las mi zad btang bzung dang / /rnam shes skad
cig sgrib par byed/ /bsgribs nas de las rnam shes kyang / /bems por song nas brgyal bar 'gyur/ /skye mched cha ni sgrib par byed/ /dag pa'i ye shes mchog gi mchog /de las thim par gyur pa'i srog /

rnam shes dang ni mtshungs par ldan/ /de nyid mchog ni de ltar bshad/ /srog ni thim zhing 'char ba dang / /ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes/ /bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa 'byung / /rigs pa gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /

rdo rje'i sku ni bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /'chi ba med pa'i bsgrub pa ni/ /gang gis 'chi med lus mchog ni/ /thob pa yon tan rnams kyi rten/ /gang phyir sems can tshe thung bas/ /'chi med go 'phang bsgrub mi nus/ /

de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /'chi ba med par rab bsgrub bya/ /bcom ldan mgon po ye shes mchog /rnal 'byor de nyid pha rol byon/ /rdo rje sems dpas phyag byas zhus/ /'chi ba med nyid rigs par ni/ /

ji ltar yang dag thim pa lags/ de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /bya ba kun bsgrub go 'phang ni/ /'chi ba med pa'i rnal 'byor che/ /yang dag de nyid rnam nges pa/ /sems can tshe ni thung ba yis/ /dngos

grub 'grub pa gang yang med/ /de bas rnal 'byor bzang po rnams/ /tshe ring ba ni dge ba'o/ /de la thog mar rnal 'byor mchog /blo bzang nang gi bdag nyid bsgrub/ /lce ni rkan gyi dbus sbyar ba/ /byas nas de kho nyid

tshig bzla/ /sems dpa'i dkyil krung bcas nas ni/ /yang dag rnal 'byor rjes dran bya/ /sna rtser dbugs ni rgyu bya zhing / /kha ni gsal bar dgag par bya/ /rkan gyi gnas son zla ba ni/ /sngags kyi rnal 'byor

gyis ni zhu/ /zhu ba rlung gi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor gtso bos btung / /mtshan phyed kyi ni dus tshod mthar/ /ji srid thun gcig ma chad par/ /de srid rnal 'byor pas sngags bzla/ /rdo rje'i lus ni byed par 'gyur/ /

sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la/ /dbyangs bcas pa dang yang dag ldan/ /yan lag ma nyams rtag tu bzla/ /sgrub pa po yi srog ni 'gugs/ /rdzas kyang rtag tu bsten par bya/ /de nyid lnga yi rim pas skye/ /bzlas

pa rdzogs nas rtag tu ni/ /lus la 'byung ba'i dri ma med/ /lcags lnga'i rang bzhin snod du ni/ /bzhag nas ji srid nyi ma ni/ /'char kar de nas de la yang / /yo Shig rag gtam bde ba ni/ /blugs nas rtag tu rdzas

kyi mchog /bdud rtsi bdun pa'i ming can no/ /nyal kar yang ni de 'thungs na/ /rdzas kyis tshe ni 'phel bar byed/ /sngags kyi rgyal po oM AHhUM/ /de nas lan bdun bzla bar bya/ /lag g.yas ba dan gyis mtshan

la/ /snod bzangs de la bkab nas su/ /yi ge brgya pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /lan gsum du ni dag par bya/ /de phyir bud med gzhon nu ni/ /rtag tu 'khur ba bkang zhing btung / /de ni bza' ba sbyin pa yang / /mar la btags

pa'i 'bras dang ni/ /ma sha dang ni nyi dga' dang / /ra yi 'o ma kha ra kar/ /til rnams cha mnyams byas nas ni/ /mos pa yis ni sbyin sreg bya/ /nyal kar de la bza' ba sbyin/ /bla na med pa'i bza' ba po/ /de ltar

rig pas chog shes nas/ /su la'ang smra bar mi bya'o/ /thams cad sngon bzhin zhi ba ni/ /myur du dngos grub ster bar byed/ /zla ba drug tu'ang gang bsten pa/ /de ni rdo rje'i lus su 'gyur/ /bcud kyis len dang

gser 'gyur sogs/ /tshe dgug pa ni bla na med/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsten par bya/ /phyag rgya che don sgrub pa pos/ /rgas pa med cing srin nad med/ /snyom las med cing lkugs pa med/ /glo skam rlung mkhris nad sogs
med/ /nad dang 'bras dang 'brum bu dang / /shu ba g.yan pa 'brum phran med/ /mdze nad mtshan ma rdol ba med/ /dung dang pad dkar dpal lus ldan/ /'dzam bu'i chu bo gser ltar 'bar/ /rig pa

'dzin pa'i bu mo mchog /de ni rtag tu 'gugs par byed/ /de yi mdza' chen lha rnams te/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams sems par byed/ /lus kyi rang bzhin rtag tu ni/ /phyag bya ba dang mchod par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor
chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rlung gi grangs kyi rim pa'i gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang rtsa rnams ni/ /grangs dang gnas ni bsdus

pa nyon/ /'khor lo'i grangs kyi dbye ba yis/ /ji bzhin rmad du byung ba'i mchog /'khor lo drug la rten bcu drug /lus la lha yi gzhal yas khang / /rnal 'byor ji bzhin gnas ji bzhin/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad

par bya/ /rlung gi 'khor lor gnas pa'i rtsa/ /'dab drug rlung ni mkha' la spyod/ /'dab gsum me yi 'khor lor bshad/ /rtsa gsum gnas ni rim gyis 'char/ /de bzhin longs spyod 'khor lo yang / /rtsa ni bcu

drug yang dag brjod/ /chos kyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i rtsa/ /brgyad ni kun la khyab pa'o/ /de bzhin sprul pa'i 'khor lo yang / /drug bcu rtsa bzhir 'char bar bshad/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo cher/ /rtsa ni sum cu

gnyis su bshad/ /de ltar mdor bsdus rim pa yang / /brgya dang sum bcu gcig lhag par/ /rtsa rnams su ni yang dag bshad/ /gzhan dag tu ni rgyas par yang / /rtsa ni bdun khri nyis stong du/ /gnas kyi dbye bas

phye ba ni/ /nges par brjod pa 'bum sder gsungs/ /rgyud ni chung ngu'ang 'di nyid du/ /snying po las ni snying por gsungs/ /smin ma'i dbus gnas rlung 'khor lo/ /bye ba 'khyil pa mi bzad pa/ /mi bzang brtan dang mtshan

nyid can/ /rtsa thung drug gi mtshan nyid do/ /'dzin pa rtog med gang ba ni/ /rtsa gsum gru gsum me dkyil 'khor/ /mgrin pa'i 'og tu bshad pa yin/ /dri ma dang bral gsal ba dang / /drag po dang ni gsum yin

no/ /yang dag zhugs dang shin tu zhugs/ /shin du bzang dang bzang por 'gro/ /stobs chen dang ni mi bzad che/ /mdzes chen mdun du skyes pa che/ /rgyags pa'i rtag dang rgyags pa'i cha/ /rgyags pa'i chu dang rgyas

smyo byed/ /rgyags dang rgyags pa'i rgyu mthun dang / /rgyags pa'i rlan dang rgyags pa 'chang / /rtsub dang mkha' dang 'byung brlang dang / /dbugs mi bde dang g.ya' mkha' 'gro/ /'dab chags yan lag khwa yi gdong / /

za phod mi bzad sgra sgrogs dang / /dri ldan rdeg dang rdul ba dang / /dbyangs dang dbyangs skyes dang ni sprin/ /chu ba mthong dang rgyun ltar sngo/ /yud tsam gtso bo yud ma skyes/ /rgyab tu kha bltas dbyug pa dang / /dbyug snyoms

dang ni rnying pa dang / /tshigs kyi lha dang tshigs kyi tshig /tshigs kyi tshad dang brtul ba dang / /tshigs kyi gnas dang tshigs kyi gdong / /tshigs 'od tshigs kyi lu gu rgyud/ /dul byed dud 'gro gzi brjid dang / /dri med dul ba'i

snyems pa dang / /chu 'phyang lto dang chu 'phyang chags/ /chun 'phyang chun 'phyang phyed sbrang bu/ /phru gu phru gu ster dri ba/ /lo ma lo ma'i mgrin pa dang / /rab mchog ma dang rab gsal te/ /de ltar drug bcu rtsa bzhir bshad/ /lte ba

sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnas/ /bdud rtsi mchog gis yongs su gang / /rin chen chen po pad ma dang / /rdo rje chen po stobs po che/ /mgo bo che dang sgra che dang / /nyes dga' chen po myos pa che/ /'di brgyad chos kyi 'khor

lo'i dbus/ /snying ga'i pad mar yang dag gnas/ /longs spyod longs spyod ster ldan dang / /nyi 'gro gsal dang skal ba dang / /sgom pa dang ni thal ba'i gdong / /bza' ster bza' dang bkres pa dang / /bcud len ros ni
bkur ba dang / /ro 'jigs pa dang ro dang ni/ /khrung khrung longs spyod 'khor lor gnas/ /grangs ni bcu drug tu ni brjod/ /de steng rim rigs 'dod pa can/ /'dod can ma dang srog gi lus/ /zla 'thung

zla ster mdzes pa ni/ /'dod chags min smra ku sha dang / /shi ba spo dang dag pa dang / /me dang me ro ne tso dang / /gang la gnyis ro ldan pa dang / /kos ring chang ster bdud rtsi dang / /dung can dang ni dung rna dang / /dug gi mig dang dug gi

sna/ /rgyags dbang rgyags pa brkam pa dang / /rgyags pas brgyal dang ngo mtshar rgyags/ /snyems pa dang ni tshogs kyi sten/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis zhes ni brjod/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che/ /mchog tu dga' ba ster

bar byed/ /phra dang reg bya mchog tu phra/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /rang nyid bde chen rang bzhin dang / /gzhan dag la yang ster bar byed/ /de ltar yang dag rtsa yi rim/ /bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya/ /rtsa

yi rim med nges par ni/ /phung po la sogs mi 'byung ngo / /phung po med na ye shes che/ /rnal 'byor pa yis thob mi 'gyur/ /phung po lnga yi bdag nyid lus/ /mkha' 'gro lngar ni rab tu grags/ /de nyid 'byung ba

lnga yis ni/ /ye shes lngar ni rnam par gnas/ /de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo shes par bya/ /ji ltar chu yi dbus kyi shing / /myur du yang ni 'phel nas 'gro/ /de las 'bras bu sogs ldan pa/ /

ster bar 'di la the tshom med/ /de bzhin phung po shing zhes bya/ /rtsa yi chu yis 'phel nas ni/ /'phel bas yang dag 'bras bu ni/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster byed/ /lha yi rnam pa'i ngo bo yis/ /rtsa rnams rang

bzhin bsgom par bya/ /gnyis phrad pa las reg bya gnyis/ /gal te rdo rje lhag gyur na/ /de tshe me ni yang dag 'bar/ /de rjes me yi 'khor lo'i dbus/ /'khor lo'i ming can pad ma rnams/ /rim gyis rim gyis bye bar

'gyur/ /'di ni rtsa las 'bab de las/ /byang chub sems ni bde ba che/ /sprul pa'i snying po yang dag thob/ /ngo bo gcig gyur bsdus nas ni/ /'bab pa'i nyi ma zla ba'o/ /mi dbang dkyil 'khor dbus su yang / /

gang phyir srad bu'i rnam par gnas/ /rgyu gcig tu yang shes nas ni/ /de nyid 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis/ /g.yas pa nyi ma'i rnam pa dang / /g.yon pa zla ba'i rnam par 'byung / /gang tshe g.yas pa'i nyi ma ni/ /

de tshe khrag 'gyur bde ba'o/ /gang tshe g.yon pa'i zla ba gsal/ /bde ba kun kyang de lta bu'o/ /de gnyis khongs su chud pa'i me/ /yan lag bdun nyid yang dag gnas/ /sngon la rlung gi rnam shes ni/ /brgya lam gang tshe 'khrul

gyur na/ /pha yi mkha' la mtshungs par gnas/ /de tshe chags pa'i dbang du 'gyur/ /gsang gnas zla mtshan ldan pa'i rtsa/ /me dang nyi ma 'char ba na/ /de tshe lhag par chags pas non/ /chags pa mchog tu 'dod par 'gyur/ /rdo rje pad ma 'dres

pa'i gdong / /'jug pa pha yi kha yi rlung / /de tshe sa bon du ni 'gyur/ /sa bon las ni sems can 'byung / /de phyir rtsa las yang dag 'char/ /'bras bu ngo mtshar can ni skye/ /de nyid byang chub sems kyang ni/ /'dzin pa srog ni bsdus

pa'o/ /ye shes mchog dang de nyid mchog /mchog tu bde ba rmad byung che/ /ye shes rnal 'byor thob pa yis/ /mchog tu bde ba bla na med/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rtsa'i 'khor
lo'i gnas kyi rim par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rnal 'byor lus la rim ji bzhin/ /rtsa rnams rtag tu yang dag ni/ /rgyud pa

yi ni rigs kyis skye/ /gsal ba ru ni ma gsungs pa/ /dad pa'i bsam pa rnam spangs pa/ /skye bo skal ba med don du/ /gang du'ang gsal bar ma gsungs pa/ /snyigs ma lnga zhes bya ba'i dus/ /sems can myur du dngos
grub don/ /snod du bya bar 'dod pa yis/ /rang byung ye shes rmad byung ba/ /rnal 'byor lus kyi bde chen po'i/ /'khor lo'i rtsa ni sum bcu gnyis/ /byang chub sems ni gsal 'bab pa'i/ /rtsa

rnams yang dag rnam bshad bya/ /de ni bde ba chen po'i gnas/ /de ni mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /ka tsa Ta ta pa'i sde tshan/ /ya ra la wa Sha sha sa/ /de dag rim par shes par bya/ /slar yang de dag bsdus nas ni/ /

sde tshan tsam ni gcig tu 'gro/ /de yang zhi ba'i ye shes mchog /byang chub sems la thim nas 'gro/ /kun rtog thams cad spangs nas ni/ /bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog /shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs/ /
thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /de las 'khor lo gsum dbye bas/ /rtsa ni brgyad kyi dbye ba las/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sngags kyis ni/ /gsum phye bdun bcu rtsa gnyis gsal/ /de ni stong du rab

phye ba/ /so sor 'phros pa'i bdag nyid can/ /stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis kyis/ /rtsa rnams kyi ni grangs zhes bya/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan ni/ /khams gsum gyi ni dbye ba yis/ /stong phrag nyi shu rtsa

bzhir ni/ /'khor lo 'khor lo'i dbye ba yis/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi ni/ /nges pa'i man ngag rjes 'brangs na/ /phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor de nyid mchog /lha yi rim pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rtsa ni so sor dbye
ba yis/ /bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o/ /de las yang ni sdom sbyor bar/ /song nas phan tshun kun nas brten/ /slar yang bdun bcu rtsa gnyis 'gro/ /bde chen 'khor lo rtsa yi gnas/ /rtsa ni sum bcu
rtsa gnyis las/ /de yang 'khor lo sdom par 'gyur/ /'khor lo re re'i gtso bo'i rtsa/ /brgyad brgyad du ni 'gyur bar gsal/ /rnal 'byor lus kyi rtsa mchog ces/ /rmad byung sum bcu rtsa gnyis ni/ /yi ge
sum bcu gnyis dbye bas/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor gtso bos thob/ /phung po khams dang don yul nyid/ /dbang po'i sgo ni srung ba'o/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis dbye bdag nyid/ /gsal ba yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog /

lus kyi gzhal yas khang du yang / /de nyid kyi ni nang bzhugs pa/ /de bzhin gshegs dang lha mo dang / /gzugs la sogs dang rgyal sras rnams/ /khro bo bcu zhes bya ba yi/ /de nyid mchog ni yang dag bzhugs/ /slar

yang khro bo rgyal sras la/ /nang du mi snang bar ni 'gro/ /rgyal sras rnams ni gzugs la sogs/ /lha mo rnams la bsdus nas ni/ /de rnams kyang ni sa sogs 'gro/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs lnga la/ /sku gsung thugs

kyi rdo rje la/ /de dag la yang bsdus nas 'gro/ /de kho na nyid bde gcig pu/ /de la yang ni thim nas 'gro/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams las grol/ /bde ba kun rten pa yi mchog /de yang nyams myong tsam las slar/ /de ni

yi ge tsam la thim/ /yi ge tsam ni thig ler thim/ /thig le yang ni sgra la thim/ /sgra yang sgra tsam la ni thim/ /sgra tsam 'od gsal ba la'o/ /'od gsal go 'phang yang dag par/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /rnam par shes dang chos dbyings dang / /

don dam pa dang bde ba che/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol ba/ /byang chub sems ni dri ma med/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i zhi ba che/ /gnyis med ye shes rmad du byung / /dbang bskur bzhi pa bde ba dang / /bzhi ba'i dga' ba go 'phang

mchog /de la sogs ming bye brag gis/ /go 'phang mchog ni gsungs pa yin/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i dbye ba yis/ /rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ /de ltar bskyed dang rdzogs pa yi/ /rim don bla ma brgyud las shes/ /zhi ba gnyis
med mtshan nyid can/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rnal 'byor pa'i lus kyi rtsa bsdus pa'i le'u ste bcwo brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad
bya ba/ /sna tshogs la sogs skad cig bdag /yang dag gzhung lugs mtshan nyid ni/ /de nyid ji lta ba bzhin nyon/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par smin/ /rnam par 'joms dang mtshan nyid bral/ /

skad cig ma ni bzhi zhes gsungs/ /rnam par phye nas slar bshad bya/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'dod/ /de yi skad cig dbye bar bya/ /a ling ga na dang / tsum pa na sha dang tsum sha na dang ku tsa gra ha dang bu la tra tra han dang

da sha na dang da kha da na dang do la dang pu tsi tsi dang kur pa la sogs pa'i ka ra na dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig go/ na li stong phrag bdun bcu gnyis/ /lus ni bde ba rgyas pa na/ /mgrin pa dag tu gang phyin pa/ /rnam smyin zhes

bya skad cig go/ lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i mtshan nyid can/ /thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i/ /rnam pa med pa'i skad cig go/ na li las byung shu kra 'das/ /rnam pa dang bral skad cig go/ ye shes

bzhi dang stong pa bzhi/ /skad cig ma ni bzhi las rtogs/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las skad cig ma'i mtshan nyid rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //

de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dga' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid ni/ /lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yi/ /ji lta ba yi rim pa yi/ /dga' ba'i bde ba dang po ste/ /mchog tu dga' ba gnyis pa dang / /dga' bral zhes pa

gsum pa dang / /bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par bshad/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lor dga' ba dang / /mchog dga' chos kyi 'khor lor gnas/ /longs spyod bral ba'i dga' ba dang / /lhan cig skyes dang bde ba che/ /lugs bzlog rim pa

zhes ni gsungs/ /de rjes lugs 'byung bshad bya ste/ /bde chen 'khor lo spyi bo la/ /de ni dga' bar bshad pa yin/ /longs spyod 'khor lor mchog dga' dang / /dga' bral chos kyi 'khor lor gnas/ /sprul pa'i 'khor

lor lhan cig skyes/ /dga' ba nyams su myong bar byed/ /blta dang dgug dang de bzhin brda/ /kha la tsum pa byed pa yi/ /dga' ba nyams su myong bar shes/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan nyid do/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor

ma mchog tu/ /de bzhin skra la 'dzin pa dang / /rdo rje pad mar bzhag nas ni/ /nyams myong sa ni skad cig mchog /rnam smin zhes bya skad cig nyid/ /de nyid rgyur ni rnam par shes/ /rtsa yi dbus na rab gsal gnas/ /

gtum mo yang ni rnam rtog 'joms/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che/ /mchog gi cha ni zhu bar byed/ /bral dga'i gnas su myong ba na/ /rnam rtog skad cig mtshan nyid do/ /de la ro gcig rang bzhin ni/ /rtsa ni gcig gi

rgyun la rten/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang zhi/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig gsungs/ /stong nyid kun gyi gzhi yi mchog /chos kyi 'khor lo de la te/ /rnal 'byor pa yis

bsgrub bya ba/ /nyams su myong ba mchog dga' ste/ /rnam smin skad cig mtshan nyid do/ /longs spyod 'khor lo de las ni/ /steng du byed pa'i skad cig la/ /nyams myong bral ba'i dga' ba ni/ /rnam 'joms mtshan

nyid skad cig go/ bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che/ /de thob mtshan nyid skad cig ma/ /lhan cig skyes dga'i nyams myong ba/ /mtshan nyid dang bral skad cig go/ rtsa gsum kun gyi nam mkha' che/ /rnal 'byor ma tshogs yang dag gzugs/ /de las

rab sad nyams myong ba/ /mtshan nyid gcig par ro mtshungs pa/ /rnal 'byor chen pos nyams su myong / /slar yang mtshan nyid med par 'gro/ /rab tu sad pa nyams su myong / /stong phrag bcu drug bdag nyid do/ /
bde chen go 'phang mi phyed pa/ /gnyis med rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas/ /de ltar 'di ni dga' dbye ba/ /gzhan du gsal bar ma gsungs so/ /rnal 'byor ma yi bka' drin gyis/ /bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya/ /
rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las dga' ba'i mtshan nyid rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang

bshad kyis nyon/ /thig le gsum ni bla na med/ /gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi dngos grub 'gyur/ /rtsa rnams kun du 'bab pa dang / /byang chub sems ni zhu byas pa/ /rdo rje 'am ni pad

ma'i rtse/ /rlung ni bzung ba'i skad cig la/ /rkan dgug pa yi sbyor ba dang / /k+Sh+mi gyi sngags kyi sbyor ba yis/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni thob par byed/ /bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog /chos kyi 'khor lo de nyid

mchog /snying ga'i pad ma'i lte ba la/ /dbus su hU~M ni bkod nas ni/ /thams cad stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol/ /de kho na nyid lus skyob pa/ /phyogs yul dus dang rnam par grol/ /

steng dang 'og ni rnam par spangs/ /sems bral rang gi ngo bor gnas/ /ngag gi dra ba yongs su spangs/ /rgyud dang mtshan ma dang bral zhing / /rtog pa'i spyod yul rnams dang bral/ /gnyis pa kun la rnam par grol/ /mchog

tu rtag cing zhi ba'o/ /rlung gi thig le rnal 'byor mchog /kha dog lnga pa gsal ba che/ /sna rtser sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /kun nas kyang ni bsgom par bya/ /yi ge oM ni sngags kyi mchog /rnal 'byor pa yis
bzla bar bya/ /snga ma bzhin du ye shes lnga/ /zhi ba la sogs de bzhin bsgrub/ /bag chags rim pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/ /rtsa ni gsum po 'di ni mchog /bsdus nas slar yang

dbye ba ni/ /phan tshun du ni so sor 'gro/ /rdzas kyi thig le khong chud pa/ /thig le gnyis te sngags dang rlung / /sngags kyi thig le de nyid mchog /thig le gnyis ni 'od dang rdzas/ /slar yang rlung gi thig le yang / /

thig le gnyis kyi nang du 'gro/ /sngags dang rdzas kyi bdag nyid can/ /rnal 'byor pa yis yang dag shes/ /zla ba nyi ma me yi rtsa/ /gsum zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /la la nA dang ra sa nA/ /a ba d+hU tI zhes bya'i

ming / /sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dang / /de nyid du ni yongs su grags/ /steng dang 'og tu khyab pa nyid/ /so sor lu gu rgyud tshul du/ /rtsa rnams kun la khyab nas ni/ /yang dag man ngag rim pas gnas/ /
de ltar rnal 'byor mchog tu phra/ /shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs/ /dngos grub thams cad kyi ni gzhi/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rmad byung che/ /gso sbyong gis min bzlas pas min/ /phreng bas ma yin

'gog pas min/ /grangs min dus min sbyin sreg min/ /'byin byed 'gogs byed kyis ni min/ /ye shes chen po'i go 'phang zhi/ /rnal 'byor gcig pus rtogs par byed/ /mngon par shes pa lnga dang ni/ /de bzhin ye shes lnga yi mchog /thig
le gsum ni rnam sgom pa/ /zhi sogs bya ba yang dag ni/ /rnal 'byor mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid ni/ /ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje sems/ /dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya

gsungs/ /gnas dang grangs kyi dbye ba yis/ /bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las thig le gsum rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig
pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon/ /de nyid gsum gyi go 'phang mchog /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /snying po bdag nyid dam tshig ni/ /yi ge gsum ni sku gsung thugs/ /

snying po yang ni bshad par bya/ /de ni rnam phye khyod nyon cig /de ni ji lta ba bzhin bshad/ /oM ni sku yi rdo rje yi/ /snying po ru ni yang dag bshad/ /yi ge a dang yi ge u/ /yi ge ma zhes bya ba gsum/ /AHni chos
'khor pad ma la/ /rlung gi 'khor lo la ni khyab/ /sgrib med pa yi rlung chen po/ /srog tu gsungs pa thams cad bsdus/ /cha med cha dang bral ba dang / /dngos po dngos med dbus na gnas/ /thig
le 'khor lo'i cha la khyab/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi yi ge mchog /sngags rnams kun gyi don gyi gnas/ /sngags rnams thams cad rab sad byed/ /sngags rnams kun gyi phan byed cing / /ngag gi 'khor lo
rab sad byed/ /dngos su lan gsum gyi ni gzhi/ /'byung ba thams cad dbang du byed/ /zad med 'phel ba med pa'i gnas/ /byang chub sa bon bde ba che/ /gzugs med khams su yang dag bshad/ /'khor lo bzhi
yi don bsdus pa'o/ /u ni longs spyod 'khor lor gnas/ /me dang nyi ma 'dra ba yi/ /mgrin pa'i mtha' nas spyi gtsug mtha'/ /khyab pa gzi brjid kyi ni lus/ /gzugs kyi khams zhes bya bar shes/ /gnas ris

bcu bdun bdag nyid can/ /bde chen 'khor lo zhes byar bshad/ /yi ge ma ni thig le tsam/ /gdong tshad mtha' yi sor bzhi tsam/ /dga' ba'i gtsug tor gnas na gnas/ /zla ba'i gzugs dang 'dra ba yi/ /bde ba chen

po'i go 'phang zhi/ /rtsa ni kun la khyab pa po/ /mi phyed lus kyi go 'phang ni/ /'dod pa'i khams zhes bshad pa yin/ /bsdus na gnas ris nyi shu'o/ /de ltar rlung ni gnas gsum gyi/ /rtsa gsum gyi ni gnas su 'dus/ /

yi ge oM gyi brda shes na/ /khams gsum rnam par sad par byed/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'gro ba'i gzugs/ /spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rgyu/ /rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni/ /sna yi bu ga nas ni byung / /yang dag nyi ma zla ba

gnyis/ /sbas pa nang nas rgyu bar byed/ /me ni 'bar ba rtse mo la/ /smin ma'i dbus su srog gi rlung / /de ltar gcig pu'ang gsum du bshad/ /gtan la phab ste de nyid gsum/ /zhi ba khams gsum la khyab pa/ /

skye ba'i sa bon rgyas pa'o/ /yi ge a ni ye shes mchog /gsung gi rdo rje snying po mchog /a ni gnyis dang yi ge ha~M/ /ring por byas te dbye ba gsum/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi don bsdus pa/ /yi ge AHni sngar bshad

zin/ /gnyis pa yang ni srog gi rlung / /stong nyid ye shes ming can te/ /srog dang rtsol ba gnyis su rigs/ /yul dang dbang po bsdus pa'o/ /kun gzhi dang ni nyon mongs yid/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /
ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas ni/ /gsung gi rdo rje brjod pa'i mchog /AHni chos 'khor pad ma las/ /mgrin par yi ge AHnyid 'gyur/ /srog nyid dang ni thur sel dang / /yi ge ha yis kun nas ni/ /mgrin pa'i
dbus na gnas pa bcings/ /a ha~M kha nas gsal bar brjod/ /ro 'bab pa yi khrung khrung ni/ /ro skyur ba zhes bya bar gsungs/ /bkug nas rtag tu khyab par byed/ /gzugs kyi khams ni 'bar ba'o/ /ha dang de

bzhin yi ge u/ /de ni yi ge ma dang gsum/ /rkang pa nas ni mgo mtha'i bar/ /'khor lo bzhi yi don bsdus pa/ /ha ni thur sel ming can rlung / /bshang sgo gsang ba'i dbus na gnas/ /yi ge u ni khyab byed rlung / /

mgrin pa pad ma'i dbus na gnas/ /yi ge ma ni srog rlung yin/ /dpral ba rlung gi 'khor lo la/ /de dag gcig gyur snying ga nas/ /thugs kyi sa bon du ni brjod/ /mi bskyod snying po kha dog gnag /gzugs med khams

kyi ming can no/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /snying po gsum du rab tu bshad/ /lag na rdo rjes thal sbyar nas/ /slar yang thams cad mkhyen la zhus/ /rdo rje gsum gyi sngags don dang / /gnas kyi dbye ba 'tshal

lags na/ /'di rnams dbus na bdag po gang / /ji lta bu zhig gtso bos gsungs/ /gtso bo rdo rje 'chang ba che/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa/ /gsang ba'i mchog tu gsungs pa yi/ /sbas pa'i don ni khyod
'dri ba/ /rgyud rnams kun du ma gsungs pa/ /rab tu bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ /thugs kyi sa bon bdag po ste/ /kun gyi nang na rnam rtog med/ /gang phyir gtso bos gzhan rnams ni/ /sgrib

dang de bzhin 'phrog pa dang / /rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni/ /lus kun la ni khyab par byed/ /sna yi bu ga las ni rgyu/ /lus la rtag tu 'byung bar byed/ /'gro ba drug gi 'khor lo'i lam/ /gang gi stobs
kyis khyab par byed/ /gsum pa rnal 'byor pa yis rtogs/ /rnam rtog med par rmad byung che/ /rlung rnams thams cad 'gags pas na/ /skyes pa de nyid rtogs pa'o/ /rlung ni thams cad 'gog
pa yang / /yang dag rigs par nga yis bshad/ /sprul pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus/ /rgyud 'di pad ma gnyis su gsungs/ /drug bcu rtsa bzhi brgyad 'dab gnyis/ /steng dang 'og tu kha
bltas nas/ /slar yang kha sbyor tshul du gnas/ /srog dang mthur sel rgyud bar byed/ /de nyid rtog pa dang bcas pa/ /rlung gnyis su ni gsal bar gsungs/ /sku dang gsung gi snying po gnyis/ /la la nA

dang ra sa nA/ /a ba d+hU tI mchog gi gnas/ /de gnyis dbus na mchog gi mchog /rnam rtog med pa rlung gi rlung / /rtag tu rgyu zhing kun la khyab/ /rnam rtog gang thob rtag tu ni/ /las kun byed cing mkhas par

'gyur/ /rlung gi rang bzhin bye brag ni/ /brgya dang brgyad las gang rgyal ba/ /dus kun du ni 'phel bar rigs/ /rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes pa/ /skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub/ /de yis thob par rgyud 'dir

gsungs/ /de ni gang tshe skad cig thob/ /de ni skad cig mchog tu gsungs/ /de yang ji ltar thob par byed/ /de la rigs pa ru ni brjod/ /thog mar rnal 'byor pa chen po/ /blo bzang gis ni zhi gnas bsgom/ /bskyed pa'i rim

pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /khro bo'i phyag rgya byas nas kyang / /dbang po yi ni sgo dgu la/ /thams cad du ni kun rdzob pa/ /hU~M bzlas pa ni mtshungs pa med/ /mchog tu rgyun mi 'chad par ni/ /zla ba gcig tu bzlas byas na/ /de rjes

skad cig de la thob/ /gang phyir de ni bzlas byas na/ /snying ga'i pad ma'ang steng bltas 'gro/ /de nas gsang ba'i pad ma las/ /kha sbyor ba ni de bas kyang / /rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni/ /de las rnam par bcas nas

'gro/ /rnam rtog med pa'i rlung chen po/ /sku gsung rdo rje bcad nas ni/ /rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba ster/ /sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni 'thob/ /a ba d+hU tI'i rgyun la gnas/ /smin dbus rlung ni bcad byas pa/ /de thob thob

byas dga' ba ni/ /rgyun du 'chang zhing mi bzad pa/ /chags sogs bral zhing zhi ba dang / /rang rig bde ba chen po'o/ /'dir ni rgyu mtshan bshad par bya/ /sngags grub pa yi rnal 'byor pas/ /'dar dang rngul dang ba spu langs/ /

rtag tu dga' ba'i bsam pa dang / /gdong ni zangs mdog yid du 'ong / /kun gyis mthong dang dga' ba dang / /grangs lhag chad pa la sogs dang / /'jig rten chos dang de bzhin gnas/ /rnal 'byor sngags kyi de nyid
ni/ /gnod pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las sku gsum gyi snying po bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// //
de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ /de nyid gsum gyi tshig bstan bya/ /bdag nyid sngags sogs byed pa yis/ /ji lta ba bzhin rim pa rnams/ /bdag gi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog /rdo rje sems dpa'

nyid kyi rgyu/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bdag /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pu/ /kun mkhyen go 'phang mi gsal byed/ /rigs kyi dbye bas rab gsal byed/ /rigs ni lnga yi rnam pa gang / /de ni phung po'i
mtshan nyid do/ /phra rag la sogs dbye ba yis/ /thogs bcas thogs med mtshan nyid dang / /'byung ba chen po bzhi yi dngos/ /'di ni gzugs kyi phung por gsungs/ /der ni rnam

snang ngo bo dang / /thams cad spros bar byed pa'i rgyu/ /bde dang sdug bsngal mchog tu zhi/ /grang dang dro ba mchog gi mchog /gang gis shin du rig pa ni/ /de ni tshor ba'i phung por bshad/ /rin chen 'byung ldan nyid

kyi mtshan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spros bdag nyid/ /glang po bong bu ce spyang dang / /rta dang ri dgas dang ni phag /pha dang ma dang pha yi spun/ /mdza' bo snag gi gnyen tshan sogs/ /gang gis yang dag shes pa ni/ /

'du shes phung po'i mtshan nyid ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med/ /de ni spros pa kun nas gsal/ /'gro ba khyab par yongs su shes/ /dge dang mi dge'i las 'bras bu/ /gzhan yang lung du ma bstan min/ /

de yi 'du byed du ni bshad/ /don yod spro ba'i rang bzhin can/ /'khor ba dngos dang dngos med sogs/ /kun rtog 'byung ba'i bdag nyid can/ /rnam shes zhes ni rnam par shes/ /mi bskyod spro ba'i bdag nyid can/ /

de ltar phung po yongs shes na/ /lung dang rigs pa'i shes pa skye/ /dzi na dzika dang rata na d+h+r-ika / A ro lika dang pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika / badzra d+h+r-ig ces bya ba'i sngags/ /ci rigs par ni rim bzhin shes/ /spyan la sogs pa bzhi
po gang / /de ni khams gsum yongs su brtag /sra ba la sogs bzhir phye bas/ /sa yi khams su yongs su brtag /gti mug dga' bar mngon par brjod/ /de yi spyan du yongs su grags/ /zhu ba ci mchi khu ba
sogs/ /rdzas kyi bye brag yang dag bstan/ /chu yi khams su rnam par shes/ /mA ma kI yi bdag nyid can/ /dro ba bza' btung smin pa dang / /gzi brjid 'phro ba nyid thams cad/ /me yi khams su shes

par bya/ /gos dkar spro ba'i bdag nyid can/ /'byung ba rngub pa rab tu 'phel/ /rlung rnams kyi ni tshogs kyi mchog /brkyang ba dang ni bskum pa dang / /steng dang 'og tu byed pa dag /de ni rlung gi khams su shes/ /sgrol ma spro

ba'i bdag nyid can/ /de ltar 'byung ba bzhi po yang / /rnal 'byor mchog nyid rnam par shes/ /mo ha ra ti dwe Shar ti/ /rA ga ra ti badzra ra ti/ /de ltar rim pas sngags rnams ni/ /de dag mngon sum cho ga yis/ /gzugs

la sogs pa yul gyi tshogs/ /lha mo'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du/ /rnal 'byor mchog gis rnam par shes/ /stong nyid gcig pu rgyu gcig pu/ /sngo ser sogs kyi dbye ba dang / /ring dang thung ba'i rnam pa yis/ /

lha mo de gzugs rdo rje ma/ /phyi rol gzung ba'i rang bzhin can/ /mkhar rnga sil snyan sbubs rol mo/ /de bzhin rnga snyan pi bang dang / /bstod dang smad sogs sgra dag ni/ /sgra yi rdo rje ma zhes bya/ /gzung ba

dang ni rang bzhin mchog /rnam par shes pa sad par byed/ /dri nga ba dang dri bzang dang / /sbyar ba'i dri yi mchog rnams ni/ /dri rdo rje mar de shes bya/ /gzung ba'i rnam par cher dmar ba/ /ro drug mchog tu
ldan pa ni/ /lan tshwa skyur la sogs dbye yis/ /rdo rje ro mar de shes bya/ /kun kyang gzung ba'i rnam pa'o/ /mig sogs dbang po la brten pa/ /rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad ni/ /rim pa ji lta ba
bzhin du/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyad du shes/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid che/ /mig gnyis sa yi snying por gsungs/ /gzugs la sogs pa ci rigs par/ /rang gi ngo bo spro bar byed/ /sgra yi

rnam pa thams cad nas/ /bye brag so so ci rigs par/ /sgra yi rnam par shes pa ni/ /phyag na rdo rjer yang dag bshad/ /dri yi bye brag la spyod pa/ /so sor ji ltar rigs par ni/ /sna yi rnam shes mtshan nyid
ni/ /nam mkha' snying po rnam par shes/ /ro yi bye brag la spyod pa/ /dbye ba so so'i go rims bzhin/ /lce yi rnam shes mtshan nyid ni/ /'jig rten dbang phyug tu ni shes/ /reg bya'i bye

brag la spyod pa/ /bye brag so so'i go rims bzhin/ /reg bya'i rnam shes mtshan nyid ni/ /sgrib pa rnam par sel bar shes/ /yid kyi bye brag la spyod pa/ /dbye ba so so'i go rims bzhin/ /yid kyi rnam shes
zhes gsungs pa/ /'jam dpal zhes bya'i ming can no/ /rgyus pa kun la yang dag sbyor/ /dbye ba so so'i go rims bzhin/ /bag chags yul gyi bdag nyid can/ /byams pa ru ni rnam par shes/ /rtsa rnams
so so'i mtshan nyid can/ /bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin can/ /'di ni kun tu bzang por bshad/ /de ltar rnam shes tshogs brgyad mchog /yang dag de nyid bla na med/ /mig sogs

dbang po'i rnam shes ni/ /gzugs sogs mthong ba'i rang bzhin no/ /rje ngar dpung pa brla thal gong / /sgo gnyis dang ni thams cad kyi/ /shes pa bcu yi mtshan nyid ni/ /khyab pa rnams su yongs su shes/ /
gshin rje mthar byed shes mthar byed/ /pad ma mthar byed bgegs mthar byed/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba/ /dbyig sngon dang ni stobs po che/ /gnod mdzes gtsug gtor 'khor lo sgyur/ /de ltar de

rnams gnas dbye bas/ /ye shes gsum gyis yongs su gsal/ /ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas ni/ /yang dag de kho na nyid rten/ /gang gis de nyid cho ga bzhin/ /bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya/ /sngags kyi de nyid rnal

'byor mchog /ye shes chen po legs rgyas pa/ /skye med zad med mi gsal dang / /'gyur ba med cing sgrib pa med/ /gnyis med 'jigs bral zhi ba dang / /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang mchog /sprul dang btus dang

mtha' med dang / /mgo med yongs su dbye ba yis/ /oM dang hU~M phaT swa hA'i mtha'/ /sbrul zhes bya ba mngon par brjod/ /rang ming yon tan dang ni gzugs/ /btus pa'i mtshan nyid ming can no/ /oM la sogs
pa zhabs med pa/ /mtha' med ces bya'i ming can no/ /swA yi mtha' can oM med pa/ /mgo med zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /thams cad yod la oM med pa/ /mgo med ces ni bshad pa yin/ /de ltar mtshan nyid

shes nas ni/ /sngags kyi de nyid bla na med/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /'di yi rgya chen don shes bya/ /ye shes de nyid rnal 'byor mchog /gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /dbang po thams

cad mnyam par sbyor/ /dngos po thams cad gcig pu'i lus/ /ngag gi rnam rtog kun spangs pa/ /snang ba thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /bdag byin brlab pa'i rang bzhin can/ /kun la khyab pa rmad du byung / /rang

rig pa yi rnal 'byor mchog /skad cig bzhi yi mtshan nyid ni/ /cha bral kun 'gro khyab pa dang / /rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes shing / /kun rdzob yongs su mi shes pa/ /don dam rang gi ngo bo ni/ /rdzogs pa'i
rim pas dbye ba dang / /sngags kyi de nyid rab tu gsal/ /a ni de nyid mtha' thig ler/ /yang dag thim pa rnam par sgom/ /thig le yi ge a la thim/ /a ni mtha' yi ha tsam la'o/ /ha yang yi ge

hU~M la'o/ /yi ge U ni ha~M la'o/ /yi ge ha~M yang a la thim/ /yi ge a ni thig le tsam/ /thig le yang ni sgra la thim/ /sgra yang sgra tsam la ni'o/ /sgra tsam mchog ni nam mkha' la'o/ /de yang 'od gsal
ba la thim/ /'od gsal go 'phang gsal ba ni/ /shin du rnam dag chos dbyings te/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog /rab tu sad cing rab tu 'char/ /ngag gi spyod pa rnams dang bral/ /gnyis pa

thams cad rnam par spangs/ /phung po lnga ni gcig pu'i gzhi/ /'byung ba lnga ni yang dag bsten/ /rnam shes brgyad kyi tshogs dben pa/ /phyi yi yul drug bsdus pa ni/ /rlung bcus shes pa bcu bsdus pa/ /de ltar mtshan

nyid kun bsdus pa'o/ /kun nas spro ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /gang gis bzhugs gnas srid pa gsum/ /dngos grub kun byed dpal dang ldan/ /skal ba bzang po kun 'phel ba/ /rdo rje de ni rdo rje sems/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed

dbang phyug dang / /he ru ka dang dus 'khor lo/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas thub pa che/ /kun du bzang po 'jam dpal dang / /sna tshogs spro ba'i bdag nyid can/ /sna tshogs yon tan tshogs kyi gzhi/ /kun nas spro ba'i rnal

'byor ni/ /rnal 'byor chen po dri ma med/ /ye shes de nyid gsal ba ni/ /rtog pa med cing gnas pa med/ /chos dbyings 'pho ba zhes bshad do/ /bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid dag /skra yi rtse mo brgyad stong 'dra/ /shin tu

gsal zhing 'od gsal ba/ /lung dang rigs pa'i dbye ba yis/ /bla ma brgyud pa las ni shes/ /de ltar de nyid gsum de mchog /nyal nas brgyud pa'i rim pa skye/ /gsang ba yi ni ye shes mchog /bzhi pa'i mtshan ni

skad cig mchog /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las de kho na nyid gsum gyi dam tshig gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad kyis nyon/ /

sna rtse gsum gyi mtshan nyid ni/ /gsang ba snying ga gdong sna'i ming / /gsum po rgyud las gsal ba ni/ /'khor lo gsum gyi dbye ba yis/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom pa'i rim/ /shin du chags pa'i dbang song

ba'i/ /sems kyi bde ba ster bar byed/ /rlung gi de nyid sbyor ba yis/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo sad par byed/ /bde ba chen po kun nas skye/ /khams gsum ro gcig gyur nas ni/ /dgug dbang cho ga bzhin du bya/ /byang

chub sems ni bde ba che/ /lhan skyes skad cig mtshan nyid ni/ /rdo rje rtse mor gzung bar bya/ /de nyid bde ba chen po ste/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can/ /kun rtog thams cad rnam par spangs/ /gsang ba'i sna rtser rdzas thig le/ /yang dag gzung

ba'i bdag nyid can/ /chags chen sems ni gcig pu yis/ /rnal 'byor mchog tu shes par bya/ /pad 'dab bcu drug rtsa bzhi la/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo rim bzhin 'char/ /de yi lte ba snar ni bshad/ /gsang ba bde ba thams cad

ster/ /snying ga'i pad ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /de yang lte ba snar ni brjod/ /zhes sdang nyid kyi sems ni bsgom/ /gsang sngags 'bar ba'i ye shes sems/ /yang dag spro bar byed pa'i rgyu/ /ngag gi rtog pa kun spangs pa/ /rmad

byung chen po ye shes mchog /rtag tu sngags ni nA da 'byung / /rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba che/ /bsam gtan la sbyor bde ba'i mchog /man ngag thob pas bde ba rgyal/ /zhe sdang myur du dbang byas nas/ /zhi ba'i de nyid rgyu gcig ni/ /

zla ba nyi ma me dang gsum/ /lan gsum gyi ni dbus nas khyab/ /gdong gi sna ni zhes byar bshad/ /rlung rnams gnas kyi mtshan nyid dang / /de la gnas pa'i ye shes che/ /thig le gti mug gis gnon yis/ /bsam gtan gti

mug mchog las rgyal/ /dngos po thams cad rnam par spangs/ /ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid gsal/ /de kho na nyid lnga rten mchog /de yi 'od zer thig le tsam/ /gdong gi sna rtser yang dag brten/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni bsgom

par bya/ /gti mug rgya mtsho las ni rgyal/ /de nyid dam tshig sems dpa' yi/ /ming can du ni yang dag bshad/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni/ /ye shes lnga yi mtshan nyid can/ /rnal 'byor mkhas pa rnams

kyis ni/ /gti mug mun pa rnam 'joms pa/ /kun mkhyen rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi rigs gnas na/ /sna rtse bu ga las byung zhing / /rlung lnga steng du yang dag rgyu/ /lus la rtag tu spyod par 'gyur/ /kun rdzob snar ni rgyu
ba yi/ /sgo de las ni rnam par byung / /g.yon dang g.yas dang gnyis ka dang / /dal bar rgyu dang rnam pa bzhi/ /g.yas pa las ni 'byung ba'i khams/ /me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/ /kha dog dmar

po bzang po 'di/ /pad ma mgon po rgyu ba'o/ /g.yon pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang 'dres pa/ /ljang ser dag tu snang ba ste/ /dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid/ /rin chen mgon po rgyu ba'o/ /dal

zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams/ /dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba ni/ /'di ni chu yi dkyil 'khor te/ /rdo rje mgon po rgyu ba'o/ /khams gsum las ni yang dag byung / /rten dang brten par bzung ba ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad rang bzhin

te/ /'chi ba'i mthar ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag ni/ /mnyam par bzhag pas rtag tu bzlos/ /sngags bzlas pa yi grangs kyis ni/ /nyin mtshan rtag tu zlos pa yin/ /de ltar rlung ni sna rtser ni/ /

kha dog lnga par rnam par bsgom/ /gnyis med mchog gi rnal 'byor gyis/ /'od zer tshogs ni dri ma med/ /de yis zhi sogs bya ba ni/ /rim gyis sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' 'gro mgon la/ /de nas lag na rdo rjes zhus/ /thig le gsum gyi gzhung lugs ni/ /khyod zhabs bsnyen bkur gyis 'tshal na/ /'di la cung zad the tshom mchis/ /srid pa mthar mdzad gsal bar

mdzad/ /rdzas dang sngags dang de bzhin rlung / /thig le gsum ni bsgoms pa na/ /rnal 'byor pa gcig nyid dam ni/ /yang na rnal 'byor so sor bsgom/ /de la the tshom kun gcod gtso/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sems

dpas gsungs/ /yun rings chags chen dbang song bas/ /srid pa gsum du skyob pa rnams/ /de dag dgrol ba'i don du ni/ /rdzas kyi thig le gsungs pa yin/ /zhe sdang chen po dbang song ba/ /mi gang mi srun pa yi

lus/ /de rnams myur du grol don du/ /sngags kyi thig ler gsungs pa yin/ /gti mug chen pos kun nas 'khrul/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho las skyob gang / /de dag dngos grub brgyad 'bras bu/ /thob phyir ye shes rgya

mtsho ni/ /rlung gi thig ler gsungs pa yin/ /yang dag de nyid spros pa ni/ /de ltar yang dag thig le gsum/ /bsam pa ji bzhin sbyor ji bzhin/ /tshe 'di nyid la grub don du/ /sgrib pa thams cad dag pa'i phyir/ /rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis ni/ /ye shes

gsum gnas nyams dga' ba/ /me tog 'bras bu chu yis brgyan/ /skye bos dben pa'i ri yi rtser/ /dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni/ /'bad pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa
las sna'i rtse mo gsum gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad kyis nyon/ /stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid ni/ /lus la gnas pa de nyid mchog /thams cad bdag

nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /chos rnams thams cad snang bar byed/ /mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du 'dod/ /de las ye shes bde ba che/ /'od gsal ba ni rnam dag pa/ /gang phyir a ba d+hU tIr zhugs/ /yang dag stong pa nyid du 'dod/ /chos rnams rnam

rtog snang ba mched/ /kun rtog thams cad gcod par byed/ /rnam rtog rlung gi ngal so ba/ /de ni stong pa nyid du bshad/ /gtso bo chen po mi bskyod pa'i/ /'jig rten khams ni de nyid do/ /der ni rtag tu bzhugs pa'i sa/ /srog gi ye shes ming

can te/ /gzugs med drag po chen po yi/ /zhi ba'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid can/ /de la ye shes bde ba che/ /byang chub sems kyis gang ba nyid/ /de nyid bde chen go 'phang gnas/ /ye shes yang dag byang chub sems/ /de la sogs pa ming gi sgras/ /brjod

bya gcig pu bde ba che/ /dngos po gcig dang ldan pa nyid/ /stong nyid ye shes zhes ni brjod/ /bde ba can zhes de la bshad/ /bde ba dge ba'i thob mtshan nyid/ /gang de bde bar gnas pa ni/ /de ni bde ba can zhes brjod/ /tshe dpag med pa'i zhing
khams na/ /bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog /byang chub sems ni tshe dpag med/ /de las byung zhing skye ba'i 'od/ /de phyir 'od dpag med du shes/ /bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog /stong nyid rdo rje

dbyings dbang phyug /ye shes rdo rje'i dbang phyug dang / /de nyid mnyam par sbyor ba ni/ /stong nyid ye shes zhes ni brjod/ /shes rab pad ma la la nA/ /zla mtshan nyi ma 'bab pa na/ /de yang stong par rnam par shes/ /

gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /thabs kyi rdo rje ra sa nA/ /zla ba shu kra rab tu 'bab/ /de ni ye shes mchog tu gsungs/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang mchog /de gnyis sbyor ba mchog tu shes/ /stong nyid

ye shes mi zad pa/ /zla ba nya dang de nyid yin/ /rnal 'byor ma yi zhal las shes/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las stong pa nyid kyi tshig bshad pa'i le'u ste/
nyi shu lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ /lus ni stong pa nyid kyi gnas/ /lus ni gang gis shes pa ni/ /lha rnams kun gyi pho brang mchog /

longs spyod chos dang sprul pa dang / /bde ba chen po yi ni rten/ /'khor lo yang ni gang bshad pa/ /rim pa ji bzhin ma lus pa/ /de ltar rtag tu yang dag bzhugs/ /thim dang longs spyod bdag po ni/ /lha nyid mchog tu gnyis su

med/ /yang dag ngo bo'i go 'phang rten/ /ye shes chen po'i go 'phang phyir/ /bde ba chen po'i yang dag rten/ /zhe sdang che dang gti mug che/ /phrag dog che dang chags dngos kyis/ /khro bo che dang rnam pa'i mchog /'khor ba'i mdud pa nges gcod pa/ /

sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/ /rlung dang nam mkha'i dbye ba yis/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ /ro dang reg bya nyid dang ni/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mig bzangs dang / /rna ba sna dang lce dang ni/ /lus kyi rnam shes chos dang ni/ /kun gzhi

nyon mongs can gyi yid/ /dad dang brtson 'grus dran ting 'dzin/ /shes rab dbang po'i dbye ba yis/ /dad stobs brtson 'grus stobs dang ni/ /dran pa'i stobs dang ting 'dzin stobs/ /shes rab stobs ni bla na med/ /ji bzhin gnas

su yang dag shes/ /lus kyi lha ru gsal ba yin/ /sngon bzhin ming gi dbye ba yis/ /sngags kyi dbye bas rim pa dang / /sngags dgod pa yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rim bzhin gnas kyi dbye ba yis/ /lung gis rnam par nges byas

pa'i/ /yang dag gnas kyi dbye ba dang / /lha mo rtag tu rnal 'byor pas/ /bdag la byin brlabs go 'phang gnas/ /'dod pa lnga la longs spyod cing / /rab tu 'bad de mchod pa bya/ /rdo shing sa yi rang bzhin gyi/ /phyi rol lha la phyag

mi bya/ /bdag la byin brlabs rim de nyid/ /gzhan du srid pa gsum na med/ /de kho na nyid rnal 'byor mchog /bdag la byin brlabs sgrib med pa/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pa sogs/ /phyi yi dngos po mi bgrang ste/ /de

nyid thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /rnal 'byor ma la mchog tu ni/ /'bad pas byin gyis brlab par 'dod/ /bdag byin rlob thabs mtshan nyid do/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las lus kyi
lha ye shes kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang lha mo yi/ /de rnams kyi ni ming bshad bya/ /'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis/ /rtsa yi rim pa'i grangs

kyis ni/ /las dang rdo rje pad ma dang / /'khor lo la sogs rigs dbye bas/ /rim pa bzhi yi dbye ba yis/ /rtsa yi rim pas yang dag bzhugs/ /'dir ni rigs ni lnga par yang / /de kho na nyid nyams myong mchog /

tshor ba nyams su myong ba yi/ /thams cad la ni khyab par gnas/ /sprul pa rang gi rigs las skyes/ /lha mo 'di dag yang dag zhugs/ /mkhyen ma gtum mo dpa' mo ma/ /las sgrol ma dang yid gcugs ma/ /'khrul

'khor ma dang 'bud ma dang / /de bzhin rlung rgyu ma dang ni/ /snying stobs yang dag sangs rgyas ma/ /rab dang ma dang yid 'ong ma/ /grub ma sprul 'tsho sgra ma dang / /gter 'dzin lha yi dbang phyug ma/ /

ge sar pad ma dri med ma/ /rlung gi lu gu rgyud byed ma/ /bzang mo dang ni khwa yi gdong / /gnyid log ma dang mi 'phel ma/ /'phar ma sngo bsangs dus mtshan ma/ /rtse 'jo ma dang skal bzang 'phel/ /na ra dz+wa

na khyi gdong ma/ /chags ma dga' ma rnam sgeg ma/ /brtson 'grus 'phel dang dkar mo dang / /bdud rtsi lnga ni 'phel ba ma/ /dngos 'bebs shin du dpa' mo dang / /pad ma rnga dang 'dod ma dang / /sgyu ma yid 'ong mdza' mo

dang / /skyur dang chang gi dbang phyug ma/ /mi bzad che dang las skal bzang / /me tog bzang mo gdug rmongs ma/ /steng gzigs zhal dang rtse gsum mtshan/ /mdzes ma dang ni ljags bskyod ma/ /rtag bam ma dang gar

ma dang / /ri dgas mig dang chags dga' ma/ /sna tshogs rmongs par rol pa mo/ /dkar mo 'jig rten gsum pa mo/ /ro blan dri med 'gro bstun ma/ /ral ga rnams ni yang dag bzhugs/ /rtag tu brgyad dang brgyad

spel grangs/ /zhal gsum phyag drug dri ma med/ /rigs kyi phyag rgya dbye ba yis/ /mtshon cha rnams kyis yang dag brgyan/ /de dag sna tshogs rdo rje g.yas/ /g.yon pa 'gying bas uta pa la/ /g.yas na 'khor

lo rin chen dang / /de bzhin ral gri chos 'byung ni/ /g.yon gyi phyag gnyis la ni 'gyur/ /sems dpa'i dkyil krung gis legs bzhugs/ /zhal ni ljang khu spyan gsum pa/ /don yod grub pa'i cod pan can/ /zhal

rnams bzhad par bsgom pa dang / /bde ba thams cad 'phel bar byed/ /rang gi ming gi dbye ba yis/ /yi ge gsum dang rnam par spel/ /sngags kyis yang ni yang dag mchod/ /'dod pa'i de nyid rab stsol mdzad/ /

chos kyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dbus/ /lha 'di dag ni yang dag bzhugs/ /rdor dbyings dbang phyug lA ma dang / /rdo rje phyag rgya stobs chen mo/ /rdo rje sgeg mo rdo rje gdong / /rdo rje chos ma rdo rje bzang / /rdo rje rol mor shes

par bya/ /chos kyi 'khor lor dgu bdag nyid/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa dang / /sems dpa'i dkyil krung gis legs bzhugs/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang / /g.yas pa yi ni phyag na 'dzin/ /g.yon na ral gri

pad ma dang / /dril bu 'dzin pa bla na med/ /sku mdog sngon po spyan gsum pa/ /zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /rang ming yi ge gsum dang spel/ /sngags kyis de dag rab tu mchod/ /longs spyod 'dab ma bcu drug la/ /pad pad+ma

ma'i dbus na lha rnams bzhugs/ /pad ma'i sgrol ma pad dkar mo/ /pad ma ku mu da 'phel ma/ /pad ma'i spyan dang pad gtsug phud/ /pad ma'i phreng ba pad skyes ma/ /pad gdan pad ma'i dra ba ma/ /de bzhin pad ma'i 'od dang ni/ /pad pad+ma

ma'i spyan dang pad bzangs ma/ /pad ma'i nang bzhugs pad skyes ma/ /pad ma'i ge sar pad ma ma/ /de ltar 'di ni yang dag bshad/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can/ /sems dpa'i dkyil krung gis legs bzhugs/ /

g.yas na pad ma 'khor lo dang / /rdo rje yang ni 'debs par mdzad/ /g.yon na ral gri dril bu dang / /rin po che yis rnam par bsdigs/ /spyan gsum rnam par 'char ba dang / /pad ma dmar po'i mdog ltar dmar/ /nyi ma'i dkyil

'khor nyer bzhugs shing / /sems dpa'i dkyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /rang ming yi ge gsum dang bcas/ /'di rnams sngags ni bla na med/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che/ /pad 'dab sum bcu rtsa gnyis la/ /rtag tu

lha mo rnams ni bzhugs/ /rab tu sad pa 'bad pa can/ /'khor lo'i shugs ma rdo rje ldan/ /rin chen sgrol ma pad zhugs ma/ /sna tshogs las ma gti mug dga'/ /zhe sdang rdo rje dga' chags ma/ /rdo rje las chags
gzugs rdo rje/ /sgra yi rdo rje ro rdo rje/ /reg bya rdo rje chos dbyings ma/ /spyan 'od ma dang thod dbyangs ma/ /sna yi snang ba ro dga' ma/ /sku yi rgyal mtshan yid dga' ma/ /khams bcas ma dang

rgyu 'bab ma/ /gshin rje 'joms pa'i blo yi ni/ /bye brag rnam par rgyas ma dang / /pad ma'i ral pa gyen du brdzes/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'joms pa mo/ /sbas pa'i mthil dang dbyug sngon ma/ /shin tu brtan

ma stobs chen ma/ /rang byung ma dang 'khor lo'i gtsug /de ltar rtsa yi dbus nas shar/ /slar yang lha mo zhal gsum dang / /phyag drug bde ba 'phel ba can/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yang bzhugs/ /dri med pad ma
dkar mo'i mdog /zhi ba zhal gsum spyan gsum pa/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na bsnams pa ni/ /'khor lo lcags kyu rdo rje rim/ /de bzhin g.yon pa'i phyag gsum la/ /pad ma zhags pa rin po che/ /'char dang

'debs dang sgeg par mdzad/ /pad ma dkar po 'dra ba'i 'od/ /spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad 'chang / /rang gi ming dang yig gsum ming / /'di dag sngags ni go rim bzhin/ /de nyid mchog ni rab tu gsal/ /sku gsung

thugs kyi sdom pa ni/ /de lta bu yi sdom pa mchog /lha mo rnams kyi de nyid mchog /rtag tu gnyid log lus la gnas/ /'dod pa lnga yi longs spyod bsten/ /mchod pa nyid kyis yang dag mnyes/ /rdo rje pad pad+ma
ma'i bde bas myos/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang mchog /mnyes nas slar yang gso bar byed/ /de yi zhi sogs bya ba rnams/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /bsam gtan rnal 'byor sogs spyod dang / /

sngags dbyibs la sogs bya ba ni/ /dgos med mchog tu cung zad ni/ /bla ma'i lung las yang dag skyes/ /de phyir rdo rje slob dpon ni/ /'bad pas dngos grub kyis mnyes bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje
phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las 'khor lo bzhi'i lha mo bzhi rim pa rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /'char dang nub pa'i
mtshan nyid ni/ /rtsa rnams kyis ni rnal 'byor mchog /dngos grub thams cad kyi ni gnas/ /mdun gnas pa yi yul rnams las/ /yid la byed pas der mi 'gro/ /sngon gyi bag chags nang gnas pa/ /de tshe
dbang po rab tu gsal/ /de yis de ni rab tu sad/ /de rnams rtsa la rim bzhin gnas/ /rab sad de yis sad byas nas/ /lha mo rang yang 'khor lo las/ /de yis 'char ba'i rim par gsungs/ /nub pa yang

ni bshad par bya/ /yul rnams kyang ni dngos bral med/ /yid la byed nas gzhan du gnas/ /bag chags kyang ni sad mi sad/ /rtsa rnams 'char bar mi 'gyur zhing / /lha rnams yang dag sad par ni/ /de yi phyir ni
mi 'gyur te/ /snying gi dbus nas bde ba'i dngos/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma gsal ba'i 'od/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i gzugs kyis kyang / /de ni 'od zer bcu gnyis te/ /'od 'phel 'od zer gzi brjid ma/ /gsal
ba 'bar ma 'od 'bar ma/ /mig la sogs pa la brten nas/ /phyi rol gzugs sogs 'dzin pa'o/ /mun sel 'od ma snang ba mo/ /gsal mdzes gsal 'od nyi ma gsal/ /phyi rol gzugs sogs rnam

pa'o/ /drug po 'di dag 'og tu 'dod/ /lha mo rnams ni gang 'char ba'ang / /ye shes nyi ma 'char ba yin/ /de yang yang dag nub pa ni/ /de yang mchog tu nub pa'o/ /'char ba nub pa rnams chud pa/ /go 'phang

mchog tu shes par bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po legs par sad/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma sdom pa'o/ /'di ni rnal 'byor de nyid mchog /'char dang nub pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i rjes 'brangs nas/ /bla ma rgyud
pa las shes bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las 'char ba dang nub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ /dga' ba
skyes pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /gang gis yang dag shes pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang mchog /de ni rtsa yi 'khor lo la/ /slar yang rgyas dang bsdus pa yis/ /'khor lo bzhi yi dbang dag sbyor/ /

rtsa rnams brgyad dang gnyis lhag pa/ /mtshams kyi rtsa yi rim pa yang / /rtsa ni bcu drug la yang brten/ /bzhi dang bzhi yis rtag tu khyab/ /de rnams dga' ba'i rim pa'o/ /chu khams khong du chud pa can/ /pad ma'i

snal ma lta bu'i/ /de nas de yis khyab byas shing / /bde ba chen po phan par byed/ /'khor lo so so'i dbye ba yis/ /cha bzhi pa yi yi ge ha/ /shin du phra ba'i cha dag tu/ /khyab pa rten gyi tshul du gnas/ /rim pa

bzhi yi dbye ba las/ /rim pa bcu drug dbye bas 'thob/ /'phreng ba'i bdag nyid rmad byung ba'o/ /ro gcig pa yi go 'phang 'thob/ /rim gyis so sor nyams myong las/ /sna tshogs chu yi sbyor ba las/ /rim gyis

rgya mtsho chu bzhin du/ /sbyor ba bzhi yi 'khor lo'i dus/ /dga' ba bzhi ni de la brjod/ /rnal 'byor ma rgyud spyod pa las/ /go 'phang mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par
rtogs pa las dga' ba skyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang yang dag nyon/ /rdo rje brtan pa'i lus kyis ni/ /rtag tu rtsa rnams kyi ni rgyun/ /de kho na nyid ngas

bshad bya/ /stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni/ /rtsa ni rtag tu rmad byung ba/ /byang chub sems ni 'bab par shes/ /bde ba thams cad rab tu 'phel/ /rtag tu rmad du byung ba'i rtsa/ /stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni/ /khrag 'bab par ni

shes par bya/ /nyi ma 'pho ba'i bdag nyid can/ /rtag tu rmad du byung ba'i rtsa/ /stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni/ /rlung rgyu bar ni shes par bya/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i rgyud las ni/ /lus kyi gnas ni dbye ba yis/ /de nyid nyi shu rtsa bzhir

brjod/ /thim dang longs spyod bdag po nyid/ /grangs ni bdun bcu rtsa gnyis brjod/ /re re'ang 'khor lo stong stong ngo / /thim pa longs spyod bdag 'dod pa/ /gtso bo yang ni bsdus pa las/ /gnas rnams kyi ni

grangs su 'gyur/ /slar yang bsdus nas 'gro ba na/ /gsum po brgyad brgyad dbye ba'ang ni/ /nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba dang / /thun tshod skad cig sbyor ba yis/ /rtsa rnams gong nas gong du ni/ /nang du 'gro bar

shes par bya/ /g.yon pa byang chub zla ba 'bab/ /g.yas pa khrag dang nyi ma 'bab/ /dbus ni rlung rgyu ba yis ni/ /mi sad byed par shes par bya/ /la la nA dang ra sa nA/ /a ba d+hU ti zhes bya'i ming / /de rnams spro

ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /re re'i rim gyis thun brgyad brgyad/ /gsum po nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'gro/ /thim dang longs spyod bdag po'i phyir/ /rim gyis grangs ni bdun bcu gnyis/ /slar yang de spro sbyor ba yis/ /re re'ang
stong stong dbye ba yis/ /rtag tu grangs nyid 'gyur ba ni/ /stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis so/ /gtso bo gsum po slar yang ni/ /sbyor bas gcig pa nyid du 'gro/ /dang po las ni rnal 'byor pas/ /

phra ba de ni shes par dka'/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mchog tu ni/ /thig le nA da rnam par spangs/ /bde ba kun gyi gzhi gsang ba/ /srog gi rten gyi mtshan nyid dang / /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug dang / /
dus kyi rtsa ni rnam par bshad/ /ro gcig go 'phang bdag nyid can/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud las shes/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par
rtogs pa las rtsa 'bab pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum bcu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ /mtshams kyi rtsa yi ngo bo

nyid/ /rtsa rnams sdom pa 'char ba ni/ /gang gis shes na rtag tu ni/ /mchog tu dga' ba nyams myong ba/ /lha yi ye shes gsal bar byed/ /lha yi sngags su yang dag sbyor/ /lha yi rnal 'byor don nges pa/ /de nyid gsum sbyor dri ma med/ /

de gsum cig char bdag nyid sdom/ /'jig rten gsum du khyab cing phra/ /lus kun la ni yang dag brten/ /ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje sems/ /gang phyir dam tshig sems dpa' bde/ /rnal 'byor mchog tu shes par bya/ /khyab

pa'i de nyid rmad byung ba/ /mchog rab mchog dang phra ba dang / /rang byung ye shes mi zad pa/ /byang sems sum bcu rtsa gnyis 'bab/ /rtsa ni thams cad mchog tu rgyas/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas/ /cha kun bdag nyid rtsa ba

ni/ /de yi dbus su rtsa gsum ste/ /gtso bo yang ni yang dag bshad/ /zla ba nyi ma me rgyu ba/ /'byung ba thams cad la ni khyab/ /ji ltar shing rtsa cung zad cig /sa la brtan par gnas pa na/ /sdong bu yal ga 'dab phreng bu/ /

sogs pa yis ni kun nas khyab/ /de bzhin skyes bu mgor ldan pas/ /phung po khams la sogs tshogs la/ /mchog tu kun nas khyab pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dngos/ /de kho na nyid gsum sdom pa/ /'dod

chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /rang bzhin mtshan nyid dbye ba gsum/ /mtshan mo nyin mo mtshams kyis kyang / /dam tshig mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum/ /sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun ni/ /gsum phye dam tshig mtshan nyid

dang / /stong nyid ye shes rdo rje ni/ /rnam gsum de nyid mtshan nyid do/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu nye 'khor ni/ /rnal 'byor gsum gyi mtshan nyid do/ /rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa ni/ /gsum phye khams ni bsdus pa'o/ /'dod khams
gzugs khams gzugs med khams/ /'jig rten gsum po'i mtshan nyid do/ /rtsa ba gsum dang 'bras bu gcig /rim bzhin gyur nas chos 'khor 'gro/ /de ni sprul pa gsum du gsal/ /sku gsung thugs kyi

rang bzhin gyis/ /gang tshe de la de sbyor ba/ /de ni gzas zin mtshan nyid do/ /gang tshe cung zad sbyor ba na/ /de tshe phyed 'dzin mtshan nyid do/ /gang phyir srog gi rlung bcom na/ /de tshe 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid yin/ /rtsa yi gtso bo

nyid rnams ni/ /gsum po nges pa zhes ni bya/ /rgyas par rnal 'byor ma rgyud las/ /rnal 'byor pa yis gsal por shes/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las mtshams kyi rtsa
gsum gyi nges pa'i le'u ste sum bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ /rlung skye ba yi mtshan nyid ni/ /dus kyi glags ni btsal ba na/ /ji ltar dngos su

yang dag shes/ /bag chags nyon mongs can gyi yid/ /rang gi ngo bo gzugs gzhan mthong / /don ni shes par mi shes shing / /rlung tsam gcig pus rmongs pa'o/ /kun gzhi rnam shes bkug nas ni/ /bag chags nang

du rnam par spyod/ /bag chags kyis ni rnam shes bzung / /bag chags dang 'dres rim pa las/ /nang gi bag chags bsgos pa yis/ /de rnams zla mtshan dus su ni/ /mngal gyi rtsa la 'jug pa na/ /rdo rje khu khrag zhu thig le/ /

'dres pa ru ni gyur pa dang / /kun gzhi las ni rnam shes skye/ /ji ltar chang ros myos pa bzhin/ /kun gzhi rnam shes bag chags las/ /rnam par shes pa'i rgyun ni skye/ /nyon mongs can nyid srog rlung nyid/ /skad cig gcig

la yang dag 'gro/ /thog mar 'pho ba'i dus su ni/ /nya yi rnam pa lta bur 'gyur/ /'pho ba gnyis pa'i dus su ni/ /slar yang khrag dang 'dres pa ni/ /steng dang 'og gi dbye ba yis/ /srog gi rlung ni gnyis su 'gro/ /mthur
sel rlung gi 'gro 'ong la/ /ru sbal rnam par 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de nas 'pho ba gsum pa la/ /khrag dang khu ba zos pa na/ /thur du sel ba'i rlung gi tshogs/ /skams nas kun du rlung ni

'byung / /steng du kha bltas nas ni gnas/ /phag rgod 'dra ba'i lus 'chang 'gyur/ /slar yang 'pho ba bzhi pa la/ /khrag dang khu ba bsgos pa ni/ /gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung bkug nas/ /'og tu kha bltas nas ni 'gro/ /seng

ge'i rnam pa yis kyang ni/ /khyab byed rlung ni spro bar byed/ /de nas 'pho ba lnga pa la/ /khrag dang khu ba 'phel nas ni/ /mnyam gnas rlung ni 'dar nas ni/ /me yi gzugs red rim bzhin 'gro/ /mnyam gnas rlung

gis khyab byed spro/ /gang gis 'gul dang 'dar bar 'gyur/ /phung po lnga ni rdzogs pa na/ /de ltar gsungs pa de las slar/ /'pho ba drug pa'i dus tshod la/ /sa yi khams dang mig gnyis dang / /khyab byed rlung gis klu

rlung spro/ /rlung gi dngos po 'phel bar byed/ /de nas 'pho ba bdun pa la/ /chu yi khams dang sna sug dod/ /klu yi rlung gis ru sbal rlung / /spros nas gnyis su med par sprod/ /de nas 'pho ba brgyad pa la/ /me dang sna

yi bu ga 'byung / /ru sbal rlung gis rtsangs rlung spro/ /rang gi rang bzhin shes par byed/ /de nas 'pho ba dgu pa la/ /rlung gi khams dang ro ni tshor/ /rtsangs pa zhes bya'i rlung chen pos/ /lha sbyin rlung ni spro bar byed/ /de

rjes 'pho ba bcu pa la/ /lha sbyin rlung gis gzhu rgyal spro/ /rlung kun bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /dgu pa'i dbus na khyab pa'i khams/ /phra zhing thogs med mtshan nyid can/ /rtsa dang rgyu ma rgyus pa'i sbubs/ /
sgo ni dgu po rgyas par byed/ /lus kyi mchog tu tshor ba dang / /gcig tu reg pa'i mtshan nyid 'dzin/ /rab sad mchog ni nam mkha' la/ /'od gsal bzang po yang dag gnas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa

bcu/ /de lta bu nyid bshad par bya/ /'pho ba bcu ni sa bcu ste/ /rim pa yi ni rnam par shes/ /ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /b+ha ga phyag rgya chen por brjod/ /byis pa yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /thams cad mkhyen

cing thams cad gzigs/ /mgo bo'i skra ni bregs pa dang / /khru ma'i chos gos dmar po bgos/ /dpal dang ldan pa thal mo sbyar/ /spyi bo sa la gtugs pa phyag /mtshan ni sum bcu rtsa gnyis 'chang / /dpe byad

bzang po brgyad bcus brgyan/ /ye shes chen po legs par sad/ /'du byed thob pa grol dang bcas/ /dpa' bo chen po rnam rtog med/ /skyed byed sha ni 'jig par byed/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni ye shes che/ /rtag tu bdud

rtsi lnga myang byed/ /dngos po thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /rnal 'byor seng ge bzhin du spyod/ /'di gnyis mchog ni gsang ba ste/ /gang du yang ni ma gsungs so/ /rlung skyes pa yi nges pa ni/ /bla ma brgyud pa
las shes bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rlung gis bskyed pa skyes bu skye ba 'jug pa'i le'u ste sum bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang
bshad bya ba/ /rlung rnams mchog tu nub pa ni/ /gang gis yang dag shes pa yis/ /'chi ba'i skad cig mtshan nyid ni/ /phan tshun du ni yang dag sad/ /skye ba'i rim ltar thim par 'gyur/ /rlung rnams

yang dag skye ba ni/ /phan tshun nub pa'i nyi ma bzhin/ /thog mar lo bcu lon nas ni/ /rgyags pas myos pa'i rlung skyes na/ /gzhu las rgyal ba'i rlung zos te/ /rim gyis sgra gcan zla ba bzhin/ /de rjes lo bcu

phyin pa ni/ /rgyags chu rlung gis yang dag skye/ /lha sbyin zhes bya'i rlung ni za/ /rlung gi rim pa snga ma bzhin/ /gzhan yang lo bcu phyin pa na/ /rgyags pa'i chu rlung skyes par 'gyur/ /rtsangs pa zhes bya'i rlung ni

za/ /de nas gzhan yang lo bcu phyin/ /lo las skyes pa'i rim pa yis/ /btang gzung rlung ni chen po yis/ /ru sbal rlung ni za bar byed/ /klu yi rlung dang gtang gzung rlung / /stobs dang gzi brjid mtshungs

pa'i phyir/ /dus gzhan lo bcur phyin pa na/ /gnod par byed par mi nus te/ /stobs dang nus pa mtshungs pa'i phyir/ /gang gis gang la gnod pa ni/ /byed pa nyid du mi nus so/ /bcu de gzhan du phyin pa'o/ /long ba btang gzung

stobs chen thob/ /klu yi rlung ni rim gyis za/ /de nas bcu pa gzhan phyin na/ /khrag dang sha ni rnam par 'phel/ /rgyags shing myos pa'i rim pa yis/ /btang gzung rlung ni za bar byed/ /de rjes lo bcu lon pa na/ /

myos chu rlung ni bkug nas ni/ /tshil dang kha chu rnam par 'phel/ /de yi btang gzung klu za byed/ /de nas bcu pa gzhan phyin pa'i/ /lo la btang gzung rlung stobs skyes/ /myos pa'i dus rlung za bar byed/ /me dang rlung ni

'phel bar byed/ /btang gzung rlung nyid rnam gyur nas/ /longs spyod chen po 'phel gyur nas/ /de nas lo bcu gzhan lon nas/ /rlung gis lus rgyas lci bar 'gyur/ /chu dang rlung ni 'dres pa na/ /khyab cing sgrib

byas rim pa las/ /de las lo bcu gzhan du phyin/ /chu shing 'bras bu bzhin du med/ /rtsa ba dang bcas med par 'gyur/ /las kyi rnam smin mtha' yis ni/ /de ltar rim pa bcu pa yis/ /zla ba 'am ni nyin zhag gzhan/ /

tshe ni nyung ngur byas nas ni/ /srog zad par ni shes par bya/ /mkha' 'gro sdud pa'i rgyud las ni/ /shin du rgyas par shes par bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rlung gi rim pas srog
zad pa rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste sum bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ /mtshan nyid chen po ye shes mchog /bsdu ba'i mkha' 'gro rnal

'byor mchog /snying pos snying po'i don bsdus pa/ /gang phyir mkha' 'gro mas bsdus pa/ /de phyir bsdus pa'i mkha' 'gro brjod/ /lte ba'i dbus na rtag bzhugs pa/ /nyi ma stong dang mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /ye shes chen

po'i me 'byung ba/ /kun rtog thams cad 'joms par byed/ /'char bas phung po rnam rtog ni/ /bsregs byas bar chad med pa'i lus/ /rdo rje khams kyi rnam rtog ni/ /bsdus nas slar yang rang bzhin gyis/ /gzung dang 'dzin

pa'i rnam rtog ni/ /snying rjes der ni slar yang sdud/ /de ltar gang la phye leb bzhin/ /'ching ba thams cad sreg par byed/ /rlung gi de nyid mngon sbyor bas/ /sngags kyi lus kyi sbyor ba yis/ /rnam par rtog pa tsam yang

ni/ /sring pa nyid du the tshom med/ /mkha' 'gro sdud pa'i rgyud las ni/ /rnal 'byor mchog gi rim shes na/ /mkha' 'gro ye shes rgyas par ni/ /rnal 'byor bsten pas rig par bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje

phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las mkha' 'gro ma sdud pa'i le'u ste sum bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ /rnam rtog rlung ni rnam par gcod/ /nyin dang mtshan du shes par ni/ /brgya dang

brgyad ni lhag par rgyu/ /rlung rnams de ni rnam rtog ni/ /gang phyir rnam par gcod par byed/ /rnal 'byor de ni mchog tu zhi/ /thams cad stong pa'i ngo bor byed/ /the tshom thog mar sbyor ba drug /rnal 'byor rig pas mchog

tu bsgrub/ /de nas dbyangs med yi ge ha/ /shin du rgya che bzlas par bya/ /gang phyir mdud pa 'joms byed cing / /bde ba skye ba ster bar byed/ /de yis rnam rtog thams cad ni/ /skad cig gis ni gcod par byed/ /rnal 'byor

rjes su rnal 'byor dang / /shin du rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che/ /de yi dbye ba bcwo brgyad kyis/ /dang po sbyor ba bsgom par bya/ /bcu bdun rjes su rnal 'byor sogs/ /de las dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ni/ /rnal
'byor mchog la dbye ba lnga/ /de las kyang ni las rgyal mchog /rnal 'byor dbye ba bcu gnyis so/ /de nyid dbye ba bzhi bcu dgu/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa bsdus pa yis/ /mngon sum byed pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /

de la rdo rje bzlas rim mchog /rdzogs rim rnal 'byor yan lag ni/ /rnam par rtog pa dzes byed pa/ /phra ba 'di nyid bla na med/ /cho ga ji bzhin rnal 'byor pa/ /blo dang ldan pas sngon bzhin bsgom/ /srid pa'i 'ching ba gcod

par byed/ /rnal 'byor chen po ye shes che/ /de nyid chen po rmad 'byung che/ /nges par bsgoms pas yang dag ni/ /rnam rtog rlung ni 'joms par byed/ /don gyi rjes 'gro bzlas pa yis/ /dngos med ngo bo gcig pa dang / /

stong nyid bsten pa mngon par zhen/ /sgoms pa nges par brtan par byed/ /sgrub pos yang dag bsgom byas na/ /rdo rje bzlas rim bla na med/ /de yi rim pa bzhin ye shes/ mchog thob 'gyur 'di the tshom med/ /

rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gcod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste sum bcu lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ /rnam rtog

med pa'i rlung shar na/ /gang shes rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /rang dngos go 'phang bzang po 'thob/ /rnam rtog med pa'i rlung chen po/ /gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag /
sgom dang sgom min go 'phang bral/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i ye shes che/ /gnas pa med cing dri ma med/ /phra ba'i cha kun dbus na gnas/ /thig le nA da rnam par spangs/ /kun la khyab cing zhi ba dang / /
bdag byin brlab pa'i mtshan nyid gcig /mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid rnams las grol/ /bag chags rnam rtog rnam par spangs/ /tshigs dang mdud pa'i lam dang ni/ /sgom dang bsgom bya rnam par spangs/ /

stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid do/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i rnam pa'i cha/ /rnam pa'i spyod pa rnam par spangs/ /bya ba spyod pa rnal 'byor gyi/ /rgyud rnams la yang bklag mi bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud chen po/ /

bshad par bya ba dam tshig mchog /man ngag ji bzhin cho ga bzhin/ /thog ma nyid du bshad par rigs/ /de yi rim pa'i rjes 'gro shes/ /bla ma brgyud pa'i go 'phang mchog /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng
ba mngon par rtogs pa las rnam rtog med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste sum bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas rdo rje can gyi gsungs/ /rtsa rnams nub pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /de kho na nyid bshad kyis nyon/ /

yul dang dbang po yang dag sbyor/ /rtsa rnams kyang ni 'char bar 'gyur/ /shar nas sngon bzhin song nas ni/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa bla na med/ /rnam rtog skye ba de yi phyir/ /brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag pa'i rim/ /

de las skye dang rga dang na/ /'chi zhing slar yang ldog par 'gyur/ /yul rnams dngos po med pa yis/ /sbyangs pa'i ye shes de nyid phyir/ /de nyid 'di la spyod pa'i phyir/ /dngos su yul rnams dngos med phyir/ /dbang po rnams

ni skye ba min/ /de las gnyis gnyis yang dag sbyor/ /dngos dang dngos med stong pa nyid/ /de nas rtsa rnams nub 'gyur te/ /'khor lo'i rim pa la yang rton/ /de rnams nub pa las ni zhi/ /stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis ni/ /

kun kyang rtsa yi 'khor lor 'gyur/ /de nyid kun chos nang du khyab/ /stong nyid bsgom pa rnal 'byor las/ /yul rnams kyi ni ngo bo nyid/ /nges pa ru ni shes pa zhes/ /rig pa'i rdo rje rnam par 'joms/ /
rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rtsa rnams nub pa'i sbyong ba'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang
bshad kyis nyon/ /spyod drug go 'phang mtshan nyid ni/ /ji lta ji lta ba bzhin sbyor/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i yan lag rten/ /rnam pa drug po de las phyed/ /de bzhin brgyad brgyad de las lhag /

brgyad gnyis brgyad phrag bzhi dang ni/ /de ltar grangs kyis sbyor ba gsal/ /zla ba phyed pa'i cha lta bu/ /stong nyid rlung gi 'khor lor gnas/ /phyed pa ma yin rdzogs pa min/ /chu yi zla ba lta bur snang / /sgyu

ma chen po 'gro ba'i ma/ /thams cad rten pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rlung gi 'khor lo srog ces bshad/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi spyod yul min/ /me yi 'khor lo stong nyid khyab/ /dbus na thig le lta bu ni/ /mi 'gyur kun du 'gro ba dang / /
