rang byung kun la khyab pa dang / /bde ba yang dag 'phel bar byed/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed rnam par spangs/ /'jig rten gsum ni ma lus pa/ /gcig tu byas na skyed par byed/ /mi shig nA da'i go 'phang can/ /

rnam pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /sbrul gyi lce ltar g.yo ba dang / /tshangs pa la sogs pha mes dang / /'jigs pa ma yin g.yo ba min/ /yi ge dang ni tshig ma yin/ /'byung ba'i tshogs ni rnam par spangs/ /

grangs bral zad med skye ba med/ /lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus gnas pa/ /sgra tsam dri ma dang bral ba/ /chags bral chags pa med pa dang / /bya ba byed dang gnas med pa/ /

dpe med gnas pa med pa dang / /srog dang rtsol ba rnam par spangs/ /lha yi dbang phyug ye shes mchog /de lta bu yang rnyed par dka'/ /longs spyod 'khor lo mchog tu gnas/ /'ching ba med pa'i rnam pa mchog /mchog

tu khong du chud gyur pa/ /rnam pa kun gyis yang dag bzhugs/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin gyi/ /chang gi ro yis myos pa bzhin/ /mchog ni dang po ma lus pa/ /dngos po kun gyi nang na gnas/ /thog ma tha ma lhag par

gnas/ /mtshan nyid med cing snang ba med/ /mtshan nyid thams cad rnam par spangs/ /zhi ba mi 'jigs brjod du med/ /rang bzhin nyams myong rang ngo bo/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas/ /bla ma brgyud pa las ni thob/ /de

ltar ye shes bye brag che/ /rang gi ngo bo rnam shes drug /steng dang 'og tu yang dag sbyor/ /rnal 'byor zhes ni rab tu grags/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las 'khor lo drug sgom pa'i
le'u ste sum bcu brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /dus kyi mtshan nyid sdom pa ni/ /rnal 'byor gang gis rnam par shes/ /grangs kyi rnal 'byor bla na med/ /dus ni dus tshod zhes ni

bshad/ /bsam dang bsam bral rang dngos ni/ /dus bzang dang ni dus ngan dang / /rnam pa gnyis la yang dag gnas/ /sna yi bu ga las byung nas/ /phyi yi sgo las rtag tu 'char/ /nang du sdud par dus bzang gsungs/ /'byung ba

yang ni dus ngan 'dod/ /dus ngan las ni gzhan pa mchog /dus bzang mchog ste rang nyid ni/ /rdzogs ldan dang ni gsum ldan dang / /gnyis ldan dang ni dus bzang po/ /rtsod pa'i dus ni ngan pa ste/ /de ltar gsungs pa'i dus

mtshan nyid/ /dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba dang / /lhan cig skyes pa dus bzang ste/ /dga' dang bral ba ngan dus so/ /dus kyi mtshan nyid de ltar bshad/ /'jug pa dang ni gnas pa'i dus/ /dus bzang por ni yongs su grags/ /ldang

ba yang ni dus ngan te/ /de ltar dus kyi mtshan nyid do/ /dus ni khams rnams thams cad de/ /mnyam pa ro gcig go 'phang mchog /ye shes rnam shes rnam spangs te/ /dus ni gcig ni brjod pa yin/ /dngos dang dngos med spros bral ba/ /bzhi pa'i skad

cig mtshan nyid ni/ /brjod bya rjod byed las grol ba/ /dus gcig zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /chags dang chags bral nges grol ba/ /bde ba chen po go 'phang spangs/ /phyag rgya chen po'i don gyi gzhi/ /dus gcig zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /mtshan
nyid med cing snang ba med/ /grangs ni rnal 'byor rnam par spangs/ /de nyid dus su nges bshad de/ /bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs
pa las dus dang dus tshad rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba'i 'bras bu mchog nyon cig /gang gis

dngos grub mchog tu 'gro/ /phyag rgya chen po yang dag bsten/ /gsang ba sbas pa zhes ni bshad/ /rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes shing / /bzhi pa'i dbang zhes bya ba'i ming / /zhal nas brgyud pa'i rim pa rnams/ /mchog

tu zhi ba'i ye shes che/ /rnam rtog thams cad rnam par spangs/ /phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub che/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i don bsdus pa/ /rnal 'byor ma rgyud las bslabs pa/ /mchog tu rmad byung ngo bo nyid/ /ye shes chen po'i ro

'bebs pa/ /de nyid chen po'i yon tan ldan/ /nam mkha' mchog la gnas pa'i sa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang ngo bo/ /bde ba rnams ni 'phel bar byed/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang 'das/ /shes dang shes bya rnam par bral/ /

sgom dang bsgom bya rnam par spangs/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi bya bas stong / /kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs/ /dngos po kun gyi go 'phang gsal/ /'jig rten gsum gyi rnam pa'i ni/ /chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs/ /

dam tshig chen po la gnas pa/ /grangs med 'jig rten gsum gcig dngos/ /dngos grub de kho na yi rgyud/ /de ltar gsang ba'i 'bras bu gsal/ /gzhan ni gang du'ang ma gsungs pa/ /rnal 'byor mchog gi ye shes mchog /rnal
'byor ma rgyud las shes bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las gsang ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan

rdo rjes gsungs/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang mchog /chos kyi dbyings nas khyab pa'i khams/ /chos kyi dbyings kyis de la brjod/ /kun khyab mchog tu phra ba dang / /kun 'gro rtag tu 'char ba dang / /phung po lnga nyid 'byung ba lnga/ /

yul dang skye mched rnam shes dang / /de dag yang dag ldan chos kun/ /bshad de gsang ba'i dbang phyug ste/ /de dag dbus na gnas pa'i khams/ /khyab cing spyod yul ma yin pa/ /ji ltar til gyi til mar dang / /ji ltar shing la me

bzhin du/ /de bzhin chos rnams thams cad la/ /khyab kyang mthong ba ma yin no/ /nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med/ /chos kun gyi ni gzhi yi mchog /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i kun rtog gis/ /khyab kyang mthong ba ma yin no/ /stong

nyid ye shes rnal 'byor gyis/ /rnal 'byor pa yis gsal bar mthong / /chos dbyings b+ha ga zhes ni brjod/ /b+ha ga rin chen za ma tog /gang phyir dbang phyug sogs yon tan/ /ldan pa de phyir b+ha ga brjod/ /b+ha ga chos rnams

su yang bshad/ /dbyings ni byang chub sems su gsungs/ /khams gsum pa yi 'gro ba yi/ /rgyu ni b+ha ga zhes byar bshad/ /dbyings ni yang dag sbyor dngos kyis/ /chu zla bzhin du yang dag gnas/ /don dam gcig pu'i

de nyid shes/ /lag mthil skyu ru bzhag pa bzhin/ /mchog gi de nyid ltar ni snang / /rang rig shin tu dri ma med/ /dngos dang dngos med zad nas ni/ /rtag tu de nyid mthong zhing snang / /chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang gsal/ /

de ltar shin tu rgyas par bshad/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral bas/ /sbyor bral shes pa rmad du byung / /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las chos kyi dbyings kyi don bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu
gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /rdo rje yi ni mtshan nyid mchog /de yi don du bshad kyis nyon/ /ji lta ba bzhin bshad par bya/ /rdo rje mi phyed zhes ni gsungs/ /ye

shes lnga yi bdag nyid mchog /rtsa lnga yi ni nam mkhar rten/ /rtse mo lnga yi rang ngo bo/ /sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/ /rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dang ni/ /rtsa yi nam mkha'i cha yi gzugs/ /bla ma'i brgyud

las shes par bya/ /a~M ra~M la~M ba~M ya~M sa bon/ /brjod pa rtsa ni lnga rnams te/ /'bad pa yis ni shes par bya/ /rdo rjes skye ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ /pad ma lte ba'i dbus gnas pa/ /thig ler bshad pa 'gro ba med/ /dam tshig

gnas ni shes pa dang / /bdud rtsi mchog gis rab tu gang / /rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med/ /de ni rdo rjer yongs su grags/ /me long mnyam nyid ye shes dang / /so sor rtog dang bya nan tan/ /rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings/ /

ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin no/ /de yi ngo bo yongs su shes/ /rdo rje rang nyid nyams myong mchog /nam mkhar cher gnas zhi ba dang / /rtog pa med cing nyon mongs med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag gzhi/ /bla ma brgyud pa las
shes bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rdo rje bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /rigs kyi

dbye ba don bsdus pa/ /de tshe rigs ni rnam pa lnga/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud du gsal bar gsungs/ /rnal 'byor spros pa dbye ba yis/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig go/ rgyud du grags pa dbye ba yi/ /mthar thug de ni yang

dag gsungs/ /de nyid las ni bsdus nas kyang / /rigs kyi dbye ba brgya ru gsungs/ /sna tshogs spros pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes ni brjod/ /gang gis de yi rnam pa mthong / /sna tshogs nor bu ji

bzhin no/ /sems can mos pa sna tshogs dang / /sna tshogs bsam pa'i bye brag gis/ /sna tshogs nyon mongs mnan nas ni/ /'gro ba'i bla mas grol ba'i phyir/ /gzhung nas gang gis de yis ni/ /sna tshogs spro ba'i

ngo bo nyid/ /grangs med pa yi dbye ba yis/ /dbye ba grangs med sbyor ba yis/ /don dam rigs kyi dbye ba nyid/ /rgyud gzhan rnams su gsungs pa yi/ /sems can bsam pa'i bye brag gis/ /de ni bsdus na dbye bar

'gyur/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo'i rim pa yis/ /stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ /de la stong phrag sum bcu drug /lus kyi rdzas dang gnas sogs kyis/ /rim pa'i dbye ba de las kyang / /stong phrag nyi shu rtsa

bzhi'o/ /de rjes brgya yis mchog tu gang / /bdun bcu rtsa gnyis drug bcu bzhi/ /sum bcu rtsa drug bsdus pa las/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi de las kyang / /sum bcu dang ni dgu yang ngo / /de las lnga dang de phyir
gsum/ /gsum yang bsdus na gcig nyid de/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /gzhan nas gzhan du 'dres nas 'gro/ /de yang 'od gsal go 'phang la'o/ /rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba che/ /gnyis

med ye shes dri ma med/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid mchog /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rigs kyi dbye ba'i bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /phyag rgya'i dbye ba bla na med/ /chos dang las dang dam tshig dang / /phyag rgya chen po mngon par brjod/ /las kyi rnam smin nges pa yis/ /kun nas rgyas btab lta bur gnas/ /gang yang 'di ni las gang gis/ /de 'bras

ji lta ba bzhin 'gyur/ /chos rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid/ /rang bzhin gyis ni rgyas btab nas/ /dam tshig rang gi yon tan dngos/ /rgyal sras rnams kyi rgyas btab pa/ /stong dang snying rje mi phyed pa/ /sangs rgyas

zhing ni rnam sbyong ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig ni/ /yongs su dag pa'i mdzad pa'i sa/ /de yi rang bzhin rang bzhin med/ /phyag rgya chen po zhes ni brjod/ /las kyi phyag rgya yongs shes na/ /sngags pa las ni
thob par skye/ /bla mas shes rab dbang bskur na/ /ji ltar mthong ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang dngos don/ /snying rje'i bsam pas gsal ba ni/ /de las nges par thob nas ni/ /chos nyid

sgo nas nges par byed/ /de ltar de nyid de ye shes/ /de ltar rnal 'byor ma mtshan nyid/ /dam tshig la zhen mkhas pa dang / /rlung gis de nyid pha rol son/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i don bslab pa/ /ngag 'jam shes rab ldan ma dang / /

mig yangs ma yi bu mo rnyed/ /gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par brgyan/ /ji bzhin rnal 'byor dam tshig la/ /phyag rgyas lhan cig sgrub par byed/ /de nas de nyid thob pa na/ /phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid do/ /de nyid bde chen go 'phang

ni/ /kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs/ /stong nyid ye shes dri ma med/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang gsal/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya'i dbye ba bla na med/ /rigs dang pha rol phyin dbye bas/ /phyag rgya drug

tu yang dag bshad/ /ya~M ra~M la~M ba~M a~M ha~M dang / /lha mo rnams kyi rim pa las/ /mchod pa'i rim pa ro gcig pa/ /rtag tu yang ni mchod par bya/ /gdol pa mo dang khrus mkhan mo/ /sme sha can dang gar mkhan ma/ /
ro bsregs mo dang bram ze mo/ /grub 'gyur don du rnal 'byor pas/ /bdag nyid rol cing gnas par bya/ /khrus mkhan rin chen rigs las skyes/ /gdol pa pad ma'i rigs las skyes/ /de bzhin gar mkhan

las kyi rigs/ /ro bsregs ma ni 'khor lo'i rigs/ /sme sha can ni rdo rje'i rigs/ /ye shes phyag rgya bram ze mo/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs su brjod/ /'di ni rigs ni drug tu 'gyur/ /bram ze mo ni ma yin te/ /
khrus mkhan mo ni sring mor brjod/ /gar mkhan mo ni bu mor shes/ /sme sha can ni chung mar grags/ /ro bsregs mo ni mna' ma ste/ /sgyug mo gdol pa ma zhes bya/ /shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/ /rnam

rtog med pas brjod par bya/ /gang phyir rnam rtog med gyur na/ /dngos grub kun la dus kun du/ /sems ni ma ru gyur nas ni/ /sring mo dag tu yang dag bshad/ /lus ni bu mor shes par bya/ /srog ni chung mar rab tu

gsal/ /mna' ma thur du sel ba'i rlung / /dbu ma'i rlung ni sgyug mor brjod/ /ma ni rgyags pa'i rtsa yi cha/ /sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog /sring mo khu ba 'bab pa'i rtsa/ /spyi bo'i gnas na yang dag gnas/ /bu mo

khrag rgyu ba yi rtsa/ /de ni phyed phyed lhag par gnas/ /chung ma gcin ni 'bab pa'i rtsa/ /de nyid kyi ni dbus na gnas/ /mna' ma mchi ma 'dzag pa'i rtsa/ /mgrin pa'i gnas su lhag par gnas/ /ma ni sa ru yang dag bshad/ /

chu yi khams ni sring mor brjod/ /me ni bu mor shes par bya/ /rlung ni chung mar rab tu grags/ /mna' ma nam mkha' ru ni bshad/ /sgyug mo nam mkha' chen po'o/ /mngar bar gyur pas ma dang ni/ /skyur ga sring mo ru ni brjod/ /

kha ba rang gi bu mo dang / /lan tshwa chung mar yongs su grags/ /bska ba sgyug mor shes par bya/ /tsha ba mna' mar yongs su grags/ /de dag 'bad pas 'dod bya zhing / /dngos grub 'dod pas bsten par bya/ /las kyi phyag rgya dbye

ba 'di/ /de yi yon tan bsten pa'i mchog /dam tshig de dang rtog par 'jug /phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba che/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang zhi/ /ye shes mchog ni bla na med/ /de ltar phyag rgya'i go 'phang gsal/ /rnal 'byor
ma rgyud spyod yul lo/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las phyag rgya'i dbye ba rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang

yang dag bshad/ /phung sogs skye mched mtshan nyid ni/ /rgyal ba rgyal ni gzugs zhes bshad/ /rdo rje 'dzin ni rnam shes dang / /rin chen 'dzin la tshor bar gsungs/ /'khor las brgal bar 'du shes gsungs/ /shes rab 'dzin

ni 'du byed dang / /de ltar phung por rab tu grags/ /sa ni gti mug dga' mar bshad/ /de bzhin chu ni zhe sdang dga'/ /me ni chags la dga' ba dang / /de bzhin rlung ni rdo rje dga'/ /nam mkha' rdo rje dbyings dbang

phyug /gzugs ni gzugs kyi rdo rje dang / /sgra ni sgra yi rdo rje ste/ /dri ni dri yi rdo rje dang / /ro ni ro yi rdo rjer bshad/ /reg bya'i rdo rje reg byar 'gyur/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ /mig gnyis sa yi snying po dang / /rna ba phyag

na rdo rje dang / /sna ni nam mkha'i snying po dang / /lce ni 'jig rten mgon po dang / /lus ni sgrib pa rnam sel mdzod/ /yid ni kun du bzang po dang / /rtsa ni byams pa ru ni brjod/ /ye shes mchog ni 'jam dpal nyid/ /khyab pa ru

ni yang dag bshad/ /de bzhin lus kyi chos rnams ni/ /khro bo bcur ni yang dag bshad/ /de ltar lus kyi dkyil 'khor gsungs/ /phung po la sogs skye mched sogs/ /rnal 'byor gnyis med mchog gis ni/ /bla ma brgyud pa

las shes bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las phung po la sogs pa dang skye mched kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya chen po'i

don mtshan nyid/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i 'bras bu zhi/ /ye shes chen po'i don bsdus pa/ /bde ba chen po'i skal ba che/ /ro mchog chen po'i bdag nyid can/ /sgyu ma chen mo mchog tu phra/ /chen po'i chen po nam mkha' che/ /phyag rgya

de bzhin gshegs ye shes/ /rnam rtog med pa'i go 'phang ste/ /mi phyed rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas/ /rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba che/ /nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med/ /rang bzhin med cing gzhi dang bral/ /gnyis med bdag

med brjod du med/ /rnal 'byor rnams ni rang rig pa/ /phung po khams dang skye mched cha'i/ /kun rtog chos ni yongs su spangs/ /sgom dang bsgom bya snyom 'jug dang / /rim pa gnyis ni rnam par spangs/ /rnam shes ye shes dang bral ba/ /

sngags dang bzlas brjod bsnyen pa spangs/ /dngos po kun gyi gnas las brgal/ /ye shes chen po rab gsol ba/ /dngos grub chen po 'dir shes bya/ /phyag rgya chen po bla na med/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba

mngon par rtogs pa las phyag rgya chen po'i don rnam par nges pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /nyams kyi mtshan nyid dbye ba ni/ /gang gis yongs shes rnal 'byor

pa/ /rnal 'byor chen po dag shes par/ /gyur nas kyang ni ye shes che/ /de nyid rnal 'byor kun las bsgyings/ /'dar dang rngul dang ba spu langs/ /dbyangs 'gyur ba dang ldibs pa dang / /mdog 'gyur mchi 'dzag thim pa dang / /

snying stobs can gyis 'di brgyad nyams/ /dga' ba rgyas pa'i rtsa yi cha/ /rgyags pa'i cha yi rtsa dga' ni/ /khong stong 'dar bar skyed par byed/ /rgyags pa'i chu yi rtsa de ni/ /rab tu rngul byed skyed par byed/ /de bzhin

rgyags pas g.yengs pa'i rtsa/ /khong stong ba spu ldang bar byed/ /de bzhin na sa ra yi rtsa/ /khong stong tshig ni ldib par byed/ /rus sbal chen po'i rtsa rgyas na/ /kha dog 'gyur ba skye bar byed/ /mgo bo chen po'i

rtsa rgyas nas/ /brgyal zhing sdug bsngal bcas par byed/ /'ur 'ur chen po'i rtsa bye na/ /ba spu langs pa skyed par byed/ /dga' ba chen po'i rtsa rgyas na/ /khong stong mchi ma 'dzag par byed/ /myos pa chen po'i rtsa bye na/ /

srog gi rlung ni thim par byed/ /brgyal dang sems med bde ba che/ /de nas dran pa nyams par 'gyur/ /sgeg pa la sogs nyams su shes/ /sngar bshad rim pas sad par byed/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHde bzhin du/ /a la la
la la ho sngags/ /rab tu bskul bas rgyas nas su/ /nyams ni so so'i dbye bas shes/ /de ltar de ni dbye brgyud pa'o/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las nyams kyi
dbye ba bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /bdag ces bya ba sgra yi rten/ /gang gis yang dag shes pa yis/ /srid pa'i 'ching ba'i mtshan

nyid ni/ /a ha~M 'khor lo'i 'ching ba dag /de ni yongs zad grol ba'o/ /a ni dngos po kun gyi mchog /lus rnams kun la lhag par gnas/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan/ /kun khyab kun mkhyen zad pa med/ /thogs med

snying stobs zhes bya ba/ /thabs gcig tu ni skye bar byed/ /srid dang srid rtse brtse ba med/ /sprul pa'i sku yi mchog dang ni/ /don kun byed pa la mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs 'byung ba'o/ /ha~M ni dngos po dang

bral ba/ /lus la gnas kyang lus bskyed min/ /dbang po las 'das mi gsal ba/ /rnam pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /dngos dang dngos med las grol zhing / /gang la'ang lhag par gang gnas pa/ /dngos po thams cad

nub pa dang / /chos kyi sku yi ngo bo nyid/ /sems ni rdo rje 'chang dbugs phyung / /don kun byed pa dang bral ba/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin mya ngan 'das/ /ye shes sku yi rang bzhin nyid/ /rjod dang brjod bya rnam par grol/ /

de yang yi ge ha~M du grags/ /thams cad a ha~M kun la khyab/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /a ha~M dngos po thams cad la/ /khyab pa'i sa ni lhag par gnas/ /a ha~M dang bral skyes bu ni/ /rtsa ba bcad pa'i

shing bzhin no/ /ha~M ni dpral ba'i skra mtshams na/ /a ni lte bar yang dag gnas/ /'dir ni a las zla bar bshad/ /'od zer stong 'gyed pa yi ha~M/ /'dir yang a yi ming la brten/ /rten pa'i ha~M du rab tu grags/ /

a ni srog gi rlung du bshad/ /de bzhin mthur sel ha~M du brjod/ /de gnyis gcig gyur 'khor ba ste/ /des na a ha~M zhes par grags/ /rnam rtog bral ba'i gnas pa ni/ /a ha~M gang du gnas pa med/ /gzhan ni 'ga' zhig

'di la yang / /don dam par ni dmigs su med/ /de ltar a ha~M nga yis bshad/ /rgyud rnams kun du rnyed par dka'/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las a ha~M gi sgra'i don bshad pa'i
le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /stong nyid dbye ba bsdus pa ni/ /rnal 'byor pa ni gang gis shes/ /stong nyid de ni shes par 'gyur/ /

mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyir/ /stong nyid bsgom par yongs su gsungs/ /nang gi bdag nyid chos rnams ni/ /kun du rtog pa'i gnyen po dang / /phyin ci log ni rnam dag pa/ /phyi nas stong pa nyid du 'dod/ /phyi rol

dmigs pa dang bral ba/ /nang gi bdag nyid chos rnams dang / /phyi rol du yang mi rtog pa/ /'dir ni phyi dang nang gi ni/ /stong pa nyid du yang dag bshad/ /snod kyi 'jig rten dang bral ba/ /chen po stong pa nyid du brjod/ /ye shes

gang gis de stong par/ /mthong ba de yang stong par brjod/ /me long ye shes rdzogs pa la/ /rjes su dmigs par byed phyir ro/ /de yi mi mthun phyogs stong pa/ /dngos med stong pa nyid stong nyid/ /don dam par ni brdzun

pa'i dngos/ /shes pa don dam stong pa nyid/ /'dus byas sbyin pa la sogs kyi/ /dge ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ /rang gi rnam rtog mtshan nyid spyod/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid du bshad/ /yang dag byang chub 'dus ma byas/ /

rgyu mtshan yang ni dmigs su med/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs/ /'dus ma byas pa'i stong nyid gsungs/ /sems can don du smon lam sogs/ /rang dga' sogs pa dmigs pa med/ /shin tu stong pa nyid du

bshad/ /kun rtog thams cad rnam par spangs/ /mtha' las 'das pa'i stong nyid gsungs/ /thog mtha' med pa'i 'jig rten gyi/ /'gro ba'i phyir ni smon lam nyid/ /rlom sems med par de brjod do/ /thog mtha' med pa'i
stong pa nyid/ /mya ngan 'das la dmigs pa med/ /dge ba'i bdag nyid mi stong ba/ /rlom sems med pa zhes bshad do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid/ /'dod chags la sogs dri ma ni/ /bdag ni rang
bzhin gyis dag pa'i/ /de ltar rlom sems med gsungs pa/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gsal/ /mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa/ /sku gzugs de yi yon tan ni/ /gzhan rnams la yang mi dmigs pa/ /rang gi

mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/ /byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams nyid/ /spyod pa la yang rlom sems med/ /chos rnams thams cad stong par bshad/ /bdag dang skyes pa'i chos rnams ni/ /sgro btags dngos po med pa'i mchog /

'ching ba thams cad rnam par gcod/ /dngos med stong pa nyid du gsungs/ /ji ltar sngon gsungs stong pa nyid/ /de ltar dngos po med shes pa/ /slar yang mi dmigs pa nyid ni/ /dngos po med pa stong nyid 'dod/ /de ltar

stong nyid dbye ba yang / /bag chags rnams kyi gnyen po'i phyir/ /rgyu yi gnyen po mi mthun phyogs/ /bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las stong pa nyid kyi
mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /stong pa nyid ni skye ba'i rgyu/ /rnam pa med pa'i nyams myong dngos/ /lus rnams la ni khyab pa dang / /

phung po lnga ni rang bzhin lus/ /'khor lo drug la khyab pa dang / /chos rnams kun gyi dbus gnas phyir/ /ring ba ma yin nye ba min/ /de ni kun rdzob dang dbyer med/ /stong pa nyid ni don dam mo/ /rdo rje phreng ba de ltar bshad/ /srog gi

rten gyi mtshan nyid ni/ /sku mdog sngon po zhal gsum pa/ /spyan gsum po la phyag drug mchog /rdo rje 'khor lo nor bu g.yas/ /g.yon pa dril bu pad ma dang / /ral gri shin du rnon po dang / /phyar ba go rims bzhin du bsnams/ /

A li kA li las byung ba/ /zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /sna tshogs pad rgyas gdan la ni/ /sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung gis bzhugs/ /hU~M gi sa bon rdzogs pa dang / /rdo rje chen po'i rigs las byung / /

kun rtog rnams ni skyed pa'i rlung / /rnam par gcod cing thim par byed/ /gnod byed de dag sel bar byed/ /gnyis pa thams cad rnam par gcod/ /sgyu ma chen mo stong pa che/ /sangs rgyas sa ni rmad du byung / /sangs rgyas

nyid kyi 'bras ster ba'o/ /'di yi sngags ni brjod par bya/ /oM dang badzra mA le+e dang / /de bzhin AHdang hU~M dang gnyis/ /phaT dang swA hA yang dag ldan/ /sngags mchog btus pa bla na med/ /rlung 'phrog de kho na nyid kyis/ /yid kyi rnam

rtog sel bar byed/ /zhi ba'i gnas dang chu 'gram dang / /shing gcig lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / /yang na sum mdor 'bum phrag bcu/ /gsal bar yang ni bzlas par bya/ /de ni dngos grub mchog tu 'gro/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i
rnal 'byor gyis/ /de yi yon tan gsal bar 'byung / /zhi ba la sogs 'bad mi dgos/ /skad cig gcig la mngon par rtogs/ /de ni de nyid rigs mchog shes/ /dpa' bo gcig pu'i cho ga 'di/ /dpa' mo gcig

pu nyid bsgrub pa/ /de yi mtshan nyid sgom pa gang / /rnam rtog spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /shin du rnam dag mkha' yi dngos/ /rang gi dngos grub mchog tu 'gro/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par
rtogs pa las stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i phreng ba skyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /mtshan mo nyin mo'i mtshan nyid ni/ /mtshan

mo shes rab shes par bya/ /'byung po thams cad thim nas 'gro/ /mtshan mo'i cha ni zla bar 'gyur/ /zla ba mya ngan 'das mtshan nyid/ /kun rdzob dang ni don dam gyi/ /shes rab rnam pa gnyis zhes bya/ /kun rdzob shes
byar shes par bya/ /don dam reg bya rnam par spangs/ /reg bya dang bral bde ba gang / /bde ba mchog de thob par dka'/ /nyin mo slar yang thabs su bshad/ /thabs ni nyin mor gyur pa dang / /gang tshe

dngos las skyes nyi ma/ /rtag tu b+ha ga'i bdag por 'gyur/ /'khor ba'i rnam pa nyi mar 'gyur/ /nyi ma las ni zla ba skye/ /de las gnyis med ngo bor bshad/ /'bar ba'i phyir ni nyi mar 'gyur/ /rnam par dpyad pa'i don dam

dang / /chags bral mchog tu phra ba dang / /mi snang ba dang stong pa'i lus/ /'od gsal ba yi go 'phang zhi/ /gang du yang dag mi gnas so/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las mtshan
mo nyin mo rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /A li kA li'i dam tshig ni/ /rgyud rnams gzhan du ma gsungs pa'i/ /rgyal sras

rnams la dgongs pa yi/ /'od gsal go 'phang las skyes pa'i/ /snang ba mched pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /gsal byed sum bcu rtsa gsum ldan/ /kA li'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'o/ /snang ba mched pa'i go 'phang ni/ /snang ba las byung

zad pa med/ /dbyangs ni bcu drug dang ldan pa/ /A li'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'o/ /de gnyis gsang ba'i sbyor ba las/ /dbus su skyes pa'i bde ba che/ /A li kA li'i dam tshig ces/ /dgongs pa'i tshig gis bye brag

byas/ /shin tu phra ba'i ye shes mchog /bla ma brgyud las shes par bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las A li kA li rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gnyis pa'o// //

de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ /mtshams kyi mtshan nyid bla na med/ /snang dang mi snang bral ba'i mtshams/ /shes rab rdo rje las byung ba/ /gnyis med 'dres pa'i dbus na gnas/ /'bags shing gos pa rnam par

spangs/ /rdo rje pad ma 'chi med skyes/ /zla ba nyi ma yang dag 'dres/ /mthar ni yang dag mi 'gro gang / /mtshams med 'khor ba dag par byed/ /rang gi ngo bo rnam pa mchog /phra ba'i mtshan nyid bsam mi khyab/ /sems can kun gyi

mtshams kyi ni/ /rdo rje 'chang gi btsun mo dang / /'char ba mchog tu dag par bshad/ /dga' bral la sogs rnam par spangs/ /mdud pa'i rtser gnas mchog tu zhi/ /tsa na ka yi tshig gu tsam/ /mtshan mo bdag po de shar ba/ /gang phyir

steng gi go 'phang gnas/ /la la thig le'i rang ngo bor/ /rnam pa bzhi yis yang dag gnas/ /la lar thog ma la sogs spangs/ /la lar de yang dmigs su med/ /gang phyir rang gi bdag nyid can/ /de phyir brjod du med pa'o/ /
rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las mtshams kyi 'char ba'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /

rnam pa nyi shu'i ming tsam ni/ /slob dpon las su yongs su bshad/ /sngags kyi rnal 'byor legs rgyas pa/ /sngon du bsnyen pa sa sbyang dang / /'byung po bskrad pa nyid dang ni/ /sa gzung nyid dang thig skud ni/ /sbyang dang lhag par

gnas pa dang / /bgegs bskrad de bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi/ /thig ni rab tu gsal ba dang / /phur bus yang dag gdab pa dang / /bum pa byin gyis brlab pa dang / /bcom ldan 'das kyi lhag gnas dang / /khrus dang rab tu sbyang ba dang / /

mchod pa rab gnas gtor ma dang / /slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang / /me la sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin/ /dbang bskur ba dang gshegs su gsol/ /de ltar cho ga nyi shu'i las/ /gang gis de shes 'gro ba'i bla/ /dge

slong rdo rje 'dzin pas bya/ /bdud las sdigs 'dzub de ni mchog /yi ge gsum zlos pa la zhen/ /rdo rje theg pa lhag par grol/ /zhi ba la sogs las gang gis/ /rtag tu lag pa'i mthil la gnas/ /de yi yang dag cho ga
yis/ /cho ga mchog ni bya ba yin/ /rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor sogs/ /cho ga la sogs brtsam par bya/ /bgegs mthar byed pa'i snying po'i sngags/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi mchog /stong phrag bcu ni

yongs su bzla/ /thog mar mkhas pa ji bzhin du/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bsal ba'i phyir/ /sngon du bsnyen pa zhes ni bshad/ /de 'og yi ge gsum khrir ni/ /bsam pa kun gyis bzlas byas na/ /yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub

ster/ /slob ma rnams kyi dngos grub rgyur/ /skye bos dben pa'i phyag dar byas/ /sa gzung chu ni nye bar bcas/ /grong dang ha cang mi nye zhing / /ring por yang ni brtsam mi bya/ /shin du 'jam zhing srog chags med/ /rgyal po'i pho

brang shin du ring / /khang khyim tshong dus las rgyang ring / /yang na bde gshegs rten la ni/ /thog mar sor mo rnams la ni/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sngags dgod bya/ /khru gang sor ni bzhi pa yis/ /seng ldeng phur pa byas nas ni/ /yi

ge gsum sngags chu yis bkru/ /yi ge brgya pa lan bdun dang / /yi ge gsum gyi sngags kyis brko/ /sa ni chu yi mthar thug pa/ /yang na khru ni phyed dang gsum/ /yang na sems kyis sbyang bar bya/ /de la gnas pa'i 'byung po ni/ /

yang dag 'gror ni 'jug par bya/ /oM ma hA kro d+ha dz+wa lArka/ /hU~M phaT mtha' dang yang dag ldan/ /de ltar lag mthil sngags bkod la/ /'byung po rnams ni bskrad par bya/ /sa la thal mo lan gsum du/ /brdab pa byas nas sngags

bzlas te/ /u gats+tsha da lan gnyis brjod/ /sarba bud d+ha gra ha ud gats+tsha/ /yi ge gsum ni mtha' ru brjod/ /badzra satwa be shad de/ /las ni thams cad par gsungs pa'i/ /gtor ma byin nas 'gro ru gzhug /sa ni yongs su bzung rjes la/ /

rdo rje slob dpon gyis brtsam bya/ /tshwa sgo med cing dri ma bsal/ /mnyam zhing zug rngu med pa dang / /me long lta bur 'jam pa dang / /mnyam pa yang ni mkhas pas bya/ /ba yi lci ba la sogs pa/ /rnam pa lnga yis byug par bya/ /byugs

nas de rjes khrus byas la/ /slob dpon khro bo'i sku dang ni/ /dkyil 'khor 'jam pa'i rdo rje yi/ /mchog tu mi g.yo gzugs kyis ni/ /'jam pa dang ni sum sgril gyis/ /ras sam yang na gso ma yis/ /yi ge gsum

gyis rnam par sbyang / /thig skud kyis ni kun nas mnyam/ /gru bzhi par ni byas nas kyang / /rdo rje can gyis khru gsum gsum/ /gru bzhi par ni gzung bar bya/ /de yi dbus su lte ba'i cha/ /sgrib pa'i skyon ni spang bar bya/ /sku gdung

dang ni rin chen gzhug /legs par bsangs nas byin gyis brlab/ /yi ge gsum yang swA hA'i mtha'/ /phaT kyi dbus su yang dag sbyar/ /sngags 'di yang ni bzlas par bya/ /brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag par gsal/ /

tshangs pa'i thig ni btab nas ni/ /yi ge brgya pa bzla bar bya/ /de rjes de la me tog char/ /sngags ni brjod nas gtor bar bya/ /oM dang a mo g+hA pad mo/ /de bzhin du ni phyi nas su/ /b+ha su d+ha ri d+ha ra gnyis/ /d+ha ra Ni maN Da

li hU~M/ /yi ge brgya pa'i sngags dang ni/ /lan gsum bar du thig skud la/ /zhabs bsil chu yis bsang bar bya/ /yi ge gsum gyis thig gdab bya/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rdo rje can gyis mtshams bzhi pa/ /

thog mar shar dang byang dang ni/ /ji srid lho dang nub dag dang / /mtshams su yang dag thig skud dang / /slar yang yang dag gdab par bya/ /shar dang lho yi mtshams dang ni/ /nub dang byang gi mtshams su ni/ /thig skud kyis ni tshad

gzhal bya/ /zur bzhi dang ni thig skud bya/ /skor thig gsum ni sgo bzhi pa/ /rdo rje phreng ba gsum gyis mdzes/ /tshangs pa'i thig gnyis btab nas ni/ /de las dbang po'i pho brang ni/ /rnam pa kun gyis yang dag thig /rgyal

ba kun gyi bzhugs gnas gsal/ /de la rig pa 'dzin pa bri/ /slar yang rin chen phye ma 'am/ /tshon sna lnga rnams me tog dang / /rdzas sam las kyi sbyor ba las/ /rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya la sogs bri/ /
mi bskyod sku mdog phyag rgya sogs/ /rigs ni dbus su dgod par bya/ /rgyal ba rgyal dang rin chen 'chang / /'khor ba 'das dang shes rab 'chang / /rim bzhin sku mdog dbye ba yis/ /

shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su dgod/ /gti mug zhe sdang chags pa dang / /rdo rje dga' sogs rim pa bzhin/ /me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su/ /ji lta ba bzhin dgod par bya/ /sna tshogs pad ma zla ba yi/ /gdan
bdun gzhan gyi nyi ma gnyis/ /'khor dga' zhe sdang dga' bar bcas/ /ka yi phreng gis rnam par brgyan/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can/ /g.yon na shes rab ral gri bsnams/ /gzugs dang dbyibs rnams

ji bzhin du/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya/ /phyi rol gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs/ /mtshams kyi char ni rnam par dgod/ /shar la sogs pa'i snam bu la/ /byams pa sa yi snying po shar/ /'jam dpal phyag na rdo rje

lhor/ /mkha' snying 'jig rten dbang phyug ni/ /kun nas nub tu bsgom par bya/ /sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / /kun du bzang po byang du dgod/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can/ /g.yon na ral gri dgod pa dang / /phyag na

rdo rje dri med pa'i/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni gdan/ /lha mo rnams la zla ba'i gdan/ /sna tshogs pad ma'i steng na gsal/ /rnam par snang mdzad rigs las byung / /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya la sogs dgod/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo

rnams su/ /gshin rje gshed la sogs pa dgod/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can/ /de bzhin ral gri g.yon na 'dzin/ /mi g.yo la sogs mtshams rnams su/ /gshin rje gshed kyi rang ngo bo/ /zhal gsum phyag drug

rnam pa can/ /g.yon na ral gri rnam par bsam/ /gang phyir shes rab rang bzhin g.yon/ /de bzhin g.yon nas ral gri brjod/ /gnod mdzes de bzhin gtsug tor ni/ /'og dang steng du rnam par dgod/ /khro bo rnams ni nyi mar bzhugs/ /

de bzhin sna tshogs pad ma'i gdan/ /de bzhin phyag rgya dbyug la sogs/ /nye bar mtshon nas dgod par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam dag pa'i/ /ri mo lnga ni rnam par dgod/ /de la rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng / /ra ba yis ni yongs su bskor/ /rin chen dra ba rnga ma dang / /

lha mo rnams kyi snam bu yis/ /ka ba rta babs 'khor lor mtshan/ /ri dgas rnams kyi mtshan pas brgyan/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs/ /rnga yab me long la sogs kyis/ /brgyan pa ru ni rnam par bshad/ /

sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag brten/ /slob dpon mchog gi dkyil 'khor ni/ /rang gi lus kyi gzugs brnyan no/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya ba/ /bgegs bskrad pa ni sngon song bas/ /su~M b+ha'i sgra dang ni su~M b+ha/ /thog mar oM

dang ngo mtshar che/ /hU~M gnyis phaT kyi mtha' dang ldan/ /shar gyi sgo ru dgod par bya/ /oM dang gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na zhes/ /hU~M gnyis phaT dang yang dag ldan/ /blo dang ldan pas lho ru dgod/ /oM dang gr-ih+NA pa ya gnyis/ /hU~M gnyis phaT kyi mtha'

dang ldan/ /nub du yang dag spro bar bya/ /oM A na ya ho b+ha ga /bAn dang bid+yA rA dzA dang / /hU~M gnyis dang ni phaT mthar dgod/ /de rjes yang ni byang du dgod/ /'di yis gdug pa bkug nas ni/ /de nas sngags pas phur pa gdab/ /seng

ldeng las ni byas pa yi/ /phur bu sor ni bcu gnyis tshad/ /zur gsum yi ge gsum gyis mtshan/ /yi ge brgya pa so sor bzlas/ /sngags kyi chu yis bsangs nas ni/ /phyogs dang mtshams su dgod par bya/ /oM dang yi ge g+ha lan

gnyis/ /de bzhin g+hA ta ya na gnyis/ /sarba du Sh+Ta phaT zhes dang / /de bzhin kI la ya gnyis dang / /sarba pA pa~M phaT dang ni/ /hU~M gsum badzra kI la ya/ /badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ /kA ya bAka tsit+ta badzra dang / /kI la ya hU~M phaT yi ge'i/ /

mtha' can gyi ni phur bus gdab/ /oM dang badzra mud ga ra/ /badzra kI la ya A ko Ta/ /ya dang hU~M gnyis phaT mtha' dang / /sngags dang phur bus brdung ba brjod/ /de rjes bgegs ni 'jug la sogs/ /bskrad don rdo rje ra ba dang / /
steng du mda' yi dra ba dang / /'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje dang / /gtsug tor gnod mdzes sngags kyis ni/ /byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga yis/ /bum pa bcu 'am yang na drug /rin chen las byas rnam dag pa/ /

sman lnga dang ni 'bras bu lnga/ /'bru lnga la sogs kyis gang ba/ /rin chen lnga dang sna ma sogs/ /lo ma lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /gur gum gla rtsi ga pur dang / /tsan dan chu yis gang bar bya/ /me tog la sogs kyis mchod

bya/ /rang rang sngags kyis byin gyis brlab/ /badzra d+h+r-ika dang dzi na dzig /rad na d+h+r-ig dang A ro lig / de bzhin pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika sngags dang / /lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i 'od zer gyis/ /'og min 'jig rten khams nas ni/ /bu~M` pa rang

gis bskur byas pa/ /de nas spyan drangs nas ni gzhug /de nas lha mo'i gzugs spros nas/ /de rjes gzhan la dgod par bya/ /oM dang ru ru spu ru dang / /de nas dz+wa la tiSh+tha gsal/ /de bzhin sid d+ha lo tsa ne/ /sarba ar

tha sA d+ha ne/ /swA hA zhes ni de la bzlas/ /spyan gyi rnam pa rdzogs nas ni/ /bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya/ /oM dang sha~M ka re dang ya/ /de las shAn ting ku ru dang / /de bzhin g+huT+Ti g+huT+Te dang / /g+huT+Ti ne dang g+huT+Ti ne/ /g+ha ta ya ni

lan gnyis brjod/ /swA hA'i mtha' can sngags brjod bya/ /mA ma kI yi rnam pa rdzogs/ /bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya/ /oM dang ka Te bi ka Te/ /ni ka Te ka Ta~M ka Te/ /ka ro Ta bIr+ye swA hA/ /gos dkar rnam par

rdzogs nas ni/ /bu~M pa'i dbus su mchod par bya/ oM dang tA re tud tA re/ /tu re swA hA dgod par bya/ /sgrol ma'i rnam pa rdzogs nas ni/ /bu~M pa'i dbus su mchod par bya/ /gshin rje gshed sogs gzhan rnams

la/ /gcig la las ni thams cad pa/ /oM na maHsa man ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzrA NA~M/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA da~MSh+To ta ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la/ /ba ra shu pA sha hastA ya/ oM a mr-i ta kuN Da li/ kha kha

khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ gardza gardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+na bi nA ya kAn/ ma hA ga Na pa ti/ dzi bi ta an ta ka rA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ sngags 'di lan bdun bar du ni/ /las

ni thams cad pa yin te/ /snying po'i sngags ni bzlas byas la/ /rigs kyi dbang phyug mchod par bya/ /yi ge brgya pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /lan bdun bar du bsgom par bya/ /brgya dang rtsa brgyad rim pa yis/ /yi ge gsum

yang bzlas pa ni/ /de nas rang lha'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /mchod yon snod du mchod par bya/ /de nas du gu la ras ni/ /ga pur a ga rus bdugs pa/ /bkab nas rang rang sngags dang ni/ /de la rim bzhin lhag gnas
bya/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can/ /sprin bral nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /de lta bu yi sku mdog phyag /rang snang ba yi sku la 'khyud/ /A li kA li las byung ba/ /sna tshogs pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /
gzhal yas khang dbus nyams dga' ba'i/ /'og min zhing khams na bzhugs pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor dang bcas par ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /bsgoms nas de las 'od zer spro/ /kha

dog lnga dang lcags kyu yi/ /de yi spyan drangs slob dpon gyis/ /sngags brjod nas ni spyan drang bya/ /e h+ye hi dang b+ha ga bAn/ /sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ /tiSh+Tha gnyis dang sa ma ya/ /de la a nu sma ra gnyis/ /sku gsung thugs

kyi rdo rje dang / /swA hA'i mtha' can lan gsum brjod/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje spyan drang bya/ /dkyil 'khor ba dang yang dag ldan/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su spyan drang bya/ /rang gi gdan gyi dbye ba la/ /bzhugs shing yang dag

mchod par bya/ /rang rang sngags dang rim ji bzhin/ /lha yi me tog sogs kyis mchod/ /'khor lo mchog ni mchod par bya/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'dir/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin grong / /yo byad ci 'byor pa yis
ni/ /dkyil 'khor mchod pa bgyi bar 'tshal/ /thugs kyis brtse bar nyer dgongs te/ /mgon pos mchod pa 'di bzhes shig /oM sarba ta thA ga tA nA~M/ pU dzo pas+thA na yA Ata mA na~M nir+yA ta yA mi/

bla mas yi ge gsum ni brjod/ /lha yi rnam par byas nas ni/ /de rjes bdag la mchod par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga te/ /pU dzA badzra swa b+hA ba/ /Ata ma ko\u0f85 ha~M zhes ni brjod/ /rang lha'i nga rgyal byas nas ni/ /ji ltar bskyed pa'i

yul rnams dang / /gnod byed kha na ma tho med/ /zhe sdang chen po'i rigs las byung / /dkyil 'khor dbang phyug mchod bya zhing / /de nas lha rnams lhag gnas bya/ /yid 'phrog sna tshogs lha yi gos/ /ga pur a ga ru

yis bdug /sngags kyis dag byas dgab par bya/ /oM dang tiSh+Tha badzra ho/ /brjod nas dkyil 'khor lhag gnas bya'o/ /oM dang s+pha ra badzra ho/ /blo dang ldan pas sngags 'di brjod/ /me tog spar bas gtor nas ni/ /
lhag gnas der ni gshegs par bya/ /rnam pa kun dang yang dag ldan/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong bar bya/ /rigs lnga'i rang bzhin bzang po yis/ /bcom ldan gzugs brnyan bsgoms nas ni/ /me long sogs la

khrus bya zhing / /de bzhin rdzas dang 'o ma sogs/ /ji ltar ltams pa tsam gyis kyang / /de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ba/ /de bzhin bdag gi sku khrus gsol/ /cod pan dbang phyug rdo rje sems/ /dbus su yi ge

gsum dang spel/ /swA hA'i mtha' can brjod par bya/ /las kyi de nyid cho ga shes/ /de rjes sbyar ba'i gtor ma bya/ /oM sarba A ba ra Na/ /shud d+ha sarba pA pa~M dang / /bi shud d+ha badzra hUM~M phaT/ /swA hA'i mtha' can sngags brjod bya/ /

pad ma bskor ba'i phyag rgya dang / /yungs kar dkar po bsregs byas nas/ /nyon mongs pa ni sel bar byed/ /mkhyud cing bskor bas dor bar bya/ /de nas cho ga bzhin legs mchog /sil snyan glu la sogs pa dang / /bcom ldan

'das la dbul bar bya/ /rang rang sngags dang go rim bzhin/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ /puSh+pa pU dzA me g+ha dang / /sa mu drA dang s+pha ra Na/ /sa ma ye dang shrI ye AH/ /hU~M gi sngags ni rjes su brjod/ /rdzas rnams kun la rang ming ni/ /

gzugs la sogs pa snga ma bzhin/ /cho ga bzhin du yang dag brjod/ /rdo rje sems dpa' legs bsgyings pa/ /rdo rje slob dpon cho ga shes/ /sngags 'di yis ni rab gnas bya/ /oM dang su pra tiSh+Tha dang / /badzra

swA hA'i mtha' can bzlas/ /yi ge gsum gyi snying po ni/ /sku gsung thugs la bkod nas ni/ /me tog char ni dbab par bya/ /slob dpon slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas/ /glu yis yang dag bskul nas ni/ /sad pa na ni phyag

kyang byas/ /las kun bdag nyid rnal 'byor bdag /gtor ma don kun grub par byed/ /las la byang zhing mkhas pa dang / /cho ga bzhin du bsgyings bcas dang / /chang dang sna tshogs sha dang ni/ /de bzhin la du 'o ma dang / /'bras

chan phye yi khur ba dang / /sran khur bye ba mang po dang / /mchod yon me tog sogs kyis mchod/ /snod bcu chu yis gang ba la'o/ /gsungs pa'i khro bo bcu sngags kyis/ /snga ma bzhin du cho ga yis/ /de dbus 'byung po kun

la ni/ /ngo mtshar chen po'i gtor ma sbyin/ /snga ma bzhin du cho ga yis/ /til bsregs bza' bas khyad par du/ /blo dang ldan pas sngags bzlas bya/ /'di ni don kun sgrub byed pa/ /oM brah+ma de ba tA sarba/ in dra da sha

lo ka rak+Sha ka / nA ga gan d+ha rba ku~M b+ha Na Da/ yak+Sha b+hU ta ga Na/ ta thA pre ta u ga ta/ pi shA tse a pasmA ra/ DA ki ni gra ha/ big+ha nan mA tr-i ga NA/ sarba ta thA ag ne ma ra gra hA/ oM dzo b+hak+Sha ma hA te dza/ ma nu Sh+ya na ma/ bi hi sa ka /

mu dra man tra a d+hi d+ho b+h+yaHtsa/ gra ha nak+Sha tra ma nu Sh+ya/ i ma~M ba li/ pra grI h+nan sid d+ha yad tshan du me san d+ha/ sa t+ya ma ne Sh+ya ka ra me Shu/ sad sa ha ya b+ha ban du tse/ d+hA na d+hA na/ su pa ra nany+tsa/ d+ha DAn tu ma ma to
Shi ta/ i ti u pA trA na tro Sha Ni satwA ta nam na sha yan tu tsa/ thog mar oM dang AHhU~M phaT/ /swA hA'i mtha' can las kun byed/ /de ltar sngags 'di snod la bzlas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par

rol/ /slob ma lhag par gnas par bya/ /mtshan nyid yon tan gyis brgyan pa/ /tsan dan ga pur gla rtsi yi/ /chu yis kyang ni khrus byas te/ /dad pa'i chu ni 'chang ba yis/ /sems kyi dri ma rnam par 'khrud/ /bdog pa thams

cad gtong bar byed/ /gos gtsang ba ni mchog tu bgo/ khang pa brtseg ma byas nas ni/ /ras kyi yol ba kun nas bre/ /yi ge gsum dang yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje can gyis sngags chu ni/ /lan bdun gtor la gtor ma yis/ /

las skyes dri ma sbyong bar byed/ /de nas sa yi snying po sogs/ /mig la sogs la rnam par dgod/ /sor mo dbu ma gnyis kyis ni/ /dbang po so so la reg pas/ /sngags brjod bya zhing byin gyis brlab/ /lus kyi dkyil

'khor rnal 'byor gyis/ /oM dang tsak+Shu tsak+ShuHdang / /sa man ta dang tsak+ShuHbzlas/ /mai tri satwa lo tsa ne/ /sarba aR+tha sA d+ha ni/ /swA hA'i mtha' dang sngags 'di brjod/ /mthe bo gung mo yang dag sbyar/ /zhabs bsil chu dang mnyes

nas ni/ /sngags de lan gsum bzlas par bya/ /slob ma'i mig la so sor ni/ /mthe bo'i phyag rgyas reg par bya/ /khru gang ba la sor bzhi pa'i/ /skud pa zhags pa 'dra ba la/ /yi ge brgya pa'i sngags lan gsum/ /bzlas

nas zhabs bsil chus bsang bya/ /skud pa lan gsum dkris pa ni/ /rdo rje gsum ni mdud par ldan/ /dpung pa g.yon par bcings pa ni/ /sngags 'di lan gsum brjod par bya/ /oM dang lo tsa ne yi sgra/ /ya ta twad ta~M sa~M

pra ta~M/ /mi b+ha bi shud d+hi yi sgra/ /ra~M dang rad na tra yA ya/ /sid d+hi na ni da da sha / ya swA hA yi sngags 'di ni/ /theg pa bla med lan bdun bzlas/ /slob ma la ni me tog gtor/ /de nas rdo rje 'chang gis ni/ /sor ni bcu gnyis gzhal ba yi/ /

zur ni gsum du yongs su bya/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin brlab bsgom/ /slob ma'i lag tu gtad par bya/ /oM dang pra ti badzra dang / /sa yan ta dang i shwa ri/ /oM AHhU~M swA hA'i mtha' can sngags/ /bzlas nas slob mas dor

bar bya/ /sar 'bab pa yi phur bu ste/ /phyogs ni gang du lta ba nyid/ /slob dpon dang ni slob ma yis/ /de yi phyogs bltas nyal bar bya/ /nam langs yang dag bla ma la/ /ji ltar mthong ba'i don kun zhu/ /de la dmigs nas

sbyin bsreg ni/ /zhi ba la sogs rab dbye bas/ /las ni thams cad pa nyid dam/ /bgegs zhi ba yi don du bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgyings bcas pas/ /rnal 'byor ji bzhin cho ga bzhin/ /sngar bzhin 'dir yang gtor

ma ni/ /bgegs rnams zhi phyir sbyin par bya/ /de nas gsol 'debs slob ma ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon thugs rjes khyab/ /thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni/ /mdun du 'dug nas phyag byas te/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob

dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid gsal du stsol/ /sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po

bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /de nas bla mas de la yang / /bya dang mi bya gsungs pa ni/ /sems can las kyi srad bus gdab/ /rdul tshon bkye ba'i rim pa dgye/ /'gro ba 'di dag dkyil 'khor te/ /rang bzhin dag pa gnyis med

pa'o/ /thog mar dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor bdag /rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid bsgom/ /slob ma bdag nyid 'drar dmigs nas/ /de 'og thams cad rab bsgrub bya/ /bla ma bzang la dbang bskur phyir/ /slob mas de rjes gsol ba

gdab/ /'di nas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho la/ /nyon mongs chu srin na kras khyab/ /las kyi rlung gis dba' klong 'khrugs/ /bdag byin thugs rje'i rgya mtsho kye/ /mi shes ling tog gis sgribs mig /nyon mongs dbang du bya ba ni/ /bde ba
sdug bsngal 'jigs las skyob/ /thugs rje'i rgya mtshos bdag skyabs mdzod/ /de 'dra tshig gsan rdo rje can/ /thugs rje'i thugs ni yongs su gang / /slob ma la ni yongs su gsungs/ /bu khyod

dus 'di nas bzung ste/ /rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung lugs bstan/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni khyod kyis zung / /rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gnas/ /bu khyod 'di ni bdud rtsi ste/ /srungs shig ma srung na ni sreg /bsrungs na dngos grub

kun 'grub 'gyur/ /nyon mongs thams cad sel ba'i klung / /oM dang pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ /u da ka dang AHhU~M Tha/ /slob mas bdud rtsi lnga btung bya/ /rdo rje ye shes rmad byung ba'o/ /gsang ba dran na skyon 'gyur phyir/ /rdo rje slob ma la ni
dbab/ /dri chen dri chu la sogs pa/ /mtshal chen 'bab pa'i bu mo'i gos/ /khrag dang khu bas yang dag bsgos/ /gu gul dang ni rnam par bsres/ /yi dgas me ni blangs

nas su/ /pad ma'i snod du bzhag nas ni/ /der ni thams cad gzhug par bya/ /khro bo rdo rje gsum bdag nyid/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas gnas/ /rdo rje 'chang dbang slob ma la/ /rmad byung chen po'i bdug pas bdug / /'bab

par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /oM tiSh+Tha ma hA kro d+ha/ /de bzhin A be sha ya hU~M/ /rnal 'byor pa yis sngags 'di brjod/ /slob ma la ni gsal bar dbab/ /badzra sa twa hi ma he/ /bid+yA rA dzA ya bid+yA ma he/ /de ltar sngags ni 'di yis

kyang / /slar yang slob ma dbang bskur nas/ /rang bzhin gyis dag rang gi lus/ /dkyil 'khor mchog 'di mthong ba na/ /de bzhin gshegs dang lha mo dang / /rgyal ba'i sras kyi yang dag gzhi/ /khro bo khyab pa'i gsang ba'i mchog /

rdo rje sems dpa' rten dang ni/ /phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor ni/ /gnyis po de la bstan par bya/ /slar yang slob mas gsol ba gdab/ /bdag la dbang bskur mdzad du gsol/ /rnam rgyal bum pa blangs nas ni/ /pad ma'i
snod ni bzang po la/ /de yi dbus su blo bzang po/ /hU~M rdor las byung mi bskyod bsgom/ /rang nyid ye shes sa bon gyi/ /'od zer yang dag bskul bas byung / /slar yang ye shes sems dpa' bsgom/ /

mi bskyod pa yi rnam pa mchog /mi bskyod ngo bo de nyid kyis/ /rnam par shes pa'i phung po bsgom/ /slob ma'i mgo bor lag pa bzhag /rdo rje slob dpon thugs rjes khyab/ /oM dang ma hA sa twa dang / /de bzhin I sha ra

taM dang / /a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi sa hA/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ /a b+hi She ka sa ma ya/ /shri ye AHhU~M de nas bzla/ /chu yi gting nas slob ma la/ /dbu rgyan dbang bskur don du ni/ /cod pan 'jig rten gsum rgyal po/ /sems can

kun gyi don sgrub pa/ /snying rjes khyab pa nges byin gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i yon tan gnas/ /sa bon tri las byung ba yi/ /rin chen 'byung ldan bsgoms nas ni/ /ri mo dar sogs cod pan yang / /slob ma'i mgo la sbyin par bya/ /

oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ /rad na mu ku Ta sgra dang / /de bzhin sgra dang pU dza ya/ /a tiSh+Tha dang AHhU~M dang / /sngags 'di dag ni brjod nas ni/ /me tog mgo la sbyin par bya/ /slob ma rdo rje dbang bskur phyir/ /slar yang bla ma la

gsol gdab/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dngos/ /rdo rje brtul zhugs ngas byin gyis/ /gang gis ma rig sgo nga 'byed/ /ye shes thob 'gyur nga yis byas/ /hrIHlas pad ma rdzogs par ni/ /'od dpag med du rnam par

bsgom/ /rdo rje lag pa g.yas par sbyin/ /slob ma la ni 'di skad brjod/ /ngas khyod de ring dbang bskur bya/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /kun tu bzang po'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /dngos grub bzang phyir rdo rje

long / /kha~M las byung ba'i ral gri 'am/ /don yod grub pa'i rang ngo bo/ /rdzogs par lag pa g.yon par ni/ /slob ma bsgyings pa'i phyag rgya 'dzin/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /dril bu sgra yi rjes 'gror brjod/ /

khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /byang chub mchog ni rgyal ba'i gzhi/ /rdo rje dril bu bzung rjes la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang ngo bo/ /rang bzhin yon tan rnams kyis gang / /bdag po yi ni rnal 'byor 'gyur/ /rnam par

snang mdzad rang ngo bo/ /slob ma'i mgo la lag bzhag ste/ /rdo rje can gyis ming dbang bskur/ /gzugs kyi phung po rnam par bsgom/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ /che ge mo zhes badzra sa twa~M/ /a b+hi ShIny+tsa mi swA hA/ /phung po lnga yi

rnam dag pas/ /thog mar chu nas ming gi mthar/ /dbang bskur ba ni mchog tu shes/ /rmad byung chen po bshad par bya/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni dag pa 'di/ /dbang bskur lnga ni thob par 'gyur/ /ma rig pa ni bsal nas ni/ /

ye shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /slob ma 'dod don sngags dbang sbyin/ /sngags kyi dbang bskur ye shes mchog /ngas byin dngos grub ster bar byed/ /de nas yi ge drug sngags phaT/ /swA hA'i

mtha' can yi ge gsum/ /kha ni dam tshig gis bkang nas/ /sngags kyi sku yis dag pa dang / /bla ma'i zhal las yang dag brjod/ /bla mas dngos grub sbyin bya'i phyir/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /snying po yi ni

ye shes mchog /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus pa ni/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /de nas slob ma spyod brtul zhugs/ /sna tshogs bsam pa'i bye brag gis/ /gang gi spyod pa rnam dag pa/ /'dod la thugs rje'i gtso

bo yis/ /sems can don ni byed pa'i thabs/ /nga yis spyod pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin/ /de nas glegs bam dung la sogs/ /mda' gzhu ral gri 'khor lo dang / /sngon bzhin sngags kyis dag par byed/ /slob ma'i lag tu rim

bzhin sbyin/ /'di ni kun bzang spyod brtul zhugs/ /bsam pa sna tshogs rnam dag byed/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /sems can kun gyi don gyis byos/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ /de bzhin d+hI Tar twa~M dang / /d+har+ya mi AHhU~M dang / /de ltar sngags 'di dgod

par bya/ /de nas lung bstan thob don du/ /bsam pa dang bas bla ma la/ /da ltar sangs rgyas rigs su 'jug /khyed kyis bdag la lung bstan gsol/ /don yod rdo rje zhes bya khyod/ /rigs kyi dbang phyug lung bstan bya/ /de nas

slob ma dbugs dbyung 'dod/ /bla ma'i zhal snga nas ni skye/ /mgon po yang dag bdag dbugs phyung / /byang chub spyod pa'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /de nas rdo rje chos gos mtha'/ /g.yon pa'i lag pas bzung nas ni/ /g.yas

pa mi 'jigs sbyin byas la/ /dbugs dbyung ba yi mchog bya ba/ /nga yis rdo rje gsung bdag khyod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi go 'phang mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' mngon par brjod/ /khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che/ /dpal ldan

yon tan 'byung gnas bdag /bdud kyi stobs ni kun las rgyal/ /grong khyer mchog tu khyod zhugs so/ /de nas slob ma don 'dod la/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur bya/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur che/ /rdo rje

sems dpa' bdag la stsol/ /de nas ye shes rdor dbang phyug /ye shes sems dpa'i 'od zer gyis/ /spyan drangs sangs rgyas lnga la sogs/ /lha mo'i 'khor lo rim bzhin 'byung / /de yis ye shes chus bkang ba'i/ /

bum pa phyag bsnams de bzhin gshegs/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang rgyal ba rgyal/ /rin chen 'dzin dang 'khor ba sgrol/ /shes rab 'chang ni rim pa bzhin/ /gti mug zhe sdang 'dod chags la/ /de bzhin rdo rje dga' ma sogs/ /gshin

rje mthar byed shes mthar byed/ /pad ma mthar byed bgegs mthar byed/ /'di yis kun nas dbang bskur bas/ /rdo rje slob ma rnam par bsam/ /dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che/ /khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /gsang

ba gsum gyi gnas las byung / /sangs rgyas kun ni nga yis sbyin/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs lha mo/ /khro bo rang gi gnas su dgod/ /'jam dpal rnam par bsgoms nas ni/ /ye shes rdo rjes rnam par brgyan/ /oM dang d+ha
su pra tiSh+Tha/ badzra swA hA zhes ni dgod/ /blo bzang gis ni sngags brjod nas/ /slob ma la ni me tog gtor/ /de nas me tog sogs kyis mchod/ /slob ma'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'dra/ /thugs rjes

khyab pa'i bla ma yis/ /de nas slob ma rjes gnang bya/ /de nyid shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /mi bya ba ni ci yang med/ /dpal chen khyod kyis bka' drin gyis/ /nga ni 'dod yon lnga la spyod/ /sgyu ma rmi lam 'drar shes nas/ /rten

'brel las byung chos rnams ni/ /gzugs brnyan lta bur shes nas ni/ /sems can don ni mnyam med byos/ /bya ba byas pa'i slob ma ni/ /ci bde bar ni bsgrub par gyis/ /de nas bla ma la yon dbul/ /bstod cing kun nas phyag

kyang bya/ /skye bo bzang dang lhan cig tu/ /de nas bla ma gsang don gnyer/ /mthur du kha bltas kha sbyar te/ /ji ltar bdag nyid chen po khyed/ /bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar mdzod/ /de nas rigs lnga las byung ba'i/ /las dang

chos sogs dbye ba yis/ /sngags kyi theg pas lhag par grol/ /skal ldan bud med phyag rgyar bshad/ /skye bos dben pa'i mtshan phyed na/ /ro yi gzhi yi gnas song nas/ /thugs rje chen pos khyab pa yi/ /rdo rje slob dpon

yon tan 'byung / /ji ltar de ltar rnyed phyag rgya/ /snyoms 'jug la ni gang byung ba'i/ /bla na med pa'i rang bzhin gyi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa ni/ /rnal 'byor ma yi yang dag ltung / /kun rdzob byang chub sems gang yin/ /

gsang ba de yis dbang bskur bya/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig chen po rnam byung ba/ /khams lnga las byung bcud kyis len/ /bde ba chen pos myong bar gyis/ /slob ma rtog pa dang bral bas/ /pad ma la gnas

de myang gyis/ /'das pa'i rdo rje 'chang ba yis/ /rgyal sras ji ltar dbang bskur ba/ /byang chub sems kyi chu yis ni/ /bu khyod de bzhin dbang bskur bya/ /de nas shes rab dbang bskur phyir/ /bla mas don 'dod slob ma la/ /dngos

grub thams cad bsdus pa ni/ /bdag la khyed kyis dbang bskur stsol/ /de nas slob dpon bdag nyid che/ /phyag rgya yang dag byin gyis rlob/ /mchog ni thob par bya ba'i phyir/ /de 'og slob ma la ni sbyin/ /lha mo phyag rgya chen

po 'di/ /dpag med bde ba rab ster ba/ /bu yis kun nas blangs nas ni/ /bla na med pa'i mchod pa gyis/ /de nas shes rab ye shes de'i/ /sgrub po mchog tu 'dod pa'i don/ /lha mo'i ye shes de nyid mchog /dngos

grub don du nga yis sbyin/ /lha mos de la bka' bsgo ba/ /dpa' bo'i bu ni bla na med/ /dpa' bo khyod ni spro 'am ci/ /byang chub sems ni za nus sam/ /yang dag de ni nges par ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du smros/ /ji ltar

gsungs pa'i dam tshig mchog /lha mo ci phyir bdag mi nus/ /de nas lha mo de dgyes nas/ /skra bkrol gos ni bor nas kyang / /pad ma dag ni 'byed byed cing / /b+hany+dza mok+Sha ho zhes gsungs/ /bka' yi pad ma'i dbus gnas

pa/ /bde ba kun du rgyu ba'i rtsa/ /sor mos bskul nas dga' bar bya/ /dzi hwas kyang ni rol bar bya/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i bde byed pa/ /'di nyid rig pa bzang bsten na/ /mchog tu dga' bas nyams myong nas/ /lhung ba'i bde bas

de myang bya/ /de nas bcom ldan ma dgyes nas/ /b+hany+dza mok+Sha'i sngags gsung zhing / /rkang pa g.yon pa mgo la bzhag /bka' yis de nyid yang dag bstan/ /de ring phan chad bu khyod kyis/ /ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar/ /rmi

lam bzhin du sems can gyi/ /bla na med pa'i don byos shig /bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa yi/ /man ngag las ni 'di mi shes/ /rig pa 'di ni dor byas na/ /thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs mi rgya/ /brtul zhugs rnams

kyi mchog gi mchog /rig pa'i brtul zhugs bu yis spyod/ /de ltar 'di ni byang chub mchog /rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma/ /rim pa bzhin du yongs shes bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang rten/ /bdag la go 'phang
mchog stsol lags/ /ting 'dzin kun gyis 'bras bu gsal/ /sems can kun la ci 'dod par/ /dngos grub bla na med pa gsol/ /slar yang gshegs par mdzad pa'i phyir/ /rang gi gnas gshegs

badzra muH/ /de nas lhag ma'i gtor ma sbyin/ /'khor lo lhag par 'byung ba'i rim/ /u ts+tshiSh+Ta k+She tra pa la/ /a ti tsakra u ts+tshiSh+Ta/ /su b+ho dza nA~M bi ba gnyis/ /b+hu rak+Sha gnyis dang sarba dang / /sid d+hi pra~M yats+tsha me dang / /oM sngon AHhU~M

phaT swA hA/ /de yi rjes la brjod par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu 'chang 'gyur ba/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi gnas pas gnas/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal rang bzhin dang / /rdo rje slob dpon rang bzhin ni/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal rang bzhin 'chang / /

de ltar cho ga nyi shu las/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid bstan/ /de nyid mang du shes pa yis/ /bla ma dge ba'i las bzang po/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las cho ga nyi shu'i las rgyas pa'i

le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /de yi rgyu mtshan 'bras bu ni/ /las ni cho ga nyi shur bshad/ /dbang phyug chen po'i rgyu mtshan ci/ /de yi 'bras bu ci zhig 'gyur/ /chen

po'i chen po ji skad gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /las kyi rgyu mtshan 'bras bu dang / /sngon du bsnyen pa'i las kyis ni/ /rgyu mtshan 'jig rten dngos grub brgyad/ /ser sna la sogs bsal ba'i phyir/ /

sangs rgyas mchod pa rnam bsgom zhing / /sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan rab tu rdzogs/ /shes rab ye shes dbang bskur gyis/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa rdzogs/ /gsang ba la sogs la

gnas pa/ /skye bo chags pa'i rgyu mtshan no/ /kun du spyod pa'i chos rnams kyis/ /mnyam nyid ye shes rgyu yis ni/ /bla ma dad pas mchod pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang don/ /chu sogs ming ni mthar thug pa/ /ye shes lnga yi

rnam dag phyir/ /spyod pa phyir mi ldog pa'i mtha'/ /sems can bsam pa rnam dag phyir/ /shes rab brtul zhugs sogs kyi mtha'/ /dpe yis bde ba bstan pa'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor sa tshon phra rab dang / /mtshungs pa

de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /mchod pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang / /de ltar 'bras bu 'khor lo 'jug /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa ni/ /las kyi sgrib pa dag par 'gyur/ /shin du rnam dag chos kyi dbyings/ /dbang bskur

ba ni thob pa dang / /dngos po'i ngo bo ji bzhin du/ /shes rab ye shes kyis ni thob/ /bla ma yis ni sgrub pa yang / /mchod pa de yi go 'phang mchog /de ltar yun mi ring bar 'thob/ /dag pa'i spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog /
rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las cho ga nyi shu pa'i rgyu mtshan dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas rdo rje sems dpas

gsungs/ /mchod pa'i cho ga bla na med/ /gnyis med mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /lus la mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim/ /rdo shing sa dang gser gyi ni/ /sku gzugs la ni phyag mi bya/ /rab gnas dkyil 'khor sbyin bsreg dang / /

de nas nam yang mi bya'o/ /dri chen rdor chu dkon mchog sogs/ /bdag nyid lnga ni rtag tu mchod/ /de phyir de la mngon zhugs pa'o/ /thugs kyi rdo rje rang nyid gtso/ /sems de yang ni de dngos med/ /gang phyir stong nyid mtshan nyid ni/ /

stong nyid kyang ni rnam pa med/ /de phyir thams cad nam mkha' 'dra/ /de ltar rnam dag rnam shes kyang / /rtsa ni gsum la'ang mchod par bya/ /gang phyir sems kyi rang bzhin kun/ /sems las gzhan pa yod ma yin/ /

rang nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /sems kyi rang bzhin la ni gnas/ /lha yi gzugs ni bla med pa/ /sems ma gtogs pa gzhan ni med/ /de phyir de ltar rnam dpyod pa/ /rang lus gcig pu rtag tu mchod/ /rigs lnga
rtag tu rtag spyod pa/ /rigs gcig tu ni rnam par brtag /'dod dang mi 'dod dbye ba dang / /btung dang mi btung rnam par spangs/ /rnal 'byor skal yod skal med ces/ /nam yang smra bar mi bya'o/ /phyag

rgya'i rnam pa sngon po sogs/ /de bzhin gzugs la'ang dbye ba gsum/ /gzugs rdo rje ma bkug nas su/ /sa snying la ni dbul bar bya/ /yang dag glu dang brjod bral dbyangs/ /de bzhin sgra la'ang dbye ba gsum/ /sgra rdo rje ma yang dag

dgug /phyag na rdo rje la ni dbul/ /ga pur a gar dza ti sogs/ /de bzhin dri yang dbye ba gsum/ /dri rdo rje ma yang dag dgug /nam mkha'i snying po la yang dbul/ /'o byed pa dang 'jib pa dang / /ro drug de bzhin dbye ba gsum/ /

rdo rje ro ma yang dag dgug /'jig rten dbang phyug la ni dbul/ /rdo rje pad ma yang dag sbyor/ /gos dang 'khyud pa'i dbye ba gsum/ /reg bya rdo rje yang dag dgug /sgrib sel la ni dbul bar bya/ /phyi yi chos rnams

'di dag kun/ /brtags pa dang ni ma brtags pa'ang / /chos dbyings rdo rje yang dag dgug /'jam pa'i rdo rje la ni dbul/ /de bzhin phyi dang nang dang ni/ /gnyis ka yang ni mi dmigs pa/ /gzugs la gsum du byas

nas ni/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /yul ni lnga ni nges gnas te/ /rgyud lngar nges par 'byung ba ni/ /rmi lam rlung dang ldan pa ru/ /'dod pa lnga rnams spyod par byed/ /dbang po gang dang gang lam gyis/ /sgrub pa po

ni yul 'thob bo/ /de dag thams cad thugs rje che/ /mnyes pa'i phyir ni dbul bar bya/ /yang dag dga' ba'i me tog gis/ /rdo rje nyi ma pad ma 'byung / /me tog bdag nyid la mchod pa/ /rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig

mchog /rnam rtog tshul gyi yul min zhing / /de ltar gtum mo'i me yis ni/ /nges par bsregs pa de ni spos/ /thugs kyi rdo rje la ni dbul/ /rdo rje pad ma yang dag par/ /zhugs pa la sogs rim las byung / /rnal 'byor

pa yi mi shigs sgra/ /thugs rdo rje la dbul bar bya/ /yi ge hU~M las yang dag byung / /sngags kyi 'od zer shin du gsal/ /mar me 'bar ba'i yang dag 'od/ /thugs kyi rdo rje la dbul bya/ /bde ba chen po nam mkhar gnas/ /

byang chub sems ni sad pa dang / /de nyid kyis kyang byugs pa ni/ /thugs kyi rdo rje la dbul bya/ /'dir ni gang dang gang longs spyod/ /dbang po thams cad yang dag bsten/ /de dag thams cad thugs rdo rje/ /bza' ba'i snod du

mchod par bya/ /dgod dang sgeg dang rtse 'jo ni/ /sna tshogs kyis ni sems dga' byed/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo dag dang / /thugs kyi rdo rje la ni dbul/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa

las nang gi bdag nyid mchod pa'i cho ga'i rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /lha mo yi ni mtshan nyid mchog /rnal 'byor bde la rtog pa rnams/ /rtsa

dbye ba yi rang bzhin gyis/ /rtag tu lus kyi rtse 'jo bya/ /de yi lha rnams su ni bshad/ /rtag tu bde ba kun gyis dga'/ /kun nas rnam par sgeg pa'i lus/ /bde ba chen pos kun du khyab/ /lha nyid du ni yang dag brjod/ /dga' dang

mchog tu dga' ba dang / /bral ba lhan cig skyes skad cig /char pa dang ni rtse 'jo dang / /kun nas lhag par sgeg pa dang / /brgyal dang sad par gyur pa dang / /de rnams lha mo ru ni bshad/ /phyi rol du ni byung ba na/ /gang phyir yang

dag sbyor bar 'gyur/ /lus kyi rtsa rnams yang dag sad/ /de phyir rnal 'byor mar ni bshad/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las lha mo'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /e ba~M zhes bya yi ge gnyis/ /e ni stong pa nyid du bshad/ /de bzhin ba~M ni thugs rje dang / /thig le de gnyis sbyor las byung / /de ni rnal 'byor rmad mchog byung / /e ba~M gnyis

ni sangs rgyas dang / /mdor bsdus chos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /rgyal po chen po phyag rgya gnyis/ /rgyud rnams su ni thog mar gsungs/ /e ni b+ha ga'i mtshan nyid do/ /pad ma'i sten du shes par bya/ /rten pa

rdo rje zhes ni gsungs/ /brtan pa rdo rje 'chang ba yi/ /de la gnas pa'i thig le'i gzugs/ /sna tshogs sprul pa ston par byed/ /bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi gnas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /e ni gsang ba'i

mkha' dbyings sam/ /b+ha ga chos 'byung pad ma la/ /rnal 'byor seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs/ /mchog tu rmad byung ston par mdzad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ba~M rdo rje/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed dbang phyug dang / /he ru ka dang dus

'khor lo/ /dang po sangs rgyas la sogs mtshan/ /e ba~M de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgya/ /gnyis su med pa'i bde mchog dang / /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med dang / /gang la de nyid mngon par brjod/ /de la de bzhin gshegs

pa'i rgya/ /gnyis med ye shes mtshan ma ni/ /rgyud kun gyi ni gleng gzhir gsungs/ /rgyud kun gyi ni don bsdus pa/ /stong nyid snying rje mi phyed pa/ /gang la de nyid mngon par brjod/ /e ba~M zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis/ /gang la

'di nyid med pa ni/ /de la de kho na nyid med/ /gang la de nyid yongs shes pa/ /btso ma'i gser ltar gsal por ni/ /rgyud ni legs bshad de nyid shes/ /sngags kyi spyod pa la gnas par/ /de ltar 'di ni de nyid mchog /

e ba~M don ni rnam par nges/ /chos kyi phyag rgya yi ge gnyis/ /dang po'i ngag tu yang dag bshad/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las e ba~M zhes bya ba dang po'i ngag bshad pa dang rgyu mtshan
bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ /e ba~M la sogs don rgyas pa/ /gang gis yang dag yongs su shes/ /chos kyi de ni yang dag rtogs/ /
e/ e ni shes rab dam pa ste/ /'dod chags bral sogs skad cig bdag /srid pa gsum na yongs shes pa/ /'di ni rtsa bar rnam par bstan/ /ba~M/ 'od ma bsgreng ba ltar mdzes shing / /chags la sogs pa

rab bskyed ldan/ /snang ba gsal ba rnam par shes/ /ming ni thabs shes bya ba yin/ /ma/ rig chen rang nyid rtsa ba ste/ /ma rig pa ni zlog pa yin/ /ma rig pa las 'di 'byung bas/ /de bas snang ba 'byung ba'o/ /yA/ 'gro ba
rnam shes gsum dang po'i/ /de ming snang ba gsal ba ste/ /de ni stong pa cher 'gyur la/ /de yang 'od gsal bar 'gro'o/ /shru/ snang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid can/ /gang 'di rnam shes gsum thob pa/ /sems

can khams ni ma lus pa'i/ /rang bzhin rtsa ba 'di yin no/ /ti/ de ni re re'i don snang ba/ /rlung gis blangs nas 'dzin byed pa/ /rlung dang ldan pa'i rnam shes ni/ /kun du 'gro la gnas par 'gyur/ /e/ 'di ni rlung khams

chen po ste/ /rnam shes gsum gyi bzhon pa yin/ /de yis rang bzhin dag tu ni/ /ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /ka / sra ba'i sa khams chu nyid dang / /de bzhin me dang rlung dag ni/ /rnam par shes par blangs nas su/ /srid

gsum gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ /smi/ 'di ni phung po lnga rnams su/ /'byung ba 'dus byas mtshan nyid ni/ /gzugs tshor 'du shes 'du byed dang / /rnam shes nyid ni lnga pa'o/ /sa/ mnyam nyid so sor rtog pa dang / /bya ba

grub pa nyid dang ni/ /me long dang ni chos kyi dbyings/ /'di ni ye shes lnga po yin/ /ma/ yid kyi skye mched nyid dang ni/ /mig dang de bzhin rna ba dang / /sna dang lce dang lus rnams te/ /'di ni skye mched rnams 'byung ba'o/ /ye/ gang
yang khams gsum sems can rnams/ /srog dang rtsol ba la brten pa/ /gsang sngags rgyal po zlos bzhin du/ /mi shes bsam gtan klog pa spangs/ /b+ha/ 'di las rang bzhin chags pa dang / /chags med la sogs

par yang 'gyur/ /de las dge dang mi dge'i las/ /de las skye ba 'byung ba yin/ /ga /'gro ba 'byung ba'i phung po rnams/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi bdag nyid de/ /mngon par byang chub rnam lnga zhes/ /ming gis

rab tu bskul ba yin/ /bAn/ rlung dang chu dang me dang sa/ /spyan la sogs pa bzhi po ste/ /ye shes bdag nyid can gsum du/ /shes bya sangs rgyas byang chub ster/ /sa/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur/ /phyag rgya

bzhis ni rgyas btab cing / /mig la sogs pa'i bdag nyid der/ /sa snying la sogs rgyal sras so/ /rba/ rol pas dga' ba gang yin pa'i/ /khro bo'i rgyal po stobs chen rnams/ /de yi phyogs mtshams ngo bo ru/ /dpung pa

yan lag rnams su brtag /ta/ de dang de yi rigs las byung / /lha dang lha mo tha dad pa/ /de ni yod min de dag kyang / /'gro ba'i don phyir ston pa yin/ /thA/ 'di las gnyis med mthong ba yi/ /rnal 'byor pa ni ye shes gsum/ /mthong

phyir dman dang bar ma dang / /dam pa'i yul la gzhag par bya/ /ga /dbang po rang nyid rang yul la/ /'gro bar 'gyur ba de dang de/ /dbang po'i spyod yul gang dang gang / /de dang de snang tsam nyid do/ /ta/ dbang po de yi lam nas ni/ /sgrub pa pos ni

yul thob pa/ /de bzhin de las ma gsungs par/ /tshim par bya phyir dbul bar bya/ /kA/ sku gsum dag ni tha dad par/ /skyob pa yis ni yang dag bstan/ /rdzogs pa'i rim gyis sbyor ba yis/ /gcig tu yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /ya/

gang zhig sangs rgyas sku mtshan nyid/ /kun rdzob bden par gsungs pa ni/ /de nyid rdzogs rim sbyor ba yis/ /'od gsal bar ni rnam dag 'gyur/ /bA ka / tshig gi lam gyi yul 'di nyid/ /gtso bo ye shes sku rang bzhin/ /

sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /'ja' tshon bzhin du snang ba yin/ /tsi ta/ /sems dang sems byung ma rig pa/ /shes rab thabs dang nyer thob dang / /stong dang shin du stong pa dang / /stong chen zhes kyang rab tu brjod/

/rang bzhin snang ba'i dbye shes na/ /de nas spyod pa rab tu bya/ /las kyi lus ni yongs spangs nas/ /rdo rje sku nyid thob par 'gyur/ /hr-i/ thugs la 'jig rten pa rnams kyi/ /don spyod bzhag nas de bzhin gshegs/ /kun

rdzob tu ni sprul skur gnas/ /ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa spyod/ /da/ yid bzhin nor bu mchog bzhin du/ /'dod pa thams cad ster bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi phun tshogs kyang / /stobs kyis blangs nas spyod par

'gyur/ /ya/ rnal 'byor dbang po gang gang 'dod/ /de ni sgrib pa med par bya/ /mnyam par ma bzhag rnal 'byor gyis/ /rtag tu mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur/ /ba/ rdo rje pad mo mnyam sbyor bas/ /ye shes gsum gyi cha rig

pa/ /blo la gos dang ma gos pa/ /der ni bde bas rtag tu gnas/ /dzra/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dngos dag kun las rnam par rol/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed bzhin du/ /gtan la phab pa'i gzhi la gnas/ /yo/ /rnal

'byor lhag pa'i rnal 'byor dang / /rnal 'byor chen po rang nyid 'gyur/ /rdo rje can dang mkha' 'gro ma/ /gang yang rnal 'byor de rang nyid/ /ShIta/ dgag pa dag kyang byed pas na/ /bya dang bya min rnam spangs te/ /pad ma la ni

'dam gyis bzhin/ /ngo bo nyid ces gos mi 'gyur/ /b+ha/ yon tan brgyad dang nyer ldan pas/ /sems can thams cad rigs 'gyur zhing / /'jig rten khams ni ma lus par/ /bdag nyid ye shes lus kyis spyod/ /ge/ gtso bo

gang du spyod pa yi/ /de yi khyim ni nam mkha' nyid/ /bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /de nyid du ni rtag tu rol/ /Shu/ 'di la snang ba dbye ba la/ /thun mtshams nyin mo mtshan mo yi/ /'jig rten tha snyad byas pa yis/ /

ye shes gsum ni mthong phyir ro/ /be/ sna tshogs pa yi tha snyad dag /'jig rten pas ni yongs brtags pa/ /lam gsum gyi ni dbye ba yis/ /ye shes gsum las byung ba'o/ /dza/ skye dang gnas dang 'jig pa dang / /
srid pa bar mar gnas pa ste/ /ji snyed 'jig rten gyis brtags pa/ /sems kyi rlung ni rnam 'phrul lo/ /ha/ dgod dang rtsed mo byed pa dang / /gar gyi nyams dgur ldan pa dang / /sngags dang

phyag rgya rnam rtog pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod pa'o/ /ra/ bdag byin brlabs chen ma gtogs pa/ /rin chen gzhan dag 'di na med/ /me yis sbyangs pa'i nor bu bzhin/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam pa'o/ /'di skad la

sogs dang po'i ngag /mchog tu gsungs pa'i don rgyas pa/ /gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa ba'i mdo/ /de nyid bshad pa bsdus pa ni/ /rim pa ji lta ba bzhin shes/ /sgrub po'i de nyid shes pa ni/ /ye shes mchog gi mtshan

nyid kyis/ /gang du gsal bar ma gsungs so/ /rim pa 'di yis rnal 'byor pas/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa rgyas btab pa/ /de ltar rim pa 'di yis shes/ /sems can kun la phan skyed pa'o/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud
dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las e ba~M ma yA zhes bya ba dang po'i ngag bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ /nang gi bdag nyid

sbyin bsreg mchog /nang du rgyu ba'i 'byung ba rnams/ /gang gis thim par gyur pa dang / /rnam rtog bag chags sa bon ni/ /phung po lnga yi bud shing dang / /rnal 'byor ye shes chen po'i mes/ /rtag tu sbyin bsreg rmad byung bya/ /lte

dbus gnas pa'i sgra tsam ni/ /sgra tsam phyi rol gsang pad ma/ /de la rang rgyud rlung gis ni/ /yongs su bskul ba'i me yis ni/ /dbang po gnyis ni yang dag sbyor/ /gzi brjid gsal bar rab tu 'bar/ /gang tshe mar gang gsang pad

ma/ /de la 'di ni snod du brjod/ /ha~M ni blugs gzar zhes byar gsungs/ /rdo rje dgang gzar du ni brjod/ /b+ha ga thab khung zhes ni bshad/ /dbang po lnga yi bsreg rdzas dang / /phung po yam shing du ni gyur/ /mar ni byang chub sems
su bshad/ /gnam stong nas brtsams nya yi bar/ /ji srid byed pa gshegs su gsol/ /me thab thig le tsam du gsungs/ /blugs gzar nam yang mi 'bo ba/ /sangs rgyas gti mug dga' la sogs/ /gzugs rdo

rje sogs rgyal sras rnams/ /khro bo'i rgyal po bcu la ni/ /rtag tu sbyin bsreg gis tshim bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa gang / /de yang dgang blugs su ni brjod/ /hU~M phaT yang dag ldan sngags kyis/ /cho ga bzhin
du bsreg blugs dbul/ /de yis lus gnas mnyes 'gyur na/ /lha yi dam tshig bla na med/ /yid la ji ltar 'dod pa rnams/ /de ltar dngos grub stsal nas ni/ /sbyin bsreg 'di ni mchog tu gsungs/ /dngos grub
kun gyi 'bras bu stsol/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin bsreg gi le'u ste drug bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes

gsungs/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' ba ni/ /dngos grub kun byed de nyid mchog /ji ltar rigs pa'i rim pa bzhin/ /rnam snang mdzad dang mi bskyod dang / /don yod grub dang 'od dpag med/ /rin chen rgyal mtshan lnga po ni/ /

bdud rtsi lnga yi mtshan nyid do/ /khrag ni rin chen dbang phyug dang / /byang chub sems ni 'od dpag med/ /de bzhin don yod grub pa sha / mi bskyod de bzhin rdo rje chu/ /dri chen rnam snang mdzad du bshad/ /de dag bdud rtsi lnga ni

mchog /bas mtha' nyams dga' skye bos dben/ /sgra yi tsher ma rnam par spangs/ /de la khang pa bya ba ni/ /khang pa gnyis brtsegs sgo dang bcas/ /sa 'og khang pa gcig bya zhing / /gzhan dag de yi steng du

bya/ /gzhan ni gsangs nas bya ba ste/ /'jig rten pa ni gcig tu shes/ /sgrub pos de nyid kun shes shing / /sngags shes bsam pa rgya che ba/ /brtan zhing snying rje mkhas pa dang / /yul la phrag dog rnam par
spangs/ /sgrub po gtso bo'i yon tan gang / /de lta bu nyid sgrub grogs mchog /chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs/ /brtson zhing brkam chags med pa dang / /khro med dang bcas dpa'

ba dang / /mang du thos shing yod par lta/ /thog ma gnyis ka yi ni lus/ /'bras bu sogs kyis dag bya ba/ /gnod mdzes skul byed 'bum phrag gcig /de rjes sngags pas bzla bar bya/ /oM su~M b+ha ni su~M b+ha

hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na pa ya gr-ih+Na pa ya hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga ban bid+yA rA dzA hU~M hU~M phaT/ de nas zla gcig yi ge gsum/ /sgrub pos mi smra bzlas par bya/ /kun du bzang po 'gro

ba'i gtso/ /de ni skad cig rmi lam mthong / /des ni bka' yis bsgo ba ni/ /ka n+ya mchog ni bsten gyis la/ /sems can don ni mtshungs med byos/ /ji ltar de nyid rdo rje 'chang / /bu mo skal ldan mig yangs
ma/ /gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par brgyan/ /brkam chags med cing chags bcas sems/ /bsgeg pas myos shing bsgyings dang bcas/ /nu rgyas sngo bsangs nyams dga' ba/ /rnam rtog med cing mang du thos/ /

sgrub pos de srid 'dod par bya/ /ji srid khu ba dang bcas gyur/ /de nas gdong ni pad ma gnyis/ /gnyis ka 'byung ba blangs nas ni/ /pad ma'i snod der gzhag par bya/ /mtshan nyid bzang por zhag bdun du/ /glang po

rta khyi ba lang mi/ /dpyid zla tha chungs gnyis ka shar/ /skye gnas nas ni blangs nas ni/ /de bzhin de ru rim pa bzhin/ /pad snod de nyid la ni der/ /zhag bdun bar du gzhag par bya/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/ /

yi ge gsum ni sngags bzlas bya/ /'du 'dzi med cing dben pa'i gnas/ /tsan dan bzang po byugs nas ni/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH'i sngags bkod pa'i/ /pad mo'i snod la gzhag par bya/ /ra yi 'o ma til gyi mar/ /mar dang li kha dkar po dang / /

cha bsnyams bskol ba byas nas ni/ /de dang lhan cig snod bzhag bsre/ /rgya shug tshig gu tshad tsam gyis/ /blo dang ldan pas ri lu bya/ /grib ma la ni bskam byas nas/ /rim gyis bskyed cing bza' bar bya/ /rdo rje

ming sring spun dang ni/ /rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig bza'/ /zla ba gcig nas de nas lhag /mdza' bo rnams dang yang dag bsgo/ /mar ngo'i tshes brgyad tshes bcu 'am/ /yang na bcu bzhi nas brtsams te/ /de la gtor

ma bya ba ni/ /las kun la ni bla na med/ /de las kyang ni dngos grub skye/ /phyag rgya chen po mngon rdzogs dang / /dngos grub rgyas dang zhi ba sogs/ /de yis 'bad mi dgos par 'thob/ /rlung gi de nyid yang dag slob/ /mkha' spyod
nyid ni thob par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad

kyis nyon/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo cho ga mchog /gang gis mchod pa las byung ba/ /rgyal sras rnams kyi dngos grub mchog /rnal 'byor che dang lhan cig tu/ /sgrub pa'i phyir ni yang dag gnas/ /phyag rgya brda ni yongs

shes shing / /de dang dam tshig la ni 'jug /de rnams tshogs ni rab mchog dang / /tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhes ni brjod/ /kun kyang dam tshig la gnas pa/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /bla ma la dad dam tshig gnas/ /

gtong sogs yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/ /thabs zhes bya ba bgegs med na/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo la ni 'jug /gzhan du skyon ni 'byung 'gyur te/ /'khor lo la yang 'grub mi 'gyur/ /shes rab kyang ni thabs dang

mtshungs/ /mdza' bo bzang dang rab tu mkhas/ /lo ni nyi shu rtsa lnga lon/ /lhag ma yongs su spangs nas ni/ /thabs dang so sor shes rab dang / /kun la gcig ni phan yon med/ /thog ma yid 'ong nyams dga' bar/ /me tog gi ni
dkyil 'khor bya/ /de nyid sna tshogs mchod pa ni/ /legs par mnyam par bzhag nas mchod/ /gtso bo dngos po kun gyis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du mchod/ /tshogs kyi mchod pa byas rjes la/ /
dkyil 'khor lugs 'byung lugs bzlog pas/ /dad pa dngos pos kun nas ni/ /mnyam pas blta bas bsgoms nas ni/ /bstan bcos nyams myong 'jig rten dang / /'gal ba de ni gzhug mi bya/ /gzhan yang bstan

bcos las gsungs pa/ /mtshan phyed na ni dgug par bya/ /slob dpon mgon la yang dag mchod/ /ji ltar gdan stengs bzhugs gsol nas/ /gdan ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /phyag rgya chen po yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje

slob dpon de nyid kyang / /mkhyen pa 'khor lo'i dbus na bzhugs/ /dkyil 'khor pa ni gzhan rnams dang / /de bzhin 'khor lo gnas pa gzhan/ /dkyil 'khor pa bzhin shes par bya/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lor gtam smra dang / /

rtsod dang de bzhin sgrub pa dang / /mchil snabs dor zhing dgod pa dang / /rkang pa la sogs rkyong ba dang / /yang dang yang du ldang ba ni/ /de la dus kun du mi bya/ /phyag rgya brda yi tshogs rnams kyis/ /bya zhing bya bar

shes par bya/ /shes bzhin du ni gar dang glu/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du ni bya/ /gtso bo la ni snod kyi mchog /dum bu gcig pa mtshan nyid bzang / /de med dum bu gsum pa la/ /me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod/ /lha yi chang

la sogs pa gang / /legs par mnyam par gzhag ste dbul/ /tshogs rnams la yang so sor snod/ /me tog tshogs kyis yongs gang ba/ /thog mar gtor ma chen po sbyin/ /sngon bzhin bza' ba la sogs ldan/ /gang gis dga' ba

rnams nyams pa/ /de 'dra btung bar mi bya'o/ /yang dang yang du phyag byas nas/ /phyag rgya bcings nas btung bar bya/ /de nas bza' ba thams cad ni/ /sbyang bya sogs kyis yang dag sbyangs/ /oM dang AHdang hU~M gis ni/ /sbyang dang sad dang

rtogs par bya/ /gur gum tsan dan dpa' bo dang / /gangs dang ri dgas lte ba dang / /'di ni dag byed bdud rtsi lnga / /bza' ba 'di rnams rab tu spyod/ /sbom po ming med sbyor ba yis/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rim bzhin/ /rang gi

lce yis myang bar bya/ /dpa' bo dbus su dus kun du/ /kha la dpa' bo rnam par dgod/ /bla na med pa'i mchod pa bya/ /pad ma'i lte ba'i dbus la ni/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi gdan du brjod/ /gal te dpa' bos ma shes na/ /dpa'

bo don gyi mtshan nyid rnams/ /dngos grub thams cad stsol ba yi/ /'khor lo de yi 'bras bu med/ /de lta'i 'bras bu cung zad gang / /phyi nang bdag nyid yang dag spyod/ /de yis rnam dag dngos grub 'gyur/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i

'bras bu ster/ /rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig 'dres/ /rab tu bshad kyis de nyid nyon/ /'dul ba'i mkha' 'gro ma 'ga' zhig /sems rtog med pa'i phyir 'ongs nas/ /de la de tshe smra ba yang / /sgrub pa pos ni mi bya zhing / /tshig

tsam gyis ni lan mi gdab/ /bde bar 'ongs sam phyag rgyas bya/ /de la cung zad bya smra gang / /slob dpon rang nyid kyis ni bya/ /yang na bya ba thams cad ni/ /las kyi rdo rjes yang dag sbyar/ /gang phyir rang nyid rdo rje sems/ /

las kyi rdo rje gzhan dga' min/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyi rnal 'byor ma/ /yang dang yang du dgug par bya/ /de la g.yo ba'i spyod pa med/ /slob dpon dpa' bo bzhin du spyod/ /gang yang skyon gyi spyod pas ni/ /de yi lus ni

ltung bar 'gyur/ /shin du dga' ba yang dag skyes/ /bka' bsgo gar gyi spyod pa bya/ /rdo rje bcing ba de yang bya/ /lha rnams ji ltar mnyes pa nyid/ /ma 'am sring mo bu mo 'am/ /gal te mchod par 'dod pa na/ /shes rab thabs

kyi cho ga yis/ /rtog pa med pas bstan par bya/ /rab mchog de yi dngos grub ni/ /thob par 'di la the tshom med/ /lhag ma'i gtor ma blangs nas ni/ /dgon pa chen por song nas dor/ /k+Sh+m+rI u ts+tshiSh+Ta k+She tra pA/ /lA ya swA hA sngags
brjod bya/ /gal te de ltar rab byed pa'i/ /rnal 'byor pa yis slar yang mthong / /de ltar de ni yongs shes nas/ /rnal 'byor pa yi mtshan nyid mchog /gang gis gdong ni 'bar ba'i 'od/ /zlum

zhing 'jam la mdzes pa dang / /smin ma ring ba de shes bya/ /'od dpag med kyi rigs las byung / /de las pad ma'i phyag rgya bstan/ /rus sbal phyag rgya lan yin no/ /mchu rle mig dkyus ring ba dang / /kha dog ser mo yid 'phrog

ma/ /'di yi dpral bar ri mo gsum/ /ji srid skra mtshams bar du gnas/ /g.yul du 'chi ba rnams kyis ni/ /gtam dag la ni rab tu nyan/ /'di 'dra'i nyan pa ma mthong nas/ /mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /rkang pa

g.yon pa bskum pa dang / /de ni gar byed rab tu ston/ /g.yon pa yongs su bskor nas ni/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni bstan par bya/ /sna tshogs pa yi gos la dga'/ /rin chen 'byung ldan rigs las byung / /kha dog gnag cing gos
