kyang gnag //skra ni 'khyil cing dar gyis bcings/ /dpral bar gzhu yi rnam pa yi/ /de 'dra'i mtshan ma mthong na ni/ /rtag tu de yi sems g.yo ba/ /ma mo zhes ni rab tu grags/ /dril bu'i phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /de yi g.yon

pas phyag rgya ston/ /mi bskyod rigs las byung bar shes/ /mtshan mo 'ongs nas 'gro ba mchog /thung ngu lto sbom kha dog dkar/ /byin pa sbom zhing shin du mdzes/ /sa spyod mar ni shes par bya/ /dung gi phyag rgya lan yin

no/ /rnam par snang mdzad rigs las byung / /mig yangs rdzi ma stug pa dang / /yan lag kun la ba spus khyab/ /sngo bsangs mig ni dmar ba dang / /yan lag phra zhing dpung pa ring / /de ni mkha' 'gro ma ru grags/ /don

yod grub pa'i rigs las byung / /de 'dra ba ni rab mthong na/ /ba dan gyi ni phyag rgya dang / /g.yon pa'i phyag rgya lan yin no/ /de ltar 'bad pas shis nas ni/ /mkhas pas mtshan mo song nas ni/ /de la cung zad 'jigs mi bya/ /

gang phyir de nyid mchod par bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa dang rnal 'byor ma dang 'dres pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //

de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ /gsang ba'i tshig ni bshad pa ni/ /rdo rje'i gnas sogs gnas rnams su/ /rigs kun las byung rnal 'byor ma/ /mtshan mo'i 'dre ba'i dam tshig ni/ /'di 'dra ba yi tshig rnams dang / /de lta

bu yi gsang ba ni/ /bdag gis dad pa yis ni nyon/ /sa~M po dang ka~M chang 'thung ba/ /bri ra~M sha ru rnam par brjod/ /ni la nA p+la tra~M thod pa/ /gu lang mi yi thod pas brgyan/ /kun du ra~M 'dod yang dag spyod/ /tsha dru~M ro drug bza' ba po/ /

su~M su TA~M dbang gnyis sbyor ba/ /a lo ka~M yod pa yi ming / /shar mi ga skam skal yod shes/ /tsakra ka ni skal med brjod/ /tu~M shA~M ra~M ni khu tshur shes/ /me ka ma tra~M gcig tu brjod/ /tsan dra ma ni khrag tu bshad/ /ga na~M bshang

bar yongs su grags/ /g+ha na~M sha chen du ni bshad/ /ni dza~M d+ha du ra ru brjod/ /b+ha sa na~M ni chu ru bshad/ /ba k+Sha~M yan lag rab tu bshad/ /shu pa~M bzang po zhes ni brjod/ /ho ni tshim pa zhes ni grags/ /marga ltogs pa

ru ni brjod/ /g+hi ta~M lam du bshad pa dang / /byo ma ga~M na~M pha rol dpung / /ka ma ya ni gyis shig brjod/ /na ga ra~M ni bdag lus brjod/ /pa ta ka ni nyos zhes brjod/ /a dza~M ya ni me zhes brjod/ /sha kham za ba zhes ni brjod/ /ra gam 'dor ni cho

ga brjod/ /sha ta ka~M mi bza' bar brjod/ /ci 'dra ba ni sngags zhes brjod/ /sha ra~M khyi 'tshed sha zhes brjod/ /ra~M pa ka ni bla mar bshad/ /ka ya 'dir ni rgyal rigs brjod/ /ra ga~M rje rigs zhes ni bshad/ /ba ra~M rgya

ni dmangs rigs brjod/ /tsa ba~M rigs ngan zhes ni brjod/ /sha ra~M sme sha can du brjod/ /b+ha ba tsa kra~M ko lpags mkhan/ /khad kom ri sreg ma ru bshad/ /sa mun tra ni rgyal por brjod/ /mi ra~M ma yi ring du brjod/ /b+ha

ra ha gang zhes ni bshad/ /bim+kh+ya phag ces brjod par bya/ /pa la~M sha ni nya zhes brjod/ /di nam ra skyes su ni bshad/ /nag tu~M sbyin bsreg tu ni bshad/ /marta ah+na ni 'dab chags brjod/ /hi ra phyu
ni me tog brjod/ /sha drul la~M ni spos su bshad/ /mA la tri ni dri ru bshad/ /sha ku ni ka mar mer brjod/ /ka shi ka~M ni gos su bshad/ /ke sa ra ni gdong du brjod/ /ba~M tra~M dpral ba zhes su

bshad/ /ma la smin mar yang dag grags/ /ko bal ya~M ni mig tu shes/ /a da ra ni so ru brjod/ /pal la po ni mchu ru shes/ /pa sha mgrin pa ru ni grags/ /hU~M so 'phrag pa ru ni bshad/ /a gu ro ni dpung par brjod/ /

so so ru ni lag par bshad/ /shri pang le ni nu mar brjod/ /dza ti pha la~M rkang par brjod/ /da la na~M ni lte bar brjod/ /pad ma 'dza' lam gsang ba'i gnas/ /ka ta~M ba ka~M brla gnyis so/ /be sa~M rje ngar du ni bshad/ /tsha ga

na ni rkang par brjod/ /pa ra a ka ke sa ra/ /sen mo zhes ni yang dag bshad/ /pad ma gar ni ga ni snang / /sha kra ku su la~M mal stan/ /shag tu bu zhes bya bar brjod/ /na la ni nA lam ston med/ /go bag Sh+ma lam thams cad

brjod/ /sA ga ra~M ni rgas par bshad/ /sa la~M ro ni zhim por brjod/ /a k+Sho ra~M rim mi zhim bshad/ /mr-i ga~M mi smra bar ni bshad/ /pa go la mu da~M glu len/ /mi tra gar zhes bya bar brjod/ /shab ta tshul 'chos su ni bshad/ /spar sha

zhags par rab tu grags/ /ra sa sgeg mo'i ro 'bebs ma/ /ru pa~M ri yi rtse mo'o/ /rta ne ha ni bsad par bshad/ /pA rA pa ta 'chi bar brjod/ /ta ma lA ko se ma yul/ /pha la~M grong khyer du ni brjod/ /pra na grong du bshad

pa yin/ /th+ya n+ya srog ces bya bar bshad/ /ku ru ta ra mkhas par bshad/ /na ya na ni rnam shes brjod/ /a bi na pa~M dgod par bshad/ /ru ti ra ni 'chang bar brjod/ /ku mu ra ni nyin mor bshad/ /kan nya mtshan mor rab tu grags/ /

da sa nyi ma phyed du bshad/ /da pi mtshan gyi cha ru grags/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las gsang ba'i tshig bshad pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// //

de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /sku ni mgo bor gnas pa ste/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis byang sems 'bab/ /de ni so sor rab phye bas/ /sku yi 'khor lo ru zhes bya/ /yi ge
phyi mo'i dbye ba yis/ /gsung la gnas par rab tu shes/ /chags sogs bag chags dbye ba yis/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo ru ni shes/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bshad pa ni/ /sems dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig /rdo rje

slob dpon sku la ni/ /rgyal ba'i sku ni rim bzhin gnas/ /dang po sku yi rdo rje ni/ /gzugs phung la ni yang dag bzhugs/ /de rjes nam mkha' rdo rje ni/ /tshor ba yi ni phung por bzhugs/ /bcom ldan gsung gi rdo rje ni/ /

'du shes kyi ni phung por bzhugs/ /las rnams kyi ni rdo rje ni/ /'du byed kyi ni phung por bzhugs/ /bcom ldan thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /rnam shes phung por yang dag bzhugs/ /yang 'di'i sha sogs sa khams la/ /
bcom ldan 'das yum spyan bzhugs so/ /khrag sogs chu yi khams la ni/ /bcom ldan 'das yum mA ma bzhugs/ /dro ba la sogs me khams la/ /bcom ldan 'das yum gos dkar bzhugs/ /mi

bskyod la sogs rlung khams la/ /bcom ldan 'das yum sgrol ma bzhugs/ /de mig dbang po gnyis la ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sa snying po/ /de yi rna ba'i dbang gnyis la/ /bde gshegs phyag na rdo rje'o/ /de yi
sna bug gnyis la ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i mdzod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang / /de yi lce yi dbang la gnas/ /de yi yid kyi dbang po la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs bzhugs/ /
khams bzhi'i rang bzhin gong bu ni/ /lus zhes bya bar brtags pa la/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs so/ /lus kyi tshigs ni thams cad la/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa kun du bzang / /lus kyi rtsa rgyus thams cad la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i rtsa bar ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gshin rje'i gshed/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i rtsa bar ni/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa gzhan mi thub/ /kha yi pad mar bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rta mgrin no/ /gsang ba'i gnas su bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /dpung pa g.yas par bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

mi g.yo ba/ /dpung pa g.yon par bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa'i rgyal/ /pus mo g.yas par bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig pa sngo/ /pus mo g.yon par bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stobs po che/ /rang gi mgo
stengs bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor lo sgyur/ /rkang pa'i 'og tu bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gnod mdzes te/ /lus ni 'di nyid kun la 'dir/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
bzhugs/ /sku yi dkyil 'khor zhes brjod pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dbye ba yis/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus 'di/ /lus pa med pa sangs rgyas sku/ /skye ba 'di la

rnal 'byor pa/ /mya ngan 'das pa myur du 'thob/ /khyod kyi dge ba yongs sbyin pa/ /de bas rdo rje slob dpon gyi/ /lus la rgyal ba thams cad bzhugs/ /mthong na don ni yod pa kye/ /phyi ma'i dus na sems dpa' che/ /
de bas sems can thams cad kyi/ /lha yi mchod pa'i yo byad kyis/ /rab tu 'bad de bla ma bsten/ /de nas mthong ba don yod bcas/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags pa che/ /dga' zhing mgu bas phyag byas
nas/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchi ma blags/ /gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bzhugs/ /legs so bya ba byin nas ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs/ /a A i I u U dang / /r-i r-I

l-i l-I e ai dang / /o au a~M aHdbyangs zhes bya/ /ka tsa Ta ta pa sde tshan/ /ya ra la wa sha Sha sa/ /ha dang gsung gi dkyil 'khor shes/ /ngag kun rab tu spro dang ldan/ /'dod chags la sogs bag chags
kyang / /grangs ni nyi shu brgyad kyis so/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor legs rgyas pa/ /dpal mchog las ni shes par bya/ /de ltar 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/ /rdo rje gsum ni dam tshig mchog /mchog

tu rmad byung rgyas pa ni/ /sgrub pa'i dbang pos yang dag shes/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun dang / /bla ma ston pa slob dpon dang / /rdo rje 'chang dang slob ma yi/ /mtshan nyid thams cad bsdus pa ni/ /dri med sems ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /chos

ni ngag tu yang dag gsungs/ /sku ni dge 'dun zhes bya ste/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi gnas/ /sangs rgyas yi ge hU~M du bshad/ /gsung ni yi ge AHru brjod/ /dge 'dun zhes bya yi ge oM/ /kun nas 'phro ba'i

bdag nyid do/ /sangs rgyas a ba d+hU tIr 'gyur/ /chos kyang la la nA ru brjod/ /dge 'dun ra sa nA ru brjod/ /'di ni gsum po'i mtshan nyid do/ /gzugs med khams ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /gzugs kyi khams ni

chos dang ni/ /'dod khams de bzhin dge 'dun te/ /de ltar khams gsum mtshan nyid mchog /snying por gyur pa rang srog las/ /khams gsum na ni gzhan med de/ /sgyu ma rlung gi khams gsum pa/ /rmi lam rmi ba
bzhin du mthong / /khams gsum bdag nyid de bzhin nyid/ /gcig pur myur bar mthong bar 'gyur/ /byin gyis brlab nas de bzhin nyid/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas longs spyod

rdzogs pa'i sku/ /dam pa'i chos ni chos kyi sku/ /dge 'dun sprul pa'i skur ni 'gyur/ /de ni sku gsum bdag nyid can/ /snang ba sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs/ /chos ni snang ba thob pa'o/ /dge 'dun snang ba mched par

'gyur/ /de ni snang ba gsum mtshan nyid/ /zhi ba la sogs las la byang / /sngags dang rnal 'byor che rnams shes/ /cho ga nyi shu bya ba bslabs/ /de ni bla mar mngon par brjod/ /tshul khrims dag cing sbyin pa gtong / /bzod dang

brtson 'grus mchog tu ldan/ /nyin dang mtshan du sgom la zhen/ /shes rab ldan zhing bzo la mkhas/ /bla ma'i spyir ni yon tan tshogs/ /dpal ldan slob dpon zhes ni brjod/ /nang gi gsang 'dus la rab dga'/ /

phyi rol nyan thos la spyod pa/ /de lta'i man ngag rim pa yis/ /slob ma rnams la rjes su bslab/ /de ni ston par yongs su gsungs/ /de skad smras pa de bzhin byed/ /rtog pa rnams dang dkyil 'khor tshogs/ /

dam pa'i don gyi bya ba dang / /slar yang snang ba gsum dang ni/ /rnal 'byor mchog gi spyod pa la/ /slob cing gzhan yang slob tu 'jug /de ni slob dpon zhes bya'o/ /de nyid bcu ni yongs shes nas/ /dkyil 'khor

la sogs bya ba shes/ /slob ma rjes su nus pa dang / /gsang ba'i dbang ni bskur ba dang / /shes rab snying rje yang dag ldan/ /rgyud kyi man ngag la mi 'jigs/ /zab cing rgya cher yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje sems dpa'

gnyis pa mchog /tshar gcod phan 'dogs pa la mkhas/ /de ni rdo rje 'chang du bshad/ /dad cing bla ma la yang gus/ /rtag tu dge ba'i las la gnas/ /gnyis med sgyu yang med pa dang / /rtog pa ngan pa rnam par spangs/ /

lung ni mang du thos pa dang / /gsod pa dang ni 'tshe ba spangs/ /sems can rnams ni 'don pa'i blos/ /kun du brtson dang yang dag ldan/ /de la sogs pa'i yang dag ldan/ /dad pa chen po'i slob ma bzang / /stong nyid

snying rje dbyer med pa/ /gang la de nyid nges shes bya/ /gong na med pa'i spyod rab mchog /sngags dang rnal 'byor rim pa sogs/ /ye shes lnga ni rnam dag dang / /sangs rgyas lnga ni rang bzhin nyid/ /mngon par byang chub rnam

lnga yis/ /snang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid dang / /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang / /sku gsum rnam par bsgom pa dang / /bde chen yon tan mtshan nyid ni/ /dga' ba la sogs dbye ba dang / /de bzhin sgeg sogs nyams

dang ni/ /rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor dang / /shin du rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che/ /dang po sbyor ba mdor bsdus pas/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog /las kyi rgyal po rnal 'byor mchog /'jug dang gnas dang ldang ba ni/ /

rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor dang / /bde gnyis dbugs 'byung gnyis la sogs/ /gang la rgyas bshad de nyid rgyud/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud du brjod/ /yon tan ji lta bu yi rgyud/ /thos sogs yon tan mchog gi ni/ /rten dang

snod ces bya bar gsungs/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dang / /ji ltar seng ge'i 'o ma ni/ /sa yi snod du bzhag mi bya/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud/ /snod min dag la sbyin mi bya/ /slob ma skad cig de la 'chi/ /'di dang

pha rol du na phung / /snod min man ngag rab bshad na/ /slob dpon dngos grub nyams par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ sangs rgyas dang dam pa'i chos dang dge 'dun la sogs
pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig rgyas pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rje gsungs/ /slob ma'i bya ba'i spyod pa ni/ /zhi ba la sogs bya ba yang / /sngags dang rnal 'byor

rim pa yi/ /lham dang gdugs dang gtsug tor dang / /so rtsi la sogs myang ba dang / /snabs kyi gong bu mchil ma sogs/ /'dor zhing rkang pa rkyong ba dang / /gzhan du lta dang spyi brtol smra/ /nor gyis snyems dang ngar

'dzin dang / /rgyan la sogs pa blta ba dang / /bag med par ni smra ba dang / /bla ma'i grib ma 'gom pa dang / /de la sogs pa skyon gyi tshogs/ /bla ma'i mdun du rnam par spangs/ /'jigs pas thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /spyi

bor phyag rgya bka' lung nod/ /rab bdog kun gtong dam bcas pas/ /ngo tsha bcas shing gdong smad pas/ /slob mas bla ma'i mdun gnas bya/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /bla ma'i mdun du slob ma rnams/ /

de lta bu sogs spyod zhes bya/ /dam tshig sdom pa sngar bshad pa/ /de rnams slob ma'i spyod pa'o/ /de yi zhi sogs bya ba ni/ /bla mas bstan par bya ba'i rigs/ /de la mdor bsdus bshad par bya/ /thun mong cho ga'i mtshan

nyid ni/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa gnyis/ /zla ba yar gyi ngo la bya/ /dbang dang mngon spyod kyi ni las/ /zla ba mar gyi ngo la brtsam/ /byang du kha bltas zhi ba la/ /de bzhin rgyas pa shar du blta/ /drag po'i las la lho phyogs su/ /

dbang gi las la nub tu blta/ /gsod pa nyid la me yi phyogs/ /sdang bar bya la bden bral du/ /gnas nas bskrad la rlung gi phyogs/ /rengs pa la ni dbang ldan phyogs/ /zhi ba'i kha dog dkar po ste/ /rgyas pa la ni ser
po bya/ /dbang dang dgug pa la ni dmar/ /kha dog nag po gsod pa la'o/ /byams pa'i sems kyis zhi ba la/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyas pa la/ /chags pa'i sems kyis dbang dag la/ /khro ba'i sems kyis

gsod pa'o/ /zhi la phal cher tho rangs bya/ /de bzhin rgyas pa snga dro bya/ /dbang dang mngon spyod dag gi las/ /nyi ma gung dang mtshan phyed la'o/ /de ltar rigs par yang dag bshad/ /sngags kyi rgyud gsungs mtshan nyid kyis/ /

zhi ba la sogs dngos grub brgyad/ /blo ldan cho ga bzhin du bsgrub/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las slob ma'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi 'bras bu bstan
pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ /khro bo bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /gang gis rnal 'byor dngos grub brgyad/ /thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /

khro bo'i sems kyi bzlas pa ni/ /khro bo'i bzlas pa zhes ni brjod/ /yang na khro bo'i rgyal po rnams/ /sngags bzlas pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /khro bo'i bzlas pa de shes bya/ /dngos grub brgyad kyi 'bras bu stsol/ /'jigs su

rung ba'i dur khrod du/ /'jigs pa 'jigs par byed pa'i gnas/ /skyes bu thod pa'i khrag gis gos/ /rma med pa yi mtshan nyid blang / /skyes bu'i khu ba zla mtshan dang / /bsres nas bri bar bya ba ni/ /de na bsgrub bya'i rnam pa

dang / /gsal dang 'jigs pa skrag pa dang / /g.yon brkyang ba yis mnan nas ni/ /zhag bdun bar du dus gsum du/ /gshin rje gshed kyi sngags 'dis ni/ /dngos grub rgyur ni bzlas par bya/ /na maHsa man ta kA ya bAka

tsit+ta badzrA NA~M/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba duSh+Ta sa twa da ma ka / a si mu kha la ba ra shu pA sha hasta/ khaD+ga bA ma ta ra tsa ni haSh+Tha/ tsa tur mu kha/ tsa tur b+hu dza/ Sha Da tsa ra Na/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ sarba duSh+Ta prA Na a pra ha ri

Ne/ ma hA big+h+na g+hA ta ka / bi kr-i ta A nan/ sarba b+hU ta b+ha ya~M ka ra/ aT Ta aT Ta ha sa nA di ne/ /byA g+h+ra tsarmA ni bA sa na/ ku ru ku ru/ sarba karmA Ni/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/ sarba man trAn/ bin d+ha bin d+ha/ pa ra mu drAn/ A kar Sha ya

A kar shaSha ya/ sarba b+hU tAn/ ma tha ma tha/ nir ma tha nir ma tha/ sarba duSh+TA na/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ maN Dal ma d+h+ye/ bai ba shwa ta/ dzI bi ta an ta ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA bi lam ba

mA bi lam ba/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ hU~M hU~M/ tardza ya/ b+he gA nA~M/ phaT phaT/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ ka ra ka ra/ sarbA a nA na pa ri pu ra ya/ he he b+ha ga bAn/ kiny+dzi rA ya si/ na maH sarbAr+tha sA d+ha ya hU~M phaT swA

hA/ thog mar khro bo'i bzlas pa 'di/ /dbang du bya dang dgug pa'i mchog /bskrad pa rab tu bshad par bya/ /khro bo gnyis pa'i bzlas pa yang / /skye tshe lan tshwa yungs mar dang / /dug dang d+ha du ra'i khu ba/ /sdigs mdzub khrag dang

bsres nas su/ /dur khrod ras dang bya ba ni/ /zla ba phyed pa lta bu mchog /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /logs gnyis rdo rjes mtshan par bya/ /de dbus bsgrub bya'i ming bris la/ /g.yon brkyang bar ni gnas nas ni/ /sngags

'di yongs su bzla bar bya/ /sngar bzhin bsgrub bya'i ming bkug nas/ /mtshan phyed kyi ni dus su ni/ /kun nas zhag bdun bsgrub par bya/ /bskrad par yang ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /na maHsa man ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta badzrA NA~M/ na mo

badzra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA daMSh+Tha ka Ta b+hai ra wA ya/ a si mu sa la ba ra shu pA sha ha stA ya/ oM a mrI te kuN Da li/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ gardza gardza/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta/

bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+ha na bi nA ya kAn/ ma hA ga Na pa ti/ dzI bi ta an+ta ka rA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ sngags 'dis gdug pa'i sems can ni/ /bskrad pa'i don du byas pa yin/ /zhi ba'i las ni bshad bya ba/ /

gzhan gyis mi thub ming dang ni/ /khro bo gsum pa bzlas nas ni/ /me dang sbrul sogs zhi bar byed/ /lag pa gnyis la nyi ma gnyis/ /de la hU~M gnyis bsgom par bya/ /bsgrub bya'i mgo la lag gnyis kyis/ /brabs

la de la zhugs nas ni/ /bsgrub bya'i snying la de gnyis kyis/ /'byung po bsreg par bsam par bya/ /me dang 'byung po 'jigs byed pa'i/ /'di yi sngags ni bshad par bya/ /na maHsa man ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta

badzrA NA~M/ oM a pa rA dzI ti ri dz-i hU~M phaT/ che ge mo 'byung po'i gdon las grol bar mdzod cig /g+h+r-iHdug sel ba'i sngags kyis ni/ /bzhi pa bshad kyis de nyon cig /khro bo rta mgrin bzlas pas ni/ /yang dag mi mtshungs
pa yi mchog /bsgrub bya sems dpa' sum brtseg bsgom/ /snying gar zla gnas ye shes sems/ /de yi 'od zer gyis rab gang / /bsgrub bya'i lus la mchog tu bsam/ /rab tu 'bar ba de yis dug /de nas lag

g.yas bsam pa ni/ /zla ba ha~M gis rnam par brgyan/ /kha dog dkar por sor mor dgod/ /de ltar sgrub pa po la bya/ /hU~M d+h+r-iHdzi k+ShI sA d+ha dgod/ /las rnams kun ni 'grub par byed/ /bsgrub bya'i mgo bo nas brtsams

te/ /rkang pa'i mtha' yi bar du bsgom/ /chu rgyun rgyun mi 'chad pa ni/ /dug ni 'og btang rim pa yis/ /'dir ni sngags 'di bzlas bya ste/ /rta mgrin du ni mngon par brjod/ /na maHsa man ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta badzrA NA~M/

oM hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ta ru la bi ru la/ sarba bi Sha g+hA ta ka ta ka dz+wa li ta bI s+phu li ga / aT+TAT+Ta hA sa nA da sa hI ta/ ka sa ri sa ho ba ta~M ad de ba badzra khu g+ha ta na/ tsa ta ba su d+ha ta la ni shwA sa ma ru ta od k+Shi ba ta d+ha ra Ni d+ha ra/ bi Sha na

aT+Ta hA sa a pa ri mi ta wal pa ra kra ma Ar+ya ga Na b+hi ta/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/ ha ya grI ba kha kha/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/ A be sha ya/ sarba gra he Sh+wa/ pra ti ha to b+ha ba/ badzra daM ki tsi rA ya si i da~M duSh+Ta gra ha~M da~MSh+Ta sarba~M bA/ du na du na/

mA tha mA tha/ mam+Ta mam+Ta/ bud d+ha d+harma ra d+ha/ bud d+ha d+harma sa~M g+he a nu dz+nyA na kar ma ku ru swA hA/ che ge mo'i dug la sogs pa sel bar mdzod cig hU~M zhes bya ba dang sngags spel lo/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs te/ /lhag ma rgyas
par shes par bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las khro bo'i bzlas pa dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub brgyad kyi le'u ste drug bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// //
de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes mchog /dngos grub la sogs mtshan nyid ni/ /sa snying phyag na rdo rje dang / /'jam dpal sgrib pa

sel ba dang / /byams pa lnga po 'di dag dang / /yi ge gsum dang rnam par spel/ /mig dang rna ba yid dang lus/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo byin gyis brlab/ /mtshan gsum nyin mo de dang 'dra/ /mngon shes lnga nyid thob par byed/ /bzhi

pa yi ni dbang bskur bas/ /blo ldan de nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ /snang ba mtshan mo'i cha ru 'gyur/ /nyin mo snang ba mched pa'o/ /mtshams ni snang ba thob pa'o/ /de ltar snang la sogs mtshan nyid/ /mtshan min mtshams

dang nyin mo min/ /kun rtog rlung ni spong bar byed/ /de ni skad cig mngon byang chub/ /mtshan nyid skad cig mar ni brjod/ /tha mar 'byung dang thog mar 'byung ba 'am/ /dbus mi 'byung ba'ang dbus su 'byung ba 'am/ /mtha' min

'byung ba'ang mthar ni 'byung ba 'am/ /de ni thams cad stong pa'i skad cig gcig tu gsungs/ /gang du 'gro ba dang ni 'ong med cing / /zad med 'phel med dngos dang dngos med min/ /ngo mtshar gzugs can yin zhing ngo mtshar min/ /gnas par 'gyur min myur du 'gro
ba min/ /gang zhig yod dang med pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral/ /bsod nams gzugs min sdig pa'i gzugs ma yin/ /bsod nams sdig gi bdag min mchog gyur pa/ /de ni thams cad stong pa'i skad cig

gcig tu gsungs/ /skad cig gcig la mngon byang chub/ /mtshan nyid 'di ni skad cig mchog /rdo rje rtse mo byang sems ni/ /'dzin pas lus kyi brtan pa nyid/ /de yis de nyid byang sems ni/ /rlung gi de nyid

rab sbyor bas/ /rigs pas steng du byed pa ni/ /rgas pa med par the tshom med/ /hU~M hoHrim bzhin shes pa ni/ /'dzin pa steng du rnam par spel/ /sngar bshad pa yi bdud rtsi lnga/ /'di ni bcud kyis len du brjod/ /

'di nyid kyis ni grub par byed/ /lcags kyi gser 'gyur byas nas ni/ /rdo rje phyag rgya dngos grub che/ /zung du 'jug pas thob par 'gyur/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba dang / /de bzhin rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang / /gang la de

gnyis gcig 'gyur ba/ /de ni zung du 'jug par bshad/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /rtog pa gnyis po spangs pas ni/ /gang du dngos po gcig 'gyur ba/ /zung du 'jug ces de la bshad/ /kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag /rtog pa gnyis

dang rnam par bral/ /gang du yang dag 'dres gyur pa/ /de ni zung du 'jug par bshad/ /rdo rje bzlas pa'i rab sbyor bas/ /rlung gi mtshan nyid shes nas ni/ /rnam rtog rlung rnams rnam par gcod/ /sems la dmigs pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /bdag

la byin brlabs rim pas kyang / /dngos grub brgyad ni thob par 'gyur/ /snang ba la sogs dbye ba shes/ /mngon par byang chub rim pa thob/ /zung 'jug rim pa la gnas pa/ /dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /

rnal 'byor pa yis the tshom med/ /phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub cher/ /zung du 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rnam rtog med par zhugs nas ni/ /thob pa 'di la the tshom med/ /lus ni gzhal yas khang du 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis yang

dag brten/ /zur bzhi pa yi mdun rgyab dang / /g.yas dang g.yon gyi dbye bas so/ /steng 'og sgo yi dbye ba yis/ /sgo bzhi zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /sna rtse bzhi yi dbyibs kyis ni/ /rta bab bzhi ni brjod par bya/ /dra ba chu bar yang dag bshad/ /

rgyus par gyur pa dra ba phyed/ /cha ni zla ba phyed pa dang / /bum pa lto bar yang dag shes/ /rje ngar bla dpung lag ngar ni/ /ka ba brgyad du yang dag bshad/ /mig gi rnam shes me long sogs/ /sgra yi rnam shes rol mo dang / /sna yi rnam shes

me tog phreng / /rin chen pha gu lce rnam shes/ /lus kyi rnam shes ras 'phan dang / /yid kyi rnam shes ri dgas so/ /mig ni 'khor lo'i mtshan ma dang / /rna ba kun nas rdo rje rnams/ /sna ni ba dan du ni bshad/ /lce ni dril bu ru ni gsungs/ /
rnga yab la sogs rnam dag pa/ /lus kyi tshogs zhes bya bar bshad/ /yid ni dbus kyi pad mar gsungs/ /rnam rtog rlung ni yang dag brten/ /ye shes lnga ni rnam dag pa/ /re khA lngar ni yang dag brjod/ /

phung po lnga ni rnam dag lnga / /rnam dag kha dog lnga ni dbye/ /de dag gzhal yas khang du bsgom/ /dang po sbyor bar shes par bya/ /mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga / /rigs kyi dbye ba rang ngo bo/ /de nyid phyi rol gnas par brjod/ /dkyil

'khor rnam par dag pa'o/ /khams bzhi'i rang bzhin bdag nyid ni/ /gzugs kyi phung po mdor bsdus na/ /gzugs kyi phung po rnams dang ni/ /mig gi rnam shes sa snying po/ /phyi rol gzugs kyi rdo rjer bshad/ /byams pa rtsa rgyus

dbus na bzhugs/ /de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis/ /shar dang lho yi mtshams su ni/ /me long ye shes su ni bshad/ /rnam par snang mdzad rnam dag nyid/ /bde dang sdug bsngal 'jigs dang skyo/ /tshor ba'i mtshan nyid du ni

'dod/ /tshor ba chu yi khams dang ni/ /phyi rol sgra ni rdo rje dang / /rna ba phyag na rdo rjer bshad/ /rigs ni gnyis po 'dres pa nyid/ /de yi rdo rje phyi rol 'gyur/ /sna yi ye shes mkha' snying po/ /khro bo gnyis po rnam par shes/ /mnyam

nyid rin chen 'byung ba dang / /dngos dang dngos med sogs 'du shes/ /snga ma rjes dran mtshan nyid can/ /'du shes phung po me khams dang / /phyi rol dri yi rdo rje dang / /lce yi rnam shes 'jig rten mgon/ /de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po

gnyis/ /de ni so sor rtog ye shes/ /'od dpag med kyi rigs las byung / /dge dang mi dge'i las rnams kyis/ /bag chags 'du byed mtshan nyid ni/ /'du shes phung po rlung gi khams/ /phyi rol ro yi rdo rje dang / /lus kyi rnam

shes sgrib rnam sel/ /kun bzang tshigs kyi mtshams dbus bzhugs/ /de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis/ /bya ba nan tan grub ye shes/ /don yod grub pa'i rigs las byung / /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni/ /ye shes

mtshan nyid rnam shes brjod/ /rnam par shes pa nam mkha'i khams/ /yid kyi rnam shes 'jam rdo rje/ /de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis/ /shin du rnam dag chos kyi dbyings/ /mi bskyod pa yi rigs las byung / /mngon par byang chub

rnam pa lnga / /gzhal yas khang na 'di dag bzhugs/ /de nyid khams kyi dbye ba yis/ /rim pa ji bzhin bshad par bya/ /skra rus phyi sa mchil ma snying / /sa ni rnam snang bdag nyid do/ /spu dang gnag dang nye ba'i snying / /sen mo chu yi khams su

shes/ /rin chen 'byung ldan bdag nyid kyi/ /rigs kyi rten du shes par bya/ /so dang lpags pa sha dang snying / /me yi khams zhes bya bar brjod/ /'od dpag med kyi rang bzhin dang / /rigs kyi dbye bar shes par bya/ /rgyus pa sha

dang rtsibs logs snying / /rlung ni don yod grub pa'o/ /dri ma rgyus pa mkhris pa snying / /de ni nam mkha'i khams su grags/ /mi bskyod pa yi rang bzhin dang / /snying ni rnam shes lnga zhes bya/ /re re la yang so sor ni/ /rnam pa lnga ni spro

ba shes/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i phung po lnga/ /nang gi bdag nyid rdzas phye ba/ /sha rtsa rgyus pa sha kham tshad/ /glad pa dang ni glad rgyas dang / /rus pa rkang dang snye ma dang / /mkhal ma snying dang lto ba dang / /glo ba mtsher pa gcin dang ni/ /

bshang ba pho ba long ka dang / /zhag dang chu ser gnag dang ni/ /khrag dang mkhris pa bad kan dang / /ngar snabs skra dang kha spu dang / /sen mo spu dang lpags pa dang / /lag pa rkang mig yan lag sogs/ /mtshogs ma dpung pa zhes

ni brjod/ /de dag rim par shes par bya/ /gzhal yas khang ni rnam dag pas/ /de la gnas kyi dbye ba ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /pU l+li ra ni mgo bor shes/ /spyi gtsug dzA lan d+ha ra dang / /rna ba g.yas par

o Tun dang / /spyi bo'i rgyab ni arbu da/ /go dA ba ri rna ba g.yon/ /rA me shwa ri smin ma'i dbus/ /mig gnyis de wi ko Ti dang / /mA la we ni dpung pa'i rtsa/ /kA ma rU pa mchan khung gnyis/ /ku lu nu ma gnyis su grags/ /

ko sa la ni lte bar shes/ /tri sa ku ni sna yi rtsa/ /kha yi pad ma ka ling ga /mgrin pa lam bA kar ni brjod/ /snying ni kany+tsir shes par bya/ /hi ma la ya mdoms su shes/ /mtshan ma gr-i ha de wa dang / /

pre ta pu ri bshang ba'i lam/ /brla gnyis su war+N+Na dwI pa/ /sau raSh+Ta ni byin pa gnyis/ /rkang pa'i bol ni sin d+hU'i yul/ /sor mo rnams la nA ga ra/ /mthe bong gnyis ni ma rur shes/ /ku lu ta ni rkang pa'i mthil/ /de ltar

gnas kyi rnam dag dang / /sa bcu rnam par dag pa nyid/ /de nyid dang ldan shes par bya/ /thim dang longs spyod bdag po nyid/ /'jug pa la sogs bye brag gis/ /rims kyis rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /de nas gzhan yang rab

bshad pa/ /rlung rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid mchog /srog gi rlung ni snying gar gnas/ /mi bskyod bye brag rigs las skyes/ /mdoms na gnas pa'i thur sel ni/ /rin chen 'byung ldan bye brag skyes/ /stod du rgyu ba lkog mthar gnas/ /

'od dpag med pa'i rang bzhin no/ /me dang mnyam gnas lte bar gnas/ /don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin no/ /khyab byed yan lag kun la gnas/ /rnam snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs/ /dbang po'i sgo yi rgyun las ni/ /srog dang rtsol

ba rgyun 'di dang / /dus kun du ni rgyu ba ni/ /srog ces bya ba yin par bshad/ /srog dang rlung dang phyi sa dang / /de bzhin du ni khu ba sogs/ /'og 'dren 'di ni thur sel rlung / /rtag tu rnal 'byor pas shes bya/ /dgod dang za dang ldag pa

dang / /kun du 'thung dang 'jib pa dang / /gang zhig rtag tu mnyam gnas pa/ /mnyam du gnas pa zhes byar brjod/ /gyen du 'gro zhing sdud pa dang / /bza' dang myang ba la sogs pa/ /shes nas lhan cig 'byor pa dag /gyen rgyu'i las

su shes par bya/ /khyab dang 'dzin pa nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin 'gro dang ldog pa sogs/ /tshigs kun du ni khyab pa'i phyir/ /khyab byed ces ni bya bar bshad/ /rlung gi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni/ /de nas de yi 'jigs par brjod/ /snga ma

bzhin du btang bzung sogs/ /phan tshun du ni gnod par byed/ /gzhan ni gzhan la 'tshe ba yin/ /stobs ni thob pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /gcig ni gcig la thim par 'gro/ /ji ltar zla ba gzas bzung la/ /rlung rnams rim gyis

nyams 'gyur ba/ /snga ma bzhin du gong nas gong / /rang gi bdag nyid la thim par/ /btang bzung slar yang 'gro bar byed/ /ji ltar mes bsregs dngos med dang / /rgyu med par ni thim par 'gro/ /slar yang srog gi rlung shar ba/ /las

kyi rlung ni sna tshogs pa/ /de ni lhan cig rnam shes dang / /slar yang 'jig rten gsum du gnas/ /de las las dang de las skyes/ /de las chags sogs bag chags dang / /de las slar yang 'chi dang skye/ /de ltar 'khor lo bskor ba

'dra/ /sngon bzhin rdo rje bzlas la sogs/ /rim gyis de yi dbye bar 'gyur/ /de nas sems dpa' chen po kun/ /de nyid mig sman thur ma yis/ /thams cad 'khrul ba'i long ba bsal/ /yang dag dngos po nyid ni mthong / /de nas

yang 'di phyag byas te/ /mchi bcas mig gis bcom ldan la/ /lan gsum du ni bskor byas nas/ /rdo rje 'chang la yang dag bstod/ /e ma'o kun 'gro kun dbang phyug /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa brnyes/ /e ma'o dam tshig

de nyid gsum/ /mchog tu rmad byung ston par mdzad/ /khams gsum las ni rnam par grol/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid/ /'dod pa rnams kyis ma gos pa/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phung po rnams dang khams

rnams dang / /skye mched rnams la mi rten cing / /srid dang mya ngan 'das las grol/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de ltar nam mkha' gnas med cing / /spros pa med cing gos pa med/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ /dmigs
med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku/ /'jig rten gsum las rgyal gyur pa/ /'jig rten gsum 'di rnam par g.yos/ /bdud rnams bcom par mdzad nas ni/ /'jig rten gsum nas lha las
rgyal/ /khro bo bcu ni kun nas ni/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal gtso bo yis/ /'di ltar bka' ni bsgo bar 'gyur/ /sa yi cha ni gang na 'di/ /rdo rje phreng bar mngon brjod pa'i/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i dam

tshig brgyad/ /dus kun du ni spyod 'gyur zhing / /rgyud du de nyid rang nyid kyis/ /khro bo bcu yis de las ni/ /rtag tu phur bus bgegs kun la/ /bsrung ba'i don du yul 'khor dang / /rang rang phreng ba'i sngags kyis ni/ /de rnams la ni

gtor ma dbul/ /sems can yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ /sna tshogs sprul pa bstan nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dus kun du/ /nyin dang mtshan du bzhugs par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs
pa las dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rgyud thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba rnam par

phye ba zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// //thugs dam sa'i snying po tho ling snying po dpal dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po su dza na shrI dz+nyA na dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba chen po bod kyi
lha btsan po bla ma dge slong zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ stag lung rgyud 'bum dang bstun pa'i zhu dag grub// //
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ san d+hi byA ka ra Na nA ma tan tra/ bod skad du/ dgongs pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nyid 'di skad bdag
gis thos/ /shin du gsal ba'i dus gcig na/ /gsang gtso rdo rje bcom ldan 'das/ /dam tshig mchog ni rdo rje gsum/ /de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni/ /yon tan phun tshogs bsam mi khyab/ /yod med
gnyi ga las 'das pa/ /gnas med pa la gnas shes bya/ /nam mkha' rang bzhin gcig pa 'dir/ /kun mkhyen ye shes rnam bsgom pa/ /'gro snying rnam dag ces bya la/ /thub pa chen po bzhugs pa yin/ /ma rig

pa dang 'du byed dang / /rnam par shes dang ming dang gzugs/ /skye mched drug dang reg pa dang / /tshor ba dang ni sred pa dang / /nyer len srid pa skye ba dang / /rga shi zhes bya rig ma yin/ /nga rgyal che ba'i nga rgyal dang / /nga'o snyam rgyal

mngon nga rgyal/ /gzhan yang nga rgyal las nga rgyal/ /cung zad nga rgyal log par bcas/ /'di dag rdo rje mtha' can mchog /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /de rnams brjod mi lang ba'i grangs/ /brjod kyis mi

lang nyid du gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni grangs med pa'i/ /ri rab rdul phran grangs mnyam pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /til gyi gang bu mtshungs pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang / /nam mkha'i

khams kun gang bar snang / /de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/ /de nyid gsum skyes skur mdzad do/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug lha chen dang / /'dod dang

rig byed de bzhin zung / /tshangs lha de bzhin zla ba ste/ /phung po la sogs grangs dang mnyam/ /sgra sgrogs de bzhin dga' byed dang / /skya bseng skem byed thub pa dang / /sna yon dang ni dkon mchog gsum/ /de bzhin gshegs

kun gcig pu nyid/ /de tshe phyung ba gsol ba yi/ /gsang sngags gsungs pa dang po nyid/ /thub chen byang chub sems tshul du/ /mdzad pa gnyis pa yin par bshad/ /rnam lnga mngon par byang chub pa'i/ /phra mo rnal

'byor gsum pa yin/ /dbang bskur ba ni rnam pa bzhi/ /gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid bzhi pa/ /bsrung ba'i bslab gzhi rnam bzhi dang / /spyod pa'ang 'dir ni lnga pa ste/ /drug pa rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi/ /ting 'dzin phra mo'i rnal

'byor ro/ /bdun pa de nyid mchod par bshad/ /gsang ba'i dbang du gtso bos mdzad/ /phyag rgyas dbang bskur brgyad pa bstan/ /dam tshig bzhi po dgu pa yin/ /rnam pa bcur phye yang dag rtog /bzlas pa'i sngags kyang

gsungs pa yin/ /bcu gcig ming du byung ba na/ /phyag rgya gcig par bshad dkyil 'khor/ /bcu gnyis pa yi bdag nyid sku/ /nyan thos byang chub ston par mdzad/ /de bzhin rig pa spyod grub pa/ /mngon shes lnga ni bcu gsum pa/ /

bcu dang bzhi par bzhi po dang / /phreng sngags bla ma ston par mdzad/ /phyogs dang skya bseng nyid gyur pa/ /dngos grub dkyil 'khor bla med pa'o/ /sgra sgrogs dus dang yang dag ldan/ /dkyil 'khor rdul tshon ldan pa'o/ /slob ma dbang

bskur nyi zla dag /chags bral sna tshogs nyid gyur pa/ /sna tshogs tshig gi don gyi brda/ /sna tshogs ming can ming gcig pu/ /de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /so sor sdud pa rab tu bstan/ /gcig dang du ma las grol ba/ /yang

dag mthong nas yongs su bsgom/ /yongs su bsgoms par gyur pa'i bdag /rten 'brel du yang bstan par bya/ /de nas ma skyes sbyor ba la/ /thub pa rnam par snang mdzad che/ /rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i/ /ting 'dzin

de 'og ston par mdzad/ /'dod pa'i yan lag 'gro ba'i tshogs/ /gnyis pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs/ /'dod chags che tshul zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ /de bzhin gshegs kun gtso bo yi/ /rang

gi sku la zhugs par mdzad/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rgyun de la ni sbyor bar gyur/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs kun dang / /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /de bzhin gshegs bdag mnyes bya'i phyir/ /

de rnams zhugs nas gyur gyur pa/ /srog dang gyen rgyu thur sel dang / /mnyam gnas khyab byed ces bya dang / /klu dang rus sbal rtsangs pa dang / /lha sbyin gzhu rgyal zhes bya ba/ /'di dag tu ni nyid sku mdzad/ /bud med gzugs su

slar sprul te/ /rang gi ngo bo ji bzhin du/ /de sku'i sku las byung bar gyur/ /de nyid gsum ni mnyam sbyor las/ /rang gi gsang sngags de dag bsgom/ /yan lag kun las nges grol zhing / /shin du phra ba nyid du gyur/ /dbu

dgos ming las byung ba ni/ /zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong ste/ /dngos med ngo bo nyid yin pas/ /rang nyid kyang ni mi shes so/ /'on kyang 'di ltar thub pa la/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams gsol ba 'debs/ /bcom ldan

dgongs pa lung bstan pa/ /chos kyi mchog ni bstan du gsol/ /khyab bdag khyed ni chos 'di rnams/ /dngos med nyid ni thugs su chud/ /'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pas/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur mdzes/ /gang zhig yang

dag shes gyur na/ /'jig rten pa dang rtsod med cing / /de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa dang / /'jig rten shin du 'das de bzhin/ /gang 'di zhi ba nyid kyi chos/ /zhi gnas shin du sngon 'gro ba/ /byang chub sems dpas thos na yang / /

de bzhin nyid kyi bde ba byed/ /de nas sa snying la sogs pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /mgon po rnam snang chen po la/ /de dag gis ni zhus gyur pa/ /gang shes bla med byang chub ni/ /ma 'ongs skye bos thos
'gyur ba'i/ /gsang sngags de nyid don 'byung ba/ /rnal 'byor bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /lan gnyis gsol kyang mgon po ni/ /mi gsung bar ni rnam par bzhugs/ /rdo rje can gyis de shes nas/ /de nas slar

yang zhus par gyur/ /gang 'di zhi gnas la sogs pa'i/ /rnal 'byor zab mo bla med pa/ /de ni 'di ltar sngags pas bsngags/ /'tshal 'gyur de ni gtso bos gsungs/ /bya ba dag bya'i rnal 'byor dang / /rnal 'byor 'ba'

shig pa nyid dang / /lung ni yang dag gang yin pa/ /de ni bstan par mdzad pa'i rigs/ /zhus pa'i don ni mkhyen nas ni/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /gsang sngags tshul ni mchog gyur 'di/ /gsang ba khyod la bstan

par bya/ /'di skad ces bya'i gsang sngags che/ /gsang sngags kun don sngags ster ba'o/ /der ni lnga yi bdag gyur cing / /sbyor ba bzhi dang bcu yi bdag /lnga pa lnga po'i ming 'di ni/ /gsal dang mi gsal dag tu sbyar/ /rgya

mngon phyogs pa'i sbyor bshad pa/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa yin/ /bcu bdun zhes ni bshad pa 'di'i/ /gsungs pa'i don de ma shes pas/ /sngags pas gsang sngags sbyor ba dag /de tshe ji ltar byed par 'gyur/ /don 'di

rtogs par gyur nas ni/ /sna tshogs don ni ston pa dang / /'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa/ /gsang sngags rig pa mchog rnams byed/ /bdag ni stong dang yang dag sbyar/ /yi ge a ni steng du gnas/ /phyi ma zhes bya gnas bya la/ /sngags

pas sems can don rnams bya/ /yi ge a gnyis sbyor ba gang / /a sgo las skyes nyid du 'gyur/ /steng 'og phyogs kyi rnam pa de/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /gang zhig 'di las gsungs pa ni/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i thabs

chos nyid/ /bdag gis zhes rtogs de 'gyur ba/ /thogs med rtog pa 'di gnas so/ /ston pa po dang bstan dang gnas/ /phra rab tsam gyi ngo bo med/ /kun rdzob dus gsum sbyor gcig pa/ /sngags pa rnams kyi thos de 'gyur/ /shin

du grangs med bskal pa ru/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang mkhyen pa/ /sngags pa rnams kyis dus gcig na/ /skad cig la rdzogs byang chub thob/ /kun mkhyen kun rig thugs chud pa/ /gsang sngags ston pa'i chos can te/ / de nyid

kho na bcom ldan mchog /sku gsung thugs rdo rje las skyes/ /mi rtag nam mkha' ji bzhin te/ /gsang sngags thams cad nyi ma 'dra/ /sa la rlung bzhin sngags pa ni/ /'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod/ /thams cad 'gyur ba gang gang yi/ /

de de stong pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de bzhin sbyor ba de mthong bas/ /kun rig de ni de bzhin gshegs/ /de bzhin nyid gzugs brnyan gyur pa/ /de ni sku yi rdo rjer gyur/ /'gro ba yang dag tshim par 'byung / /mi phyed gsung gi rdo rjer gyur/ /nam

mkha'i gnas kyi sbyor ba gang / /bsam mi khyab par spro bdag nyid/ /de nyid ye shes rgya mtsho la/ /thugs kyi rdo rje yang dag byung / /sems can kun gyi sems gang yin/ /nam mkha' yongs su brtags pa ste/ /de yang de ru kun gnas

pas/ /bud med chos gcig pu yi gzugs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gang brten pa/ /sar gyur de ni bcu gsum pa/ /de ni bud med ces bshad de/ /de bas chos de b+ha ga yin/ /bya ba la sogs ji skad bshad/ /dam tshig chen po

gcig tu gyur/ /dngos med chos nyid gcig pu ru/ /'di ni de dag mnyam par 'gyur/ /dam tshig sku gsung thugs dang ni/ /ting 'dzin de bzhin rgyal ba dang / /sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/ /rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dag dang / /gzugs

dang sgra dang dri dang ro/ /reg dang de bzhin chos kyi dbyings/ /'di rnams rdo rje'i mtha' can byung / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /de ltar brjod mi lang zhes pa/ /brjod mi lang ba nyid gyur rnams/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi ri rab kyi/ /

rdul phran gyi ni grangs mnyam pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems chen dang / /nam mkha' mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs/ /mi bskyod rnam snang mdzad rin chen/ /dpag med tshe dang gdon mi za/ /'di dag nam mkha'i khams

mnyam pa'i/ /rdo rje snying po de bzhin gshegs/ /dper na til 'bru mtshungs pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha'i khams ni yongs khebs pa/ /de rnams der ni yang dag snang / /de nas mgon po rnam snang

mdzad/ /de bzhin nyid dang gcig tu gyur/ /gang yang dam tshig sngon 'gro dang / /sku rdo rje sogs ming can gyi/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems chen dang / /don yod thams cad de bzhin gshegs/ /'di rnams sku yi

yan lag grags/ /zhi gnas bsam mi khyab las byung / /ma skyes gcig pu gzigs pa ni/ /'dod chags chen po'i tshul du gyur/ /'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog gi/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa kun gyi tshogs/ /de ni nyid kyi sku la bcug /de ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /de ni rnam par snang mdzad che/ /'di nyid mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ /nyid sku bud med nyid du mdzad/ /de nas mgon po bsam yas las/ /

bud med gzugs su byung bar gyur/ /de ni sangs rgyas spyan 'dra dang / /mA ma kI 'dra sbyor ba dang / /gos dkar mo 'dra'i gzugs dang ni/ /sgrol ma'i gzugs su yang dag gnas/ /sgra yi ngo bo'i gzugs can dang / /dri yi ngo bo'i

gzugs dang ni/ /de bzhin ro yi ngo bo'i gzugs/ /reg gi ngo bo'i gzugs can dang / /la la gzugs kyi ngo bo yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams bzhugs/ /de nas tshul gsum don gcig dang / /mi bskyod pa yang bstan phyir

dang / /'jig rten rgyang pan gdul don du/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul byung ngo / /gnyis med mnyam pa nyid rnal 'byor/ /rdo rje bud med b+ha ga mchog /dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor du/ /de ni mi bskyod yang dag bri/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo

bzhi pa/ sbyor gzhi gcig tu sbyor ba nyid/ /dri ma med par byin brlabs pa/ /kun nas shin du gsal ba'i gzugs/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun du khyab/ /'bar ba mang pos rnam par 'khrug /gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor
ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /de nas de ni bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po 'di/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su yang / /rnam par bzhag ste bzhugs par gyur/ /mi bskyod rin chen

dpag med dang / /don grub rnam snang de bzhin gshegs/ /de rnams byang chub sems rdo rje'i/ /thugs la rnam par bzhugs par gyur/ /de rnams zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems/ /dngos med ngo

bor gcig par ni/ mkha' 'dra rdo rje las byung gzigs/ /shes rab ting 'dzin gzhi gcig pu/ /de ni grib ma ltar thugs chud/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin skur mdzad nas/ /'gro don mnyam dang mi mnyam mdzad/ /ji ltar mtshams gnas

nyi ma yis/ /'gro ba gnyid log sad par byed/ /de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /byang chub sems kyis sad par byed/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje gcig /de rnams skye bar bzhed pa yis/ /byang chub sems kyi ngo bo
yis/ /rdo rje'i sngags su mdzad par gyur/ /rig pa skyes bu'i gzugs dag ni/ /sngags kyis byin brlabs bla na med/ /der ni zhal gsum pa lta bur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gzigs/ /de nas mgon
po bcom ldan gyi/ /thugs rjes bzhugs pa las byung ste/ /byang chub sems ni rab bskor la/ /lan gsum ched du brjod pa mdzad/ /bsam mi khyab cing gnas med gang / /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /

rdo rje byang chub sems gcig las/ /spyod yul der ni gyur pa yin/ /de nas gsang tshul thos pa dang / /de 'og gsang ba'i bdag pos ni/ /khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad la/ /ji bzhin tshul du de btud zhus/ /phung
po khams la sogs pa'i chos/ /'dus la gang zhig gnas pa'i rnams/ /rten 'brel las skyes yin par ni/ /khyed chos ston par mdzad pas khums/ /sman pa'i chos rnams 'di dag ni/ /zhe sdang la sogs rkyen dang

ldan/ /'di dag ji ltar bde gshegs dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po rigs ma lags/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems chen de/ /lus la sogs pa ji ltar 'gyur/ /gang zhig phyi dus skye bo yis/ /'di dag 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro/ /

de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /'od chen ldan pas bka' stsal pa/ /ma 'ongs skye bo mthong nas ni/ /gang zhig khyod kyis nga dris pa/ /legs so legs so sems dpa' che/ /gsang ba'i bdag po khyod legs so/ /

smras don ji lta ji lta bar/ /de ltar khyod la lung bstan bya/ /ma 'ongs dus na mi rnams ni/ /'jig rten rgyang pan mchog gzhol 'gyur/ /log par lta ba la gnas te/ /ci dga' bar yang spyod par byed/ /la la glu dang gar la

dga'/ /dgod dang sgeg la mchog tu gzhol/ /dri dang phreng ba la dga' zhing / /de bzhin 'khrig pa la dgar 'gyur/ /rmongs pa la la sdang ba dang / /de bzhin gti mug la rab gzhol/ /la la de bzhin 'dod chags zhen/ /shes pa

gzhan dag 'dod par 'gyur/ /nya dang sha dang de bzhin chang / /bshang gci khu ba khrag rnams ni/ /skyes bu glen pa za byed cing / /med par smra ba chos su sgrogs/ /ma dang sring mo la sogs pa/ /bgrod min la ni 'gro ba dang / /pha dang ma yang

gsod pa dang / /de bzhin srog chags gzhan rnams gsod/ /brdzun gyi tshig nyid smra ba dang / /khyad par du yang rku ba dang / /gzhan gyi chung ma'i thad 'gro zhing / /smad pa gzhan yang byed par 'gyur/ /la la dam chos spong

ba dang / /de bzhin mtshams med byed pa ste/ /sna tshogs sdig pa byas nas kyang / /sngags pa dngos grub 'dod par 'gyur/ /gzer nad dug dang sbyar ba'i dug /sna tshogs nad ni mi bzad par/ /'di rnams kyis ni gzir gyur

nas/ /zhi ba nyid ni 'dod par 'gyur/ /'dor bar byed pa rmongs pa de/ /mi bzad sdig pa byas pa dang / /log par lta la mchog gzhol rnams/ /ngan song gsum du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ /gsang

ba 'di ltar bstan pa yin/ /gang zhig yang dag thob pa nyid/ /'dir ni de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i bdag po mkhas rnams kyis/ /tshul mchog 'di ni rnyed gyur nas/ /don gsal yang dag rnyed pa dang / /de yang

nga rgyal dag tu ltung / /de rnams ting 'dzin zhi nyid dang / /shes rab nyid kyang shin du ring / /rab tu dga' dang ldan pa yis/ /rnal 'byor pa ni bdag nyid ces/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal la rtag dga'/ /sgyu dang bcos ma'i chos dang ldan/ /

mya ngan 'das dang gzhan 'gro ba/ /phan tshun dag ni sun yang 'byin/ /gsang sngags smra ba la brten nas/ /gcig la gcig ni rtsod par 'gyur/ /de rnams bdud kyi byin brlabs kyis/ /gal te dngos grub phra thob na/ /des

ni mngon par nga rgyal bas/ /mkhas pa snyam du shes par 'gyur/ /tshogs pa'i nang du rtsod pa dang / /khyi bzhin kha zas la spyod 'gyur/ /rang las 'bras las byung ba yi/ /phan pa la ni gnod pa byed/ /de rnams dge dang

mi dge rnams/ /bdag cag rnams kyi stobs yin zer/ /mngon sum sangs rgyas 'dra ba yi/ /slob dpon smod cing bsnyen bkur med/ /skad cig gcig gis sdang byed cing / /de la skad cig gis rjes chags/ /khyi dang

phag dang khwa rnams kyi/ /spyod pa dag ni ston par byed/ /de rnams phan tshun rnam 'tshe bar/ /mngon par dga' bar byed par 'gyur/ /gsang ba 'dus pa mi shes par/ /dam tshig la sogs byed par 'gyur/ /gsang ba

srung bar mi byed par/ /thams cad du ni ston par byed/ /'jig rten la ni smad byas nas/ /gzhan dag la yang rab gsal byed/ /bdag nyid rtsa ba med par ni/ /dam tshig 'das par byed par 'gyur/ /sgra bcas spror ldan

gyis bskul bas/ /rang la rang gi glags rnyed med/ /de nyid ye shes 'byung ba yi/ /ting 'dzin de yis shes mi 'gyur/ /nyes pa cung zad tsam gyi phyir/ /mngon spyod rab tu byed par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor rab sbyor dman pa

yi/ /sngags pa rnams ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /phyi rol bstan bcos la rtag dga'/ /de yi sbyor la gcig tu mkhas/ /rang gi dam tshig yongs spangs nas/ /lcags kyu med pa bzhin du spyod/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor
ba yis/ /de rnams 'tsho ba sgrub par 'gyur/ /gang du rnyed pa thob 'gyur bar/ /dam pa'i chos ni ston par byed/ /de rnams yang dag sdud byed pa'i/ /gsang ba dgongs pas bshad pa yin/ /dam tshig
nyams te gnas pa rnams/ /'di yis thams cad dgug par bya/ /rang gi rjes rig mi shes na/ /de rnams zhi bar ga la 'gyur/ /de nas rjes su gzung don du/ /tshul 'di dag ni gyur pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan de
bzhin gshegs/ /gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas su/ /de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po la/ /rang mchod de nyid dam tshig sprin/ /yang dag 'byung bas legs mchod de/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni 'di skad gsol/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa kun bsdus pa/ /'dus pa gnyis med rnal 'byor pa'i/ /nyams dga' rdo rje snying po 'di/ /de nyid bsdus pa rnams kyi mchog /de nyid bcom ldan bshad
du gsol/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs kun la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa/ /gang yang 'di ltar gsol 'debs pa/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams legs so legs/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs rnams kyang / /

the tshom skye bar byed yin na/ /byang chub sems gzhan ci smos zhes/ /de bzhin gshegs de rnams la gsungs/ /de nas ngo mtshar rmad byung nas/ /the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa'i/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs

kun gyi/ /bdag po la ni 'di skad zhus/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /yon tan kun gyis phul phyung yang / /gtso bo 'dir ni ston mdzad par/ /ji ltar spro ba mnga' ma gyur/ /byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas mdzad de/ /

de bzhin gshegs yid bde la sogs/ /ye shes rgyu 'bras thob pa'i phyir/ /de ni yang dag bshad du gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po ni/ /de rnams zhu bar mkhyen nas su/ /ye shes sgron ma rdo rje grags/ /ting 'dzin

zhe sdang rigs 'byung ba/ /gtso bos mi bskyod snying po ni/ /sku gsung thugs ni dpal ldan pas/ /de nas yang dag phyung ba ni/ /badzra d+h+r-ig ces bya ba'i sngags/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /zhe sdang rigs byung las

skyes pa/ /de ni rig pa skyes bur 'gyur/ /mi bskyod rgya chen thabs kyis sbyor/ /zhal gsum gnag dang dkar dang dmar/ /bdag nyid chen po de zhal yin/ /rdo rje gsum 'dir de bzhin gshegs/ /bzhugs pa ye shes

zhes bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po/ /dam tshig 'byung rdo rje zhes bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin la gtso bo ni/ /snyoms par zhugs pa nyid du mdzod/ /de nas dzI na dzIka ces pa'i/ /snying po de bzhin yang dag phyung / /

de nas gsungs pa tsam gyis kyang / /gti mug rigs byung las skyes pa/ /rig bcas skyes bur gyur pa ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs/ /dkar dang gnag dang dmar bcas pa'i/ /zhal gyis mdun du bzhugs par

gyur/ /de nas rin chen byung ba yi/ /dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la/ /snyoms par zhugs nas bder gshegs kun/ /bde dang yid bder gyur pa'i phyir/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen rigs/ /de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po 'di/ /

de nas rat+na d+h+r-Ika ces bya'i/ /snying po dpal ldan de tshe byung / /de nas phyung ba tsam gyis ni/ /rig dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur/ /ser dang dkar dang gnag pa yi/ /zhal dang rin chen 'byung ldan ni/ /rdo rje gsum gyi bdag po yi/ /

lho phyogs logs su bzhugs par gyur/ /de yang byang du gzigs gyur te/ /mnyam nyid ye shes zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan bdag po de/ /rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig bdag /'dod chags chen po las byung ba/ /rdo rje zhes ni

bya ba yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /'dod chags chen po'i rigs las byung / /A ro lIka ces bya snying po/ /rdo rje gsum las de nas phyung / /de nas phyung ba tsam gyis ni/ /de 'og bcom ldan gtso bo ni/ /rig dang
bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur/ /'jig rten dbang po 'od dang mtshungs/ /dmar dang dkar dang gnag pa'i zhal/ /dpal ldan rigs chen po yi bdag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po yi/ /nub phyogs su ni bzhugs par

gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /don yod dam tshig ces bya ba'i/ /ting 'dzin rdo rje yang dag byung / /rdo rje de la snyoms zhugs nas/ /snying po mchog gi mchog ces bya'o/ /dam tshig rnams ni dgug pa'i rigs/ /snying po

pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika ces pa/ /rdo rje gsum zhes bya las byung / /de nas phyung ba tsam gyis ni/ /don yod rdo rje sbyor ba yi/ /de nyid mgon po bcom ldan 'das/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /rig dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur/ /ljang dang gnag

dang dkar ba'i zhal/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po yi/ /byang phyogs su ni bzhugs par gyur/ /zhe sdang gti mug rigs dang ni/ /de bzhin yid bzhin rin chen dang / /'dod chags dam tshig ces bya ba/ /'dod dang thar pa rab

bsgrubs pa'o/ /de nas khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags dam tshig 'byung ba yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa btsun mo mchog /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /dam pa dag ni phyung bar gyur/ /

sangs rgyas kun gyi yum gcig pu/ /yum zhes bya bar yang dag bshad/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs bdag po/ /gang phyir lha mo btsun mo mchog /sku dang gsung thugs las byung ba/ /dwe Sha ra ti zhes byar grags/ /rig pa

skyes bu zhes bya ba'i/ /de ni bud med gzugs 'dzin ma/ /zhal gsum lta bu'i gzugs kyis ni/ /me yi phyogs su rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas rjes mnyes rdo rje grags/ /sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung / /ting nge

'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /rdo rje gsum las byung ba ni/ /de ni mo ha ra ti ste/ /gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang / /rig pa skyes bu byung ba ste/ /zhal gsum lta bu'i rnal 'byor ma/ /gnyis med mnyam pa'i rnal

'byor pas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yid 'ong gcig /gsang ba bsdus pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bden bral phyogs su rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas rjes chags rdo rje zhes/ /bya ba rdo rje gsum las skyes/ /ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms zhugs nas/ /bde ba chen po phyung ba ni/ /'di ltar nA ga ra ti phyung / /zhal gsum pa yi gzugs can te/ /gtso bo bud med gzugs 'dzin pa/ /de ni rig pa skyes bur gyur/ /gos med ye shes las byung ba/ /rdo rje

gsum gyi dam tshig mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo ste/ /rlung gi phyogs su rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag po/ /rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig can/ /bslu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms zhugs nas/ /de bzhin gshegs kun btsun mo mchog /zhal gsum lta bu'i gzugs can ma/ /badzra ra ti zhes bya ba/ /rdo rje gsum las phyung bar gyur/ /de ni phyung ma thag tu yang / /gtso bo rig ma skyes bur gyur/ /

bud med kyi ni gzugs 'dzin te/ /dbang ldan phyogs su rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas bcom ldan mgon po de/ /rnam snang rdo rje las byung ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje la/ /dkyil 'khor

'dir ni gshin rje'i gshed/ /khro bo chen po phyung ba dang / /phyung nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /bsnyengs par bya bar shar phyogs bzhugs/ /de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /mngon

byang rdo rje zhes bya yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /khro bo chen po phyung ba ni/ /pra dz+nyAn ta kr-ita rdo rje can/ /de nas dpal ldan phyung ba ni/ /rig pa skyes bur yang dag phyung / /dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba las/ /'od chen
phur bu'i gzugs lta bu/ /rdo rje dam tshig bsnyengs byed pa/ /lho yi sgor ni rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas rin chen 'byung gnas grags/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor kun gyi

gtsor/ /rdo rje gsum las khro bo che/ /pad mAn ta krita 'od po che/ /bdag po de nas phyung bar gyur/ /de nas phyung ba tsam gyis 'dir/ /gtso bo'i rig pa skyes bur bcas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi'ang / /

gsung gi tshul du rnam sprul zhing / /gos med ye shes bla med pa/ /nub kyi sgor ni bzhugs par gyur/ /bcom ldan de nyid sna tshogs pa/ /thugs kyi rdo rje ting 'dzin la/ /kun nas snyoms par zhugs nas ni/ /de nas

gtso bos phyung bar gyur/ /khro bo chen po rnam phyung ba/ /kun nas bgegs mthar byed pa ste/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /byang gi sgor ni rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor mchog

'di thos pa dang / /mgon po rnam par snang mdzad che/ /de la slar yang zhus gyur pa/ /mkha' dang dbyer med sbyor gcig cing / /dngos med de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /dga' ba'i mchog sogs bgyis nas ni/ /ji ltar

de rnams zhus par gyur/ /'di dag thog mtha' yod min na/ /'di yi gtso bo ji ltar 'gyur/ /phyogs kyi cha rnams bzhag pa la/ /'di ni gang gis rnam par sbyang / /gsang ba 'di ni mi srid ces/ /theg pa gsum po rtog

pa dang / /so so'i skye bo'i tshig gis kyang / /spang ba dag kyang bgyid par 'gyur/ /gang zhig nyan thos rnams dang ni/ /de bzhin mdo sde las spangs pa'i/ /zhe sdang sogs dang 'dod lnga sogs/ /de bzhin gshegs
rnams sten mdzad pa/ /rjes su spyod dang thun mong ba'i/ /bya ba de dag phyin ci log /dga' mtha'i spyod pa de rnams ni/ /de bzhin gshegs de rnam mdzad pa/ /tshig gcig la ni dpag med don/ /gsang ba
dam pa 'di dag ni/ /mgon po gang zhig ma 'ongs pa'i/ /skye bos ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa/ /phyag na rdo rje tshul 'di ni/ /dgongs pa gsang ba bla med pa/ /dris

pa rnams ni bshad par bya/ /zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags/ /lus la sogs pa'i phung po lnga / /'di dag bdag med rtogs nas ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas ni tshul gsum gnas/ /pha ni zhi gnas yin zhes bya/ /
ma ni lhag mthong yin par bshad/ /de bzhin nyid shes lus su 'gyur/ /zhi ba rnal 'byor pa yi zas/ /ji ltar bzo bos bder gshegs kyi/ /sku yi gzugs brnyan byas pa ltar/ /gang zhig sku lta bu yi sku/ /

de bzhin gsung gi rnam pas gsung / /thugs kyi rnam pas thugs su ni/ /zhi gnas la sogs pa las byung / /phung po la sogs chos rnams ni/ /stong zhing rten 'brel las byung mthong / /ye shes nyi ma shar ba'i

gzugs/ /zhi las rnal 'byor pa rnams byed/ /de bas sku gsung thugs rdo rje/ /grib ma lta bur byung ba yin/ /de bzhin phung po khams la sogs/ /dam tshig gcig la rnam par gnas/ /de nas tshul gsum don gcig pa/ /

zhi gnas la sogs pa las byung / /de bas rdo rje tshul yid 'ong / /gsang ba'i bdag po mnyan par gyis/ /stong pa rten 'brel las byung bar/ /rnal 'byor pa yi rdo rje zhes/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor ni/ /phung
po la sogs chos 'byung ba/ /lus dang ngag sems kun rtog ni/ /phung po sogs byung 'byung las gyur/ /'di dag dngos med yang dag sbyar/ /de las ting 'dzin skyes par gyur/ /'di dag ting 'dzin gnyis med

sbyor/ /mi phyed rdo rje nyid du gyur/ /zab dang rgya chen rtogs byang chub/ /de rtogs pas ni sems dpar gyur/ /'di dag nam mkha' mtshungs gyur pa/ /chen po zhes bya shes byed pa'o/ /de la rtogs pa mtha'

yas pa/ /rdo rje theg par ston pa yin/ /ting nge 'dzin ni de nyid las/ /rdo rje'i theg pa byung ba yin/ /'di las 'jig rten 'das 'gyur zhing / /de bzhin 'jig rten shin du 'das/ /dngos don de bzhin nyid gcig
pu/ /gsang ba 'jig rten pa zhes bshad/ /ma skyes pa las byung ba ni/ /kun rdzob dang ni don dam yin/ /bdud gyur lha yi bur bshad de/ /phung po nyon mongs 'chi bdag bcas/ /'di las dngos med
pas rgyal bas/ /rgyal ba'i rdo rjer rnam par bshad/ /lus sogs phyi yi phung por bshad/ /'byung dang 'byung las gyur pa gang / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /'di dag rdo rje'i rigs can 'gyur/ /

dngos po gang dang gang dag gis/ /phung po lnga po brtags gyur pa/ /de rnams de bzhin yang dag dmigs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur/ /ji ltar me long mtshungs gsal ba/ /dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid can/ /
der ni bdag gis bdag mthong ba/ /dkyil 'khor mchog 'gyur rnal 'byor pa/ /phung po de bzhin gshegs grags pa/ /de bzhin nyid las spros bya ba/ /chos kyi sku can rgyal ba yi/ /mchod pa chen por de 'gyur
ro/ /'di ni spros dang bsdus pa dag /de ni dga' bar yongs su bsgrags/ /sems can gang zhig longs spyod cig /de ni gsol 'debs zhes bshad do/ /yang dag shes rab thabs gnyis med/ /mkha' dbyings dbyer

med rab sbyor ba/ /de ni 'dod chags che tshul 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa ni mngon bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje theg pa rnal 'byor che/ /bdag nyid nges par sbyor ba gang / /dngos po thams cad bde skyed pa'i/ /yid bde ba ni skye bar
'gyur/ /zhal gsum rnam thar gsum du gang / /mthong zhing de las phung po sogs/ /lha yi bdag nyid rig 'gyur ba/ /de nyid gsum du bshad pa yin/ /dngos med pa ni lam gyi mchog /mya ngan 'das par gnyis

med 'jug /'on kyang so sor gyur pa de/ /chos kyi sku las zhe sdang gyur/ /bcom ldan bdag po de nyid ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs phyung zhing / /mya ngan 'das tshul rdo rje can/ /de nyid dbang po kun byed pa'o/ /

dam tshig la sogs 'byung ba'i chos/ /rang gis rig par ma gyur kyang / /der ni gnas pa yang dag bshad/ /de ni gti mug de bzhin sems/ /gang gis ji ltar brtags chos kyis/ /longs spyod rdzogs zhes bya byed pa/ /

de ni yid bzhin rin chen 'byung / /rin chen chen po'i rigs kyi gtso/ /de nyid bcom ldan 'dod chags ni/ /kun mkhyen ye shes las byung ba/ /gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor gyur pa/ /'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyi

mchog /ji ltar 'dam gyi pad ma ni/ /de yi nyes pas gos mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor rig pa mchog /'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod/ /'gro ba gcig tu 'dod pa khyab/ /de nyid rdo rje rigs mchog yin/ /chos dang

longs spyod sprul pa ste/ /gsum po de dag mdor bsdus pa'o/ /zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags/ /rdo rje dga' ba'i mtha' can gtso/ /ngan 'gro gsum 'don pas bud med/ /gcig pu yin yang du mar gyur/ /gsum po
yang dag 'dug gyur pa/ /gshin rje shes rab gyur de bzhin/ /pad ma bgegs gyur khro bo ste/ /mthar 'byed mtha' yi ming can no/ /'jug pa la sogs gsum nyid la/ /phung por grags te de bzhin gshegs/ /skrag

byed gshin rje'i gshed kyis kyang / /thams cad 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /rdo rje dam tshig skrag byed pa/ /de bzhin gshegs rab mthar byed gtso/ /pad mo 'ang gsung zhes bya bar gyur/ /'chi bral rnal 'byor
grub pa yin/ /bgegs mthar byed kyang thugs kyi gtso/ /rigs pa'i bdag nyid can bdag po/ /'di ltar rtag spyod rnal 'byor pa/ /gsang ba'i lus kyis rnam par spyod/ /dgongs pa lung ston la gnas par/ /

gang zhig yid ni bzod gyur pa/ /des 'di de bzhin bya ba dang / /de nas gsang ba yang dag bsrung / /nu zho zas kyis bu gso bzhin/ /srid pa gsum na bcom ldan gtso/ /sems can bsam dbang ji bzhin du/ /chos kyi

bdud rtsis tshim par mdzad/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa yi/ /sku gsum gcig tu sbyor ba las/ /bcom ldan gsang ba dgongs mdzad pa/ /bden pa ma yin brdzun pa'ang min/ /zhe sdang gti mug rin chen dang / /
'dod chags sna tshogs rigs byung ba/ /dgongs pa'i rigs kyi brdar gyur pas/ /gleng gzhi yin te dang po'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag la/ /slar yang de bzhin
gshegs kun gyis/ /lhag par mchod pa byas nas ni/ /thub chen de la 'di skad gsol/ /dgongs pa rdo rje dam pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun ye shes/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /gsang ba bcom ldan

bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyis/ /zhu ba yang dag thugs chud cing / /byang chub sems dpa' yongs rtog pa/ /thub nyid kyis ni rnam mkhyen pa/ /de nas byang chub sems kun la/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis de skad gsungs/ /lus sems de dang 'dra ba dang / /de bzhin ngag ni tshig brjod lta'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /khyed kun gyis ni bskyed par bya/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la/ /ston pas ji bzhin

ston par mdzad/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/ /sku dang thugs dang de bzhin gsung / /de 'dra'i tshul du sbyar nas ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /sku gsung thugs rdo rje can la/ /ched du brjod pa ched

du brjod/ /e ma kun du bzang po yi/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung las skyes pa/ /skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /skye ba 'dir ni rab tu bsgrags/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje gsum/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /mngon rdzogs byang chub rdo rje yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /dpal ldan byang chub sems 'di gsungs/ /dngos po med pa'i dngos gnas na/ /dngos dang dngos med gnyis ka min/ /

de ltar dngos po dngos med pas/ /sgom pa dngos por yod ma yin/ /de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /gnyis med dam tshig rdo rje grags/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa kun gyi mchog /gsang ba dgongs pa rdo rje can/ /byang chub sems ni thams cad nas/ /de ni yang dag bka' stsal to/ /dag pa de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /phung po khams sogs rnam spangs shing / /gzung

dang 'dzin pa las grol ba/ /chos bdag med pa'i stong nyid can/ /byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs pa/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung ming can te/ /thog ma med nas ma skyes brda/ /rang sems mnyam pa nyid kyang yin/ /de nas

mi bskyod de bzhin gshegs/ /kun gyi gnyis med mi zad pa'i/ /ye shes ting 'dzin snyoms zhugs te/ /byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po 'di dag ma skyes pas/ /phung por grags pa'i chos nyid med/ /nam

mkha' lta bur blta dka' ba'i/ /bdag med byang chub ces bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan dkon mchog dpal/ /bdag med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /byang chub sems 'di rab tu gsungs/ /

chos rnams thams cad dngos med cing / /chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam spangs pa/ /bdag med chos las yang dag 'byung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /de nas 'od dpag med mtshan can/ /ye shes 'bar ba sgron rdo rje'i/ /

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so/ /ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la/ /dngos po med cing bsgom pa'ang med/ /nam mkha'i gnas su sbyor ba yis/ /dngos po zhes ni rab tu bshad/ /de nas

de bzhin gdon mi za/ /zil gyis gnon pa'i rdo rje yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so/ /chos 'di rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing / /gzod nas dag pas mkha' dang mtshungs/ /

byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med/ /byang chub sems ni yin par bshad/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /byang chub sems ni thos pa dang / /dgongs pa'i don ni rab bshad par/ /rnam par snang mdzad che la
gsungs/ /dngos po med cing dmigs med pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkha' dang mtshungs/ /gsang ba'i tshul ni 'di thos nas/ /dngos po yi ni rtog pa skye/ /lus la sogs pa gsung sbyor bas/ /sems ni

de rnams skyed par byed/ /yang dag byang chub du ma'i mthar/ /'di la so so skye bo smra/ /thub pa'i gsung ni de rnams la/ /rang gi sgra bzhin 'dzin par byed/ /bsam pa'i dbang ni ji bzhin du/ /'gro ba'i don du bka' stsol

cig /de nas bcom ldan bdag po 'di/ /rnam par snang mdzad thub pa che/ /legs shes lan gsum gsungs nas ni/ /lag na rdo rje la 'di gsungs/ /rnam par mi rtog don de nyid/ /rab tu phye ste bshad par bya/ /tshig

tu brjod dang dmigs par bshad/ /brda dang don dam pa yin no/ /rkyen dang nyan thos rnams kyi dang / /mdo dang gsang sngags spyod rnams kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /

de bzhin yang dag sbyor ba 'di/ /dngos po'i gsang ba bla na med/ /gnyis med dam tshig rdo rje dang / /pad ma de las skyed par byed/ /tshig tu brjod pa thun mong ste/ /sangs rgyas sku ni dmigs can yin/ /gsang

sngags de nyid ces bya brda/ /de bzhin nyid ni don dam pa'o/ /dang po gcig ni dgu dbus na/ /gang zhig bcu yis ma bcings pa/ /de ni bcings med shes bya ste/ /de shes pa ni mchog gi gnas/ /dbyangs dang gsal

byed yi ge ste/ /grangs dgu yi ni rjes 'jug pa/ /as bcings phan tshun sbyor ba las/ /gang gis shes te 'gro ba'i bla/ /gang zhig shes pa rnam grol ba/ /'bras bu phun tshogs grub 'dod pa/ /de ni de nyid grub

'dod de/ /gzugs med pas ni gzugs spangs pa/ /'byung ba'i mtha' ni yang dag ldan/ /cha la sogs pa bcu drug gnas/ /lnga pa lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /bzhi ni gsum du nges par sbyar/ /yi ge a~M bcas ring por

bcas/ /yon tan sbyor sogs phyis dang mtshungs/ /thung ngu ma lus ngag tu 'gyur/ /gcig min du ma ma yin no/ /ya yi don gyis gang yang rung / /bya ba'i dngos grub 'dod gyur pa/ /ra la sogs pa gsum nyid kyis/ /

'gro ba'i don la rab tu 'jug /yi ge gang zhig sngar bshad dang / /gang yang mngon du phyogs pa rnams/ /bud med skyes pa ma ning ste/ /khams la sogs par rab tu brtag /'og nas steng du bcas par ni/ /shes rab
blos ni nges par sbyar/ /drug bshad bzhi dang gsum dang gcig /dngos med ngo bo gcig las byung / /de ni ya sogs don sbyar na/ /dus gsum shes pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pas sgyu ma mig 'phrul

bzhin/ /'gro ba rnams ni sgyu mthar bya/ /brjod pa yi ni sngags 'di dag /dngos med ngo bo las byung ba/ /de ni yongs su gyur pa'i gzugs/ /lha ru nye bar mtshon pa gang / /brda yis de nyid gsum gnas pa/ /rang

bzhin bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /ming med brjod du med pa ste/ /byang chub sems mchog 'di yin no/ /gsum po de nyid gcig gyur pa/ /'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med/ /'gag med rab tu zhi ba ste/ /rtag dang chad pa

rnam spangs pa/ /dus gsum mkhyen pas ma byas pa'i/ /rtog pa nam mkha' dbyer med mtshan/ /de nyid kho na don dam ste/ /so so rang rig mtshan nyid do/ /de 'di sems can kun zhes bya'i/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ngo bo nyid/ /

byang chub sems dpa' gcig 'byung yang / /rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin can/ /gang 'di byang chub sems bdag nyid/ /rnal 'byor pa ni nyi 'drar 'gyur/ /'di ni rnam rtog kun bral yang / /rigs kun la ni 'jug par
'gyur/ /sreg dang skems dang bde can dang / /kun zer 'gyur ba'i me bzhin no/ /'di ni lhas kyang mchod bya bar/ /sems can la la rnam par gnas/ /byang chub sems 'dod bdag nyid de/ /'gro ba bu

gcig bzhin lta zhing / /gang zhig bdag dang mnyam gnas pa/ /byams pa chen po de bskyed bya/ /phyin ci ma log 'di mthong nas/ /byang chub sems ni yang dag 'byung / /des ni snying rje cher gyur nas/ /des ni 'khor ba

nges par 'joms/ /sems can kun dang de bzhin bdag /byang chub sems la ma mthong na/ /'on kyang 'gro ba'i don byed pa/ /de las dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/ /'khor ba dngos po yod min la/ /sems can rnams kyang

de dang 'dra/ /byang chub sems ni mthong nas ni/ /btang snyoms chen por gyur pa yin/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /thos pa'i byang chub sems dran zhing / /slar yang de don mtshan nyid ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad che la
zhus/ /'khor dang gcig shos zhes bya ba/ /'di kun byang chub sems yin na/ /ji ltar so sor gyur nas ni/ /phan tshun 'gal bar rab tu gnas/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid la/ /gnyis su 'gog byed gang
yang med/ /gang zhig nor bu gcig las byung / /mi mthun phyogs su ji ltar snang / /dman dang bar ma de bzhin mchog /'khor bar nyon mongs mi bzad pa/ /sems can kha cig gzir ba dang / /byang chub bde la

sbyar bar gyur/ /de lta'i rnam rtog kun rtog par/ /ma 'ongs skye bo bgyid 'gyur gyi/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung las byung ba/ /'di dag 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la/ /byis pa rnams ni

rtsod par 'gyur/ /de rnams rtsod pa med pa'i phyir/ /dgongs pa bshad par mdzad du gsol/ /de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje can la gsang dgongs pa/ /shin du rnyed dka' byang chub sems/ /de ni yang

dag bka' stsal to/ /phyi ma'i mtha' gang stong pa gcig /sngon gyi mthar thug de bzhin te/ /sems de mngon du byas nas ni/ /ci dga' bar ni bya ba yin/ /sems ni de yis ma mthong bas/ /lta ba so sor gyur pa yin/ /

de bas de rnams 'khor ba ru/ /'gro ba drug gi ming du gyur/ /des na tshangs pa khyab 'jug dang / /dbang phyug che la kun du sten/ /zla ba nyi ma bya ba yi/ /kun du spyod pa de rnams byed/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum par bshad dang / /

dga' ldan gyi ni gnas dag dang / /de bzhin gzhan dag dmyal bar yang / /lta bas skad cig dag gis 'gro/ /yi dgas su yang 'gro ba dang / /'gro ba sna tshogs dag tu 'gro/ /gang tshe ma rig kun bsten pas/ /bdag

nyid kyang ni mi shes so/ /'du shes can dang 'du shes med/ /sems can du brtags 'di gnas pa/ /de rnams rlung las byung ba ste/ /rlung las slar yang 'gag pa yin/ /nyin dang mtshan mo'i cha yis kyang / /rang gi rnam par

rtog par lhung / /de nas 'khor bar skrag bzhin du/ /sna tshogs 'gro bar de dag 'gro/ /mi rtog pa yi sems de ni/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gnas gyur kyang / /de ni phyin ci log gyur pas/ /khyi dang ce spyang glang po dang / /sems de ltar

yang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin du ni pha nyid dang / /ma yi rigs ni smyig mkhan dang / /sme sha can dang rigs ngan dang / /bza' dang mi bza' bya kun dang / /byang chub sems de skye bar 'gyur/ /bram ze la sogs 'jig rten shes/ /byang chub

sems las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /phung sogs dngos po med gyur las/ /rang gis myong bar shes par gyur/ /de ni 'jig rten shes zhes bshad/ /kun mkhyen pa ni byang chub sems/ /nye bar dmigs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sangs

rgyas sku ru 'di 'byung ste/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin nyid/ /tshig gis brjod pa tsam du 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje snying po'i don gsungs pa/ /'gro ba'i bla ma gcig pu la/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni slar gsol

pa/ /'jig rten pa yi lung nyid ni/ /byang chub sems ni rab gsungs na/ /ji ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa/ /ma 'ongs pa yis ji ltar rtogs/ /lta ba thams cad rab spangs phyir/ /khyed kyis chos rnams ston mdzad na/ /

ji ltar byang chub sems de nyid/ /lta ba de ni rab brtan 'gyur/ /dgongs pa'i tshig la rmongs pa rnams/ /gsungs pa'i don ni ma rtogs nas/ /gsungs pa 'di las gzhan min zhes/ /de ni ji bzhin sgrar 'dzin to/ /de nas

bcom ldan sna tshogs pas/ /lag na rdo rje la gsungs pa/ /khyed gsung dgongs pa ma rtogs pa/ /dri bar byed pa legs so legs/ /byang chub sems ni rlung gyur cing / /nam mkha' la ni rnam gnas pa/ /sems can

kun gyi srog gyur gang / /lnga yi bdag nyid bcu ming can/ /rten 'brel bcu gnyis zhes grags pa/ /ngo bo nyid rnam gsum du gyur/ /rlung zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems/ /dbang po kun gyi gtso 'di yin/ /ji ltar mi mngon

phra ba las/ /rtag tu gsal bar brjod pa yin/ /'gro ba yul sogs las byed pa/ /'dir ni de la rten pa yin/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /dbang dang de bzhin mngon spyod rnams/ /de nyid gsum gnas la rten nas/ /de
kun byang chub sems kyis byed/ /ji srid 'jig rten gdags pa dang / /de bzhin btags pa sna tshogs rnams/ /rnam rtog byang chub sems shes pa'i/ /rlung las rtag tu 'byung ba yin/ /bde sdug la sogs chos
rnams kyi/ /sa bon lta bur bshad pa yin/ /byang chub sems kyi ngo bo 'di/ /phung sogs gnyis med mkha' dang mnyam/ /shes rab thabs gcig sbyor ba yis/ /byang chub sems ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /klog dang

bsam gtan rnam spangs par/ /bdag por rang nyid zlos pa de/ /nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis/ /nyi zla rab tu sbyor ba yis/ /dngos po med par 'gro khyab pa/ /byang chub sems kyi rlung gcig pu/ /dge dang mi dge 'bras

spangs nas/ /nam mkha' 'dra bar 'gyur ba yin/ /'gro ba'i don ni shes pas kyang / /ming ni de bzhin nyid ces bya/ /dbyangs kyi thung ngu nyin mor bshad/ /ring po mtshan mo yin par bshad/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed dbye

ba yis/ /de nyid ming las sbyar bar bya/ /e ma'o 'gro ba'i bya ba byung / /de nyid gzhan las de nyid gsal/ /de las 'jig rten pa yi brda/ /myur du mngon par shes par 'gyur/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos ni/ /

byang chub sems 'di thos pa dang / /gtso bo rnam snang chen po las/ /khyab bdag la ni slar gsol pa/ /sems can thams cad skyed pa po/ /sna tshogs gzugs can sems 'di ni/ /de bas dngos po med gyur kyang / /srid pa

dag tu rab tu grags/ /byang chub sems ni mkha' mnyam pa/ /legs par rjes su myong mdzad pa/ /'gro ba'i don ni mdzad pa po/ /skye bo mchog la de bstan gsol/ /sgrub pa yi ni thabs tsam zhig /shes nas rgyud la rgyab kyis

phyogs/ /'di ltar bdag ni slob dpon zhes/ /ma 'ongs pa na smra bar 'gyur/ /bdag gi tshig ni 'di nyid dag /yin zhes smra zhing byas pa 'jig /des ni dgongs pa'i byang chub sems/ /ji bzhin don du mi shes so/ /de bzhin

'jig rten pa rnams ni/ /skal med chos kun rnam spangs la/ /rig pa yang ni mi mthong bas/ /de rnams la yang gnas med 'gyur/ /de bas byang chub sems bdud rtsi/ /de ni smra bar rigs pa yin/ /'brel pa'i nyi ma thob pa ni/ /

ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas/ /grags ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa la/ /byang chub sems kyi nges pa'i don/ /slar yang de nyid la gsungs pa/ /nang na ma yin phyi rol min/ /gnyi ga ming du'ang

'gyur ma yin/ /rtag pa ma yin skad cig min/ /de ni so so rang rig yin/ /mi rtog nam mkha' ji bzhin du/ /byang chub sems ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i don/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'byung / /'das

dang ma 'ongs pa nyid dang / /da ltar zhes ni bya ba dang / /sangs rgyas sku yang 'byung 'gyur ba/ /don dam gcig ni kun rdzob yin/ /rig byed dus dang me yi brda/ /nyi zla rlung gi gzugs can te/ /bzhi phyed gsum pa dag

las byung / /byang chub sems gcig dbye ba nyid/ /de ni shes rab thabs zung 'brel/ /de bzhin bde byed 'dzin pa dang / /ha ni so la gnas pa yi/ /gnas skabs ji snyed de bzhin du/ /ming ni yod pa ma yin pa/ /de 'di byang chub

sems su 'gyur/ /rdo rje nang du zhugs gyur pa/ /bsam bya'i snying po'ang de nyid yin/ /lhod pa gnas zhes bya ba ni/ /tsheg drag bcas pa'i rlung yin no/ /rang nyid ldog par byed pa'i mchog /de ni srog dbang yid kyang yin/ /nga rgyal

dang ni de bzhin blo/ /de dang ldan pa byang chub sems/ /bzhir grags cha las yang dag byung / /yod med rab tu zhi ba can/ /dngos po med pa'i sems 'di ni/ /rang rig gcig pu'i yul yin no/ /de nyid don ni rig byed pa/ /dgongs

pas yang dag bshad pa yin/ /de nas gsang ba'i dgongs pa 'di/ /chos kyi yi ge mchog thos nas/ /byams pa zhes la sogs pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /ngo mtshar rmad byung legs skyes nas/ /ched

du brjod pa ched du brjod/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas e ma'o chos/ /e ma'o chos ni ston mdzad pa/ /dngos kun dag pa'i don gcig pu/ /dag pa de nyid don dag ster/ /rnam par mi rtog mkha' mtshungs bshad/ /byang chub sems la phyag

'tshal lo/ /bdag med chos las yang dag byung / /byang chub tshogs ni rdzogs byed pa/ /ngo bo med cing dmigs su med/ /byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun bzang gcig las yang dag byung / /dgongs don

byang chub ster ba po/ /byang chub spyod mchog rdo rje mchog /byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa/ /rdo rje gsum ni rang bzhin gcig /byang

chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgongs pa lung ston la dad par/ /gang gang yid ni bzod gyur pa/ /dam tshig gsum gyis rdo rje las/ /des ni de bzhin bya ba yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje gsum gyi
gsang ba las/ /yang dag byang chub sems bshad pa/ /le'u gnyis pa yin par bshad// // de nas de nyid gsang rdo rje/ /gsum dang tshul gsum lam gsum mchog /rnam

thar gsum dang dkon mchog gsum/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun bkod pa/ /'phro ba'i sprin gyi rdo rje can/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin la gsungs/ /rdo rje

bkod pa mchog 'di yi/ /le'u brtul zhugs bzang po nyon/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /phra mo rnal 'byor dag la bzhugs/ /oM ni gcig dang yang dag ldan/ /shU n+ya tA ni gnyis pa ste/ /dz+nyA na zhes ni gsum pa

yin/ /rdo rje bya ba bzhi pa'o/ /swa b+hA wAt+ma kaHlnga pa/ a ha~M zhes pa drug par brjod/ /de ltar bde gshegs drug po ni/ /skye bo mchog la bstan pa yin/ /oM shU n+ya tA zung dang po/ /dz+nyA na badzra gnyis pa yin/ /swa b+hA

wAt+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M gyur/ /de nyid gsum ni 'dir brtags pa'o/ /de nyid gsum ni gcig gyur par/ /mi gsal gsal ba'i ming can no/ /mkha' dbus sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni/ /'od zer sprin gyi tshogs chen po/ /yi ge ma

yi 'od kyis khyab/ /kun nas yongs su zlum po'o/ /'dod yon lnga yis kun du khyab/ /mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa/ /mdor na de ltar bsgoms nas su/ /dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad

phyag rgya mchog /de nyid gsum gyi rdo rje mtshan/ /yang na rdo rje gsum mgon gyi/ /phyag rgya yang ni rnam par bsgom/ /mi bskyod pa yi phyag rgya che/ /tshogs ni gnyis med sbyor ba dang / /dkon mchog dpal gyi rgya

chen dang / /tshe dpag med pa'i 'od byed dang / /de bzhin don yod gzugs can rgya/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom/ /rdo rje gsum gcig rdo rje can/ /in dra nI la'i mdog 'dra ba/ /rab 'bar phyag na rdo rje

bsnams/ /rnam par gtsigs pa 'jigs 'jigs lta'i/ /'dzam bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis rab tu 'khrigs/ /de yi phyag na rdo rje che/ /rtse mo dgu pa rnam par bsgom/ /shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba/ /

thor tshugs cod pan dag gis brgyan/ /rab 'bar lag na 'khor lo bsnams/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /mar ka ta'i 'od 'dra ba/ /rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan/ /'bar zhing 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis

khyab/ /rin chen de la rnam par bsgom/ /'dod chags chen po rdo rje can/ /pad ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra zhing / /thor tshugs cod pan dag gis brgyan/ /phyag na pad ma bsnams par bsgom/ /sna tshogs rdo rje gdon mi za/ /

'od chen sna lnga'i 'od 'dra ba/ /zhi ba sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor du/ /phyag na ral gri bsnams par bsgom/ /de ltar rnal 'byor bshad pa dag /gsang ba'i bdag pos thos nas ni/ /phra mo'i rnal 'byor cha dag kyang / /
de bzhin gshegs bdag la zhus pa/ /phung po khams sogs sbyor ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal na/ /mkha' dbus sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor du/ /de rnams kyang ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /gcig shos phyi

rol du bsgom pa/ /dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas ming can ni/ /dngos po med pa'i dngos po la/ /sgom pa po rnams ji ltar brtag /mgon po phra mo'i rnal 'byor 'di/ /dkyil 'khor gang zhig bka' stsol zhes/ /gang zhig ma

'ongs pa rnams ni/ /'di ltar mchog tu'ang som nyi 'tshal/ /lag na rdo rje grags ldan pa/ /phra mo'i rnal 'byor de nyid skyes/ /'gro ba gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ /phra ba dgongs pas gsungs pa yin/ /rnam lnga mngon par

byang chub 'di/ /ma 'ongs skye bo'i rgyur gyur pa/ /chos ni yang dag sdud gyur gang / /ji lta ji ltar ston par byed/ /phung po nyid ni sangs rgyas gyur/ /byang chub don gyi rkyen las byung / /de yang de bzhin gshegs bshad pa/ /
