de nyid gnyis med sbyor bas so/ /ston dang 'jog pa po 'di ni/ /blo yi dngos grub ston pa po/ /thog mtha' med pa rnal 'byor ni/ /phra mo zhes ni bya bar brtag /mi gsal gsal bar yang dag sbyor/ /dngos med ngo

bo las skyes pa'o/ /gzod ma nyid nas rab grub pa/ /gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa/ /rten 'brel chos zhes grags pa ste/ /dngos po thams cad gcig tu byung / /bdag nyid 'di 'drar byas nas ni/ /chos kyi dkyil

'khor yang dag bris/ /dmar dang nag dang de bzhin ser/ /dkar po nyid ni mdo ru ste/ /bzhi bzhi gcig tu sbyor ba yang / /gos dkar la sogs yang dag bri/ /de rnams dbus su lha mor bcas/ /zhi sbyor mchog dang

mchog min can/ /steng dang thad ka mnyam dang 'og /ji lta ji ltar gos dkar sogs/ /me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang / /chu ste so so'i dkyil 'khor la/ /bcwa brgyad dag tu yang dag bshad/ /de yang 'di nyid dag la
bshad/ /ji ltar 'o ma khyad par ni/ /mar sar gnas par gyur pa yin/ /de bzhin gos dkar la sogs la/ /zhi ba nyid ni de gnas so/ /gzugs la sogs pa nang gi chos/ /mthong ba de ni lhag mthong yin/ /mi
bskyod la sogs grangs ji bzhin/ /rtog pa dag ni zhi gnas yin/ /'di gnyis dngos po med pa'i bdag /de bzhin nyid ni zhi zhes bya/ /de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gzhug par
bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yi dbugs rngub dbyung / /sbyor ba de nyid gcig pa nyid/ /shes rab thabs la gnas nas ni/ /sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas/ /bya ba thams cad nyid du yang / /rnal 'byor rig pas
nyal sogs la/ /ming mang brjod du med pa dang / /dus gsum 'das pa rtag tu bzla/ /gos dkar la sogs bzlas bshad pa/ /brgya phrag gnyis dang nyi shu lnga/ /bzhi pa legs par bsgres pa yis/ /

sbyor bzhis bsdus pa brgya phrag dgu/ /dgu brgya dag tu gang bstan pa/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rim gyis ni/ /de ni so sor 'byung ba las/ /nyi khri gcig stong drug brgya'o/ /de 'dir gsang ba dgongs pa yis/ /phra mo'i
rnal 'byor bstan pa yin/ /klog dang bsam gtan med mod kyi/ /'on kyang bzlas pa yin par bshad/ /de ltar rnam pa mang po yi/ /'gro la phan pa'i gsung thos nas/ /de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po la/ /

rdo rje can gyis slar yang zhus/ /gang zhig bsgoms na ma 'ongs 'gro/ /thams cad mi rtog par 'gyur ba/ /rdo rje gsum gyi snying po mchog /snying po bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /de nyid gsum nyid mang sbyor ba/ /

de ni phra mo'i rdo rje bsgom/ /myur ba la sogs gsum spangs pa'i/ /rnal 'byor par yang bdag cag 'gyur/ /de ni bdag rig yid ches shing / /zhi ba nyid ni mi shes 'gyur/ /phra mo'i rnal 'byor gtso spangs te/ /log

pa'i rnal 'byor kun du sten/ /ston pa po yi sbyor smra zhing / /phra mo zhes bya de nyid ni/ /ma 'ongs dus na spong 'gyur ba/ /de nyid de ni nges par byed/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin smra ba'i/ /lung bstan pa ni gsan pa dang / /de bzhin

gshegs pa kun bdag po/ /chos dbyings ngo bo nyid ces bya'i/ /ting nge 'dzin de kun nas ni/ /snyoms par zhugs pa nyid du mdzad/ /dpal ldan snyoms par zhugs mdzad nas/ /gsang sngags 'di ni bka' stsal to/ /

sku gsung thugs ni rdo rjer bshad/ /khyad par du ni byin rlob pa/ /gnyis med rdo rje gsum sbyor bas/ /de ni yang dag bshad par bya/ /oM ni dang por shes par bya/ /d+harma zhes bya gnyis pa'o/ /d+hA tu zhes bya gsum par

bshad/ /swa b+hA bor grags bzhi pa'o/ /Ad ma kaHni lnga pa yin/ /a ha~M du gyur drug par 'dod/ /sngags 'di brjod nas de 'og tu/ /bsgom pa bdag nyid can gyis bsgom/ /rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa/ /yungs

kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsam/ /nyams dga' ri rab rtse mo ru/ /rnal 'byor pa yi rtag par bsgom/ /rin chen mi g.yor gyur nas spro/ /mi g.yor ma gyur spro mi bya/ /sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od 'dra ba/ /mchog rab sprin rnams

spro bar bya/ /'khor lo rdo rje sprin chen dang / /pad ma ral gri mtshon cha mchog /byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rnams/ /spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro/ /phra mo dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje dkyil

'khor bsgom par bya/ /bzlas dang bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yang / /pad ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom/ /rin chen lta bu'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dngos la brtson pas rin chen bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las byung ba/ /

nam mkha'i dkyil du bri bar bya/ /'di dag sangs rgyas rab mchog gi/ phra mo rdo rje gsum bsgrub pa'o/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul thob pa'o/ /dgongs pa gsang ba zhes pa yi/ /

lung ston dam pa 'di la ni/ /gang gis sems ni bzod gyur pa/ /de ni de bzhin byed pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /rdo rje phra mo de nyid las/ /'di ni rdo rje bkod pa'i mchog /le'u gsum pa nyid
yin no// // de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad/ /gnyis su med par gyur nas ni/ /slar yang rdo rje gsum bdag la/ /bstod pas de rnams gsol ba 'debs/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyis/ /zhi ba gnas rnams mchog gyur pa/ /chos kun gcig tu bdag med pa/ /dkyil 'khor mchog 'di bshad du gsol/ /yongs su rdzogs par yang dag brgyan/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis
mtshan pa'o/ /kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /ye shes spyod pa'i don las byung / /zhi ba'i chos ni sbyong ba po/ /dngos mchog dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol/ /rang bzhin
gyis ni dri med dag /sems ni kun du bzang po nyid/ /sems can kun gcig che ba'i mchog /dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol/ /de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das/ /khams gcig khams ni gsum pa po/ /'jig
rten gsum mchog rdo rje mchog /'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa po/ /nyams dga' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun dag la/ /thugs de dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ste/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa
bka' stsal to/ /de nas sems kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /rdo rje ye shes rab 'dra ba/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi/ /dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad par bya'o/ /'di ni gsang ba'i bdag nyid mchog /legs

bsgril de bzhin nyid bstan pa'o/ /sna tshogs lung gi mtshan ma ni/ /tshad ma bzang por de bshad do/ /kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag /gnyis su med pa mdzes pa yin/ /shes rab 'di ni thig yin te/ /thabs ni de yi rjes
'jug pa'o/ /shes rab thabs kyi thig gcig gis/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs mchog ni/ /sems kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab ste/ /rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis pa/ /'phags pa'i bden bzhi ngos bzhi ste/ /

tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi grwa bzhi yin/ /bsdu ba'i dngos grags sgo yin te/ /re re'ang bzhi bzhi ming can no/ /chos kyi de nyid don gyi brda/ /'khor lo nang gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /mi phyed ye shes mtshan ma de/ /rdo rje in

dra nI la rgya/ /rnam pa lnga yis rab bye ba'i/ /rtse mo 'khor ba 'jig byed pa'o/ /shar nas me long ngo bo ni/ /'khor lo 'bar ba'i 'od kyis brgyan/ /lho ru kun mnyam ye shes yin/ /gcig gi ming can rin po che/

/nub tu so sor rtog pad ma/ /pad ma rA ga'i 'od 'dra ba/ /byang du gong ma'i sems gang yin/ /'gro ba'i rnam rtog 'joms byed pa/ /bya ba sgrub pa ral grir 'gyur/ /'od 'phro 'bar ba 'dra ba'i mdog /shar lho byams

pa'ang spyan yin te/ /sprin sngon dang ni mnyam pa'i 'od/ /lho nub snying rje zhes bya ba/ /mA ma kI ni rigs rdo rje/ /nub byang pad ma zhes bya ba/ /dga' ba legs par gnas pa bzhin/ /byang shar ud pal ltar

snang ba'i/ /btang snyoms bcas pa sngon po 'dra/ /de bzhin shar sgor sbyin pa ni/ /tho ba mdangs ldan 'od dang bcas/ /de bzhin snyan smra zhes grags pa/ /dbyig pa 'od bzang rdo rje 'bar/ /nub tu don spyod ces bya ba/ /

rta mgrin gyi ni pad ma'o/ /don mthun pa ni rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje 'khyil pa'i rdo rje can/ /phyag rgya dgod pa'i mtshan nyid de/ /'di ni legs par bshad pa yin/ /ji ltar dbyibs kyis mchod pa ni/ /rnam gsum bsgom pas

'gyur ba yin/ /dang por chen po yod pa yi/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad/ /de ltar mkha' dang mtshungs gyur dang / /shes nas 'gro la phan par 'gyur/ /rdo rje gsum dang lhan cig 'byung / /de tshe zla zer phreng

ba yi/ /skad cig la sogs dus dbye bas/ /lo grangs bcu drug pa yi ming / /ma skyes par 'byung zhi ba ni/ /bud med ces ni nges par bshad/ /zhi ba'i chos dang rjes dran pa/ /mdangs bzangs 'od ni yin par gsungs/ /

rten 'brel bag chags dri yin te/ /ye shes kha bye me tog go/ /dngos po med pa rigs yin te/ /kun mkhyen ye shes dbus nyid do/ /chos dbyings nyid kyi bud med ni/ /shes rab 'di 'dras mnyes par bya/ /nang na ma
yin phyi ma yin/ /gnyi gar ma yin gzhan nas min/ /gnas med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyur/ /de bas mA ma kIr bshad do/ /de yi ngo bo nyid gcig pa/ /byin gyis brlabs pas de bshad do/ /nam mkha' dang ni
gcig tu mtshungs/ /sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas su 'gyur/ /de bas yul du rnam brtags pa/ /bsdu ba dag ni bshang ba yin/ /ye shes dbang po stong pa gci/ /rnam dag chos nyid khu ba yin/ /thams

cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khrag /rang bzhin chos su yongs brtags pa/ /de nyid lha rnams zhes bya ste/ /dngos med pa ni dbul ba yi/ /de byas sangs rgyas sras po rnams/ /khyad par du ni mnyes par 'gyur/ /gang

yang 'jig rten pas brtags pa/ /de rnams ji skad bshad pa nyid/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms pa/ /sar pa nyid du bkal legs dang / /shin du tshad ldan mdzes pa yi/ /thig gis mkhas pas thig gdab bo/ /blo ldan

dkyil 'khor brtag bya ba/ /khru ni bcu gnyis tshad tsam la/ /ngos bzhi dang ni grwa bzhir ldan/ /rta babs kyis ni mdzes par bya/ /de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni/ /dgongs pas dang po bshad pa ste/ /de las bzlog pa'i tshul

gyis ni/ /'di na 'jig rten pa rnams rtog /gang zhig 'jig rten 'das la gnas/ /de ni gzungs kyis dbang bskur ba/ /dngos med pa ni 'dzin pa dag /yid ni rtag tu mkha' dang mtshungs/ /dam pa 'jig rten shin du 'das/ /

'khor ba dang ni gcig shos spangs/ /len pa ma yin gtong ba min/ /med pa ma yin gnas ma yin/ /blo ldan kun du 'di shes pa/ /rnal 'byor thams cad rig pa mchog /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor le'u 'di ni/ /nges pa'i

rnal 'byor pa zhes bshad/ /dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong la/ /gang zhig yid ni bzod gyur na/ /de rnams shes rab thabs dag ni/ /ji ltar gnas pa de ltar byed/ /gsang ba'i dgongs pa lung bstan las/ /de las
thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /le'u ste bzhi pa nyid yin no// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog /rdo rje gsung gtso 'gro ba'i bla/ /slar yang rdo rje 'dzin pa la/ /sngags spyod don gyi de nyid

zhus/ /sngags kyi brtul zhugs spyod pa gcig /khyad par du ni bsrung bslab pa/ /de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa'i gsung / /spyod pa bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /de nas bdag po de bzhin gshegs/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa dag gi tshig /
gsan nas 'gro ba'i don gcig pu/ /gsungs pa'i don can bka' stsal to/ /mi rtog don las yang dag byung / /zhe sdang la 'jug mtshan nyid yin/ /dngos med la gnas gti mug ste/ /'dod chags 'dod chags las

byung ba/ /'dod chags ldan pa'i ming can yin/ /theg pa mchog ni bla med pa/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste/ /'di dag rigs su yang dag bshad/ /dngos grub de ni 'di bsgrub po/ /rigs ngan myur bar shes par bya/ /
smyig mkhan dag ni dal ba yin/ /mtshams med byed pa gnyi ga ste/ /gsod pa don gnyer sems pa po/ /theg pa chen po bla med pa'i/ /theg pa mchog 'di 'grub par 'gyur/ /sems can sdig chen byas pa dang / /
gzhan yang mtshams med byed pa po/ /gang yang slob dpon smod pa yis/ /bsgrubs kyang grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di nyid dad pas myur du ni/ /zhe sdang dag la gnas pas gnas/ /gang gis phung sogs dngos med

par/ /zhi gnas las byung sems kyis byas/ /de ni srog gcod byed pa ste/ /theg pa mchog la gnas pa yin/ /nang dang de bzhin phyi rol dag /rten 'byung gnyis su ston pa ni/ /de ni brdzun smra dga' ba ste/ /
gnas med la gnas rnal 'byor pa'o/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang / /de ni rdzas su shes bya ste/ /de 'phrog ngang tshul gang yin pa/ /gzhan gyi nor la chags par 'dod/ /gang zhig de nyid dngos
gcig pa/ /de bzhin nyid la rtogs sbyor ba/ /sems can de de 'dod la dga'/ /bsgrub pa mchog la dam par 'gyur/ /de yi stong nyid gti mug la/ /yul ni bshang ba zhes grags te/ /dbang po gci ba zhes

bya la/ /de dag zhi ba za ba yin/ /theg pa chen po chos mchog 'dir/ /de dag bsgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur/ /de dag tshe brdzun 'dod pa dang / /bshang gci zas su byed pa po/ /shes rab pha rol phyin shes rab/ /

chos kyi sku ni ma gcig pu/ /gnyis med de bzhin nyid sbyor ba/ /dngos med ces bya 'dod spyod pa/ /longs spyod rdzogs dang mnyam gang yin/ /de nyid sring mo yin par 'dod/ /rang lha'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/ /
gsang sngags lus kyis mnyes par bya/ /bshang gci zas su byed pa yi/ /sprul sku'i gzugs can bu mo de/ /sgrub pa pos ni bsgom par bya/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo ni/ /'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas mnyes byas/ /

theg pa mchog gi chos nyid la/ /dngos grub rgya chen des thob po/ /ji ltar mi rtog nam mkha' ni/ /kun du khyab par gnas gyur pa/ /'di ni sgom pa zhes bshad de/ /ting 'dzin bsam khyab ces bya ba/ /de nyid

'jig rten par byung ba/ /rtog pa dga' ba'i ming can no/ /sangs rgyas yum gyi ye shes la/ /'dod spyod gos par mi 'gyur te/ /rnam par mi rtog sbyor gcig gis/ /myur du sangs rgyas des thob 'gyur/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das gsung ni/ /sgrib kun sel ba la sogs pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches/ /thos nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur/ /'di ni bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa kun gyi bdag /ci yi slad du tshig ngan pa/ /de bzhin gshegs 'khor nang du gsung / /'dod chags bral dang chags bcas dang / /gti mug bral ba rmongs bcas dang / /zhe sdang bral ba sdang
bcas pa'i/ /rigs kyi dngos grub ston mdzad cing / /gang gzhan sdig pa'i nyes pa dang / /'tshe ba la sogs yongs spangs pa/ /'dir ni de byed sems can rnams/ /snod yin zhes ni thub gsung ngam/ /
de nas mgon po thugs rje can/ /sems can kun la phan dgyes pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' la gsungs pa/ /'di ni sa khams dang mnyam pa/ /sems can kun
'dzin gcig pu pa/ /chu khams rtog dang bral ba po/ /sna tshogs gsal bar 'gyur ba yin/ /bdag po me yi gzugs can te/ /thams cad za bar nye bar sbyor/ /de bzhin phyi nang bdag nyid mchog /'gro la

gos pa'i dri gcig pu/ /bcom ldan sna tshogs nam mkha' mtshungs/ /thams cad snang zhing zab pa po/ /de nyid bdag nyid bdag yin par/ /bsgoms na rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur/ /snying po zhes bya sangs rgyas

kyi/ /chos nyid dag pa 'di yin zhing / /sngags kyi spyod don spyod rnams kyi/ /byang chub spyod pa'i mchog 'di yin/ /de nas brjod mi lang zhes pa/ /brjod mi lang ba nyid gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas zhing rdul grangs mnyam de/ /
sgrib pa thams cad sel la sogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /kun nas 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de thams cad/ /gcig tu brgyal ba nyid gyur to/ /de nas gsang dbang
rdo rje gsung / /gnyis med de bzhin gshegs kun gyis/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyal ba ru/ /gzigs nas gtso la 'di skad gsol/ /mgon po sgrib kun sel la sogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /

rang bzhin chos nyid ji lta bar/ /'di rnams bslang bar mdzad du gsol/ /mi g.yo ba ni gsang ba ste/ /zhi ba gcig pu bde ba'i mchog /rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob byed pa/ /'di ni dgongs pas gsungs pa yin/ /

dngos po med cing 'khrug pa med/ /yid 'ong rdo rje tshig gcig pu/ /'gro ba'i bsam pa'i dbye ba yis/ /bye brag mang por gyur pa yin/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas sbyor ba yis/ /gzugs la sogs pa mtha' yas te/ /
de yang de bzhin gshegs mchog dang / /byang chub sems dpa' nyid du gyur/ /de las spro zhing bsdu ba dang / /zhi ba nyid las rab sbyor bas/ /ye shes lus can ye shes can/ /brgyal lo zhes ni shes

pa ni/ /yan lag dbye ba gang dang gang / /'gro ba zhes ni grags bdag pa/ /de de rang lha'i sbyor ba las/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor rang lus gang yin pa/ /de nyid bsdus pa 'di lta bu/ /
'di ni 'jig tshogs lus rtog la/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyal bar gyur/ /des ni bden 'di ma shes pas/ /dbyangs bcas rgyal la bskul ba ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /brgyal ba

zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /de nas gsung ba rdo rje gsum/ /dgongs pa'i tshig gis bshad pa dag /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshig gsan nas/ /ting nge 'dzin ni mngon du mdzad/ /gnyis su med par mnyam rdo rje/ /'gro la
gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i/ /'di nyid gsum yul 'jig pa po/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ /mgon po snyoms par zhugs pa yis/ /'od gang chen por gyur pa yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' nges
reg pas/ /rang gi stan la gnas par gyur/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /ngo mtshar rmad du gyur spyan dang / /dgyes shing mgu ba skyes gyur nas/ /chos kyi dbyangs ni 'di skad gsungs/ /e ma'o chos
e ma'o chos/ /e ma'o chos kyi don byung ba/ /bdag med chos ni yang dag dag /chos kyi rgyal po phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje gsung gcig dag pa'i don/ /dri med mkha' dang mnyam pa'o/ /mi 'gyur don las yang
dag byung / /rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub mchog gcig pu de bzhin gshegs/ /dus gsum dag gi lam du byung / /rdo rje dbyings gcig rdzogs longs spyod/ /nam mkha'i lam gcig phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku

gsung thugs ni nam mkha' ste/ /spyod pa'i mchog ste chos gcig ldan/ /de nyid gsum ston sna tshogs pa/ /spyod pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas/ /gang zhig spyod mchog 'di

ston pa/ /gsang ba yang dag srung ba dag /de ni ci dga' bar yang byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje mchog /sngags rnams kun gyi dam pa yi/ /spyod pa'i le'u lnga pa yin// //
de nas dpal chen mi bskyod pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba can/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /thugs byin brlab pa zhes bya ba'i/ /gsang sngags 'di ni gsungs pa yin/ /oM zhes bya ba

dang por yin/ /sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis/ /tsit+ta gsum par yongs su brtag /badzra lnga pa yi gong mar ldan/ /swa b+hA bAt+ma kaHlnga pa/ /a ha~M dus kyi ming can yin/ /sku drug gsum pa'i ming can no/ /de nas dpal

ldan rnam snang mdzad/ /rdul phran rdo rje zhes bya yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /sku ni byin gyis brlab pa gsung / /oM zhes bya ba tshangs par bshad/ /sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis/ /kA ya chags thogs dbang

phyug ste/ /badzra rig byed yin par bsgrags/ /swa b+hA bAt+ma kaH'dod lha/ /a ha~M skem byed ces brjod de/ /dgongs pa yis ni yang dag brtags/ /shes rab dbye bas dbye bar bya/ /de nas tshe dpag med ces pa'i/ /

kun tu mi gnyis rdo rje can/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /gsung ni byin gyis rlob pa gsungs/ /oM ni dang por bsgrags pa yin/ /sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis/ /wAka ces bya ba gsum pa yin/ /badzra dus

kyi ming du 'gyur/ /swa b+hA bat+ma kaHlnga pa/ /a ha~M zhes pa drug pa ste/ /gsum po 'di dag bshad pa rnams/ /re re zhing drug gsum du bshad/ /thugs dang sku dang de bzhin gsung / /rim ni rim pa min pas

gsungs/ /bdag po las ni gcig pu las/ /rdo rje gsum zhes bya ba 'byung / /yon tan chos 'di rdo rje gsung / /de nyid gsum gyi dam tshig mchog /de bas 'di ni bsgom pa mchog /g.yel ba med par rdzogs par bya/ /'di

bshad pa yi blo ldan pa/ /rab mchog rdo rje gsum byung bas/ /bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyur cing / /sngags kyi mtshan nyid mtshan mar bya/ /de nas dkon mchog dpal 'di yang / /sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

zhugs te/ /de nas gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM ni zung gi dang por ldan/ /sarba ta thA ga ta zung / /de bzhin nyid ni ye shes tshogs/ /thams cad me long ming can no/ /a nu rA ga skye med de/ /de ni gsum pa yin par gsungs/ /rkyen

dang nyan thos kyis bshig dka'i/ /badzra yang ni bzhi par gyur/ /dngos med bdag nyid can ye shes/ /swa b+hA bAt+ma kaHzhes bshad/ /ye shes lnga po nyid kyi ming / /chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid/ /a ha~M so so rdzogs longs spyod/ /dngos

po med pa'i rang bzhin can/ /bde ba chen po'i ming gyur pa/ /mtshon pa drug pa'i ming can no/ /dngos med gnas pa'i bdag nyid can/ /de yi rjes su mnyes bya'i mchog /de lta'i chags pas de bzhin gshegs/ /mgon po thams cad

mnyes par bya/ /de nas dpal chen gdon mi za/ /don yod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /des ni gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM zhes bya ba dang por ldan/ /sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis/ /pU dza rnam par thar

pa'i ming / /badzra sems ni rnam bsgom pa/ /swa b+hA bAt+ma kaHzhes bshad/ /a ha~M pha rol phyin zhes bya/ /lnga po drug dang gsum du bshad/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro/ /reg bya dang ni chos kyi dbyings/ /de dag dngos med gyur byas pa/ /

de ni sangs rgyas mchod mchog yin/ /mig sogs shes las yang dag byung / /mngon shes lnga yis nye bar mdzes/ /mchod pa lnga bshad 'di rnams kyis/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /

so sor byang chub ston mdzad pa/ /rdo rje gsum rig gsang dbang po/ /thub pa chen pos yang gsungs pa/ /sku gsung thugs la dmigs pa la/ /gang tshe yid ni mgu gyur pa/ /de nyid gsum la nyer sbyor ba/ /dngos grub rab

mchog des thob 'gyur/ /bdag med par ni sems dmigs shing / /lus dang ngag kyang rnam par bsgom/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gnas bsgom zhing / /sbyor ba rnam gsum rdzogs par bya/ /rdo rje de nyid gsum dmigs na/ /

shin tu phra ba'ang yod ma yin/ /sngags kyi rang bzhin sbyor ba yis/ /bsgom pa med cing byang chub med/ /rdo rje gsum gcig mtshan nyid du/ /mdor na rnam par brtags nas su/ /sngags la sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ /gnas
la gnas med bsgom par bya/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs dbang po'ang / /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod/ /kun mkhyen sangs rgyas kun mchog gis/ /bsgom pa'i mchog 'di bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings

kyi dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas/ /phra mo'i rnal 'byor brtsam par bya/ /yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsam/ /sna yi rtse mo'i bdag nyid can/ /rgyu dang mi rgyur yang
dag ldan/ /de ru gnas par mkhas pas bsam/ /blo ldan ye shes kyis brtags pa'i/ /gsang ba'i ye shes gnas bsgom mo/ /gsang ba mchog ces bshad pa ste/ /de nyid gsum ni dam tshig mchog /nam mkha'i dbyings

kyi dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma zhes bya'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms te/ /de yi steng du gnas gzhag go/ /dbang phyug chen po skem byed de/ /gzhi phyed nam mkhas mtshon pa dag /bdud rtsi zhes ni

btags pa gang / /de ni hU~M zhes bya bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /'khor lo dkyil 'khor yid 'ong bsgom/ /spyan gyi gzugs su yang dag sbyor/ /rdo rje pad mo gnyis bsgom pa'o/ /nam mkha'i dbyings
kyi dbus gnas par/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /dang po'i sbyor ba nan tan gyis/ /de yi steng du rnam par bsgom/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid bsgom/ /

sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas 'god pa/ /'khor rnams kyis ni kun nas bskor/ /uta pal mthon ka'i mdog 'dra ba/ /rtse mo lnga pa 'od po che/ /nas kyi 'bru tsam nan tan gyis/ /ri rab rtse mor rnam par bsam/ /tsa na ka yi

'bru tshad tsam/ /'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas/ /sna yi rtse mo ri rab rtse/ /byang chub 'dod pas 'di bsgom bya/ /'khor lo la sogs bsgom pa ni/ /de yi khyad par dag tu brtags/ /yid 'ong dngos grub kun gyi gnas/ /

byang chub gnas mchog bla med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas yang dag byang chub bzhugs/ /mdor na de ni spro bar bya/ /gang tshe chos ni legs mtshan pa/ /rdo rje gcig ni bsgom par bya/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs dbang po/ /dag pa chos
rnams kun gyi mchog /'gro kun don du ston pa po/ /gsung bas mchog ni bka' stsal to/ /skad cig thang cig yud tsam dang / /zla phyed zla ba lo yi dus/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum po ni/ /skad cig gcig tu
mnyam par bshad/ /zla ba drug bshad de nyid yin/ /dngos med rdzogs par longs spyod pa'o/ /skad cig gcig tu bsngags pa ste/ /dus gsum las 'das yin par dgongs/ /gzugs dang sgra dang ror ldan pa/ /rnal

'byor pas ni zla drug bsgom/ /mchod chen de ni byas nas su/ /gsang ba'i de nyid rnam par bsgom/ /yul dang dbang po sems dpa' ni/ /bshang gci zas su byed pa po/ /byas na de 'dra'i dngos grub ni/ /bza' ba rnam

rtog med pa'o/ /de nyid 'di ni bla med pa/ /byang chub sems gcig las byung ba'o/ /rtog med 'dus ni ma byas shing / /mi rtog don ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /ma ni mA ma kIr bshad de/ /sa ni mngon par byang chub pa'o/ /

bsam gtan de ni dga' spyod pa/ /sha zhes bya bar de bshad do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor ni/ /sha chen de ni yin par bshad/ /gsang ba pa yi go 'phang mchog /rdo rje gsum ni myur du 'grub/ /dam tshig chen
po glang chen rta/ /de bzhin khyi la sogs pa'i sha / phung po la sogs rigs dbye bas/ /gang gsungs mnyam pa'i grangs kyis so/ /gang zhig rnal 'byor gnyis med zas/ /bsam gtan dga' ba'i mid gcig pu/ /

'jig rten rgyang pan 'jig rten pa/ /bza' ba'i rang gi ngo bor gyur/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rtag pa dang / /de bzhin drod gsher las skyes pa/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /'di dag zas su kun du bshad/ /

de nas rdo rje gsum dgongs pa/ /bcom ldan 'das las thos pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po/ /lag na rdo rjes tshig gsol pa/ /nyan thos rnams kyi dam tshig kyang / /phra mo'i rnal 'byor ston mdzad

cing / /mgon khyod 'jig rten pa dang ni/ /'jig rten 'das pa dag kyang gsungs/ /chu dang 'o ma gcig 'gyur bzhin/ /khyod ni chos rnams ston par mdzad/ /'jig rten 'ga' las yang dag pa/ /ngang pas 'o ma ji bzhin

len/ /ji ltar skom pas gdungs pa yi/ /skyes bu la la de bsres 'thung / /de bzhin 'jig rten shin tu 'das/ /chos kyi bdud rtsi de rnams 'thung / /dgongs pas sngags kyi de nyid du/ /gang zhig gsum du gsungs pa
'di/ /ji lta ji ltar 'jig rten sogs/ /mgon po gsal bar bshad du gsol/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog gis/ /grags ldan lag na rdo rje la/ /bu khyod legs so cher legs te/ /bye brag gsum khyod

la bshad bya/ /rkyen dang nyan thos zhes grags dang / /de bzhin mdo sde la spyod rnams/ /'di dag 'jig rten pa rnams te/ /bya ba sbyor ba'i bya bar gnas/ /rnal 'byor grub nas 'jig rten gnas/ /'jig rten 'das par
gyur pa yin/ /de ni ting 'dzin rnal 'byor yang / /de dang 'dra bar byed ma yin/ /gang yang 'jig rten shin du 'das/ /rnam par mi rtog 'jigs med pa/ /de ni de bzhin nyid dngos gcig /'khor ba dang ni
gcig shos spangs/ /brtul zhugs bzang po'i rnal 'byor 'dis/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes 'gyur zhing / /blo ldan byang chub sems rnams kyis/ /byang chub myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ /'dod khams kyi

ni dbang phyug dang / /rnal 'byor go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur/ /gzi ldan stobs kyis phyug pa dang / /mdangs bzang mthong na dga' ba dang / /mthong ngam tshig gis bskul ba yis/ /'jig rten 'di dag dbang du byed/ /gsang

ba 'di ni mchog yin te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub dam pa yin/ /de nyid sngags kyi gsang ba 'di/ /rdo rje gsum las 'das pa'i mchog /dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong la/ /skyes bu gang zhig gnas gyur pa/ /gsang
ba yang dag srung ba po/ /de rnams ci dgar byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs kun dam pa ste/ /dam tshig las ni dam tshig mchog /rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlab pa'i/ /le'u drug pa yin par bshad// //

de nas rdo rje gsum gsang dbang / /dam tshig chen po de nyid gcig /ting 'dzin gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog /mngon rdzogs byang chub 'di gsungs so/ /de nyid dam tshig bzhi po gang / /'dod pa thams cad ces de bshad/ /

de rnams longs spyod ldan pa yis/ /ci 'dod par ni bsten par bya/ /rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor bas/ /bdag dang gzhan ni mchod par bya/ /de ni 'jig rten mchod 'gyur ba/ /'jig rten 'das pa zhi ba nyid/ /dka' thub myur ba

de yin la/ /sdom pa dam pa yin par 'dod/ /mi zad pa ni gnyis ga ste/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyang / /gzugs sogs lha rnams yin par 'dod/ /de dag bsgoms pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sgrub pa po rnams myur du

'grub/ /tha dad yi ge slong mo yin/ /de 'don pa ni za ba ste/ /gang zhig zlos la dga' ba de/ /de dag slong mo za bar 'dod/ /dka' thub dag ni mi bya zhing / /sdom pa mi bzad nyid kyang min/ /'dod gsum de nyid longs spyod

cing / /sngags kyi de nyid ma nyams bzlas/ /rdo rje gsum dbye bde gnas na/ /sngags rig byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/ /gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang / /shi nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems

dpa' dang / /gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog rnams gang / /mi 'gyur chos ni brnyes pa yang / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog /kun mkhyen ye shes chags ldan pas/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams bsten/ /byang

chub sems dpa' mnyes bya zhing / /byang chub pha rol phyin chags bya/ /de ltar gzugs la gsum shes nas/ /mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /de nyid gtso bo bcom ldan 'das/ /sna tshogs rnam par snang mdzad che/ /sgra

la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /'di ni bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gtso/ /dri la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nyid

bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /'dod chags chos ni 'dzin pa'i gtso/ /ro la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nyid don yod rdo rje grags/ /sna tshogs gtso bo bcom ldan 'das/ /reg la rnam

gsum shes byas nas/ /rang gi rigs la dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /mi bskyod me long gzugs can no/ /nang dang de bzhin phyi rol dang / /gnyi ga rjes su mi dmigs pa/ /gzugs la sogs gsum
de yin te/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /gzugs sgra ro la sogs pa la/ /sems ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya/ /gsang ba bsdus par gyur pa 'di/ /snying po sangs rgyas kun bskyed de/ /mkhas pas gzugs

sgra la sogs pa/ /lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom/ /de bzhin rigs su bsgom pa ni/ /bsgom pas der ni bsgom par bya/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje sbyor ba ni/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bshad/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran

sbyor bas kyang / /chos ni rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /rdo rje gsum bsgom rnal 'byor pas/ /rdo rje rjes dran bsgom pa'o/ /rigs dbye ji skad bshad pas kyang / /chos dang longs spyod sprul skur byung / /rigs ni rjes dran sbyor

gyur pa/ /de bzhin khro bo rjes dran pa'o/ /de nyid gsum yongs gyur pa gcig /rdo rje gsum nyid med chos nyid/ /lha rnams rjes dran sbyor ba ste/ /de bsgom byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/ /bzhi po dag ni re re bzhi/ /ji lta ji
ltar mgu bcas sogs/ /de nyid lo yi grangs yin te/ /bcu drug par ni yongs su brtag /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten pa yi/ /bud med lo grangs bcu drug pa/ /gzugs bzang phra dang mchod pa ni/ /dben pa

zhes bya brtsam par bya/ /byin gyis brlabs nas yid 'ong ba/ /khyad par gsum zhes bya ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo che/ /spyan sogs nyid ni bsgom par bya/ /bsgrub bya de nyid yang dag sbyor/ /dbang

po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /dang por sbyor ba 'di bsgoms na/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /yi ge hU~M dang de bzhin o/ /phaT kyang der ni bsgom par bya/ /de nyid gsum tshul gsum bdag nyid/ /ci rigs

par ni rnam par spro/ /'od zer rnam pa lngas khyab pa'i/ /rdo rje pad ma 'di mchog ste/ /gsang dang snying ga sna rtse ru/ /rnal 'byor pas ni 'di bsgom bya/ /'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin dkar bar/ /shes rab de ni rtag tu bsgom/ /

gang phyir yid ni dgar gyur pas/ /de bas de nang yid 'ong ba'o/ /gnas med gnas par legs sbyor bas/ /bzhi mtshungs gcig tu sbyor ba rig /sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor la sogs/ /byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par

bya/ /nyams dga' sangs rgyas kun gyis bstan/ /b+ha ga zhi ba gcig pu'i ming / /rang gi de nyid gnyis med byung / /rdo rje de bdag nyid du sbyor/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba ste/ /b+ha ga ling ga yin par bsgrags/ /gzhug

pa gnyis med sbyor ba ste/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su bsgom pa'o/ /de las blo ldan gyis spro ba/ /ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse mor gnas/ /mnyam pa med pas khyad par du/ /sangs rgyas sprin rnams der spro'o/ /chos rjes dran pa'i

sbyor ba yang / /rdo rje chos kyi rab sbyor bas/ /rdo rje pad ma yang dag sbyar/ /b+ha ga'i ling gar brtag pa'o/ /de nas ba spu'i bu ga las/ /'bad pas chos kyi sprin rnams spro/ /de nyid bsam kun rdzogs byed pa'i/ /'di ni chos kyi

bdag po yin/ /rdo rje rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /dngos med gcig pu la sbyor ba/ /stong la rdo rje rab sbyor 'gyur/ /b+ha ga ling ga zhes bshad do/ /de nas ba spu'i bu ga nas/ /rdo rje sprin rnams kun du spro/ /rdo rje byang chub sems

bsgom nyid/ /myur du dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/ /rigs rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pas stong nyid rdo rje las/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor pas spros na/ /rigs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /khro bo rjes dran

sbyor ba la'ang / /stong dang rdo rje gnyis ldan pa'i/ /khro bo'i ba spu'i bu ga nas/ /khro bo'i sprin rnams spro bar bya/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /khyab bdag rnam snang mdzad chen la/ /rjes dran sbyor ba'i dgongs pa ni/ /thub

pa che la slar zhus pa/ /thub khyod kyis ni gang gsungs pa/ /b+ha ga'i ling ga'i sbyor ba ni/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i sbyor 'di las/ /sangs rgyas la sogs spro gyur pa/ /tshul 'di ma 'ongs skye bo la/ /phyi dus kun rmongs

bskyed pa ste/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi bdag pos ni/ /ci phyir gsungs zhes de rnams smra/ /'gro bas nam mkha' mtshan ma can/ /rten 'byung khyod nyid mi shes shing / /de rnams shin du rmongs dbye bas/ /ji bzhin par ni
rtog par byed/ /mgon khyod bde ba chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ston gcig pu/ /sku med srid gsum bdag nyid can/ /dgongs pa gnyis ka'i mtshan dang ldan/ /de bas khyod ni chos kun gyi/ /yon tan

gsum bdag de nyid gsum/ /dgongs pa bya ba dri med gsum/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni bdud rtsi 'byung / /khyod 'dir b+ha ga khyab 'jug ste/ /ling ga drag po'i ming can nyid/ /khyod ni sa bon tshangs la brtag /khyod ni rten 'byung

'gro ba 'byung / /dus gsum las 'das rnal 'byor che/ /dus dang rtsis su gyur pa nyid/ /shes dang shes bya rnam par grol/ /de bas khyod ni 'gro ba'i bla/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /de la sogs pa'i tshig gsan nas/ /

dam tshig rjes su dran bsgom pa/ /bcom ldan 'das ni ston par mdzad/ /rang gi rdo rje pad mar ldan/ /dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor las/ /rang gi khu ba'i thigs skyes pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom/ /dkyil

'khor rjes su dran bdag nyid/ /dbang po gnyis nyid sbyor ba las/ /rang gi tshangs pa rtag drangs te/ /rnal 'byor pas ni dkyil 'khor bya/ /sku rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi phung po lnga/ /sangs rgyas de nyid

sogs brtag pa/ /bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar rig /gsung rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba lnga/ /rdo rje chos gsung phun sum tshogs/ /de yi gsung ci 'dra bar 'gyur/ /bdag kyang de dang 'drar chos 'dzin/ /thugs rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba gang / /

rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dang ni/ /kun du bzang po'i thugs gang yin/ /bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /sems can rjes dran sbyor ba gang / /sems can rjes dran rdo rje nyid/ /spyod pa mkha' mtshungs ji bzhin du/ /bdag kyang

de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /sngags sku rdo rje gsum zhes pa/ /de sbyor dran pa bsgom pa ni/ /rdo rje sngags kyi sku gang yin/ /gsung dang sku ni rnam sgom pa/ /de nyid gsum mnyam gcig pa nyid/ /rtag tu gsum 'das gyur pa yi/ /

sngags 'dzin mchog ni ci 'dra ba/ /bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /dam tshig rjes dran rnams kyis ni/ /de bas tshangs pa shin tu dbyung / /dngos med gcig tu sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du btud/ /de bzhin

gshegs mchog che ba ni/ /dngos med ces bya bsad pa ste/ /blo dang ldan pas 'di bsad na/ /dngos grub sngags mchog 'thob par 'gyur/ /shes rab dam tshig sbyor gyur pa/ /rjes su dran pa zhes bshad do/ /pha rol phyin pa

zhes grags pa/ /yod med gnyis dang bral ba'o/ /thams cad rang bzhin dri ma med/ /ma skyes pa dang zad pa med/ /byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med/ /khams med 'byung ba'ang med pa'o/ /ma skyes rjes su sbyor ba gang / /

der ni ci yang brjod min zhing / /ma skyes ming ni gcig pu ba/ /dran pa de ni yin par bshad/ /ji ltar nam mkha' 'od gsal ba/ /mtshan ma med cing 'gyur ba med/ /rang bzhin mkha' dang 'drar gyur cing / /gnyis med gnyis

su yod min zhing / /yan lag bcu gnyis sbyor gcig gang / /zhe sdang rdzogs longs spyod pa'i ming / /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten gyur cing / /de ni rigs rjes dran zhes bya/ /rten 'byung las skyes rdzogs sangs te/ /bud

med lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/ /brtan pa'i sems ni thob pa las/ /rang gi khu bas mchod par bya/ /dngos med bdag nyid dag pa gang / /de ni dag par bshad pa yin/ /de nyid kyis ni mchod par bsngags/ /shes rab

pha rol phyin pas 'gro/ /'di yis lus la mchod pa dang / /khyad par du ni de bzhin gshegs/ /rdo rje 'dzin bshad de bzhin thugs/ /chos 'dzin pa yi sku gsung thugs/ /sku gsung thugs ni yang dag grub/ /tshe 'di nyid

la thob par 'gyur/ /gang bshad rigs ni dman bshad pa/ /de la'ang tshul de grub par 'gyur/ /de nyid mchod par bshad pa nyid/ /de bzhin so sor rab tu brtag /mi phyed rdo rje'i sbyor ba yang / /gsung gi dbang
bskur ba nyid gsal/ /dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas/ /gang zhig sems ni ma rmongs pa/ /mkha' la gnas pa'i nyi ma bzhin/ /de ni ci dgar spyod par byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /
rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba ste/ /sngags spyod pa yi mchog gyur pa/ /le'u bdun pa rab tu bstan// // de nas dpal ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /dkon mchog dpal ni 'od chen po/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /bla ma rdo rje gsum gyi bdag /mgon po rdo rje 'dzin chen po/ /dbang phyug dbang phyug dam pa dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi ston pa la/ /bstod pa 'di yis gsol ba btab/ /nam mkha'i spyod

pa rdo rje mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' thub pa che/ /theg pa chen po rnam snang ba/ /kun tu bzang po brtul zhugs bzang / /dngos kun dngos po gcig pa'i mchog /rigs mchog thams cad yang dag 'byung / /rgyal ba'i dam

pa'i mchod pa'i mchog /mchod pa kun mchog bshad du gsol/ /'dod chags chen po zhe sdang che/ /gti mug chen po blo gros che/ /theg pa gsum po rab ston cing / /rdo rje theg pa ston pa po/ /nam mkha' gcig pu dngos

po'i mchog /ye shes rgya mtsho bla ma che/ /rdo rje gsum po chags med pa/ /rgyal gnas mchod pa bshad du gsol/ /rdo rje gsum po lam gyi mchog /thar lam gcig pu ston pa po/ /sangs rgyas skal mchog shin du

dag /mi mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol/ /dngos po kun gcig shin du dag /byang chub sems ni rgya mtsho che/ /chos kyi 'khor lo gcig bskor ba/ /rten 'brel ye shes las byung ba/ /rdo rje gsum gcig rnam dag

don/ /sna tshogs sangs rgyas bya ba mdzad/ /bdag med chos ni shin du dag /phyag 'tshal rdo rje theg pa la'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po/ /thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che/ /thams cad dbang bskur kun

dbang po/ /kun don rin chen mchog 'dzin pa/ /na chung mig yangs btsal nas ni/ /gzugs dang na tshod rnams kyis brgyan/ /lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon pa/ /rnyed nas mi yi skye gnas brtag /rnam par dben nam gtsang ba yi/ /

sa phyogs su ni rgyal bdag nyid/ /zhi ba zhi ba'i gnas yid 'ong / /bshang gci chu yis byugs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster ba'o/ /rtag tu mchod pa nyid bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yi/ /phung po

zhes bya sna tshogs skyes/ /rdo rje gsum po mi phyed khams/ /rgyal ba zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /kun mkhyen ye shes lang tsho ste/ /len pa mi gsal la sbyor la/ /de nyid na chung yin par brtag /'jig rten pa rnams

'thob byed rgya/ /'gro ba'i don ni rab grub pa/ /gang zhig dngos med ces bshad pa/ /mtha' skyes bzhin du brtag pa yin/ /gtsang ba rnam dag sems yin te/ /rnam par dben pa dngos med pa/ /sa ni spyan zhes bya ba
yin/ /sa phyogs rgyal ba 'byung ba yin/ /zhi ba sna tshogs nges 'byung ba/ /zhi ba'i gnas ni myur la sogs/ /bshang gci yul dang dbang por grags/ /chu ni shes rab la sogs drug /'di dag gis gang byugs

gyur pa/ /rdzogs longs spyod pa'i 'dod 'byung ba/ /de rtag rgyal ba'i chos bshad pa/ /dgongs pa sbyor ba chos nyid do/ /mchod pa'i yan lag gnyis pa yi/ /bkod pa'i yan lag mtshan nyid bshad/ /'jig rten shin

tu 'das spyi bo/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i snying ga ru/ /rkang pa'i bar dang lte ba dang / /rked pa gsang ba 'jig rten pa/ /rgyal sras rnams kyi bkod pa ni/ /rigs ni lnga po bya ba yin/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /

ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par bsgom/ /bdag nyid zla ba'i nang gnas par/ /brtul zhugs can gyis snying gar bsgom/ /chu de sbyor bar gyur pa ni/ /mA ma kIr ni yongs su brtag /zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin 'dod pas/ /bsdu ba

de yang rab tu bya/ /rin chen rang bzhin mchod rten ni/ /'od zer sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/ /ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum pa/ /gnas de ru ni bsam bya ba/ /blo ldan pa spu'i bu ga las/ /ji lta ji ltar spro bar
bya/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor mchog gzhol bas/ /mchod pa'i sprin ni des spro bya/ /gos dkar pad mar yang dag dgod/ /rnam lnga gcig la rnal 'byor ma/ /me yi sbyor ba bshad pa ni/ /de yang mi gsal zhi la

gnas/ /sgrol mar ud pal nyid gyur pa/ /rlung ste sbyor ba lnga pa'o/ /'jug dang gnas dang skye ba dang / /de bzhin ldang ba'i ming can no/ /de nyid rnam pa gsum byas pas/ /rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnas/ /de nas blo

ldan gyis dbul ba/ /lha rnams kyi yang dngos med nyid/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog /khyab bdag rnam snang chen po las/ /me tog dgongs pa thos nas ni/ /rdo rje can gyis thub chen zhus/ /me dang rlung dang

dbang chen dang / /chu ru yongs su brtags pa yin/ /re re'ang dang po sbyor zhes bya/ /me tog de lnga gsum du bshad/ /bya rgod me tog za ba dang / /bung ba sha za zhes zer zhing / /me tog 'di yi dgongs pa ni/ /ma 'ongs

skye bos mi shes so/ /ma rtogs pas ni de rnams kyi/ /dngos grub ring du gnas par 'gyur/ /'di ltar bdag ni skal min zhes/ /smra zhing de rnams bdag nyid smod/ /de ltar bdag nyid smad pas na/ /sangs rgyas thams

cad smad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad smad gyur pas/ /mi las 'das nas gzhan du 'gro/ /gtso bo sangs rgyas nang na min/ /phyi rol na min gnyis gar min/ /tshogs pa las kyang ma yin te/ /rkyen gyis 'gro
ba dag la gnas/ /de bzhin de bzhin gshegs sangs rgyas/ /lus la gsang sngags 'di nyid las/ /gsang sngags 'grub par dka' ba'i rgyus/ /des ni bdag dang de dag smod/ /de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ /

dgongs pa de ni bshad du gsol/ /rang gi ngo bo ma 'tshal na/ /mkhas pa dag ni nyams par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas/ /gsang ba'i bdag po la gsungs pa/ /nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis/ /me tog

don ni bshad par bya/ /pad ma uta pal nyin mor bshad/ /dzA ti mtshan mo yin zhes bshad/ /lnga yi bdag nyid gsum dang gcig /gnyis lnga gcig dang gsum du 'gyur/ /de yi thabs ni nyin mor bshad/ /mtshan mo shes

rab ces bshad do/ /nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis/ /mjug tu 'byung ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de gnyis dbus kyi sbyor ba gang / /dgongs pas yongs su brtags pa yin/ /de ni sangs rgyas snying por 'gyur/ /de bas lha tshogs

kyis de min/ /rnal 'byor pa dang sngags pa rnams/ /dgongs pa'i chos la rab brtson bya/ /dgongs pa byin rlabs rgyu yis ni/ /de rnams kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rlung ni bcur grags pa/ /de ni pad ma ud u

pal ming / /de nyid ces grags rdo rje gsum/ /dzA ti gcig pu gsum du 'dod/ /ka r+Ni ka dang ma li ka / yuka ti ka ra bI ra ni/ /go rims bzhin du spyan sogs te/ /sa la sogs par 'dir sbyar ro/ /dngos med go

'phang la bkod pas/ /lha rnams kyi ni skur sbyor bas/ /gcig tu sangs rgyas kun mnyes pa'i/ /mchod pa chen por de 'gyur ro/ /lnga po'i bdag nyid yang dag bzhag /lnga bcu dag ni gnyis 'gyur bya/ /de nyid

gsum sbyor 'khor lo ni/ /dpag tshad brgya yi dkyil 'khor ro/ /der ni mkhas pas rtag par ni/ /rigs rnams rab tu dgod par bya/ /pad ma 'khor lo rdo rje dang / /de bzhin uta pal rtag tu bsgom/ /dpag tshad bzhi

po sbyor gcig pa/ /dpag tshad brgya khyon de nyid gsum/ /byams pa la sogs gru bzhir gyur/ /mdzes pa phung pos brgyan pa yin/ /gru bzhi de ni rigs su gyur/ /zhi ba sbyor ba gcig ming can/ /mchod rten ye shes
sems rang bzhin/ /gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med/ /rigs rnams mchod phyir de nyid ni/ /shes rab can gyis gnas bsgom mo/ /mngon shes lnga yi gnas 'dod rnams/ /de yi mchod pa rgya mtsho gsal/ /rin

chen ye shes spro bdag nyid/ /gos ni bsdu ba zhes bya'o/ /mchod pa mchog rnams de dag gis/ /byang chub 'dod pas mchod par bya/ /shes rab can gyis mchod mchog las/ /lha rnams rtag tu mnyes par bya/ /sbyor

gcig de las yang dag byung / /rin chen 'byung gnas na chung yin/ /dga' mgu yang dag ldan pa yi/ /dngos grub shin tu grub pa'i phyir/ /nga rgyal la sogs bdun zhes bya/ /rin chen thams cad dbul bar bya/ /

chos dang rdzogs longs spyod las byung / /rin chen bdun gyi nor de ni/ /des bkang ba yi zhing 'di ni/ /shes rab thabs gcig las byung ba'i/ /dngos grub 'dod pas sbyin pa'i phyir/ /zhing de nyin re dbul bar ni/ /

nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor pa'i/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin 'dir 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus su de/ /phyag rgya'i bdag por mnyam gzhag ste/ /'dod chags blo ldan sangs rgyas la/ /reg par yang
dag sbyor ba dbul/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsgom/ /bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ /yul dang dbang po sun 'byin pa/ /dngos med gcig par yang dag

'byung / /yul dang dbang po zhes bya ba'i/ /bshang gci ji lta ji lta bar/ /de nyid mchod pa rnams kyis mchod/ /skal bzang zhing ni mdzes pa yi/ /bud med gzugs bzang rnyed pa dang / /gsang sngags yi ge'i gnas
'byung bas/ /rnal 'byor ma de byin brlabs la/ /byas nas gnyis med sbyor gcig pu/ /rang gi lus kyi nang du gzhug /spyan sogs ji lta ji lta bar/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas bkod de/ /mig bzang dag pa'i

bya ba yi/ /rang byung khu ba blangs nas mchod/ /gang zhig de ltar rtogs pa de/ /blangs pas rdo rje 'chang bar 'gyur/ /sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gang / /spyan la sogs par rab brtags pa/ /de ni 'jug sogs

sbyor ba yang / /de ni khu ba za bar 'gyur/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste/ /rdo rje ye shes can gsang gi/ gsang sngags dngos grub byed pa'i mchog /rin chen kun gyi
'byung gnas mchog /dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas/ /gang zhig sems ni bzod gyur pa/ /de ni ji bzhin nyid du'ang byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje gsung gi gsang ba las/ /bshang
gci'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i/ /le'u brgyad pa yin par bshad// // de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog gtso/ /thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che/ /sangs rgyas dbang bskur
spyod pa'i mchog /gzugs don dbang phyug dam pa yin/ /rdo rje gsum nyid longs spyod pa/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil 'khor/ /sangs rgyas ye shes sbyor gcig pa'o/ /gsang ba nyams ni dga' bar bshad/ /

nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje rtse gcig rdo rje yang / /bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgom/ /'od 'phro mang po 'bar ba dang / /'od zer sna lngas rab tu

gang / /dus gsum sangs rgyas yang dag byung / /bsgoms la rdo rjes phye mar brlag /rdo rje gsum gcig longs spyod ni/ /rdo rjes phyer brlags med gyur pa'i/ /thugs kyi dngos grub byed bsam gtan/ /bsgoms na

myur du thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje mchog ces bya ba yi/ /rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bu/ /rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa ni/ /sems can thams cad bsad na ni/ /de ni myur bar mi bskyod pa'i/ /rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur/ /zhe sdang

rigs chen de nyid ni/ /zhing de 'gengs par byed par 'gyur/ /de nas dgongs pa chos gcig pu/ /gtso bo kun mkhyen thams cad rig /dam tshig de nyid gsungs pa yi/ /mgon la phyag na rdo rjes gsol/ /'di ltar dngos med

mchog gyur pa/ /khyod ni chos rnams ston mdzad pa/ /'jig rten pa dang 'gal tshig gis/ /mgon khyod ci phyir ston par mdzad/ /gang zhig de bzhin nyid dngos gcig /dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /chos sku gcig pu las

'khrungs pa/ /ji ltar rdo rjes phye mar brlag /de ni phyer brlags gyur pa las/ /ji ltar yang dag sems 'grub 'gyur/ /chos sku gcig pu las byung las/ /lhag pa zhes bya gyur nas su/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas

rnams/ /phye mar brlags par ji ltar nus/ /phyer brlag byed pas dngos med pas/ /phye ma nyid kyang khyad par du/ /sangs rgyas sngags don rnal 'byor pa/ /nus pa bsam mi khyab ldan la/ /de 'dra bar ni phyer brlag par/ /

sngags pa gzhan gyis mi nus so/ /sems can gyis ni sems can bzhin/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas phyer brlags pas/ /'di gnyis khyad par med do zhes/ /ma 'ongs skye bo smra bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas gcig pu mthar

thug pa/ /min zhes mi rnams nges smra zhing / /gang zhig sangs rgyas kyis gsungs bzhin/ /rab tu spong bar byed par 'gyur/ /theg bzang bsgrubs na 'tshang rgya ba/ /dgongs pa'i bum pa bzang po mchog /de ni bcom ldan

myur sbyor bas/ /mi skyod zhing du skye 'gyur ram/ /sems can 'khor bar 'khor gyur pa/ /de tshe zhe sdang che skye 'am/ /snying rjes gsad par bya'o zhes/ /sngags pa rnams ni de mi spong / /'das tshe ston par gyur pa dang / /

da ltar rjes su ston mdzad dang / /mnyes bya ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams/ /sangs rgyas byang chub stsol ba'o/ /mi bskyod gzugs can rdo rje yis/ /de rnams ji ltar gzhom par bgyi/ /de nyid sna tshogs don ldan tshigs/ /

de rnams kyis ni ji ltar rtogs/ /gang zhig shes pas rgyal sras rnams/ /dgongs pa'i don la rtog med 'gyur/ /ma 'ongs skye bo'i don du ni/ /de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin smra ba'i/ /'gro la phan pa'i

tshig gsan nas/ /de nas gtso bo rdo rje 'chang / /khyab bdag gis ni slar gsungs pa/ /legs so bu khyod cher legs te/ /kun du bzang po khyod legs so/ /dgongs pas bshad pa'i don du ni/ /khyod kyis nga la gang dris pa/ /

gsungs don ji lta ji lta bar/ /de ni nga yis bshad par bya/ /phung sogs yan lag gang gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas sems can rab brtan zhing / /sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yang / /dbye ba sna tshogs rab tu bstan/ /'khor

ba mi bskyod ming can te/ /de sngags rdo rje zhes bya ba/ /mi gsal rdo rje zhes bshad de/ /dngos med gcig pu rdo rje nyid/ /des bshig pa ni bsad pa ste/ /sangs rgyas sems can khyad par du/ /sna ni tshogs kyi dbang

po yi/ /kha ni rang bzhin nyid du g.yo/ /rnal 'byor pa yi lag gyur pa/ /'gro ba rlung gi ming can no/ /mi bskyod rdo rje'i spyod pa nyid/ /lag tu rdo rje bzhag nas ni/ /de tshe myur la sogs bya ba/ /klu yi
rang bzhin sna tshogs nyid/ /phung sogs brtags pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /sku gsung thugs las yang dag byung / /de yi yan lag phung por bshad/ /de ni phyer gyur bsad pa yin/ /
'di ni zhe sdang rigs yid 'ong / /mi bskyod ye shes rdo rje nyid/ /de bzhin skye ba dam pa yin/ /dngos grub chen po des thob 'gyur/ /de nas dpal ldan bde chen po/ /ye shes
thar pa rab sgrub pa/ /rang bzhin dag gis gos med pa/ /byang chub spyod pa rab bsgrubs pas/ /phyag na rdo rje 'od chen po/ /gsang ba gsum gyi gtso bo la/ /bos nas yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sgrub
pa'i dam tshig de nyid gsungs/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa la/ /rnam par snang mdzad bsgom bya zhing / /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par bsgom/ /rin chen
kun gyi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje gsum mnyam sbyor ba yis/ /rdzas rnams thams cad dbrog par bya/ /shes dang dbang po ldog par 'gyur/ /rnam smin dngos po med pa yi/ /

de nyid 'phrog pa'i rdo rje dang / /sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgrub pa'i/ /rin chen rdo rje mchog sbyor ba/ /rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur ba dang / /nor gyi rgya mtshos gang ba yi/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur/ /'di ni
gti mug rigs de nyid/ /dam tshig yin par yongs su bsgrags/ /rigs kun rgya mtsho shes bya ste/ /de las thub pa'i skyes mchog 'gyur/ /de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ /'dod chags thar par rab
'jug pa/ /gsang ba dag pa gnas med pa/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /dpag med chos ni rnam bsgoms te/ /

sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu dgang / /bud med lta bur sbyor ba yang / /ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad de ru bsgom par bya/ /'di ni rdo rje tshul mchog yin/ /dngos med bsam pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /gsal

mi gsal la yang dag sbyor/ /chos dang rdzogs longs spyod sbyor ba/ /gsang sngags kyis sprul dbang po gnyis/ /sbyor ba bzhi yi sbyor ba yis/ /dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor ba'i/ /snyoms zhugs sbyor ba de yis ni/ /

de dag thams cad nye bar spyod/ /sku gsum mi phyed sngags rnams kyi/ /'di ni bsgom pa mchog de yin/ /de nyid dam tshig sbyor ba 'di/ /'dod chags rigs gcig bsgom pa'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /

'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog ste/ /sngags pa rnams kyis nyin re zhing / /rab tu 'bad pas bsgom par bya/ /de nas gsang dbang rdo rje gsum/ /rdo rje sngags don sgrub pa po/ /bdag med ye shes las byung bas/ /

gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /don yod rdo rje rnam bsgoms te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje tshig gi brdzun

smra ba/ /rgyal ba thams cad slu ba ste/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /nam mkha'i gsung ni dri med pa'o/ /gang zhig brdzun du smra bshad pa/ /brdzun de nyid ni dam pa ste/ /dpa' bo gang zhig sgom byed pa/ /de ni rgyal

ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i ye shes dam pa ste/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub byed pa'i mchog /dam tshig 'gugs par gang gyur pa'i/ /rigs kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa'o/ /kun du kun nas 'bad pa yi/ /ji bzhin

don du 'dra byas te/ /so sor rtog pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de ni dngos grub rgya chen thob/ /de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum rgyal bdag /rdo rje'i dngos grub rab ston pas/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /
nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /der ni dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas sku ru rab brtags pa'i/ dam tshig de ni yang dag bshad/ /dkon mchog dpal ni rab bsgoms te/ /gzugs rnams kun
gyis sa 'di gang / /phung po la sogs grangs mnyam pa'i/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis thams cad du/ /rtsub pa'i ngag la sogs pa ni/ /sa rnams dman pa zhes bya ba'i/ /bsgoms na dngos grub thob 'gyur zhes/ /
bcom ldan thub pas de skad gsungs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun bkod pa/ /sna tshogs gzugs can 'od po che/ /bsam pas dpal ldan gcig pu nyid/ /dpag tu med par gyur pa yin/ /de nas gang zhig
dam tshig sogs/ /chos dbyings rdo rje gsum nyid ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /dam tshig rdo rje dpal la sogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas ni/ /tshig
lam rdo rje zhes bya 'di/ /de ni de rnams rjod par byed/ /ci 'di mgon po bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag /gang zhig khams gsum las 'das shing / /'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa kun mchog dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen gyi/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /ngo mtshar che ba'i tshig gi lam/ /gtso bos yang dag rdo rje'i tshig /dgongs pas ci slad gang
gsungs zhes/ /brjod kyis mi lang ba yi yang / /brjod mi lang ba rnams kyis gsol/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs kun gyis/ /brjod kyis mi lang ba yi yang / /brjod kyis mi lang grangs kyis ni/ /ri rab rdul
phran dang mnyam pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / /dam tshig rdo rje dpal sogs pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems chen la/ /dngos med las byung gsal ba gsungs/ /dman dang smad pa'i 'du

shes ni/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams ma skyed cig /ci phyir zhe na de bzhin gshegs/ /'byung ba gang 'di spyod mchog yin/ /'di ltar sngags kyi spyod mchog 'di/ /rnam par dag yin rigs kyi bu/ /sangs rgyas mnyam

med 'byung 'gyur 'di/ /gsang ba'i sngags don spyod pa nyid/ /'di ltar dper na rigs kyi bu/ /nam mkha' kun du song ba ste/ /chos rnams kun kyang der rtogs shing / /rab dbye'i sbyor bar gyur pa nyid/ /'dod pa'i
khams na mi gnas shing / /de ni gzugs kyi khams mi gnas/ /de bzhin gzugs med khams na'ang min/ /'byung ba bzhi la de mi gnas/ /rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyang / /de ltar don gyi dbang mkhyen nas/ /

dgongs pa'i dbang gis rgyal ba rnams/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams dgongs nyid kyis/ /chos rnams ston par mdzad pa yin/ /de bzhin du ni khyed rnams kyis/ /mdor na khong du chud par bya/ /yang dag byang chub don

rnams kyis/ /nam mkha'i nges tshig sbyor bas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor byung ba'i/ /dam tshig rjes su rig par bya/ /'di ltar dper na rigs kyi bu/ /gtsub shing gtsub stan bcas pa dang / /skyes bu'i

lag pa bskyod pa yi/ /rkyen las du ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas me yang 'byung mod kyi/ /gtsub shing la sogs re re nas/ /'di ltar so sor brtags na go/ me de gang na'ang mi gnas so/ /brag cha dang ni gzugs

brnyan dang / /sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu dang / /de bzhin chu zla rmi lam ste/ /chos rnams thams cad de dang 'dra/ /mgon po pi bang sgra lta bu/ /rkyen don las tshig yang dag byung / /de bzhin 'gro 'ong gnas pa rnams/ /cung zad

tsam yang yod ma yin/ /gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /gnas pa nam mkha'i mtshan nyid yin/ /des na khyed kyis rdo rje yi/ /dam tshig rjes su rig par bya/ /de ltar chos rnams dngos med ces/ /gsang ba'i

de nyid don mkhas pas/ /rnam par smin pa ldog bya'i phyir/ /phung po de bzhin gshegs par shes/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas ni/ /dam pa yis ni mig gdangs te/ /tshig ni 'di

skad ces gsol to/ /chos 'di ngo mtshar rmad byung ste/ /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa yi/ /mi rtog rnam par dag pa yang / /kun rdzob tu ni bshad par mdzad/ /dam tshig chen po yang dag gnas/ /dgongs pa lung ston

mchog la ni/ /gang zhig yid 'ong bzod gyur pa/ /de ni de bzhin spyod pa yin/ /mchog du dag pa'i de nyid don/ /gsang ba chen po zhes bya ba/ /dam tshig tshul ni yang dag bshad/ /le'u dgu pa rdzogs pa yin// //
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /rdo rje gsum 'byung bcom ldan 'das/ /slar yang dgongs pa 'dus nas ni/ /bla ma chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /dam tshig rdo rje de nyid gnas/ /mngon

par byang chub ded dpon nyid/ /sku dang gsung thugs gtsang gtso la/ /btud de de bzhin gshegs pas gsol/ /snying po sngags ni kun bsdus pa/ /gsang ba yang dag rdo rje gsum/ /dngos grub chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /
de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun ye shes/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub gsol/ /gsung gcig du ma'i rnam par rtog /yang dag bsdus don de bzhin gshegs/ /de nas bdag po

bcom ldan 'das/ /nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mtsho gtso/ /'bar ba drag po spyan yangs pas/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje gsum/ /sku dang gsung thugs bsgom pa ni/ /mnyam zhing rnam par

mi rtog pa/ /dmigs pa med cing gnas med pa'o/ /de nas mgon po bcom ldan 'das/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs/ /pha rol phyin pa sngags tshul gyi/ /rdo rje zhes bya'i ting 'dzin la/ /dpa' bo chen po snyoms
zhugs te/ /de bzhin gshegs kun la gsungs pa/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun 'di na/ /mgon po mi bskyod la sogs pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa du ma dang / /rig pa bye

ba khrag khrig ni/ /brgya stong du ma zhes bya dang / /sems can don bya la rol dang / /mchog ni de rnams ston par mdzad/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams mchog tu/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan pas/ /rol cing dgyes

par gyur pa dang / /yongs su spyod pa yod kyang ni/ /sngags spyod pa la brtson rnams la/ /kye ma dpa' bo de bzhin gshegs/ /rang gtso gsang sngags spyod tshul mchog /chos bdag med pa'i rang bzhin can/ /'di dag

rdzogs par gyur snyam nas/ /spyan ras kyis ni 'tsho mi mdzad/ /de ltar rnam par dpyad pa'i don/ /gsang sngags brtul zhugs spyod rnams la/ /yang dag par ni byin brlabs phyir/ /de ni ston par mdzad 'di yin/ /de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa mchog /thub la phyag na rdo rjes gsol/ /mgon po de bzhin gshegs de rnams/ /so so skye bor gyur pa la/ /dngos po med cing dmigs su med/ /nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam gyur nas/ /'dod

pa'i yon tan lngar ldan nas/ /ji ltar de rnams rol par mdzad/ /de rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du/ /nges par gyur pa'i 'khor rnams dang / /sems can don gyi bya ba kun/ /'dod pas ston par mdzad pa yin/ /

mgon po 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams/ /sbyin sogs drug ces bya bar 'byung / /thams cad dag kyang de nyid 'gyur/ /pha rol phyin par mnyam bzhag nyid/ /de ltar pha rol phyin 'byung ba'i/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang

ldan/ /'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba yang / /'dod pa lnga po 'di yis mdzad/ /'di rnams kyis ni mgon po 'di/ /mi bskyod la sogs rgyal ba rnams/ /rol cing dgyes par mdzad pa dang / /'gro ba'i don kyang mdzad gyur

cing / /'jig rten pa dang 'gal bya rnams/ /de yang de bzhin mdzad gyur pa/ /dag pa rdo rje'i tshig mchog 'di/ /de rnams kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /phyag byar 'os pa'i rig pa ni/ /nges par ldan pa nges par 'dod/ /yod
med la sogs byed pa ni/ /gnyis 'gyur mtshan ma can du 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu lam du chos gsungs pa/ /gang zhig 'jig rten phung po lnga/ /khams la sogs par mtshon pa gang / /gzugs sogs zhes bya'i ming

can yin/ /'di ni yan lag thams cad ni/ /bya ba nyan thos theg pa'o/ /de nyid rkyen gyi theg pa ste/ /tshig de ston par mdzad pa 'di/ /gang zhig rdo rje theg par gnas/ /de bzhin ji bzhin sgra ru 'dzin/ /shes
rab pha rol phyin pa la/ /nges par 'byung ba'i tshul gsum po/ /chos sku ngo bo la sogs pa/ /mkha' dbyings mtha' yas rnal 'byor pa/ /gnas med gnas par sbyor ba yis/ /'gro ba'i snying du rnam
rol pa/ /zhi ba gcig la gnas pa'i mgon/ /'khor ba dang ni gcig shos spangs/ /sngags las yang dag 'byung ba de/ /mi bskyod la sogs par brtags rnams/ /dngos med gnas la gnas pas na/ /

sgrub pa po rnams gzigs mi 'gyur/ /gsang sngags rkyen gyi sbyor ba yis/ /de ni rdzogs longs spyod gzigs 'gyur/ /bcom ldan gsang ba gsungs pa 'di/ /don de 'tshal bar ma gyur pas/ /rnam rtog du ma'i kun

rtog las/ /chos nyid de yis shes mi 'gyur/ /ji skad gsungs pa mi shes pas/ /phyi dus skye bo la la smra/ /'jig rten pa rnams drang bya'i phyir/ /gsang bar gyur pa bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs

pas/ /lag na rdo rje grags pa che/ /dgongs pa'i don ni rtogs gyur pa/ /bu khyod shes rab chen po legs/ /gang zhig shes pas ma 'ongs pa'i/ /skye bo rnam par mi rtog 'gyur/ /tshig gcig la yang sna tshogs don/ /

yang dag bsdus nas khyod kyis bshad/ /de nas dam pa bcom ldan 'das/ /bla ma kun mkhyen thams cad rig /skyes bu dam pa de dag la/ /spyan ras kyis ni 'tsho bya'i phyir/ /rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba 'di/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa kun gyi mchog /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /gsang ba yi ni mchog gi gnas/ /snying po sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /bskul ba gcig pu zhes bya ba/ /de bzhin gshegs kun gsang gcig pu/ /

mchog las mchog tu gsungs gyur pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi yang dag rtogs/ /dam tshig la ni dmigs pa dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku gsung thugs/ /dam tshig la ni dmigs pa dang / /chos 'dzin pa yi sku gsung
thugs/ /dam tshig la dmigs de bzhin no/ /nyid sku gsung thugs rdo rje las/ /tshig la nges par brjod pa ni/ /de nyid sngags su yang dag bsdus/ /sna tshogs gsung ba gzugs gcig pu/ /yi ge hU~M ni gcig
gsungs la/ /de nas yi ge oM gsungs te/ /de bzhin mgon pos yi ge AH/ /swA ni de bzhin bzhi pa yin/ /hA yang 'dod lhar gyur pa ste/ /de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas lnga/ /hU~M oM AHswA de bzhin hA/ /'di ni

gsungs pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun/ /rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur/ /de rnams gnyis med sbyor la gnas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran/ /zhi ba'i sbyor bar chos gcig pa'i/ /
rnam par mi rtog chos gcig skyes/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de yang / /de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po yis/ /de yi byin brlab sbyor don du/ /dam tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus
gnas par/ /dkyil 'khor bkod pa zhes bya ba/ /re re'ang gsum gyi sbyor ba yis/ /bsgom pa'i sbyor ba bsgom par bya/ /bye brag gsum po gcig brtags pa'ang / /bkod pa mi gsal ba nyid do/ /zla ba'i
dbus gnas yi ge hU~M/ /rang gi gzugs gcig rab tu brtag /rdo rje 'od zer rab 'bar ba/ /rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs/ /snying la de yis rnam bsgoms nas/ /

dpal ldan de nyid skad cig der/ /rdo rje gsum gyi rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbang chen gtso/ /'di ni kun mchog chen por skye/ /rang gi sngags kyis bskyed bya ba/ /sngags kyi cho ga dam pa'o/ /snying po rang gi
rdo rje sngags/ /rdo rje bsdus pa zhes bshad do/ /rang sngags tshul las byung ba'o/ /skyes bu'i gzugs su bsgom par bya/ /sbyor ba bzhi po sbyor gcig pus/ /gnas bzhi dag tu de dgod do/ /kha dog gsum
po zhal gsum lta'i/ /de nyid gsum gcig rnam bsgom zhes/ /bcom ldan 'das mchog nam mkha' ni/ /rdo rje dam tshig gtso bos gsungs/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog /zhi ba'i
bdag nyid thub pa che/ /gtso la phyag na rdo rje yis/ /gsang ba 'di ni slar zhus pa/ /hU~M oM AHdang swA hA zhes/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun/ /de nas rab 'dar
brgyal gyur cing / /rdo rje sems dpa' rjes dran pa/ /thub chen de 'dir ji lta bur/ /mgon po de ni phyi dus na/ /ji skad gsungs pa mi rtogs la/ /gcig pu mkha' mnyam sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems

dpa' mthu chen rnams/ /rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal gyur ces/ /byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs so/ /lan brgya stong dang bye ba yi/ /grangs dag tu ni ston mdzad cing / /ston pa sna tshogs ston mdzad kyang / /'dar zhing

brgyal bar de ma gyur/ /ma 'ongs dus na'ang 'byung 'gyur ba/ /mi mkhas pa yi nga rgyal can/ /bla ma'i lung ni blangs nas su/ /rtags ni rang nyid 'dzin par byed/ /de ni sngags don gsungs pa yi/ /mtshan nyid

gsang 'di mi shes par/ /sngags don de nyid mkhas pa yi/ /gzhan rnams la ni mi snyan sgrogs/ /'khrul pa cung zad tsam mthong na/ /bzhad gad dag ni byed par 'gyur/ /reg na dug dang mtshungs pa yi/ /mi de

zhi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig yid ni rin chen 'dra'i/ /'gro la phan pa'i sngags pa rnams/ /'di ni ma 'ongs dus su yang / /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /de rnams yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir/ /skad cig

rjes gsung grub don du/ /sbyor bar dgongs pa'i bsam pa can/ bcom ldan 'di ni bshad du gsol/ /de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das/ /'gro phan phyag na rdo rje la/ /de ltar sbyor ba yang dag sbyor/ /bsgom pa'i
dngos po rtog byed pa/ /dbang po nyi ma thub pa nyid/ /gang zhig phyogs bcur gnas pa rnams/ /sras bcas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyur/ /phung po la sogs grangs
mnyam pa'i/ /lus las skyes te yod pa 'di/ /stong pa'i rkyen du sbyor ba las/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas 'gyur 'dod/ /sngags de sngags pa sangs rgyas de/ /bdag nyid de sras yang dag sbyor/ /zhi sogs

mnyam pa'i sbyor ba las/ /zhi ba'i bde ba de nas brtsam/ /bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis dag cing / /rang bzhin dri ma med byas la/ /dal dang myur dang gnas pa yi/ /sna tshogs de gcig dag la bzhugs/ /yid dman

rim la sogs pas kyang / /sbyor ba de nyid dag la gnas/ /de nas dbang po med gyur pa/ /gang tshe zhi ba'i bde gcig pu/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sbyor ba ste/ /de yi chos ni lta ba po/ /de nas rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sngags/ /

sangs rgyas thams cad 'jam las byung / /gang phyir dang ni zlo gyur pa/ /yi ge hU~M gi gsang sngags lnga/ /de tshe snying las rab 'dar zhing / /dbang po thams cad brgyal bar 'gyur/ /gang yang phung sogs yan lag ni/ /sras

bcas sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /de nyid kyi ni grangs mnyam pa'i/ /rnal 'byor pa yi lus rab 'dar/ /nye bar mtshon sogs tshig rnams ni/ /phung po la sogs bshad pa gang / /sangs rgyas sras bcas par gyur te/ /

des ni brgyal zhing 'dar bar 'gyur/ /de gnyis la ni snyoms 'jug pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad sras dang bcas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid dran te/ /de sngags bdag nyid dngos las byung / /de 'dir mchog tu bshad

pa yin/ /rdo rje gsang ba rmad byung ba/ /phra mo'i snying gang dbus gnas pa/ /dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam pa'o/ /de yi dbus gnas zhi ba yi/ /go 'phang mchog ni bsam par bya/ /de hU~M zhes bya'i 'od po che/ /de yongs

gyur pa'i rdo rje ni/ /'di ni mchog gyur rtse lnga pa/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu bsgom/ /rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje gsum ni bsam par bya/ /de yi snying gar bsdams nas ni/ /lha rnams rab tu bskul

bar bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o/ /'khor lo pad ma'i rigs sogs pa'ang / /rol mo 'di ni dam pa ste/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rnam bsgoms nas/ /snying ga ru ni bskul bar

'gyur/ /rdo rje yi ni tshul mchog 'di/ /zhag bdun bar du byas nas ni/ /ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang / /rdo rje gsum po yang dag bsgrub/ /phung po la sogs sangs rgyas gang / /de ni dngos po med lta ba/ /de nyid
mchog gi gsang sngags kyis/ /skrag pa rnam smin mthong ba la/ /skrag pa mi rnams 'di dag ste/ /gsang sngags gnyis med sbyor gcig byung / /mthong bas skrag ste mchog ster cing / /'di dag
'di nyid brtags pa yin/ /zhi ba gcig pu'i sbyor ba las/ /sngags lus rdzogs pa nyid gyur nas/ /yid la mgu zhing dga' gyur pa'i/ /dngos grub rgya chen ster bar 'gyur/ /phung po la brtags sangs
rgyas dang / /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /sngags kyi sbyor ba'i don bsgrub pas/ /rmongs pas 'da' ba byas nas ni/ /de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur/ /zhi ba nyid kyi sbyor gcig las/ /'di ni
'jig rten 'das pa mchog /de las bzlog pa 'jig rten pa'o/ /de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ /'jig rten gsum gtso ston pa po/ /'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtsos/ /gsung ni 'di skad
bka' stsal to/ /gang zhig sngags kyi skyes bur bshad/ /rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes gzugs/ /de ni dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'i/ /gcig par bsgom pa rtag tu byed/ /bdag dmyigs sems can yod min pa'i/ /

sngags kyi dbang po rnam bsgom pa/ /dbang po gnyis sbyor bzang po ste/ /dngos po thams cad rnam brtags pa'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sngags kyi dam tshig mchog bsgom pa'o/ /rang gzugs rdo rje

yang dag sbyor/ /rig ma dbang phyug bdag kyang bsgom/ /gnyis med gnyis su med chags pa/ /lta ba dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro/ /gsang ba zhes bya der sbyar ba/ /de nyid mnyam pa'i bdag nyid do/ /de nas ston
pa bcom ldan 'das/ /thams cad dbang bskur dam pa ni/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum grub pa/ /gsang ba'i dgongs pa bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas sbyor ba yis/ /phung po bdag nyid mi dmigs pa/ /

chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa'i rim/ /bud med de ni rgya chen 'gyur/ /rab tu sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /'gro ba'i bud med ces bya ba/ /gsang sngags de nyid don gsang nyid/ /de ni gsang bas nye bar spyod/ /der ni yid 'ong

sangs rgyas rnams/ /bye ba grangs med rdo rje 'dzin/ /sngags rig dam pa spro 'o zhes/ /der ni bcom ldan gtso bos gsungs/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dam tshig ni/ /ston pa 'dir ni bla ma cher/ /'jig rten pa la 'dir

bshad de/ /'jig rten 'das pa zlog pa'o/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i byang chub ni/ /'di yis shin du thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems kyi yon tan mtsho/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog des 'thob/ /dgongs pa lung bstan

gsang ba la/ /gang zhig sems ni dad gyur pa/ /gsang ba 'bad de yang dag bsrung / /de ni rtag tu legs par byed/ /rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba las/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yang / /de nyid bskul ba zhes bya ba/ /
le'u bcu pa yin par bshad// // de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje gsum mchog mchog gsol pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun mchog gcig /nyi shu rtsa lnga mchog ces

bya'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /de bzhin gshegs kun rdo rje yi/ /sngags rig skyes bu zhes bya ba'i/ /le'u 'di ni bka' stsal to/ /sngags mchog de ni phyag rgya che/ /rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes bsgom/ /

rtogs dang bri ba 'thob pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje ye shes dag gis kyang / /tshangs pa la sogs yang dag bshad/ /ye shes snying po dam pa ste/ /rdo rje gsum sogs bshad gyur pa/ /sku yi rdo rje 'thob byed pa'o/ /a dang zung

ni gsung rdo rje/ /byang chub bdag med 'thob byed pa'o/ /hU~M ni rdo rje gsum mtha' nyid/ /sku gsung thugs ni 'thob byed pa'o/ /de ni 'jug sogs gnas nyid dang / /ldang ba dag tu rab tu bshad/ /nyi shu lnga sogs ming

can gyi/ /skyes bu'i gzugs su 'di 'gyur ro/ /de bas re re'ang gsum nyid de/ /rdo rje gsang sngags nyid du 'gyur/ /brjod med sa bon brgyad pa las/ /de ni nam mkha' las brgyar 'gyur/ /brgya phyed rlung ni gcig pu la/ /

de las nges par nyi shu lnga/ /skyes bu nyid du byung ba na/ /mgrin bcu zhes bya'i ming can dang / /sgra sgrogs gsod pa'i dga' byed 'gyur/ /de nas tshangs pa gcig nyid gyur/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po ste/ /'jug pa

la sogs rim du bshad/ /'di dag bsnyengs med de gcig pu/ /de ni zhi ba dngos med nyid/ /de las kyang ni yang dag 'byung / /longs spyod rdzogs sku dam pa'o/ /de nas sngags gcig sprul pa las/ /'gro ba'i don

gyi bya bar 'gyur/ /mtshams dang skye mched nor lha'o/ /zla ba zung gcig rig byed de/ /de la sogs pa'i grangs gyur rnams/ /de ni rig pa'i skyes bur gnas/ /'di rnams las gcig bzung nas ni/ /sangs rgyas rol

mo bstan par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid 'di/ /nam mkha' rdo rje dbus su bsam/ /dkyil 'khor brgyan pa zhes bshad pa/ /yi ge hU~M ni des bsam mo/ /rdo rje sprin ni spro bskyed pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa drug

gi sku/ /de dbus gnas pa'i rnal 'byor par/ /bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgom/ /sngags rnams kun gyi gtsug tor ni/ /sngags kyi skyes bu gsang ba pa/ /gcig pu nyid ni bdag por gyur/ /sngags spyod don

ni sgrub pa po/ /chos 'khor lo gcig 'khor lo mchog /rgyal dang rmad byung che gtsug tor/ /lus dang rnam par rgyal de bzhin/ /bya ba mchog tu yang dag bshad/ /sbyor dang bya ba gnyis med bzhin/ /sbyor ba 'ba'

shig nyid la 'di/ /b+h+ru~M ni gtsug tor yin par bstan/ /ye shes rdo rje snying po 'di/ /dus sbyor gcig gi ming can no/ /nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam nyid ldan/ /sngags kyi skyes bu dngos grub stsol/ /rdo rje'i dkyil
'khor dbus gnas par/ /oM zhes bya ba de ru bsgom/ /phra mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /yi ge AHni rnam par bsgom/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba la'ang / /yi ge hU~M ni de ru bsgom/ /yi ge bru~M

ni gnas ming can/ /rdo rje gsum 'byung bsgom par bya/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig 'di nyid de/ /rdo rje gsum 'byung bka' stsal to/ /snying po dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi/ /rdo rje gsum ni mnyes byed mchog /sku dang

gsung thugs thog ma mtha'/ /oM AHhUM gi grangs dang mnyam/ /sangs rgyas sku mchog gsung gi lam/ /thugs kyi ye shes 'jings su bya/ /rang nyid 'don pa nyid du ni/ /re re zhing ni yang dag bshad/ /sngags kyi

skyes bu'i sbyor ba yang / /rgyu yi bdag nyid ming can yin/ /byang chub tshul mchog 'di yin te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa'o/ /rdo rje ye shes sprul pa ste/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob byed pa'o/ /sngags
kyi rig pa zhes bsgrags pa/ /'di ni sangs rgyas skyes bu yin/ /rdo rje gsum mnyam mi phyed pa/ /rdzogs pa la sogs bsgom pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs kun rdo rje ni/ /gsum po ye shes rdo rje stsol/ /byin
brlabs dpal chen zhes bya ba'i/ /dam tshig ting 'dzin gyur pa yin/ /rnam par dben dang ci rigs pa'i/ /stan dag la ni sbyor ba bzhi/ /rig pa'i skyes bur yang dag sbyor/ /brtul zhugs can gyis

kun du brtsam/ /thabs dang shes rab nyi zla phyed/ /thun gcig tu ni rab tu brtag /de yi phyed nyid zla phyed kyis/ /rdo rje gsum ni nges par 'grub/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /'jig rten pa'i yang phyin

ci log /rdo rje gsum sbyor stsol dngos grub/ /grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par/ /phra mo'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig dus/ /bskyod pa yi

ge oM bsgom bya/ /sbyor ba bzhi yi gtan tshigs gang / /snying por yongs su brtags pa yin/ /sna rtse dang ni rtsa ba nyid/ /spyi bo mtha' ni dga' ldan gnas/ /gcig dang gsum gyi dngos por 'gyur/ /dag pa'i

gnas kyi grong khyer ba/ /phyed pos gsum gyi ming can ni/ /rigs kyi dbye ba rdo rje gsum/ /sna yi rtse mo sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje gsum sbyor brtul zhugs can/ /mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo/ /sgrol ma gtogs pa

sangs rgyas spyan/ /'od zer lnga yi sprin chen po/ /rnam par snang mdzad gnyis med gnas/ /rdo rje rnam snang de las ni/ /dngos grub rgya chen gsol bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas sku yi 'od 'dra ba/ /skad cig der 'grub

rnal 'byor pa/ /ye shes lnga po bsten nas ni/ /rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas/ /ye shes 'das dang ma 'ongs dang / /da ltar byung ba rdo rje gsum/ /de 'dir bskal par brtags gyur pa/ /grangs med ces bya de nyid do/ /

sku yi gsang ba de nyid 'di/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i rim par gsungs/ /zhi ba'i bde las shes bya ba/ /rang myong sbyor ba gcig las de/ /sku yi gsang ba mchog 'di ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsungs/ /rdo rje
'od zer bkod pa yi/ /ting 'dzin yang dag bka' stsal to/ /a dang u ni lkog kha'i dbus/ /rkan gyi steng gi ming can no/ /i dang tsa ni lag g.yon nyid/ /u dang mu ni g.yas par brtag /ra dzu 'di ni gsang
bar dgod/ /l-i ti rkang pa gcig shos la/ /dkyil 'khor gcig ni de nyid do/ /dkyil 'khor lnga las rgyal gyur pa/ /ha ni lus skyes gtsug tor dang / /gcod ni gsum po gcod pa can/ /yon tan bzhi yi

bzhi po de/ /lnga po'i lnga par de 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje gcig phyed sbyor/ /de ni 'od zer lngar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa chen po de nyid 'di/ /cha zhes bya bar de yongs bsgrags/ /dus can bdag nyid sbyor dbang po/ /
de yi rang sbyor gzugs can gcig /a ni thabs 'gyur sbyor ba ni/ /dbang po gnyis po gcig tu'o/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor mchog bsam pa/ /rang sngags skyes bu bsams

nas ni/ /a ni ngag gi lam du bzhag /kha dog lnga yi kun nas ni/ /brgyan pa'i rdo rje chen po dag /'jig rten dbang phyug mchog bsgom pas/ /dam tshig ye shes bsgom par bya/ /gsung gi dam tshig spros par bshad/ /

khyab bdag mi zad rtag pa ste/ /thog mtha' med pa'i mthar thug pa/ /zhi ba mya ngan 'das zhes bya/ /chos kyi gsung las rnal 'byor dbang / /rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni/ /rdo rje gsum gyi

bskal par gnas/ /gsung gi gsang ba 'di nyid ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsungs/ /dam tshig 'byung ba zhes bya ba/ /ting nge 'dzin du yongs su bsgrags/ /nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas mchog /rdo rje'i

dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /de ni rang sngags skyes bu dam/ /hU~M ni sems la gnas rdzogs bya/ /dam tshig chen po de nyid can/ /kha dog rnam lnga bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /
ston pa rdo rje'i thugs 'dra ba/ /yang dag ye shes yon tan mtsho/ /ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni/ /rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas/ /lkog ma rkan dang de nas mchu/ /spyi bo sa yi ming can te/ /rdo rje
gsum thugs gsang ba gcig /de ni ha~M la zhugs pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni/ /dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba/ /rdo rje ye shes gcig las byung / /ting 'dzin gsang bar bshad pa yin/ /ye

shes dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje chen por bsams nas ni/ /lus kun la ni kha~M dmigs na/ /rdo rje ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /dngos po med don gsal byed pa/ /kha nyid kyis ni thams cad bshad/ /rlung

gi rkyen dang kun sbyor las/ /kha~M du'ang 'gro bar gyur pa yin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /yang dang yang du mchod pa dang / /rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnas/ /gnyis med lhun gyi ngo bo nyid/ /sangs

rgyas de bzhin nyid sbyor ba/ /so so ru ni yang dag gnas/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje dam tshig che/ /chos rnams des ni mi gzigs so/ /sangs rgyas kun ni gnyis med dang / /mi snang 'di yi dam tshig yin/ /dngos po med

pa'i gnas thob na/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs so/ /sku gsung thugs las yang dag byung / /mi snang rdo rje gsum 'di yin/ /de yi bkod phreng zhes bya ba/ /ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag gsungs/ /ma 'dres

pa yi chos bdag nyid/ /sku dang ldan pa'i 'od po che/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /rang sngags skyes bur bsam par bya/ /ha~M ni rdo rje bzhir bshad pa/ /snying ga ru ni yang mdzes pa/ /rtag tu sbyor

bas gzhug pa ni/ /'od zer rnam par bsgom par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod ni/ /'jam pa'i dam tshig rdo rje can/ /sa bcur rab tu gnas na ni/ /dgongs don de tshe kun du byung / /ye shes nyid ni

zla ba 'di/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can/ /snang ba can zhes bya ba yi/ /ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag bshad/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /th+l+h-I~Mni 'bar ba'i 'od bzang ba/ /mtshon cha mchog ni rdo rje

yis/ /rdo rje sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /'di ni rdo rje mkha' 'dra sbyor/ /dam tshig bkod pa'i gnas gyur pa/ /ting 'dzin dam tshig mi snang ba'i/ /th+l+h-I~M ni yang dag 'byung ba bshad/ /sangs rgyas mngon par shes gnas

pa/ /dam tshig tu ni yang dag bshad/ /mngon shes lnga dang 'dra ba 'di/ /de ni skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mngon shes mchog sgrub pa/ /'di ni dam pa yin par bshad/ /de yi dngos grub thams cad kyi/ /
dngos grub chen po bsgrub pa'i mchog /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i mchog bsgoms la/ /yi ge oM ni bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje

gsum gyi gsang ba 'di/ /yi ge oM ni mi zad gtso/ /'di ni mi phyed sbyor ba yis/ /bsgoms pas mi bskyod 'dra bar 'gyur/ /mi bskyod pa yi dam tshig mchog /de sku byang chub rdo rje can/ /ting nge 'dzin du yang dag

bshad/ /de ni skyes bu dam pa yin/ /mi bskyod mtshungs pa'i sku dang ni/ /gsung thugs rtse gcig 'dzin pa las/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje can gyis mchod par 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi
dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor brgyan pa bsam/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje rab bsgoms te/ /de nas rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas/ /dkon mchog dpal dang 'od 'dra zhing / /
dkon mchog gsum dpal mtshungs pa yi/ /bcom ldan dkon mchog dpal 'dra zhing / /sku gsung thugs sbyor rdo rje yis/ /ye shes gsang ba'i gnas su 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin dpag med las byung ba/ /rdo rje
ye shes 'dzin de 'gyur/ /longs spyod dam tshig ces bya ba/ /rin chen rdo rje gcig tu 'byung / /de nyid gsum gsang dgongs pa las/ /rin chen rdo rje de gnas 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus
gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms la/ /der ni chos kyi oM bsgom mo/ /chos kyi oM ni de tshe yang / /rdo rje gsum mnyam sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje dpag med

'dra ba ni/ /bcom ldan dpag med rdo rje can/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis/ /dpag med tshe dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /theg pa chen po lam gyi mchog /'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa/ /ye shes rgya mtsho dpal dang
ldan/ /'gro don gcig tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /don yod pa yi dam tshig mchog /sems can don ni sgrub gyur pa/ /'od zer ye shes mchog ces bya'i/ /ting nge 'dzin du yang dag bshad/ /sems can khams ni

ma lus pa'i/ /longs spyod kun du 'gyur ba yi/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /de ni rnam snang rdo rjer bshad/ /'od zer der ni rab tu bsgom/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i

yi ge oM/ /'od chen der ni rab tu bsgom/ /de nas 'di ni rdo rje gsum/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de ni bcom ldan mgon pos bshad/ /rnam snang rdo rje can de yin/ /rdo rje gsum gnyis med sbyor las/ /rnam par

snang mdzad 'dra ba'i 'od/ /de nyid ye shes rdzogs byang chub/ /rdo rje sku gsum sgrub pa po/ /sku dang gsung thugs rdzogs byang chub/ /de la dmigs pa'i rdo rje can/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba nyid sbyor ba/ /'gro ba'i don
ni rab bsgrub pa'o/ /tshig gcig la ni sna tshogs don/ /sngags kyi de nyid gsal gyur pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog la/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po ni/ /gsang dgongs rdo rje zhes bya

ba/ /thub pa che la slar yang zhus/ /oM AHhUM ni gsum la sogs/ /b+hU~M sogs thog mar gnas pa yis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /sngags kyi skyes bur de 'gyur ro/ /oM ni rnam snang rdo rjer 'gyur/ /A~MHni

'jig rten dbang phyug gtso/ /hU~M ni rdo rje sems dpar bshad/ /skyes bu rdo rje can du 'gyur/ /b+hU~M ni gnas kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /kha~M ni nges par mi snang ba/ /ha~M ni 'jam dpal yang dag bshad/ /k+Sha~M ni rdo rje bkod ces bya/ /rdo rje

sems dpa' rin po che/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dngos grub stsol/ /de bzhin mgon po rnam snang mdzad/ /oM la sogs pa A las skyes/ /oM AHhUM ni de nyid gsum/ /rnam snang rdo rje can gyur pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi

rdo rje grags/ /shin tu rnam par nges par bshad/ /gsang sngags dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor pa/ /lnga pa bco lngar yang dag bshad/ /khrag gi sbyor ba las byung ba/ /gsang sngags skyes bu zhes bya ba/ /gsang sngags
