chen po'i sbyor ba yang / /ting 'dzin skyes bu dam pa yin/ /sna tshogs sngags don de nyid 'gyur/ /phyag rgya gcig par dkyil 'khor te/ /de dag gsang bar bshad pa ni/ /dgongs pa gcig las yang dag 'byung / /
dga' ba gcig cing dga' ba'i ming / /de dag ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur/ /mgon po rkyen dang bral ba'i mi/ /pi bang sgra ni mchis ma lags/ /de bzhin phyag rgya med par ni/ /gsang sngags dngos
grub mi 'byung ngo / /brda gsum gyi ni de nyid 'di/ /gang gi don du rab gsungs pa/ /lag pa'i sbyor bas rab bsgrub pa'i/ /phyag rgya ji ltar gnas par mdzad/ /sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor ba
ni/ /phyag rgya gcig pu'i sbyor ba dang / /gsang sngags gcig pus mi 'grub ces/ /khyod ni chos rnams ston par mdzad/ /'di ni sngags sbyor gcig pu las/ /phyag rgya bstan par ma
mdzad na/ /gsang sngags gcig skyes dngos grub ni/ /'jig rten pa rnams ji ltar bsgrub/ /sngags la dmigs pa'i sbyor gyur dang / /lha rnams kyi yang sbyor las byung / /'gro ba'i don ni rab bsgrub pa/ /
yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'das pa zhes bya dang / /yang na shin du 'jig rten 'das/ /mgon po 'jig rten pa rnams kyi/ /ji ltar 'gro la de phan 'gyur/ /spyan drang ba dang gshegs su
gsol/ /'dir ni ji ltar legs par brjod/ /gang gis 'dir ni dngos grub 'grub/ /lha rnams mngon phyogs ji lta bu/ /'di dag ma 'ongs skye bo yis/ /gang zhig shes na yang dag par/ /nges par rnam rtog

med 'gyur ba/ /mi yi skyes bu 'di dag gsungs/ /de nas mgon po bcom ldan 'das/ /dgongs pa'i gsang ba dam pa ste/ /phyag rgya'i nges pa 'jig rten pa'i/ /phyag na rdo rje la gsungs so/ /rnam rtog sna tshogs
lcags zhes bya/ /nyes pa gsum tshogs bdag nyid las/ /gsang sngags skyes bu'i sbyor ba yis/ /de ni mi mchog dag tu 'gyur/ /gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa yis/ /lcags ni gser du byed pa yin/ /de bzhin

sngags kyi de nyid kyis/ /mi ni bder gshegs byed pa yin/ /nges byas sbyor ba'i gsang sngags ni/ /zhi bde dngos grub ster bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya med pa'i sngags gcig pus/ /sngags kyi skyes bur 'gyur ba yin/ /

dngos med pa las yang dag skye/ /sngags kyi skyes bu 'byung ba ste/ /'di ni phyag rgya chen po ste/ /'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa'o/ /spyan drang bar ni bzhugs pa yis/ /myur ba yis ni gshegs su gsol/ /
gnas pa yis ni de bsgrub pa'o/ /yid rton dngos grub dam pa yin/ /de ni skyes bu'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya che dang gcig bsgrub las/ /myur ba la sogs gsum ldan pa/ /de ni phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /

'bad de bla mas slob ma yi/ /rna ba'i drung du bshad par bya/ /myur ba dang ni 'jug pa dang / /gnas pa'i rjes su sbyor ba rnams/ /spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol/ /'di dag phyag rgyar yang dag gyur/ /sgrub pa la ni

myur la sogs/ /ci rigs pa ni nges par sbyar/ /phung po la sogs chos rnams kun/ /stong zhing rten 'brel las byung ba/ /mthong zhing de bzhin sbyor ba las/ /chos kyi skur ni de gnas 'gyur/ /'dir ni gsang sngags

sbyor 'gyur med/ /phyag rgya'ang chos sku 'di nyid yin/ /de lta na yang 'gro ba'i don/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur byed/ /'on te rdo rje 'dzin gang zhig /sbyor ba gsum dang ldan pa'i mi/ /spyan drang ba dang gshegs su

gsol/ /de bzhin du ni gnas gyur pa'o/ /nye ba'i tshig ni spyan drang ba/ /ring nas lag par rab tu sbyor/ /de bzhin gsang sngags de nyid kyang / /gnyis ga la ni yang dag sbyor/ /rigs kyi dbye ba sbyor ba yis/ /phyag

rgya bud med yin par bshad/ /sems kyi rkyen sbyor bdag nyid ni/ /'jig rten par ni rab tu brtag /rang gi mtshan mar yang dag sbyor/ /rigs kyi dbye ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgyas sa gsum la gnas pa/ /sa 'og

klu yi bu mo yang / /brtul zhugs can gyi sems kyis dgug /gzhug pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni/ /de rnams gnas pa'i sbyor ba nyid/ /dngos med de nyid gcig pu yis/ /'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya/ /gzhan yang

gsang ba po yi mchog /sems kyi rgyan ni nyid ltos dang / /dngos med byang chub 'thob pa la/ /gsang sngags med cing phyag rgya med/ /'jig rten na ni rtog ci snyed/ /dus gsum du ni kun 'byung ba/ /de ni dngos med sems
gcig las/ /rnal 'byor pas ni skad cig rtogs/ /byang chub kun rdzob ma yin la/ /de las gzhan du'ang rnyed mi 'gyur/ /gnyi ga las min gzhan las min/ /mun pa'i sgron ma mtshungs par 'gyur/ /sems can

bsam pa'i dbang gis sngags/ /gsang ba 'di ni rab ston te/ /de ni sgrub dang bsgrub bya dang / /rnam par mi rtog brtags pa'o/ /sems can kun gyi longs spyod du/ /sngags kyi skyes bu rab tu gnas/ /nam mkha'
mnyam pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /rnam par dben par rab tu brtag /gsal dang mi gsal yang dag ldan/ /klung dang 'bab chu la sogs yin/ /mya ngan 'das pa gnas sbyor ba/ /dur khrod la sogs pa yi ming / /
'di ni sngags rig mchog rnams kyi/ /bsam gtan bsdus las spyod pa'o/ /'jig rten 'das pa de nyid 'dir/ /'jig rten pa ni bzlog pa'o/ /mi bskyod ye shes la sogs pa/ /rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil

du bsam/ /mngon shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas su bsgoms/ /rdo rje mngon shes rdo rje che/ /dam tshig mchog tu bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje chen po rab mdzes pa/ /rtse lnga pa la de bzhin

'khor/ /rang bzhin lnga ru sbyor ba yis/ /mngon shes lnga por 'gyur ba yin/ /mngon shes lnga yi ting 'dzin la/ /gnas nas bla na med pa brtag /gtso bo me stag mang po 'khrug /rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom
par bya/ /rdo rje la ni rab dgod pas/ /rdo rje mngon shes skye bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par/ /'khor lo rdo rje 'bar 'od 'dra/ /sangs rgyas 'jug par rab bsgoms na/ /sangs rgyas mchog
dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /lus la rnam par snang mdzad gzhag /snying gar yi ge oM bsams na/ /sngags la mngon shes bsgom par 'gyur/ /'gog pa rdo rje gyur pa'i
sems/ /nam zhig bdag nyid bdag las skyes/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog 'byung ba yi/ /dpal ldan yid bzhin nor bur 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /der ni mi bskyod rab tu bsgom/ /

hU~M ni snying ga'i zla gnas par/ /bsams la sems ni de ru bzhag /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /tshe dpag med pa rab tu sbyor/ /a ni snying ga'i thig ler gnas/ /bsams la rdo rje'i yang dag bzhag /

'di ni dgongs pa'i mchog gi mchog /rdo rje mi phyed gsum sbyor skyes/ /'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes te/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub cher 'byung ba'o/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
bsgom par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge oM/ /bsams na bskal pa gcig tu gnas/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /lus dang ngag sems yi ge AH/ /
bsams na bskal pa dag tu gnas/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par ni/ /lus dang ngag sems yi ge hU~M/ /bsams na de ni bskal par gnas/ /bcom ldan

bdag po rdo rje gsum/ /dam tshig rtogs pas de skad gsungs/ /dgu mtha' can gyi yi ge 'di/ /sngags kyi skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur/ /brjod du med cing ming med la/ /shes dang shes bya rnam spangs pa'ang / /

kun rdzob la ni legs gnas nas/ /tshig gi sngags su 'di brjod do/ /rdo rje gsum gyi rdo rje can/ /rnal 'byor 'dir 'gyur phyin cad ni/ /gang zhig klog gam sems kyang rung / /rdo rje ye shes lta bur 'gyur/ /ji ltar

gsang ba'i rgyal dbang po/ /dgongs pa lung ston 'di gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis de lung bstan/ /khyad par du yang byin gyis rlob/ /klog cing sgom dang ldan par ni/ /bris nas gang du 'jog gyur pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi/ /rigs skyes rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur/ /khams gsum thams cad bcom nas ni/ /myur bar de bzhin gshegs 'gyur zhing / /'khor los sgyur ba'i bu bzhin du/ /byang chub myur du des 'thob bo/ /bsam
gsum sku dang gsung thugs kyi/ /sngags pa'i yan lag gyur pa ni/ /sangs rgyas 'dus la brten pa yis/ /de ni dngos po med par 'joms/ /dngos med gcig tu rdzogs longs spyod/ /phung sogs yan lag don

las byung / /bde gshegs sems can spangs pa ni/ /sngags pa sngags las gyur pa yin/ /ji ltar nam mkha' rang mtshan nyid/ /skad cig kyang ni 'dor mi bya/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas thams cad kyang / /rigs las

skyes pa byin gyis rlob/ /dgongs la lung ston la gnas nas/ /gsang ba'i rin chen yang dag bsrung / /mig gzugs rang gi ngo bo nyid/ /spyod pa ci dga' byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni/ /gsang ba'i

dgongs pa'i ming can te/ /sku dang gsung thugs gsang ba dang / /gsang sngags dam tshig de nyid byung / /de ni rig pa skyes bu mchog /bcu gcig par ni yang dag bshad/ / ras ni bris dang mtshungs par 'byung / /'thob pa'i phyir

ni le'ur gyur/ /de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad/ /skyed pa ye shes bla ma gtso/ /de nyid dam tshig mchog gyur pa/ /rdo rje gsung gis bka' stsal to/ /mkha' dang mtshungs shing mi rtog la/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dam chos can/ /

dngos med shin du dri med la/ /dam tshig gcig tu gyur kyang ni/ /gar dang glu dang rol mo dang / /dgod dang steg pas rab mdzes pas/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas gar mkhan gyis/ /rol mo 'di dag rab tu bsgom/ /gzhon nus bsgrubs pa'i sems

can ni/ /ji lta ji ltar ston pa bzhin/ /gar sogs rtsed mos byang chub ni/ /myur du de nyid las 'thob 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan pa/ /de yi ming ni yid ldan pa/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gnas/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs

rgyas 'gyur/ /sems can gang 'di mthong ba dang / /thos shing rig par gyur pa ni/ /de ni u dum wA ra yi/ /me tog 'dra bar gyur pa yin/ /sems can kun gyi gtso bo 'di/ /gsung gi rdo rje chos nyid skyes/ /

gcig dang du ma las grol ba/ /rten 'byung gsal bar byed pa yin/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag mchog de/ /chos kyi de nyid rab ston pa/ /thub chen rnam par snang mdzad la/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas zhus/ /mgon po de nyid

bsdus pa las/ /rol mo 'dir ni gyur pa dang / /'jig rten pa de gar byed pa/ /gsungs te ma 'ongs skye bo ni/ /chos dbyings de ni gar min na/ /gtso bo ji ltar gar bgyid lags/ /rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan gar/ /
gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba yin/ /chos dbyings de ni glu min na/ /gtso bo ji ltar glu len 'gyur/ /rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan glu/ /gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags/ /chos dbyings
de ni rol mo min/ /gtso bo ji ltar rol mor 'gyur/ /'jig rten rgyang pan rmongs rol mo/ /gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags/ /chos dbyings de rgod ma lags na/ /gtso bo ji ltar rgod par 'gyur/ /
rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan rgod/ /gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags/ /chos dbyings de sgeg ma lags na/ /gtso bo ji ltar sgeg par 'gyur/ /rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan sgeg /gsang
mthon myos pas bskul ba lags/ /de ltar rnam pa mang po la/ /gzhan rnams kyang ni sbyor byed cing / /bza' dang min las sbyor ba yis/ /rnal 'byor pa ni bdag yin snyam/ /rdo rje yi ni tshig mchog 'di/ /

yod med rab tu zhi ba nyid/ /de yi rang bzhin gcig sbyor bdag /yang dag mchog bsdus de nyid mchog /de nas de nyid yang dag gzung / /rnal 'byor rigs mchog rnal 'byor pa/ /de nyid gsum mnyam nyid sbyor ba/ /
sangs rgyas kyi ni rol mo ston/ /sna tshogs tshul gyis rnam dgod pas/ /nor can ming ni nyams la sogs/ /gcig pu'ang dpag med dngos bshad pa'i/ /gar gyis skye dgu dga' bar byed/ /rdzogs pa'i byang
chub sogs dngos grub/ /sna tshogs khyed kyis gsungs pa rnams/ /sems zhi ba yi rnal 'byor pa/ /de rnams lhun gyis grub par 'gyur/ /mgon po shes rab 'di srid du/ /thabs kyis mchil par nye

bar sbyor/ /sngags kyi gzan gyi sbyor ba yis/ /khyed ni 'jig rten pa rnams 'dzin/ /bshad du zin kyang mi rig pa/ /dgongs pa'i gsang ba dam pa ni/ /gzhan rnams la ni ston mdzad pa/ /ngo bo nyid ni gzhan min

pa'o/ /phyi rol sngags don dngos grub ni/ /de nyid du ni tshol mod kyi/ /'gal ba'i rjes 'jug chos nyid can/ /der yang 'grub par 'gyur ma yin/ /de rnams gsang ba mi srung zhing / /sred pa yis ni sten par byed/ /bcom
ldan 'das gsung gsang ba ni/ /gsang mchog tshig gis sgrogs par byed/ /khyod bka' las 'das dman pa rnams/ /sngags kyi nus pa rnam spangs pa/ /'jig rten pa rnams sdang 'gyur zhing / /de rnams 'grub

par 'gyur ma yin/ /sred pa'am dad pa dag gis kyang / /rkyen dang de bzhin nyan thos rnams/ /gsang ba la ni smig rgyu bzhin/ /rigs skyes gzhan yang ltung bar 'gyur/ /mgon po de ni der gnas shing / /nyams shing

blo gros dman par gnas/ /de nas tshig min gyur par 'byung / /tshig gi bdud rtsi sbyor ba las/ /chos kyi tshul 'di thos pa dang / /phyi nas 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' lhung 'gyur bar/ /bdag nyid che de

byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin byang chub 'gyur ba dang / /sngags pa rnams kyang gsang ba lags/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /gsang ba mdo sde rnam smra ba/ /gdong g.yogs pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /de tshe tshig gis rig skyes pa/ /

gsang sngags la sogs chos rnams la/ /dad pa rnams ni skyed mi byed/ /log pas mkhas pa'i nga rgyal ni/ /byis pa phyi nas byed par 'gyur/ /a yi dog pa'i ras 'di ni/ /sbyor bshes rnams kyi 'di ma yin/ /de rnams dad

pas rjes 'jug pa/ /gtam dag kyang ni byed par 'gyur/ /sgyu ni g.yo yi tshul gyis na/ /rgyal po rnams ni slu bar byed/ /steng du g.yogs pa dag gis ni/ /brgyad gnyis pa yi tshul du byed/ /de ni mi skyes pa yi bdag /ras kyi

rgyu med pa nyid ni/ /a yi dog ras nyid rgyal po'i/ /yang dag dngos grub byed pa'i mchog /dam pa'i skye ba nyid mthong na/ /de ni longs spyod lam skyed min/ /de bas skye bo med gcig pu/ /bya ba'i sems ni

rab tu 'jug /der ni mche ba can ming 'gro/ /de la btsal ba 'ba' zhig yin/ /rgyal po dngos grub chen po'i ras/ /bar chad shin tu mang po pa/ /bya ba de ni rnam par 'joms/ /sgrib pa med pa'i rnal 'byor can/ /des ni tshig

de thos pa dang / /rgyal po'i bar du yid dga' zhing / /dngos grub chen po'i rigs mchog las/ /su zhig bdag ni zlog par byed/ /ras kyi bar chad byed pa dag /de la chad pas gcad par bya/ /'di la 'jigs pa'i sems 'ong la/ /

skye bo med par khyed kyis ni/ /rgyal rigs dag gam rigs bzangs sam/ /gang zhig mi srun rigs can rnams/ /dog pa med pa ras 'jig pa/ /de dag thams cad brlag par bya/ /de nas rgyal po sbyin pa ni/ /rgyud kyi slob

dpon bdag nyid che/ /rin chen rin thang med lnga sogs/ /bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu'o/ /'di yis gdong ni g.yogs nas su/ /rgyal po 'bras bu longs spyod cig /a yi dog pa ras de byin/ /ji ltar skye bzhin rgyal po byas/ /

rin chen rin thang med blangs rnams/ /'di ni ji ltar gzhag nas su/ /de nas de ni mi snang ba/ /rgyun can gyis ni de tshe byas/ /de la sogs pa'i sna tshogs tshig /rigs skyes pa la de rnams smra/ /rang nyid 'jigs shing gzhan
rnams kyang / /skrag par byed cing the tshom med/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po/ /'byin pa ston pa mnga' bdag gtso/ /phyag na rdo rje go byed pa/ /snyan pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa/ /rdo rje

rdo rje chen po legs/ /rdo rje thal mos ston par byed/ /rdo rje 'di ni zhus gyur pa/ /de nyid bsdus pa dam pa'o/ /rdo rje thal mo de nyid 'di/ /lung bstan bya yis de nyon cig /de nyid gsum du gyur pa de/ /rdo rje thal

mor yongs su brtag /de nyid gsum ni lha gsum ste/ /tshangs dang khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /de ru nga ni lha gsum 'gyur/ /oM AHhUM dang grangs mnyam pa'i/ /gsang sngags 'jug pa thams cad ni/ /sna tshogs

lus can gcig ming can/ /zhi ba nyid ni gang du ston/ /der ni nga yang gnas pa yin/ /dpal yon de la bzhin mi sdug /de yi skyes bu ming ldan ming / /de rnams lag pa'i dbus nas ni/ /thim sogs ji bzhin grangs su

bshad/ /lag pa g.yon ni drag por gyur/ /g.yas pa de bzhin khyab 'jug ste/ /gnyis pa sbyor bar tshangs pa yin/ /de bas yon tan gsum bdag dang / /rig dang mchod sbyin snyan tshig ste/ /rig byed der gyur

gsum du bshad/ /srid srung zhi ba nga yin te/ /mthar ni 'gro ba gnas pa yin/ /lag pa gnyis pa 'di dag ni/ /bzhi po'i phyed phyed rnam brgyad pa/ /phyed po'i tsham gyi hU~M mchog ni/ /rab tu zhi bar rab tu bsgrags/ /
nyi ma zla ba mi rnams der/ /so sor yongs su bsgrags pa yin/ /yi ge phyed tsam mchog gyur pa/ /shis pa zhi ba skyon med pa/ /yon tan oM dang yi ge phyed/ /oM zhes gsal bar brjod pa yin/ /sna yi rtse

mor yang dag ldan/ /gtsug mtha' dang ni lag pa gnas/ /nyi ma zla ba'i sbyor ba las/ /ye shes me ni nges par skye/ /lce dang rkan gyi mtshan ma ni/ /sbyor las thar bar de bshad de/ /a/ 'og tu a dang yang dag

ldan/ /de steng yi ge a nyid de/ /thad ka ru ni ma bshad de/ /khyod ni yi ge phyed zhib nyid/ /yi ge oM ni tshangs pa ste/ /AHni khyab 'jug yin par bshad/ /hU~M ni rlung du gyur pa yin/ /de nyid drag po zhes bya'o/ /zhi ba'i phyed phyed

zhes bya ba/ /der ni bdag yongs bsgrags pa yin/ /gnas dang 'pho dang skye ba dang / /gzhan gyi lus las yang dag 'pho/ /ye shes rang nyid med yin te/ /khyab par 'dzin pa de bzhin no/ /ral gri la sogs dngos grub der/ /byang chub phyi

rol nyid 'grub 'gyur/ /gnyis po 'di dag gnas pa yi/ /rnam dag 'di dag rab tu brtag /tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams der/ /ma 'ongs pa rnams sgom par 'gyur/ /de ni mtho ris sogs 'gag pas/ /de bzhin 'gyur ba

sel ba yin/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams srog spangs nas/ /gnyis spyad par ni rnam par gnas/ /shin du sbyor gcig gyur song bas/ /'jug 'gyur ba ni drag po yin/ /nam mkha' dgag pa'i sbyor ba yang / /tshangs par gzhol

ba'i bdag nyid can/ /mngal gyi gzugs gyur khyab 'jug ste/ /de yi dbus na dbus bzung ba/ /spu yi cha ni stong las gcig /zhi de rnam par mi rtog nyid/ /thar pa gcig pur de ston bya/ /thar pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin/ /de lta bas na

'di log bya/ /zhi ba nyid ni sgrogs pa'o/ /ston pa de rnams phye nas ni/ /zhi ba'i chos rnams smra bar 'gyur/ /thabs chen de bzhin shes rab dag /'di 'dra mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /tshangs la sogs pa'i lha rnams kun/ /khyod kyi thal

mo dag la gnas/ /de rnams phyag rgya ston byed cing / /sngags ni bye ba mtha' yas pa/ /'di nyid du ni nyi zla dang / /sbyin bsreg las can me dang ni/ /lo dang zla ba'i sbyor ba dang / /rtag tu 'char dang 'phel 'grib dang / /de nyid

gsum gyi sbyor skyes 'di/ /de nyid gcig pu rnam par gnas/ /zhi ba nyid kyi sbyor chos la/ /de yang gcig dang du ma spangs/ /khyed kyi thal mo las byung ba/ /de bas de ni 'da' mi bya/ /de bzhin gshegs kun spangs 'gyur
bas/ /de ni spong bar mi bya zhing / /'di dag dngos med la ltos pas/ /rnal 'byor pa ni mchog tu 'dod/ /gzhan du rnam rtog nyid las ni/ /dngos grub 'bras bu'i snod mi 'gyur/ /de bas thal mo

sbyar ba 'di/ /sems can rjes bzung dam pa yin/ /ma bzung ba yi sems can rnams/ /bsdu ba'i don du khyod kyis bya/ /smad bya 'on pa lkugs pa dang / /de bzhin long bar gyur pa dang / /gang zhig 'phye bo la sogs

gyur/ /de rnams la ni phan phyir bya/ /de la sogs pa mdor bsdus pa/ /de ni khyed kyi thal mor gnas/ /de ni 'jig rten 'das gtsor gyur/ /de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyu can no/ /de ni nang min phyi ma yin/ /gnyis min gzhan gyi rgyu las min/ /

phyag rgya tshogs pa las skyes min/ /'jig rten rkyen las byung ba min/ /rdo rje thal mo bsdoms pas na/ /ming ni rdo rje thal mor gyur/ /sems can rnams kyis rtogs dka' ba'i/ /snying po rtogs par bya ba'i mchog /phyag rgya 'di lta

bu 'di yin/ /phyi nang gnyis kyi ming can no/ /mi bskyod rin chen dpag med de/ /dngos grub rnam snang de bzhin gshegs/ /'di dag lag pa g.yas pa yi/ /mthe'u chung la sogs rnams la gnas/ /gnyis por gcig 'gyur dge

'dun te/ /de 'di skyabs ni gsum yin te/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams/ /gcig dang gsum du brtags pa yin/ /phan tshun bcings pa'i rdo rje nyid/ /shes rab thabs kyi gnas mthong yin/ /thal mo bcings
pa tsam gyis kyang / /sangs rgyas thams cad nyid thob 'gyur/ /skyabs gsum dang ni de nyid gsum/ /rdo rje gsum dang rnam thar gsum/ /zhal gsum mdog gsum spyan gsum dang / /lha gsum dang ni khams
gsum dang / /dus gsum dam tshig mchog gsum dang / /tshul gsum dkyil 'khor gsum du 'gyur/ /sbyor ba gsum dang lam gsum ste/ /ji srid rtogs pa'i 'dod pa rnams/ /de ni thal mor sbyor 'di yin/ /

'dod nor yon tan gsum gyi mchog /rim dang bslab pa ster ba dag /ma 'ongs skye bos 'thob par 'gyur/ /de nyid du ni der 'gyur na/ /gcig dang du ma rnam par spangs/ /chos bshad bshad pa dngos med pa/ /'gro ba rkyen

gyis yang dag sdud/ /'di ni mkhar ltar rang bzhin gcig /gnas med gnas pa zhes bya ba/ /bsdu bar byas par gyur pas kyang / /sku gsum don gyi chos nyid do/ /'di ni thog mtha' med pa ste/ /dngos po med cing gnas

med pa/ /mtha' med zad pa med par 'gyur/ /sku gsum dag ni rkyen las ni/ /rnam pa'i 'jug pa'i ye shes te/ /de las sangs rgyas snying por gyur/ /hU~M gis sems can yang dag 'byin/ /sangs rgyas skur ni rab tu
brtag /aM ni thams cad sdud pa ste/ /AHni gnas pa sor 'gyur ro/ /gcig pu rnam gsum de bzhin lta/ /gsal dang mi gsal sbyor ba ni/ /rten 'brel chos nyid 'di yin te/ /de nyid kyi ni sngags bshad pa'o/ /

zlos dang bsam gtan rnam bral bar/ /de yi lhun grub 'bras bu ster/ /rang bzhin grub pa 'di yin te/ /'dod pa'i bzlas par de bshad do/ /rnal 'byor pa la de gsal te/ /byis rnams de la phyin ci log /rkyen las byung ba de

nyid gsum/ /dngos po med par de bshad do/ /de nyid bsdus pa bshad pa ni/ /yid min pa yi bzlas par gyur/ /yid rton gcig ni mdor bsdus las/ /rings dang dal dang gnas pa rnams/ /zhi ba'i chos nyid la skye ste/ /

nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam par thim/ /dngos po med pa'i de nyid 'di/ /rten 'byung chos shes bya ba yin/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bsdus de gyur/ /sprul pa bsam mi khyab ces dben/ /sdud pa por ni gang gyur pa/ /
de yang phul du gyur pa'i ming / /rdo rje la sogs yang dag sbyar/ /sems can rnams ni de sbyor byed/ /dam tshig la sogs sngon de ni/ /de nyid kyis ni rdo rjer sbyar/ /
sems can dgongs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de yi chos rnams ston par byed/ /rnam pa dgu po thog mtha' can/ /sdus pa po rnams byas pa yin/ /gsang sngags de nyid gnas dgod pas/ /
sems can rnams ni der 'jog ste/ /gsol ba 'debs dang phyag 'tshal dang / /'jig rten rnams la gsol bya dang / /rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams mnyes byed de/ /khyod kyi thal mor gnas pa yin/ /gang zhig sems
can sangs rgyas gyur/ /de bzhin gnyis med chos nyid can/ /gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad sangs rgyas rnams gnas so/ /sna tshogs mtshon pa de nyid do/ /mthong ba gsal byed thal mo yin/ /

de bas de rnams mgu gyur pa/ /chos kyi de nyid rkyen las so/ /rgyu med rang gi de nyid 'di/ /khyed kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor las byung / /gang zhig shes pas 'dod 'grub pa'i/ /dngos grub des ni thob par gyur/ /a nyid der ni mi

gsal ba'i/ /rgyu las sbyor bar gyur pa yin/ /dog par de ni yongs bshad de/ /dngos po med par ras kyi ming / /'phags pa gshin rje gshed bsgoms la/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs su'ang bsgom par bya/ /dog pa de yi ras don las/ /

mi snang ba la sogs grub cing / /yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba'i mchog /'gro ba'i don gcig yang dag byung / /a yi dog ras mtshon pas ni/ /'jig rten pa la dgongs pas bshad/ /'di ni chos dang rdzogs longs spyod/ /sprul

pas de ni gsum du 'gyur/ /byis pa rtog par bya ba'i phyir/ /de ni rnam pa lngar yang 'gyur/ /tha mal byis pa'i chos rnams gang / /rnam lnga gcig pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /de yang shin du ldan sems can/ /sems can sogs

la rnam par gnas/ /rtag pa ltar ni so sor snang / /'gro ba dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig /skye ba med las skyes pas na/ /gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa'o/ /shes 'dod de tshe sngags pa ni/ /'gro ba byis pa de tshe spyod/ /
de nas gsang sngags grub 'gyur ba/ /rnam par mi rtog gcig shos nyid/ /ya yi sde sogs gnas byas te/ /sngags ni na ri bri bar bya/ /rang gi sde bcas gnas dag ni/ /yi ge a bzhin sngon 'gro ba/ /so so

gzhan pa'i bzhi pa ni/ /i u dang ni ring por bcas/ /a ai au u ya ste mtha'/ /bzhi po dang bcas zlum por bri/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sbyor ldan pa'i/ /'gro ba mnyam bzhag bskyed pa yin/ /'di dag rang skyes gnas
gzugs kyi/ /chu yi yi ger zhugs par 'gyur/ /de nas gzhon nu'i gzugs nyid kyang / /rnam par bsgoms pas skye bar 'gyur/ /cha bcas dbang gnas sngags pa ni/ /bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /nA

ga yi ni grangs bzhin du/ /skud sogs sbyor la gang gnas pa/ /nyi shu yi ni sngon ma yang / /de ni ras te bzhi pa'ang yin/ /sngon med cha lugs gzugs kyis ni/ /khams gsum dag ni lta bar 'dod/ /'gro ba'i

don ni byed gyur pa'am/ /mnyam nyid ye shes de nyid las/ /yon tan gsum ni brda byas pa/ /yon tan med pa'i yon tan ming / /gzhon nu'i spyod pa'i lus kyi ming / /lta ba 'di ni ba ra skyes/ /de ni sgo glegs mtha'

yin te/ /i u dang ni ring por bcas/ /yi ge gsum bcas thig ler ldan/ /tsheg drag mtha' yi ring sde can/ /yi ge a ni yig sbyor ba'ang / /bcu gcig par yang gyur pa yin/ /de nyid ring po ring ba'i mthas/ /
bcu gnyis pa yi grangs su 'gyur/ /de nyid yi ge ur sbyor las/ /yi ge oM zhes brjod pa yin/ /snga ma'i ri mo'i sbyor ba yin/ /ming ni bcu bzhi par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste a las sngags pas ni/ /a nyid du ni
blta bar bya/ /de bzhin a yi sbyor ba las/ /yi ge i ni ci 'dod par/ /ji bzhin grangs kyis yang dag blta/ /re re'ang a yi sbyor bas bsgo/ /i ri li u'i tshogs las kyang / /sngags pa ya ra la wa'i
gzugs/ /lkog ma mkha' dang bar dang ni/ /rkan dang spyi bor gang gnas pa/ /gang tshe A ka'i sde grangs las/ /a yi kha yi brgyab na gnas/ /i tshen phrag pa lag pa dang / /tshigs rnams la ni de
bzhin no/ /dpung pa dang ni lag pa dang / /lag pa g.yon par rab tu brtag /dpyi dang brla dang byin pa dang / /rkang pa g.yas g.yon de bzhin no/ /gzugs de yi ni grangs mnyam pas/ /ta tshan shin du
dngos grub ster/ /u tshan de bzhin dbus dang ni/ /lag pa ru ni yongs su bshad/ /rkang pa yang ni ri ti'i tshan/ /'das pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa yin/ /de bzhin nyid kyi sbyor ldan pa'i/ /sngags pa rnams

kyis shin du mthong / /lhun gyis grub pa'i dngos grub pa/ /me tog gis mdzes phreng ba bzhin/ /rang rgyud kyis ni nang nyid du/ /lha mchog dag ni bya ba yin/ /dgongs pa la sogs rnam pa kun/ /de nyid las ni bdag

'grub 'gyur/ /tsha ba'i gzhi bzhi ste sbyor bas/ /mkhas pa yis ni sgo rnams bya/ /ka tsa na ta pa tshan yang / /dbus dang shar las sogs sngon 'gro/ /'gro la phan pa'i 'dod pa yang / /ma spel bar ni mthong ba yin/ /

thams cad kyang ni rdzogs yi ge/ /yi ge ha yis mchod par bya/ /sna tshogs pa ni 'byin byed cing / /'gro ba dus gsum gcig pa'i dngos/ /yi ge a ni lus su bya/ /lhag ma rnam pa dang bcas pa/ /mtshams med lnga
yi sbyor ba las/ /sngags pa 'gro ba phan par ston/ /sha thog mthar gnas sngags las skye/ /dbang bskur gsum po spyi las skye/ /gzugs med rtogs pa'i chos rnams ni/ /skad cig gcig gis nges sbyor gyur/ /
de tshe dkyil 'khor med byas pa/ /'jig rten pa yi chos dgar 'gyur/ /a ku ha gnas byang phyogs gnas/ /yod pa nyid kyang dus gsum 'das/ /gang dang gang nas byung ba yi/ /gsang sngags bsam gyis mi khyab

gsungs/ /de dang de ni bzhugs gyur pa/ /rang gi mtshan ma gcig shos nyid/ /gzugs med 'di la gnas yod pa/ /cha ni gsum zhes bya bar 'gyur/ /steng 'og phyogs kyi cha rnams su/ /dngos med pa ni rnam par gnas/ /

dngos po gcig gyur mthong ba dang / /'gro bcas tshangs pa 'gro bdag nyid/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po las/ /smon lam la sogs bsgom bya ba'o/ /'gro don gtogs 'dod pa yi yon tan gyur bdag la/ /dgyes pa'i bde mchog

dga' ba'i 'dod pa mdzod/ /sngon chad mdzad pa'i smon lam rab mchog dgongs nas ni/ /thub pa rdo rje'i tshig mchog rnam par dbye bar gsol/ /nor bu rin chen dag gis rnam brgyan sku yi mchog /'gro ba'i don byed sring mo bdag

la brten par mdzad/ /lhag pa'i snying rje las byung rab mchog ldan pa'i sku/ /bdag ni yongs su bzung la chos rnams don yod mdzod/ /sring mos kyang ni khyad par du/ /de ltar bskul ba tsam gyis ni/ /de nas yongs su 'dzin mdzad de/ /

rig pa'i pad ma dpal du mdzad/ /shin du snyan cing yid 'ong dbyangs kyis ni/ /phan pas myur du 'gro ba gnyis med 'dir snod gyur/ /bla ma bdag ni gal te gson par mchis bzhed na/ /dga' ba las byung chos dga' bdag la dgyes

par mdzod/ /'gro ba dang ni 'ong dang gnas pa tsam 'di ni/ /nam yang ltos par gyur pa dag gi mnga' ba lags/ /kun du song ba'i bdag nyid can gyi dam tshig ston/ /'dod pa'i yon tan rnams dang khyed bdag 'dod pa mdzod/ /dgongs

pa'i ye shes rdo rje yis/ /sangs rgyas yon tan gcig la bzhugs/ /bzlas brjod sbyin bsreg de bzhin khrus/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su brtags pa mdzad/ /'dod pa med cing chags la zhi/ /de yang don dam dag gyur yin/ /

spyod dus de bzhin sngags pa ni/ /bzlas brjod dngos po med pa yin/ /bsnyengs pa yang ni yid bzang ldan/ /mda' dang rig byed yon tan dang / /zung dang zla dkyil rnal 'byor pa/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gzhag par bya/ /ha yi sde tshan ka

sde dang / /bcu gnyis phyed phyed dag tu sbyar/ /gshin rje'i gshed kyi gzugs 'di ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la dgod/ /de nas sngags pa mdun 'dug ste/ /dgongs pa'i don gyis brtag par bya/ /phung po khams la

sogs blta ba/ /brda las ji ltar lus yin bzhin/ /ma byin len pa byang chub sems/ /kun rdzob bstan pa rdzun smra ba/ /phung po srog chags gyur pa ste/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bud med yin/ /mi sbyin tshig

dang rkang pa ste/ /de bzhin rten pa nyid kyang ni/ /dus gsum sbyor ba gcig pu ru/ /sngags pa yis ni de bya'o/ /bshang ba zhes ni yul la bshad/ /cig pa zhes ni dbang po yin/ /de dag za bar bshad pa ni/ /ma skyes gcig pur

mthong ba'o/ /khrag gi pags par yang dag bshad/ /sa bon lus shes bya ba yin/ /rkang ni sems kyi kun rtog pa/ /za ba dngos med gyur pa'o/ /smon lam dbang gis 'di rnams ni/ /bi mu ra shu pa sa 'di/ /lha rnams

sbyor ba'i chos nyid du/ /bdud rtsi zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /dgongs pa yis ni bshad pa la/ /byis pa rnams ni yi ger rtog /rdo rje theg la gnas khyod kyang / /chos nyid de yang mi shes so/ /rtog pa kun las

rnam 'das pas/ /chos kyi dbyings te mkha' dang mtshungs/ /de 'dra 'jig rten rgyang pan pa/ /mthon po'i gsang gis rtog par byed/ /yi ge gang gis mi gang zhig /'gro la gsal bar rtog byed pa/ /'gro don gcig

pa'i sbyor ba las/ /de nyid kyi ni de nyid mthong / /gang zhig rnam smin smin pa yi/ /sems ni dngos grub la gzhol ba/ /rdzogs longs spyod pa'i skur sbyor las/ /dngos po med pa nyid du byung / /bdag nyid bsam gyis mi khyab

gzugs/ /kun rdzob don gyi gnyen por 'byung / /sprul pa'i lus las sngags pas ni/ /sgyu ma bzhin du ston par byed/ /gsang ba'i dngos po de nyid 'di/ /'jam dpal ye shes dam pa'o/ /rdo rje gsum gnas sbyor ba yis/ /

bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgom/ /nam mkhar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /phung po dgon pa chen por 'dod/ /gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de bzhin nyid gnas sa phyogs yin/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dpag

bsam shing / /dngos grub sna tshogs me tog ldan/ /sprul pa'i 'bras bu shin tu mdzes/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub ri/ /dngos med dben pa nyams dga' ba/ /rdo rje zhes bya des bsgrub bya/ /phung sogs yan lag
thams cad de/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba dngos grub gyur/ /sngags 'don par ni gang gyur pa/ /bsdus pa sngags ni gcig pu pa/ /lus sogs rdo rje gsum la ni/ /rdo rje 'jam pa bsgom par bya/ /lus la sogs pa
rdo rje gsum/ /de nyid gsum nas spro bar bya/ /rdo rje gsum dang lus sbyor las/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas yang dag rtog /sems sbyor ba ni dpag tshad yin/ /lnga bcu

gnyis gyur gang yin pa/ /brgya brgya pa nas mngon phyogs la/ /ci rigs gcig pa'i yang dag rtogs/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'bar gcig stsol/ /dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du/ /'bar ba'i rdo rje snang ba yis/ /sa la sogs pa

brgyan pa ni/ /de ni snang ba zhes bshad do/ /tshangs pa dbang po la sogs lha/ /dad pas de la phyag kyang byed/ /'di ni mi snang byed pa ste/ /ting 'dzin 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid/ /rnam par smin pa ldog gyur cing / /ji skad gsungs pa 'grub par

'gyur/ /phung po la sogs grangs mnyam par/ /mi bskyod la sogs rab tu brtag /bshang gci sbyangs las de gyur pa/ /gang zhig dam tshig ces bya'o/ /dam tshig ces bya de dag mchog /mi phyed rdo rje gsum 'byung bas/ /dkon

mchog gsum ni mnyam byas te/ /bdag med pa yang bsgom par bya/ /dkon mchog gsum ni lcags gsum yin/ /bdag med ces bya kha yin te/ /gang 'di rnam rtog gcig nyid du/ /bcug pa ril bu yin par 'dod/ /sangs rgyas

rnams kyis mi byed pa'i/ /sgom pa sems kyi dam pa'o/ /de ltar de nyid shes bsgoms na/ /skad cig gis rnam rdo rjer 'gyur/ /'khor lo 'od 'phro mtshungs par gyur/ /rang gi sngags kyis rnam sgoms nas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas bsgoms

na/ /sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur bar bshad/ /sum bcu rtsa drug gnas sbyor ba'i/ /ri rab kyi ni rdul phran rnams/ /de snyed de yi rjes 'brang rnams/ /dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'o/ /gnas ni lha yi sbyor ba ste/ /sna ni

ri rab ces bya'o/ /bdag nyid chen po sum bcu bdun/ /nam mkhar spro ba bsam mi khyab/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag po ste/ /'di dag 'khor du gyur pa yin/ /'jig rten pa yi rang ngo bo/ /phyi yi ri rab brtag pa yin/ /dam

tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/ /'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya/ /'khor lo dngos grub rnyed sla ba/ /skad cig sbyor bas bsgrub pa'o/ /rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyis/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms na/ /rdo rje kun

gyi gnas mchog ste/ /thugs kyi rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /ri rab sum bcu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi/ /de snyed bud med de yi ni/ /gsum 'gyur gnas su 'gyur ba yin/ /khams gsum gyi ni rdo rje che/ /

drug po yis ni phyag byas 'gyur/ /rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni yang dag bshad/ /pad ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa/ /rang sngags rdo rje las byung ba/ /chos rnams kun gyi gnas bsgoms na/ /rdo rje chos

dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /sum bcu rtsa drug gnas sbyor ba'i/ /ri rab rdul phran grangs snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog gi ni/ /dkyil 'khor la bdag bdag nyid 'jog /gos med mnyam nyid ye shes kyi/ /rdo rje pad mo grub

bcas sbyin/ /so sor rtog pa zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag bshad/ /shin du grangs med bskal par ni/ /grangs kyi ming gis gnas par ni/ /gnas shing sgom par byed pa yin/ /de yi ye shes lngar ldan pa/ /
sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ni/ /'jig rten phan phyir gsungs pa rnams/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i/ /yon tan gsum ni yongs su bsten/ /'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra ba'i/ /rang sngags las

byung ral gri ni/ /blo ldan lag pa de bzhag na/ /rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rang gi sngags kyi khong chud 'di/ /ho ho hU~M de khams gsum pa/ /pad ma spangs pa'i tshangs pa cher/ /rnal 'byor pa de 'gyur ba yin/ /khams gsum

kun gyis cher mchod cing / /tshangs pa lha min phyag byas pa/ /stong gsum mi yi mchog gcig pu/ /dpag chen po yi tshangs par 'gyur/ /thugs kyi rdo rje mchog bsgoms pas/ /dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa dag /sku gsung

thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /de ni de ma thag tu 'thob/ /rang gi rdo rje ting 'dzin 'di/ /dngos med gcig pu yang dag byung / /byang grol la yang de mi gnas/ /ral gri kha dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /oM ni ril bu tsa na ka'i/ /'bru tshad tsam du
bsams nas ni/ /dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs/ /bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms na/ /byang chub ye shes 'od po cher/ /blo ldan de ma thag de 'gyur/ /'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser mdog gam/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i

mdog 'dra ba'i/ /tsa na ka yi 'bru tshod tsam/ /yi ge'i dam pa AHbsam mo/ /de yi dbus su lha yi gzugs/ /khar bcug nas ni rnam bsgoms na/ /byang chub ye shes 'od po che/ /de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i dbus

na gnas pa yi/ /tsa na ka yi 'bru tshod tsam/ /yi ge hU~M ni rnam bsams te/ /dbus su rang gi lha bsams na/ /khar bcug nas ni rnam bsams na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che/ /dpal ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur/ /'dzam bu'i

chu bo'i gser mdog dang / /nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ /rnam par snang mdzad mkha' dbyings kyi/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms la/ /lag tu 'khor lo rnam bsgoms na/ /'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /

rdo rje'i sku mdog sbyor ba yang / /'di ni ye shes mchog sgrub pa'o/ /'khor lo chen po'i rigs bsgoms te/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser mdog gam/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od 'dra ba'i/ /nam mkha'i

dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje mi phyed rab bsgoms te/ /lag tu rdo rje bsgoms na ni/ /rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rdo rje mchog gi bsgrub pa 'di/ /rdo rje sku yi sbyor ba las/ /rdo rje rigs kyi mchog

bsgom pa/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /nam mkha' khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /rin chen la ni rin chen bsgom/ /de nyid lag tu legs bzhag na/ /rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rin chen mchog gi bsgrub pa 'di/ /rin

chen sku yi sbyor ba las/ /rin chen rigs kyi mchog bsgom pa/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /tshe dpag med pa rab bsgoms la/ /lag tu pad ma bsgoms na ni/ /pad ma'i rig

pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /pad ma mchog gi bsgrub pa 'di/ /pad ma'i skur ni sbyor ba las/ /pad ma'i rigs chen bsgoms pa ni/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /don yod mchog ni rab

bsgoms la/ /lag tu ral gri rab bsgoms na/ /ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /dam tshig mchog ni 'di bsgrub pa/ /sku yi dam tshig sbyor ba las/ /dam tshig rdo rje rigs bsgoms pa/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis

bya/ /bsgrub bya rdo rje'i dbye ba yis/ /mdung thung rdo rje lcags kyu sogs/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bsgrub pa yis/ /bsam gtan nyid kyis bsgrub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig chen po 'byung ba yi/ /dam tshig dngos grub ces

bya ba'i/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum dbang phyug /sna tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung nyid/ /'gog dang lam ni bzhi po ni/ /lam gyi bzhi mdor yang dag bshad/ /bsgrub pa po ni

gnas ming can/ /shing gcig drung du yang dag rtog /chos dang rdzogs longs spyod ming can/ /sna tshogs mtshan gcig yang dag dgod/ /mtshan ma rkyen gyi gzugs can no/ /'byin dang rngub pa nyid dang ni/ /gnas

pa yis ni nyer mdzes pa/ /yid rton pa yi mnyam sbyor la/ /rab tu zhi ba'i zhi gnas su/ /dus gsum rtog pa gcig las 'das/ /rdo rje lcags kyu khyad par du/ /sgrub pa po ni rtag tu bsgrub/ /sbyor gsum sngags

kyi skyes bu ni/ /sbyor gsum rdo rje can bsam pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi lcags kyu'o/ /sangs rgyas ye shes blo can gyi/ /mi gsal gsal bar yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo las/ /'gro ba thams cad dgug
par bya/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa yin/ /gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de nyid sngags don rnal 'byor pas/ /'gro ba 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyang / /mi gsal

sbyor bas sbyor bar byed/ /gang yang dam tshig phyogs rnams ni/ /mkha' dbyings dbye bas gnas pa rnams/ /de nyid rdo rje bkug nas ni/ /sngags rig pas ni spyad par bya/ /nam mkha'i khams ni dgug pa 'di/ /dam
tshig chen po rdo rje can/ /sngags kyi de nyid gcig sbyor las/ /lcags kyu de rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig rnams ni dgug pa'i mchog /rgyal gnas lcags kyu bsams nas ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad

'khor lo che/ /rdo rje pad ma la sogs bya/ /me long lta bu'i sngags pas ni/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par bsgom/ /lag tu sku dang gsung thugs kyi/ /lcags kyu la sogs rab tu bsgom/ /de ni sbyor ba 'di nyid
kyis/ /de nyid las ni lha rnams dgod/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang / /dngos grub kun ster las byed 'gyur/ /sku dang gsung thugs thams cad ni/ /mtshan nyid gcig par bsgom par bya/ /lce yi rdo rje sbyor

ba yis/ /gsung gi rdo rje de mnyam bsgom/ /brtul zhugs can gyis phyi nang gnyis/ /gsang ba'i rdo rje mchog mchod do/ /dngos med dam tshig sbyor ba yis/ /ji lta ji ltar rab bsgrub pa/ /dam tshig gsum gyi rnal
'byor pa'i/ /de ni yang dag yin par bshad/ /gsang ba'i snying po bsdus pa yi/ /dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'dod/ /bcom ldan dam tshig chen po yi/ /rnal 'byor pas ni de skad gsungs/ /de nas
phyag na rdo rje ni/ /go byed gsang ba yang dag gsungs/ /gang zhig shes na rnal 'byor pa'i/ /mnyam bzhag mchog ni thob 'gyur ba'i/ /gsang dbang de nyid dam pa yi/ /de ni de yis yang dag bshad/ /rnal
'byor chen po gcig bdag nyid/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas/ /byas na dam tshig yang dag pa/ /sha chen la ni yang dag sbyar/ /dngos med pa yi sha chen gyi/ /dam tshig mchog la gnas nas

ni/ /blo ldan bdag nyid sgom pa ni/ /rdo rje dngos grub longs spyod ster/ /rdzogs longs spyod yul bshang ba yin/ /de nyid ye shes dbang po gcig /dam tshig 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso
bor 'gyur/ /longs spyod rdzogs phung las byung ba/ /glang po'i shar ni de rab brtag /dam tshig gcig tu legs sbyor las/ /mngon shes lnga dag thob par 'gyur/ /dbang po gnyis ni rta sha ste/ /dngos
med de nyid las sbyor las/ /dam tshig gcig tu legs sbyor na/ /mi snang gnas kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /phung sogs yan lag gang gyur pa/ /dngos med de ni khyi sha yin/ /dam tshig gcig tu yang
dag sbyor/ /dngos grub thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas spyan ba lang sha / khro bo'i rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig gcig tu yang dag sbyor/ /rdo rje dgug pa'i dam pa'o/ /
'di ni 'jig rten par gyur las/ /dgongs pas gcig shos bzlog pa yin/ /sha chen dang ni bshang gci dang / /glang po rta khyi ba lang dag /mi rtog gcig pa'i sgrub pa yis/ /dam tshig gcig

tu de 'grub 'gyur/ /bstan pas 'di ni sgrub pa ni/ /sngags kyi longs spyod rnal 'byor pa/ /rdo rje sbyor ba'i gsang ba yis/ /sgrub pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de ni sangs rgyas byin brlab cing / /rnam

kun rdo rje can gsum dang / /snying gar ye shes dam tshig dang / /dbu rgyan la ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas thams cad tshim 'gyur ba'i/ /'di ni dam tshig sdom pa'o/ /dngos grub thams cad ster ba'i mchog /dam tshig mchog 'dis

rab tu bya/ /dam tshig kun gyi dam pa ste/ /rdo rje zas kyi ting 'dzin to/ /de nas 'gro la phan pa'i mgon/ /gtso bo rnam snang chen po la/ /gsang ba'i dgongs pa dam pa ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas slar yang zhus/ /gang zhig spyi bor brtags

pa ni/ /gcig pu nyid du gyur pa des/ /ri rab sum bcu rtsa drug tu/ /mu stegs rnams kyis 'tshal mi 'gyur/ /rang gi bstan bcos brda yis ni/ /phyi rol pa de rnam rtog la/ /ting 'dzin brtags pa 'di dag kyang / /'di la rang gi

ngo bo med/ /tshangs sgo mdzod kyi rgyud las ni/ /ri rab gcig dang bcas par bshad/ /byis pa mchog ni rmongs byed pa/ /gsung 'di skye bo ltung bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan bdag po 'dis/ /rdo rje can la slar gsungs pa/ /

legs so rdo rje legs pa che/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod legs pa/ /rkyen dang nyan thos theg pa dang / /'dir ni nga yis gsal bshad pa/ /sangs rgyas kyis bshad ye shes dag /theg pa chen po mi mthong ngo / /tshad yod pa

dang yongs chad pa'i/ /rang gi lus la gang bshad de/ /ye shes de rnams dri med 'dod/ /khron pa'i rus sbal zhes bya'o/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam ye shes/ /rdo rje theg pa bla med pa/ /mchog sbyin nga ni khyed bzhin du/ /

rgya chen de yis mi mthong ngo / /rdo rje theg pa rgya mtsho ste/ /de yis yang dag ma mthong bas/ /rang gi lung ni tshad ma yis/ /gzhan yod pa ni min zhes smra/ /theg pa chen la gsang ba rnams/ /srang la bcal te de smra ba/ /
de rnams sngon bzhin gsal min zhes/ /nga yi tshig las bltas te smra/ /de nyid rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas pa bsgom pa rnams/ /gang gis shes na rtog med 'gyur/ /gsang

ba dgongs pas gsungs pa yin/ /sngags kyi de nyid don byang chub/ /sna tshogs dngos grub 'bras bu ste/ /dgongs na ji lta ji lta bar/ /de ni nga yis yang dag bshad/ /dam tshig rdo rje lce la ni/ /rdo rje can gyis hU~M

bsams te/ /rnal 'byor pas ni bdud rtsi lnga/ /zos na rdo rje gsum thob 'gyur/ /AHdang oM gyi gsang ba dag /'di ni rdo rje gsum mchog ste/ /'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od chen 'gyur/ /'di ni rdo rje

'i bdud rtsi yi/ /phreng 'gyur dam tshig rdo rjer bshad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'byung / /ting nge 'dzin ni bshad pa yin/ /rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig mchog /sku gsung rdo rje can du 'gyur/ /de nyid sems can thams cad

kyi/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i rgya mtsho che/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje dam tshig dngos grub mchog /rdo rje bdag nyid de snang byed/ /gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/ /sangs

rgyas zhing ni thams cad du/ /grub nas 'di ni der sbyor ba'i/ /rig pa 'dzin par de 'gyur ro/ /sku yi rdo rje bsgom bdag nyid/ /grub mchog dam tshig la gnas pa/ /mi snang gyur pa kun gyi mchog /stong khams dag ni

snang bar byed/ /lha yi bu mo mchog phrogs nas/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ma legs sbyor/ /gang gA'i bye snyed ces bya ba'i/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus kun/ /dpe de dang ni grangs gcig pa/ /sangs rgyas dus gsum

rnam spangs pa/ /lag tu skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/ /rdo rje mig gis de mthong 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni gang dag tu/ /sgra grag pa ni ji snyed pa/ /rna ba la gnas ma nor bar/ /skad cig gis ni de kun thos/ /gang gA'i bye snyed zhing dag

na/ /sku la sogs pa gsum gyis mtshan/ /sems zhes bshad pa'i ston pa mchog /sems can rnams kyi de nyid rig /bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i mchog gis 'gengs/ /rdo rje bsam mi khyab sngon

'gro/ /rang gi rna ba sems bcas pas/ /gang gA'i bye ma'i ming can gyi/ /gnas kyi dngos grub bshad pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon shes nas/ /'di ni yang dag bka' stsal to/ /mngon shes drug ni don grub pa'i/ /

de ni sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur/ /gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/ /'khor rnams kyis ni rab mdzes pas/ /sku sogs rdo rje gsum 'di ni/ /'jig rten khams rnams kun du spyod/ /yid rton bde gcig bsten pa ste/ /de nyid

gsum mnyam gnyis spyod du/ /bsten te dam tshig gcig gyur pa/ /ye shes nye bar sgrub pa'o/ /yid rton mnyam pa'i sbyor ba las/ /sgrub pa yi ni dam tshig 'gyur/ /'bras bu mngon sum byas sbyor ba/ /sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa'o/ /
rkyen dang nyan thos mdo sde pa/ /'di dang ldan pa rab tu bsngags/ /sems la dmigs dang 'dir sbyor ba/ /skad cig gis kyang de 'grub 'gyur/ /bsnyen pa'i dam tshig sbyor gcig dang / /nye bar bsgrub

par gang gyur dang / /sgrub pa'i dam tshig nyid dang ni/ /sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa yin/ /'di la yang dag 'jug 'gyur ba/ /ji lta ji ltar 'jig rten sogs/ /sa dang shing gi rin chen sogs/ /lha nyid du ni rab tu brtag /chos kyi dbye bas

shes par bya/ /rdo rje ye shes sgrub pa po/ /bsten pa'i dam tshig yang dag sbyor/ /byang chub mchog ni rnam par sgom/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ /ro dang reg bya chos rnams la/ /dngos grub mchog ni rnam dpyad pa/ /de ni nye bar sgrub par 'gyur/ /sngags

pa gang yin bsgom nas ni/ /bskul bar sgrub par byed pa yin/ /rang sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs/ /de ni sgrub pa chen por 'dod/ /bsnyen pa rdo rje bdud rtsi gang / /sngags pas kun du brtag par bya/ /dngos grub 'dod pas gnas pa ni/ /dbu rgyan la ni mchog gang bsam/ /

'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /de nyid gsum gsang yang dag 'byung / /sngags kyi de nyid don gnyer ba'i/ /sgrub pa pos ni dben pa bsten/ /sna tshogs lung gi yang dag rtog /sngags ni dgon pa chen por 'dod/ /

de yi dpag bsam shing longs spyod/ /sa phyogs zhes ni yongs su bsgrags/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /rnam par dben pa chen por bshad/ /ri bor rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /de rigs dngos med las

byung ba'o/ /'di 'dra'i dben pa'i mtshon pa ru/ /der ni 'od chen rnams gnas te/ /gnas med pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /rtag tu dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sgrub pa ni/ /chen pos de skad bka' stsal to/ /
dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sogs/ /'jig rten pa rnams smra ba gsal/ /bsnyen pa sku yi brtul zhugs mchog /blo dang ldan pas rdo rje bzhis/ /rdo rje gsum gnyis med sbyor bas/ /bsgoms na dngos grub thob

par 'gyur/ /me long zhes bya dgon pa che/ /rin chen zhes bya dben pa'o/ /chen po zhes bya 'od dpag med/ /don yod par ni ring por yin/ /chu ngogs dag pa'i chos kyi cha/ /gnas lnga dag tu rab tu brtag /ji srid don

ni sbyor ba bzhis/ /yi ge oM ni sdom par 'gyur/ /ji ltar nam mkha'i mtshan nyid gcig /rang gi mtshan nyid 'dor mi byed/ /de bzhin de nyid gsum bzhi'i phyed/ /yi ge oM gcig sdom pa'o/ /gnas med gnas pa zhes bya ba'i/ /

oM gcig gis ni 'gro la khyab/ /de nyid mi gsal sbyor dbang po/ /gtso bo rang nyid bzlog pa yin/ /la la glang po spangs nas ni/ /rjes la dbyibs ni tshol bar byed/ /de bzhin ma 'ongs sngags pa ni/ /oM las sdom pa gzhan du 'dod/ /

gcig gnyis gsum dang bzhi dang lnga/ /dus thub de bzhin nor can dang / /phan tshun sbyor nas brjod pa las/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i grangs su 'gyur/ /bcom ldan gcig kyang du ma ste/ /tshig tu brjod pa rnam par spangs/ /brda tsam du ni oM zhes bya/ /dngos med sbyor ba'i

chos nyid yin/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa ste/ /sku gsum du ma yang dag bshad/ /gsum po yang dag 'dzin pas ni/ /des na oM ni sdom pa yin/ /dang po gcig pu mi bskyod dgod/ /de nyid sdom par gyur pa yin/ /

brda ru brjod pa sna tshogs pa/ /bsams nas sdom pa kun du bshad/ /mi phyed nam mkha'i sbyor ba yin/ /bsam dang gdon dang rnam par bral/ /rten 'brel rig las yang dag 'byung / /rjes bcas zhes bya de bsgom bya/ /

rtag tu 'byung ba'i ye shes zhig /mig la sogs pa bdun brgya la/ /g.yas dang gcig shos zla phyed de/ /shes rab thabs kyang sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag zung gyur zla ba ste/ /rdo rje ming can phyed dang gnyis/ /de ni sbyor ba 'di nyid

kyis/ /dngos grub myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhag ni mi thub zla phyed dang / /zla gcig zla ba phyed gnyis min/ /'jig rten pa yi zhag dbye bas/ /rgya cher ngas ni bshad pa yin/ /gsang ba mchog las byung ba ni/ /zla ba phyed kyis

sgrub par gsungs/ /de nyid nye bar 'gyur bshad pa'i/ /sdom pa'i yul ni dam pa yin/ /gang tshe shes rab thabs ye shes/ /de bzhin nyid shes las byung ba/ /sangs rgyas sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje mi phyed 'od po

che/ /byang chub skad cig gis sbyor ba/ /rdo rje sku ni byed par 'gyur/ /srog la sogs dang grangs mnyam pa'i/ /bdag med phyogs bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /rdo rje byin brlabs mdzad

par 'gyur/ /'das dang ma 'ongs sangs rgyas dang / /gang zhig phyogs bcur bzhugs pa rnams/ /chos sku mchog gi rnal 'byor pa/ /sangs rgyas de rnams byin gyis rlob/ /'das pa rnams ni chos sku yis/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i

phyogs na bzhugs/ /sngags mchog bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /ma 'ongs rnams kyis byin gyis rlob/ /sangs rgyas gsum la dbye ba ni/ /cung zad tsam yang yod ma yin/ /'on kyang dngos med las byung ba'i/ /sngags pa rnams la byin gyis rlob/ /
phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms la/ /sku ni ji lta bar 'tsham pa/ /de ltar byin gyis rlob par mdzad/ /rig dang ma rig yang dag ldan/ /srog la sogs
te bcu gnyis bshad/ /dus kyi nyis 'gyur lam la sogs/ /de nyid zla ba la sogs 'gyur/ /zla ba la sogs grangs mnyam pas/ /nyi ma bcu gnyis ming can yin/ /khyab 'jug de nyid dbye ba yis/ /lam rtsom
pa ni brtags pa yis/ /de nyid du ni sgrub pa mchog /sdom pa yul zhes bshad pa yin/ /sngags dang dngos med de byed pa/ /mgal me 'khor lo bskor dang mtshungs/ /rtog pa las byung de 'di ni/ /dngos med

pa ni bsgom pas so/ /ma 'ongs pa yi skye bo ni/ /lha yi gzugs la 'dud par byed/ /mig dang de bzhin rna ba sna/ /lce dang de bzhin lus ngag dang / /pags pa rkang par yang dag ldan/ /'dzin pa dag ni mi nus

pa/ /lta dang nyan dang dri dang ro/ /reg bya rnams ni dngos med pa/ /rang bzhin sems med gyur pa yi/ /'jim gzugs sangs rgyas sku can te/ /'on kyang 'gro ba'i bla ma'i sku/ /sangs rgyas byin gyi byin rlabs kyis/ /de bzhin

sngags sbyor bdag nyid can/ /dngos med rdo rje'i sku nyid yin/ /shing dang sa dang rin chen sogs/ /rang gi lha yi gzugs byas la/ /rang gi chos ni spangs nas su/ /tshig gi lam de ston par byed/ /sku gsung thugs dang ldan

pa mchog /cho 'phrul de 'dra ga las byung / /de nas dad sogs yang dag pas/ /slar yang de la gsol 'debs kyang / /gsol ba 'debs pa tsam gyis ni/ /de dang 'dra bar ga la 'gyur/ /phyi rol chos la gang zhig dga'/ /lha

rnams thams cad spong ba yin/ /de ltar sku las sku byung ba/ /dpal ldan chos 'di'ang gsum gyi lam/ /byin rlabs pa dag longs spyod na/ /gsung gi rdo rje can du byed/ /'das dang ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams/ /phyogs

bcu na ni gang bzhugs pa/ /byung dang 'byung 'gyur de rnams ni/ /mi phyed gsum gyi lam du 'gyur/ /yid rton bde ba zhi bdag nyid/ /de bzhin nyid shes lam byung ba/ /yi ge gcig ni gsum drug 'di/ /rang nyid 'gro ba'i khar

brjod do/ /de yi byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas/ /rdo rje mi phyed rdo rje can/ /gang gzhan sangs rgyas kyis gsungs dang / /'gro ba'i sgrar ni 'di gyur te/ /dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum

rnal 'byor/ /gsung gi rdo rje mi phyed pa/ /rdo rje can mchog de byin rlob/ /'jug pa gnas pa'i sbyor ba dang / /ldang ba dang ni yang dag ldan/ /gsung gi rdo rje dngos med pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob/ /ji ltar

'khor los sgyur rgyal ni/ /tshig gi lam gyis las byed 'jug /gsung byin brlabs pas sngags pa ni/ /de bzhin don yod nyid du byed/ /der ni yang dag bshad pa 'di/ /sgrub pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /sangs rgyas

de rnams byin rlob pa/ /sdom pa yul gyi dam pa'o/ /rdo rje thugs ni 'dzin rgyal po/ /de ni bdag la byin rlob mdzad/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum sbyor bas/ /nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa'i gnas/ /gang zhig
byung 'byung 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /de yi byin gyis rlab pa'i gnas/ /lam gsum las ni byung ba mdzad/ /sku yis ston par mdzad pa mchog /rang sangs rgyas ni

bsgom pa yin/ /mdo sde pa dang nyan thos kyi'ang / /smra ba sgrub pa por gyur yin/ /sems ni rnal 'byor ldan mchog gi/ 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa'o/ /'gro 'ong gnas dang bral ba ni/ /rdo dang sa ni dbyig byed pa/ /lus

la sogs pa mtshon pa yis/ /'on kyang de ni gsung du 'gyur/ /sems dang lus dang mi ldan pa'i/ /de bzhin nyid ni 'gro don can/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gcig /gyur kyang so sor bstan pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje

chos dag gam/ /de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung / /sku gsung thugs kyi sangs rgyas sogs/ /rdo rje gsum po mi phyed brtag /de 'das rmongs pa'i bdag nyid can/ /so sor rtog pa 'gag par 'gyur/ /sku la sogs

pa'i grangs mnyam pa/ /sangs rgyas kyang ni gang rtog gyur/ /stong pa nyid du sbyor ba yang / /de ni gsal bar the tshom med/ /sna tshogs sbyor gyur sngags rnams ni/ /gang zhig stong par mngon du byed/ /'das pa dag ni de thams cad/ /rmongs pa'i

bdag nyid de 'gas 'gyur/ /nyan thos rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi/ /byang chub bsdus nas bshad pa yin/ /'jig rten pa yi gang bshad pa/ /mdor bsdus pa ni 'di yin no/ /sangs rgyas yang na rdo rje chos/ /yang na rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung / /

rmongs pas 'di las 'das na ni/ /de ni 'gas par the tshom med/ /dgong pa lung bstan la gnas nas/ /gsang ba dam pa yang dag bsrungs/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /sku la sogs

pa'i gsang ba mchog /rdo rje sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i/ /dam tshig bsgrub pa'i mchog bstan pa'i/ /le'u bcu gnyis gsungs pa yin/ /dgongs pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i brgyud rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang /

zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /thang chen po dang rgyal mtshan red mo yis/ 'di yi zhus chen legs par bgyis pa'o/ /stag lung brgyud 'bum dang bstun pa'i zhu dag grub/ /

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra dz+nyA na sa muts+tsha ya nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji skad du/
bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa'i rgyud las ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa'o/ /byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' drug stong gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom

ldan 'das ma rigs pa dang / sems las byung ba dang / sems zhes bgyi ba ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nyon cig /

ye shes gsum rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba de'i phyir ye shes gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhin no/ /byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes gsum rdo rje'i ngo bo ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa/ 'gag pa med pa/ skye ba med pa de'i rkyen gyis ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang snang ba nye bar thob pa dang stong pa chen po'o/ /de yang rtogs par dka' ba'o/ /'on kyang snang ba dang bcas par brjod par

bya'o/ /ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis sems las byung ba ste/ de ni snang ba mched pa dang shin du stong pa zhes gsungs so/ /sems las byung ba'i rkyen gyis sems te/ de ni snang ba dang stong pa ste/ sems dang sems las byung ba dang / ma rig

pa'i rang bzhin bdag med pa'o/ /gsum po de dang de 'od gsal ba las byung bas rdo rje'i rang bzhin no/ /de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pas cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams cang mi smra bar 'dug pa mthong nas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ci'i phyir cang mi smra bar gyur pas 'dug /de nas

byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te gtugs nas gzhan yang zhus pa/ e ma'o ston pa rtog par dka' ba rnam par shes pa gsum gyi dbye ba mchog tu zab pa bcom ldan
'das bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang 'od gsal ba las byung ba rnam par shes pa de nyid sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya la/

de ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i bdag nyid de las rtog pa gnyis su gyur te bdag dang gzhan dag tu'o/ /rnam par shes pa de'i bzhon pa rlung ngo / /rlung las me'o/ /me las

chu'o/ /chu las sa'o/ de rnams las phung po lnga dang / skye mched drug dang yul lnga ste/ de dag thams cad ni rnam par shes pa rlung dang 'dres pa'o/ /de nas rnam par shes pa gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi snang ba rab tu gsal

bar spyod pa rjes su myong bar byed de/ snang ba'i rgyus rang bzhin rnams yang dag par 'byung ngo / /de la 'od gsal ba gnas med pa/ 'gag pa med pa/ skye ba med pa/ don dam pa'i bden pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/

de las byung ba'i mun pa'i snang ba ni ma rig pa'o/ /de'i rang bzhin lta ba dang 'khrul pa dang rnam par g.yeng ba dang brjed ngas pa dang le lo dang mi smra ba dang mi gsal ba'o/ /ma rig pa sems las byung ba ste/ nyi ma'i

snang ba lta bu dang / shin tu gsal ba'i smyig rgyu lta bu'o/ /de'i rang bzhin 'dod chags dang dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang drag po la sogs pa dang / kun rdzob tu mngon sum du skyes pa'i gzugs dang lha'i

tshogs dang mtshan ma dang rdo rje'i brda'o/ /sems las byung ba las sems te/ zla ba'i snang ba dang shin tu gsal ba'i chu'i zla ba lta bu'o/ /rang bzhin ni 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa'o/ /kun rdzob tu ni

mngon sum gyi/ bud med dang b+ha ga dang pad+ma dang lha mo'i tshogs kyi brda'o/ /rdo rje dang pad+ma yang dag par sbyor ba las shes rab kyi ye shes byung ba las rang gi rdo rje'i 'bad pa las me'o/ /me las chu ste/ nur nur po'i rnam pa dang /

de las mer mer po dang nar nar po dang gor gor po dag go/ de nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i snang ba la khrag gi gong bu mkhrang gyur rnams so/ /de khu ba dang khrag dag gis bskyed pa'o/ /de nas dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyar

ba las 'dod chags so/ /'dod chags las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / bar ma'i 'dod chags rab tu shes par bya ste/ de'i phyir lus te/ lus las byung ba'i skyil dkrung bcing ba la sogs pa dang / gsung gi
phyag rgya'i thabs su gyur pa/ A li kA li las yang dag par byung ba'i sngags dang / sems kyi phyag rgya'i thabs su gyur pa sa bon dang mtshan ma las lhar dmigs pa'o/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i yul
ni dbang po gnyis snyoms par zhugs pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje dang pad+ma yang dag par sbyor ba ni sems dang sems las byung ba dag gi thabs su gyur pa'o/ /sems dang sems las byung ba mnyam

par sbyar ba ni bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs su gyur pa'o/ /de sgyu ma'i dpes nye bar mtshon pa ste/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sgyu ma

lta bu dang chu zla dang mig yor dang smig rgyu dang rmi lam dang sgra brnyan dang dri za'i grong khyer dang mig 'phrul dang dbang po'i gzhu dang glog dang chu bur dang / me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis

kyis bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin nye bar mtshon par byed pa yin no/ /ji ltar 'o ma bsrubs pa las mar dang / ji ltar til las til mar te/ de bzhin du rdo rjes ni thabs kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i

phyir dang / pad+mas ni shes rab kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro/ /ji ltar 'o ma dang til dag yang dag par mngon par 'dus byas pa med par til mar mi 'byung ba de bzhin du/ sngags dang phyag rgya mngon par

'dus byas pa'i rdo rje dang pad+ma mnyam par sbyar ba med par rnam par shes pa gsum nye bar mtshon par mi nus so/ /gang gis b+ha ga dang ling ga yang dag par sbyor bar mi nus pa des ni bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin mi rnyed do/ /
bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig la lhag par mos pa tsam gyis ni las dang po pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa la yang slob par 'gyur ro/ /gang rdo rje dang pad ma mnyam par

sbyor ba'i bde bas rang bzhin snang ba yang dag par nye bar mtshon par byed pa de ni bde ba chen po'i go 'phang la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni sbas pa'i bshad pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das spyi'i don ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos spyod pa/ rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags

las ma grol ba rnams rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dag tu btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa/ 'dod chags kyi chos gsal bar byed pa ngo mtshar can gyi rdo rje'i tshig thos nas smod par byed pa de
rnams dang mi 'gal ba'i sgo nas bshad pa de ni spyi'i don du bshad pa gsungs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags la spyod pa'i chos
kyi tshul du mthar thug pa bshad pa ji ltar lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams legs so/ /legs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po snying rje mchog dang
ldan pa rnams nyon cig /mtha' ni mu ste/ 'od gsal ba yang dag pa'i tshul zhes bya ba mthar thug pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thabs gang gis mthar

thug pa thob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i mtha' stong pa gsum mo/ /stong pa gsum gyi mtha' 'od gsal ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams
kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa gsum 'od gsal ba'i mthar ji ltar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar mes shing bsregs te thal bar byed pa de bzhin du 'od gsal

bar shes rab kyi ye shes yun ring pos rnam par sbyong bar byed do/ /ji ltar ta la'i lo ma thal bar byed pa de bzhin du thabs kyi ye shes rnam par sbyong bar byed do/ /ji ltar ras bal gyi 'dab ma bsregs pa de bzhin du

snang ba thob pa'i ye shes mchog tu myur bas rnam par sbyong bar byed do/ /de bas na rim pa 'dis shing ta la'i lo ma dang / ras bal gyi 'dab ma thal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du stong pa dang / shin du stong pa dang stong pa chen po
rnams mthar 'od gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ni mthar thug pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa'o/ /byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtha' drug gis bshad pa ji

ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dgongs pas bshad pa dang / dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang / drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don dang sgra ji bzhin pa dang sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa rnams so/ /byams pas gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar gzhag ste tshig re re'i bshad pa bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang mthar thug par bshad pa de nyid dgongs pas bshad pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags ma

yin pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa dang / bar ma nye bar mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o/ /lus dang ngag dang yid med pa dang bdag med pa dang thams cad stong pa dang /

dag pa dang 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig ni dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o/ /ga bur dang khrag chen po dang tsan dan dmar po dang rdo rje dang pad ma dang phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni drang

ba'i don te/ ga bur ni khu ba dang khrag chen po ni zla mtshan gyi khrag dang tsan dan dmar po'i khu ba dang bsres pa ni tsan dan dmar po'o/ /rdo rje ni mtshan ma ste thabs so/ /pad ma ni b+ha ga ste shes rab dang

phyag rgya dang btsun mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni nges pa'i don to/ /gnyis ka dang spyod pa dang bya ba'i rgyud rnams su don gsal bar gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ dkyil 'khor dang mchod sbyin dang gtor ma dang

sman dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs rnams dang / de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub chen po brgyad gsungs pa rnams ni/ sgra ji bzhin pa ste de ni yi ge'i don gyi bshad pa'o/ /ko trA khya ko trA ba ko trAH

ko trA pash+tsa/ ko ti rA gA/ ko la khya/ ko la ba/ ko la ko la pash+tsa/ ko lasta tha/ 'dis dbang po dang yul gsungs te/ de lta bu la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o/ /byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dang gnyis ka'i rgyud dang / spyod pa'i rgyud dang bya ba'i rgyud dang rtog pa'i rgyud rnams kyi tshad ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi ming stong phrag bcu gnyis zhes bya ste/ rgyus par phye na grangs med do/ /gnyis ka'i rgyud stong phrag drug go/ spyod pa'i rgyud stong phrag brgyad do/ /bya ba'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o/ /

rtog pa'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o/ /de dag ni stong phrag sum bcu rtsa bzhi ste/ rgyud dang rtog pa'i ming gi mtha' ma'i yi ge ji snyed pa ni/ ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+sha/

'di dag ni ming gi yi ge'i mtha' ma rnams so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi byed pa dang cho ga dang bsgrub bya dang sgrub pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ don dam pa'i bden pa las bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis langs te 'dod chags las byung ba'i byang chub kyi gnas pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dbus su 'khor los sgyur ba'i

gzugs kyi bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis btsun mo'i b+ha ga la yang dag par bzhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang 'gal ba rmad du byung ba'i rdo rje'i tshig gi mtha' drug gang gis rab tu dpyad de bsgrub par byed pa ni

rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud la bzhugs so/ /rig pa'i lha mo rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la dgod pa dang / de las byung ba'i byed pa dang las dang sgrub pa la sogs pa de kho na nyid rnam pa bcu rab tu

dpyad de sgrub par byed pa ni gnyis ka'i rgyud la bzhugs so/ /las kyi bya ba sna tshogs phyag rgya chen po bya ba'i rgyud kyi phyag rgya dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu dpyad pas bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa ni spyod pa'i

rgyud la bzhugs so/ /'jigs par dmigs shing shin du gtsang sbra byed pa dang / ye shes sems dpa'i bde ba dam pa med pa dang / bdag nyid lha'i bsnyems pa med pa dang / rmad du byung ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa dang /

skyon gyi rgyu'i rtog pas rab tu dpyod pas sgrub par byed pa ni bya ba'i rgyud la bzhugs so/ /sngags dang sman dang sbyin sreg dang / phye ma dang mig sman dang rkang mgyogs la sogs pa dngos grub chen po brgyad rab tu dpyad
pa sgrub par byed pa ni rtog pa'i brgyud la bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyan rnam pa bdun ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gleng

bslang ba rnam pa lnga dang mtha' drug gis bshad pa dang / rigs pa rnam pa bzhi dang / bshad pa rnam pa bzhi dang dbye ba rnam pa gnyis dang / gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa dang bden pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs

pa rnams so/ /gleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga ni 'di lta ste/ ming dang gang gi don du byas pa dang byed pa po dang tshad dang dgos pa rnams so/ /mtha' drug tu bshad pa ni 'di lta ste/ dgongs pas bshad pa dang dgongs pa

ma yin pas bshad pa dang drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don dang sgra ji bzhin pa dang sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa rnams so/ /rigs pa rnam pa bzhi ni rgyud dang gleng gzhi dang nges tshig dang rgyu rnams so/ /bshad pa rnam pa bzhi ni yi

ge'i don dang spyi'i don dang sbas pa dang mthar thug pa rnams so/ /dbye ba rnam pa gnyis ni 'di lta ste/ tshogs la bshad pa dang slob ma la bshad pa'o/ /gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa ni 'di lta ste/ rin po che dang tsan

dan dang pad ma dang pad ma dkar po dang ut+pa la rnams so/ /bden pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa ni 'di lta ste/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang don dam pa'i bden pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu kun rdzob ni mi brtan pa dang g.yo ba'o/ /de'i bden

pa ni chu zla lta bu'o/ /don dam pa'i bden pa ni stong pa chen po bcwa brgyad do/ /de'i mtha' ni gnas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa/ /don dam pa'i bden pa la rab tu gnas pa'i rnal 'byor chen po bas

las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la brten nas sems can gyi don ji ltar rab tu spyod par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji srid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyis sems can gyi don mi byed pa de

srid du yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gang du sems can gyi don bya bar mthong ba de'i tshe bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas yang dag pa'i mtha' las langs te sems can gyi don byas nas

yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid du 'jug par byed do/ /de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /

ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las bde ba chen po'i le'u ste rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o/ /rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na ka ra'i zhal snga nas dang / zhu chen

gyi lo ts+cha ba khu ston dngos grub kyis bsgyur/ slad nas bla ma de nyid dang / dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas zhus shing gtan la phab pa/ /ye shes rdo rje kun las btus/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i gsal byed

yin/ /ye shes rang bzhin 'khor ba dang / /mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo bo'o/ /de gnyis dbyer med rdo rje ste/ /kun 'dir 'dus pas kun las btus/ /de ston pa la der btags nas/ /gzhung la'ang ming don 'tsham pa yin// //
lan gnyis zhus/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ tsa tu de bI pa ri prIts+tshA/ bod skad du/ lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
lha mo bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhing / /sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nyer brgyan pa/ /shin du dga' ba'i sbyor chen la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' cher bzhugs te/ /'od zer 'chang zhing 'khrigs pa yi/ /
gsang chen chos kyi 'byung gnas la/ /byang chub sems ni 'phros nas su/ /chos kyi dbyings nas zhu mdzad do/ /zhu ba'i dngos po de mthong nas/ /lha mo spyan mas yongs zhus pa/ /
bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /tshig 'di dag ni gsol ba ste/ /chos kyi dbyings rnams 'phro ba ni/ /gang las skye bar 'gyur ba lags/ /dang po ji ltar 'ong ba yin/ /de bzhin phyir
'gro ji ltar lags/ /yan lag med pa gang de ni/ / / / / / / / / / / / / / / /

yan lag dang bcas 'gyur nas su/ /lus dngos 'gyur ba ji ltar lags/ /mig dang rna ba sna dang ni/ /de bzhin lce dang lus dang yid/ /dbang po phung po'i dngos rnams dang / /khams rnams su ni 'jug pa yang / /ma rig bag chags

sred pa yis/ /bcings pa'i nyon mongs 'dod chags sogs/ /rnam par shes pa sna tshogs pa/ /ji ltar dngos su 'dus pa lags/ /dngos po med pa bsgoms pa'i gzugs/ /gzugs sogs spyod yul mtshan nyid rnams/ /rang bzhin

med cing dmigs med la/ /dmigs pa dang bcas ji ltar lags/ /de dag ngo mtshar chen po ni/ /bdag gi the tshom lhas bka' stsol/ /de ltar zhus ma thag tu ni/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/ /shes rab zab pa zad med ni/ /

nyon cig spyan ma bshad par bya/ /dpyad du med cing shes bya min/ /de bzhin dpyad mkhan gyis shes dka'/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen ni/ /nam mkha' nam mkha'i spyod yul lo/ /mi shes mun pas bsgribs pas na/ /nyan thos

rnams kyis shes pa min/ /spyod yul bag chags shes mkhan ni/ /rang sangs rgyas su sprul pa ste/ /de dag kun gyis kyang mi shes/ /shes med so so'i skye gnas dang / /ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa dang / /da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum la/ /

byol song bag chags las byung ba'i/ /dud 'gro yi dgas skye ba rnams/ /de kun gyis kyang mi shes te/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul gsang chen no/ /snying po shin tu snying po'i mchog /gang de kun bdag la gnas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas kun

gyi gsang chen ni/ /lha mo khyod la bshad par bya/ /byang chub sems dag 'od gsal ba/ /zla ba shel dang mnyam pa'i 'od/ /de nyid ye shes lnga yi dngos/ /yungs kar che ba'i tshad tsam mo/ /de yi dbus su bzhugs pa'i lha/ /mi gsal gsal ba'i

gzugs can te/ /phyed tshad tsam gyi phra mo'i mchog /yid kyi dngos po'i thig le'i gzugs/ /rtag tu snying gi dbus gnas pa/ /'od zer chen po 'bar ba can/ /ji snyed dgu pa'i bar du ni/ /dpral bar la gnas rkang mthil bar/ /thig le de kho nar

bsdus te/ /lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas/ /cha shas lnga pa tsam yin te/ /bcu gnyis kyi ni tha ma la/ /cha shas drug gis mtshan pa nyid/ /nga ro thig les brgyan byed pa/ /rdo rje khong nas phyung nas su/ /sa bon skye gnas dbus bzhag ste/ /

chos kyi dbyings ni zhu bar byed/ /de ni rim par skyed byed na/ /sgo dgu la ni kun du 'gro/ /khyab cing khyab gnas 'gro kun la/ /mi g.yo la sogs g.yo dang bcas/ /tshangs sogs lha dang lha min gyi/ /gzhi ni de las gyur pa

'o/ /gang las gtso bor skyed byed pa/ /sa dang nam mkha' de zhes gsungs/ /ji srid lus la gnas pa'i bar/ /de yis las dang las min byed/ /dge dang mi dge bsam pa yang / /bya ba'i las kun byed pa yin/ /sbyor ba rtag tu

de gsungs te/ /mchod pa bsgom par gsungs pa yin/ /gang tshe las kyi lus zhig na/ /de tshe de yi rang mthu yis/ /de 'dra'i lus su de 'gyur te/ /gang gis g.yo dang mi g.yo khyab/ /nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid 'dra ba/ /

de ni gnas par shes par bya/ /bcu yi gnyis mtha' tshig gi don/ /gang gis rtag tu bsgom byas na/ /des ni dngos grub rgyas pa yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin par bdag nyid 'gyur/ /so dang mchu dang rkan dang lce/ /mgul gnas gang la yod pa ni/ /

gang la de ni yig 'bru nyid/ /de ni zad dang gnas phyir ro/ /brjod pa med cing the tshom pa/ /sgra yig rnam par spangs pa ni/ /rang gi phyi nang de bzhin nyid/ /byang chub sems ni 'dir gsungs so/ /lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las lha mo

spyan mas yongs su zhus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas lha mo mA ma kIs/ /rdo rje can la 'di zhus te/ /byang chub sems kyi rim pa yi/ /kha snying lte ba gsang ba la/ /'gro dang phyir 'ong bstan pa ni/ /

rdo rje chen pos bka' stsal 'tshal/ /cha shas rnam pa du zhig gsungs/ /gnas kyi rnam pa bsgyur ba du/ /kha dog rnam pa du zhig gsungs/ /de bzhin gdan yang ji ltar 'tshal/ /rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa/ /cha shas bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhing / /pad+ma bzhi la yang dag gnas/ /

snying ga'i pad ma la gnas nag /kha yi pad ma la gnas dkar/ /nga ro lte ba'i pad mar gnas/ /gsang ba'i pad ma nga ro mtha'/ /stabs kyi mtha' ru 'gro byed pas/ /thig le'i sbyor bar rab tu gnas/ /bsnom byed

pa dang thos byed pa/ /de tshe mthong byed za byed pa/ /reg par byed kyang de kho nas/ /bde dang sdug bsngal tshor byed pa'o/ /gang las bzhad byed bza' byed pa/ /de bzhin cho nge dang ngu ba/ /byed pa gcod pa de kho nas/ /cho ga rnam pa mang po shes/ /rgyal po

don yang byed par 'gyur/ /dbang phyug don yang byed par 'gyur/ /bram ze rgyal po rje'u rigs dang / /dmangs rigs smad pa'i rigs rnams dang / /bud med du ma sprul par byed/ /dud 'gro yi dgas skye ba dang / /gzugs can rnams dang gzugs med

dang / /de bzhin 'dod pa'i srid rnams las/ /'byung ba thams cad skyed byed ma/ /de nyid kho na rdzu 'phrul gnas/ /mo gzugs dang ni pho yi gzugs/ /bde ba chen po go 'phang gnas/ /de ltar de bzhin nyid shes pa/ /dam pa'i yig 'bru shes pa

gang / /des ni gsang chen shes pa ste/ /gang des bdag nyid kun gnas pa/ /kha dog med cing kha dog dmar/ /kha dog dkar dang ser ba yi/ /thig le'i gzugs su bsgyur ba 'di/ /'gro dang phyir 'ong rnam par bstan/ /gang de rig pa rdzu 'phrul

che/ /mtha' yas bcas pa sna tshogs gzugs/ /skye dang bsdus dang 'jig pa la/ /thig le'i gzugs su rab gnas so/ /gang gi brgyad khri rtsa bzhi'i chos/ /stong phrag brgya ru shes na yang / /de yis de nyid mi shes te/ /de dag kun

kyang 'bras med do/ /bcu gnyis lnga yi lnga pa yang / /brgyad kyi mtha' ru 'byung ba 'dus/ /sgra yig dang po yi ge a/ /lnga pa yis ni yang dag brgyan/ /snying rje chen po las byung ba/ /kha mar bltas pa'i drug pas btags/ /gdod ma mtha' ma

med pa'i lha/ /de ni spyi bor bstan pa yin/ /de dag gsang chen dam pa yin/ /lha mo bdag gis rab bstan to/ /lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las lha mo mA ma kIs zhus pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o// // de nas lha mo gos dkar mos/ /yan lag

kun gyis btud nas su/ /thal mo snying gar sbyar byas te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi bsdu ba dang / /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /rang bzhin nyid ni ji ltar lags/ /lha yi dbang phyug khyod la zhu/ /

gang gis 'od kyi gong bur bsdu/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar lags/ /gsungs shig de nyid yig 'bru'i tshig /'dus pa gsungs pa ji ltar lags/ /chu khams dang ni me yi khams/ /ji ltar ro ni mnyam por 'gyur/ /ma las skye ba gsum

tsam dang / /de bzhin pha las skye ba gsum/ /de dag drug sogs gong bu las/ /ji ltar mi rnams skye ba lags/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni bdag mi 'tshal/ /thub pa chen pos bka' stsal mdzod/ /rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa/ /gsang ba shin du

gsang gyur pa/ /nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya/ /skye gnas dbus su rtsa gnyis ni/ /g.yon dang de bzhin g.yas pa ste/ /g.yon du byang chub sems zhes bya/ /g.yas su de bzhin raka ta'o/ /de gnyis phrad nas gcig 'gyur ba/ /chos kyi dbyings

ni 'dus pa yin/ /mun pa sku ste rdul gsung gzugs/ /thugs kyi rang bzhin snying stobs te/ /rdul ni rak+ta byang chub sems/ /mun pa de bzhin skyed pa yin/ /rdo rje pad ma mnyam sbyar nas/ /rang bzhin mnyam pa'i ror 'gyur ro/ /dri chen chu dang

shel me tog /de bzhin lnga pa byang chub sems/ /bdud rtsi lnga dngos gong bur bsdus/ /de las rdo rje 'dir gsungs so/ /cha shas gnyis pa dang ldan pa/ /de bzhin dgu pa yang yin no/ /de skad gsungs pa de la ni/ /sum bcu dang ni bcu dang ni/ /

de bzhin lnga pa'i sa bon te/ /cha shas gnyis pa lnga yis ni/ /drug gis btags pa des byung ba/ /de ni thig ler gsungs pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi yig 'bru bru~M/ /skye gnas pad+ma la gnas pa/ /de nyid sa bon swA hA mtha'/ /
'dus pa la ni shes par bya/ /chu khams pha las skye zhes bya/ /me yi khams ni ma las skyes/ /sha dang khrag dang pags pa yang / /ma las skyes pa zhes bshad do/ /tshil dang

rkang dang khu ba ni/ /pha las skyes zhes bshad pa yin/ /gong bur yang dag 'dus pa ni/ /de dag tsam du bshad pa yin/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / /de bzhin 'du byed rnam shes rnams/ /sangs rgyas dngos

po lnga yi gzugs/ /phung po zhes byar bshad pa'o/ /lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las lha mo na bza' dkar mos zhus pa ste le'u gsum pa'o// // de nas bzhad pa'i zhal 'gyur te/ /lha mo sgrol ma bcom ldan mas/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub pa ni/ /gsungs shig rdo rje can chen po/ /rdzas rnams sgrub par bka' stsal 'tshal/ /de bzhin rig pa'i sngags rnams kyang / /dkyil 'khor rnams ni brtag pa

dang / /sbyin sreg so sor bya ba dang / /de bzhin mchod pa'i cho ga yang / /khyad par du yang bka' stsal 'tshal/ /de ltar lha mos zhus ma thag /rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub thabs ni/ /

nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni/ /de bzhin ro dang reg la sogs/ /khams bcwa brgyad po de dag kyang / /chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba'o/ /de dag nyid las byung ba ni/ /byang chub sems zhes shes

par bya/ /byang chub sems las gong bu skye/ /gong bu las kyang yid skyed do/ /yid las nam mkha'i khams kyang ni/ /khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams/ /dbang po phung po 'byung ba rnams/ /de ltar dbyings

su bsdus pa ste/ /bsdu ba de ni bstan byas pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub pa yin/ /de bas nan tan thams cad kyis/ /sgrub pa yang dag spyad par bya/ /ji ltar kal pa zhes dngos kyis/ /bsgrub par bya ba rab tu brtag /

chos dbyings sgrub pa bshad nas su/ /rdzas brgyad yan lag sgrub pa bshad/ /ri lu mig sman dngos grub dang / /sa 'og ral gri'i dngos grub dang / /nam mkhar 'phur dang mig sman dang / /'chi ba med dang nad 'joms dang / /

mi dang glang po che dang rta/ /glang dang khyi dang bong bu dang / /rnga mo ma he spyang ki rnams/ /cha ni mnyam por bya ba'o/ /mthe bong tshigs tshad tsam du ni/ /shin du mnyam par bzhag nas sbyar/ /dri chen chu dang rak+ta dang / /byang chub sems

nas tshad tsam ni/ /sngags bzlas nas ni sbyar byas te/ /byin gyis brlabs kyang bya ba'o/ /phyag 'tshal dang ni yi ge AH/ /dbus su de bzhin hU~M byas te/ /'bar ba'i hU~M yig 'bar byed pa/ /dgu po de ni rab tu bsgrub/ /lan ni nyi shu

rtsa gcig tu/ /bsngags bzlas nas ni phye mar btag /yungs kar lnga yi tshad tsam du/ /lnga dang lnga ni 'byor bar bya/ /tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la/ /ri lu rnams ni byas nas su/ /pad ma'i snod la bzhag byas te/ /

stong phrag brgyar ni bzla bar bya/ /mtshams bzhi la ni bsgom byas nas/ /nyin dang mtshan du bza' bar bya/ /de nas bskal pa'i mtha' bar yang / /dngos grub rgyas par 'gro ba ste/ /gzi brjid mdangs dang stobs
brtson 'grus/ /lnga pa la ni smon lam yang / /mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa/ /ri lu chen po zos phyir ro/ /rdzas kyi sgrub pa rnams rdzogs nas/ /rigs pa'i sngags rnams bdag la stsol/ /yi ge a dang
ba~M yig dang / /la~M yig dbus su yang dag gnas/ /dang po'i mdog ni dmar po ste/ /gnyis pa yi ni mdog dkar ba/ /gsum pa kha dog ser ba rnams/ /b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /'khor
lo ltar ni bskor ba ni/ /nyin phyed dang ni mtshan phyed la/ /rig pa de ni rab 'byor na/ /de ni skad cig kho nar 'grub/ /lha mo lha min bu mo dang / /mi yi bu mo rnam pa bzhi/ /sa yi dkyil
'khor kun du ni/ /sngags kyis bkug nas spyad par bya/ /bsgom pa de bzhin rig pa'i sngags/ /bdag gis bshad pa zin byas te/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni

bshad par bya/ /dga' ma sems kyis rtse gcig nyon/ /dkyil 'khor lus shes gsungs pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor b+ha gar bstan pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dang ni/ /dkyil 'khor gsum du btags pa yin/ /btags pa rnams kyang

'dus pa ste/ /gang du gtso bo skyed par byed/ /phung po rnams ni sangs rgyas gsungs/ /'byung ba rig mar btags pa'o/ /chag pa lcags kyu kho na ste/ /zhags pa pad mar chud byed pa/ /kha phrad pa ni sgrags yin par/ /sgra bsgrags pa ni dril bur bshad/ /

spos ni dri chen zhes gsungs te/ /me tog raka ta zhes 'dod do/ /mar me sha rnams kho na yin/ /dri ni byang chub sems zhes 'dod/ /sgeg mo ling+gar bstan pa ste/ /phreng ba b+ha ga kho na yin/ /dbyangs ma dbugs su bstan pa dang / /gar mkhan ma ni

rnal 'byor te/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bzang por gsungs/ /de rtogs pa ni skal bzang yin/ /rtogs pa de rnams byams pa sogs/ /de ltar nang gi bdag nyid gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor gzhan ni sngon bshad zin/ /sbyin sreg las ni bshad
